bemat’atei hashmed ne’um yhvh tseba’ot. nishba‘ yhvh tseba’ot leimor ’im lo ka’asher dimiti ken hayatah vekha’asher ya‘atsti hi taqum. lishbor ’ashur be’artsi ve‘al harai ’abusenu vesar mei‘aleihem ‘ulo vesubolo mei‘al shikhmo yasur. zot ha‘eitsah haye‘utsah ‘al kal ha’arets vezot hayad hanetuyah ‘al kal hagoyim. ki yhvh tseba’ot ya‘ats umi yafer veyado hanetuyah umi yeshibenah. bishnat mot hamelekh ’akhaz hayah hamasa hazeh. ’al tismekhi feleshet kulekh ki nishbar sheibet makekh ki mishoresh nakhash yeitsei tsefa‘ ufiryo saraf me‘ofef. vera‘u bekhorei dalim ve’ebyonim labetakh yirbatsu veheimati bara‘ab shareshekh ushe’eiritekh yaharog. heilili sha‘ar za‘aqi ‘ir namog peleshet kulekh ki mitsafon ‘ashan ba ve’en boded bemo‘adav. umah ya‘aneh mal’akhei go ki yhvh yisad tsiyon ubah yekhesu ‘aniyei ‘amo. masa mo’ab ki belel shudad ‘ar mo’ab nidmah ki belel shudad qir mo’ab nidmah. ‘alah habayit vedibon habamot lebekhi ‘al nebo ve‘al meideba mo’ab yeyeilil bekhal roshav qarekhah kal zaqan geru‘ah. bekhutsotav khageru saq ‘al gagoteha ubirkhoboteha kuloh yeyeilil yored babekhi. vatiz‘aq kheshbon ve’el‘aleh ‘ad yahats nishma‘ qolam ‘al ken khalutsei mo’ab yari‘u nafsho yare‘ah lo. libi lemo’ab yiz‘aq berikheha ‘ad tso‘ar ‘eglat shelishiyah ki ma‘aleh halukhit bibkhi ya‘aleh bo ki derekh khoronayim za‘aqat sheber ye‘o‘eiru. ki mei nimrim meshamot yihyu ki yabesh khatsir kalah deshe yereq lo hayah. ‘al ken yitrah ‘asah ufequdatam ‘al nakhal ha‘arabim yisa’um. ki hiqifah haze‘aqah ’et gebul mo’ab ‘ad ’eglayim yilatah ube’er ’eilim yilatah. ki mei dimon male’u dam ki ’ashit ‘al dimon nosafot lifleitat mo’ab ’aryeh velish’eirit ’adamah. shilkhu khar moshel ’erets misela‘ midbarah ’el har bat tsiyon. vehayah khe‘of noded qen meshulakh tihyenah benot mo’ab ma‘barot le’arnon. habi’u habi’i ‘eitsah ‘asu felilah shiti khalayil tsilekh betokh tsahorayim sateri nidakhim noded ’al tegali. yaguru bakh nidakhai mo’ab hevi seiter lamo mipenei shoded ki ’afes hamets kalah shod tamu romes min ha’arets. vehukhan bakhesed kisei veyashab ‘alav be’emet be’ohel david shofet vedoresh mishpat umehir tsedeq. shama‘nu ge’on mo’ab gei me’od ga’avato uge’ono ve‘ebrato lo khen badav. lakhen yeyeilil mo’ab lemo’ab kuloh yeyeilil la’ashishei qir khareset tehgu ’akh nekha’im. ki shadmot kheshbon ’umlal gefen sibmah ba‘alei goyim halemu seruqeha ‘ad ya‘zer naga‘u ta‘u midbar shelukhoteha niteshu ‘aberu yam. ‘al ken ’ebkeh bibkhi ya‘zer gefen sibmah ’arayavekh dim‘ati kheshbon ve’el‘aleh ki ‘al qeitsekh ve‘al qetsirekh heidad nafal. vene’esaf simkhah vagil min hakarmel ubakeramim lo yerunan lo yero‘a‘ yayin bayqabim lo yidrokh hadorekh heidad hishbati. ‘al ken mei‘ai lemo’ab kakinor yehemu veqirbi leqir khares. vehayah khi nir’ah ki nil’ah mo’ab ‘al habamah uba ’el miqdasho lehitpalel velo yukhal. zeh hadabar ’asher diber yhvh ’el mo’ab mei’az. ve‘atah diber yhvh leimor beshalosh shanim kishnei sakhir veniqlah kebod mo’ab bekhol hehamon harab ushe’ar me‘at miz‘ar lo khabir. masa damaseq hineh dameseq musar mei‘ir vehayetah me‘i mapalah. ‘azubot ‘arei ‘aro‘er la‘adarim tihyenah verabetsu ve’en makharid. venishbat mibtsar mei’efrayim umamlakhah midameseq ushe’ar ’aram kikhbod benei yisra’el yihyu ne’um yhvh tseba’ot. vehayah bayom hahu yidal kebod ya‘aqob umishman besaro yeirazeh. vehayah ke’esof qatsir qamah uzero‘o shibolim yiqtsor vehayah kimlaqet shibolim be‘eimeq refa’im. venish’ar bo ‘oleilot kenoqef zayit shenayim sheloshah gargerim berosh ’amir ’arba‘ah khamishah bis‘ifeha poriyah ne’um yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. bayom hahu yish‘eh ha’adam ‘al ‘oseihu ve‘einav ’el qedosh yisra’el tir’enah. velo yish‘eh ’el hamizbekhot ma‘aseh yadav va’asher ‘asu ’etsbe‘otav lo yir’eh veha’asheirim vehakhamanim. bayom hahu yihyu ‘arei ma‘uzo ka‘azubat hakhoresh veha’amir ’asher ‘azebu mipenei benei yisra’el vehayetah shemamah. ki shakhakhat ’elohei yish‘ekh vetsur ma‘uzekh lo zakharet ‘al ken tite‘i nit‘ei na‘amanim uzemorat zar tizra‘enu. beyom nit‘ekh tesagseigi ubaboqer zar‘ekh tafrikhi ned qatsir beyom nakhalah ukhe’eb ’anush. ho hamon ‘amim rabim kahamot yamim yehemayun ushe’on le’umim kish’on mayim kabirim yisha’un. le’umim kish’on mayim rabim yisha’un vega‘ar bo venas mimerkhaq verudaf kemots harim lifnei ruakh ukhegalgal lifnei sufah. le‘et ‘ereb vehineh balahah beterem boqer ’einenu zeh kheileq shoseinu vegoral lebozezeinu. ho ’erets tsiltsal kenafayim ’asher mei‘eiber lenaharei khush. hasholeiakh bayam tsirim ubikhlei gome ‘al penei mayim lekhu mal’akhim qalim ’el go memushakh umorat ’el ‘am nora min hu vahale’ah go qav qav umebusah ’asher baze’u neharim ’artso. kal yoshebei teibel veshokhenei ’arets kinso nes harim tir’u vekhitqoa‘ shofar tishma‘u. ki khoh ’amar yhvh ’eilai ’eshqotah ’eshqotah ve’abitah bimkhoni kekhom tsakh ‘alei ’or ke‘ab tal bekhom qatsir. ki lifnei qatsir ketam perakh uboser gomel yihyeh nitsah vekharat hazalzalim bamazmeirot ve’et hanetishot heisir heitaz. yei‘azebu yakhdav le‘et harim ulebehemat ha’arets veqats ‘alav ha‘ayit vekhal behemat ha’arets ‘alav tekheraf. ba‘et hahi yubal shai yhvh tseba’ot ‘am memushakh umorat umei‘am nora min hu vahale’ah go qav qav umebusah ’asher baze’u neharim ’artso ’el meqom shem yhvh tseba’ot har tsiyon. masa mitsrayim hineh yhvh rokheb ‘al ‘ab qal uba mitsrayim vena‘u ’elilei mitsrayim mipanav ulebab mitsrayim yimas beqirbo. vesikhsakhti mitsrayim bemitsrayim venilkhamu ’ish be’akhiv ve’ish berei‘eihu ‘ir be‘ir mamlakhah bemamlakhah. venabeqah ruakh mitsrayim beqirbo va‘atsato ’abaleia‘ vedareshu ’el ha’elilim ve’el ha’itim ve’el ha’obot ve’el hayide‘onim. vesikarti ’et mitsrayim beyad ’adonim qasheh umelekh ‘az yimshal bam ne’um ha’adon yhvh tseba’ot. venishetu mayim meihayam venahar yekherab veyabesh. vehe’eznikhu neharot dalalu vekharebu ye’orei matsor qaneh vasuf qameilu. ‘arot ‘al ye’or ‘al pi ye’or vekhol mizra‘ ye’or yibash nidaf ve’einenu. ve’anu hadayagim ve’abelu kal mashlikhei bai’or khakah uforesei mikhmoret ‘al penei mayim ’umlalu. uboshu ‘obedei fishtim seriqot ve’oregim khorai. vehayu shatoteha meduka’im kal ‘osei sekher ’agmei nafesh. ’akh ’evilim sarei tso‘an khakhmei yo‘atsei far‘oh ‘eitsah nib‘arah ’ekh tomeru ’el par‘oh ben khakhamim ’ani ben malkhei qedem. ’ayam ’eifo khakhamekha veyagidu na lakh veyeide‘u mah ya‘ats yhvh tseba’ot ‘al mitsrayim. no’alu sarei tso‘an nishe’u sarei nof hit‘u ’et mitsrayim pinat shebateha. yhvh masakh beqirbah ruakh ‘iv‘im vehit‘u ’et mitsrayim bekhal ma‘aseihu kehita‘ot shikor beqi’o. velo yihyeh lemitsrayim ma‘aseh ’asher ya‘aseh rosh vezanab kipah ve’agmon. bayom hahu yihyeh mitsrayim kanashim vekharad ufakhad mipenei tenufat yad yhvh tseba’ot ’asher hu meinif ‘alav. vehayetah ’admat yehudah lemitsrayim lekhaga kol ’asher yazkir ’otah ’eilav yifkhad mipenei ‘atsat yhvh tseba’ot ’asher hu yo‘ets ‘alav. bayom hahu yihyu khamesh ‘arim be’erets mitsrayim medaberot sefat kena‘an venishba‘ot yhvh tseba’ot ‘ir haheres yei’amer le’ekhat. bayom hahu yihyeh mizbeiakh yhvh betokh ’erets mitsrayim umatseibah ’eitsel gebulah yhvh. vehayah le’ot ule‘ed yhvh tseba’ot be’erets mitsrayim ki yits‘aqu ’el yhvh mipenei lokhatsim veyishlakh lahem moshia‘ varab vehitsilam. venoda‘ yhvh lemitsrayim veyade‘u mitsrayim ’et yhvh bayom hahu ve‘abedu zebakh uminkhah venaderu neider yhvh veshileimu. venagaf yhvh ’et mitsrayim nagof verafo veshabu ‘ad yhvh vene‘tar lahem urefa’am. bayom hahu tihyeh mesilah mimitsrayim ’ashurah uba ’ashur bemitsrayim umitsrayim be’ashur ve‘abedu mitsrayim ’et ’ashur. bayom hahu yihyeh yisra’el shelishiyah lemitsrayim ule’ashur berakhah beqereb ha’arets. ’asher beirakho yhvh tseba’ot leimor barukh ‘ami mitsrayim uma‘aseh yadai ’ashur venakhalati yisra’el. bishnat bo tartan ’ashdodah bishlokh ’oto sargon melekh ’ashur vayilakhem be’ashdod vayilkedah. ba‘et hahi diber yhvh beyad yesha‘yahu ben ’amots leimor lekh ufitakhta hasaq mei‘al matenekha vena‘alkha takhalots mei‘al raglekha vaya‘as ken halokh ‘arom veyakhef. vayomer yhvh ka’asher halakh ‘abdi yesha‘yahu ‘arom veyakhef shalosh shanim ’ot umofet ‘al mitsrayim ve‘al kush. ken yinhag melekh ’ashur ’et shebi mitsrayim ve’et galut kush ne‘arim uzeqeinim ‘arom veyakhef vakhasufai shet ‘ervat mitsrayim. vekhatu vaboshu mikush mabatam umin mitsrayim tif’artam. ve’amar yosheb ha’i hazeh bayom hahu hineh khoh mabateinu ’asher nasnu sham le‘ezrah lehinatsel mipenei melekh ’ashur ve’ekh nimalet ’anakhenu. masa midbar yam kesufot banegeb lakhalof mimidbar ba mei’erets nora’ah. khazut qashah hugad li haboged boged vehashoded shoded ‘ali ‘eilam tsuri madai kal ’ankhatah hishbati. ‘al ken male’u matenai khalkhalah tsirim ’akhazuni ketsirei yoleidah na‘aveiti mishemoa‘ nibhalti meire’ot. ta‘ah lebabi palatsut bi‘atateni ’et neshef khishqi sam li lakharadah. ‘arokh hashulkhan tsafoh hatsafit ’akhol shatoh qumu hasarim mishkhu magen. ki khoh ’amar ’eilai ’adonai lekh ha‘amed hamtsapeh ’asher yir’eh yagid. vera’ah rekheb tsemed parashim rekheb khamor rekheb gamal vehiqshib qesheb rab qasheb. vayiqra ’aryeh ‘al mitspeh ’adonai ’anokhi ‘omed tamid yomam ve‘al mishmarti ’anokhi nitsab kal haleilot. vehineh zeh ba rekheb ’ish tsemed parashim vaya‘an vayomer nafelah nafelah babel vekhal pesilei ’eloheha shibar la’arets. medushati uben gareni ’asher shama‘ti mei’et yhvh tseba’ot ’elohei yisra’el higadti lakhem. masa dumah ’eilai qorei misei‘ir shomer mah milaylah shomer mah milel. ’amar shomer ’atah boqer vegam layelah ’im tib‘ayun be‘ayu shubu ’eitayu. masa ba‘rab baya‘ar ba‘rab talinu ’orekhot dedanim. liqrat tsamei heitayu mayim yoshebei ’erets teima belakhmo qidemu noded. ki mipenei kharabot nadadu mipenei khereb netushah umipenei qeshet derukhah umipenei kobed milkhamah. ki khoh ’amar ’adonai ’eilai be‘od shanah kishnei sakhir vekhalah kal kebod qeidar. ushe’ar mispar qeshet giborei benei qeidar yim‘atu ki yhvh ’elohei yisra’el diber. masa gei khizayon mah lakh ’eifo ki ‘alit kulakh lagagot. teshu’ot melei’ah ‘ir homiyah qiryah ‘alizah khalalayikh lo khalei khereb velo meitei milkhamah. kal qetsinayikh nadedu yakhad miqeshet ’usaru kal nimtsa’ayikh ’useru yakhdav meirakhoq barakhu. ‘al ken ’amarti she‘u mini ’amarer babekhi ’al ta’itsu lenakhameini ‘al shod bat ‘ami. ki yom mehumah umebusah umebukhah ladonai yhvh tseba’ot begei khizayon meqarqar qir veshoa‘ ’el hahar. ve‘eilam nasa ’ashpah berekheb ’adam parashim veqir ‘eirah magen. vayhi mibkhar ‘amaqayikh male’u rakheb vehaparashim shot shatu hasha‘erah. vaygal ’et masakh yehudah vatabet bayom hahu ’el nesheq bet haya‘ar. ve’et beqi‘ei ‘ir david re’item ki rabu vateqabetsu ’et mei habereikhah hatakhtonah. ve’et batei yerushalim sefartem vatitsev habatim lebatser hakhomah. umiqvah ‘asitem ben hakhomotayim lemei habereikhah hayshanah velo hibatem ’el ‘oseha veyotserah meirakhoq lo re’item. vayiqra ’adonai yhvh tseba’ot bayom hahu libkhi ulemisped uleqarekhah velakhagor saq. vehineh sason vesimkhah harog baqar veshakhot tson ’akhol basar veshatot yayin ’akhol veshato ki makhar namut. veniglah be’azenai yhvh tseba’ot ’im yekhupar he‘avon hazeh lakhem ‘ad temutun ’amar ’adonai yhvh tseba’ot. koh ’amar ’adonai yhvh tseba’ot lekh bo ’el hasokhen hazeh ‘al shebna ’asher ‘al habayit. mah lekha foh umi lekha foh ki khatsabta lekha poh qaber khotsebi marom qibro khoqeqi basela‘ mishkan lo. hineh yhvh metaltelkha talteilah gaber ve‘otekha ‘atoh. tsanof yitsnafekha tseneifah kadur ’el ’erets rakhabat yadayim shamah tamut veshamah markebot kebodekha qelon bet ’adonekha. vahadaftikha mimatsabekha umima‘amadekha yehersekha. vehayah bayom hahu veqarati le‘abdi le’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu. vehilbashtiv kutanetekha ve’abneitekha ’akhazeqenu umemsheltekha ’eten beyado vehayah le’ab leyosheb yerushalim ulebet yehudah. venatati mafteiakh bet david ‘al shikhmo ufatakh ve’en soger vesagar ve’en poteiakh. uteqa‘tiv yated bemaqom ne’eman vehayah lekhisei khabod lebet ’abiv. vetalu ‘alav kol kebod bet ’abiv hatse’etsa’im vehatsefi‘ot kol kelei haqatan mikelei ha’aganot ve‘ad kal kelei hanebalim. bayom hahu ne’um yhvh tseba’ot tamush hayated hatequ‘ah bemaqom ne’eman venigde‘ah venafelah venikhrat hamasa ’asher ‘aleha ki yhvh diber. masa tsor heililu ’oniyot tarshish ki shudad mibayit mibo mei’erets kitim niglah lamo. domu yoshebei ’i sokher tsidon ‘ober yam mil’ukh. ubemayim rabim zera‘ shikhor qetsir ye’or tebu’atah vatehi sekhar goyim. boshi tsidon ki ’amar yam ma‘oz hayam leimor lo khalti velo yaladti velo gidalti bakhurim romamti betulot. ka’asher sheima‘ lemitsrayim yakhilu kesheima‘ tsor. ‘ibru tarshishah heililu yoshebei ’i. hazot lakhem ‘alizah mimei qedem qadmatah yobiluha ragleha meirakhoq lagur. mi ya‘ats zot ‘al tsor hama‘atirah ’asher sokhareh sarim kin‘aneha nikhbadei ’arets. yhvh tseba’ot ye‘atsah lekhalel ge’on kal tsebi lehaqel kal nikhbadei ’arets. ‘ibri ’artsekh kai’or bat tarshish ’en meizakh ‘od. yado natah ‘al hayam hirgiz mamlakhot yhvh tsivah ’el kena‘an lashmid ma‘uzneha. vayomer lo tosifi ‘od la‘loz ham‘ushaqah betulat bat tsidon kitiyim kitim qumi ‘abori gam sham lo yanuakh lakh. hen ’erets kasdim zeh ha‘am lo hayah ’ashur yesadah letsiyim heiqimu bekhinav bakhunav ‘oreru ’armenoteha samah lemapeilah. heililu ’oniyot tarshish ki shudad ma‘uzekhen. vehayah bayom hahu venishkakhat tsor shib‘im shanah kimei melekh ’ekhad miqets shib‘im shanah yihyeh letsor keshirat hazonah. qekhi khinor sobi ‘ir zonah nishkakhah heitibi nagen harbi shir lema‘an tizakheiri. vehayah miqets shib‘im shanah yifqod yhvh ’et tsor veshabah le’etnanah vezanetah ’et kal mamlekhot ha’arets ‘al penei ha’adamah. vehayah sakhrah ve’etnanah qodesh yhvh lo yei’atser velo yeikhasen ki layoshebim lifnei yhvh yihyeh sakhrah le’ekhol lesabe‘ah velimkhaseh ‘atiq. hineh yhvh boqeq ha’arets ubolqah ve‘ivah faneha veheifits yoshebeha. vehayah kha‘am kakohen ka‘ebed kadonav kashifkhah kagebirtah kaqoneh kamokher kamalveh kaloeh kanosheh ka’asher noshe bo. hiboq tiboq ha’arets vehiboz tiboz ki yhvh diber ’et hadabar hazeh. ’abelah nabelah ha’arets ’umlelah nabelah teibel ’umlalu merom ‘am ha’arets. veha’arets khanefah takhat yoshebeha ki ‘aberu torot khalefu khoq heifeiru berit ‘olam. ‘al ken ’alah ’akhelah ’erets vaye’shemu yoshebei bah ‘al ken kharu yoshebei ’erets venish’ar ’enosh miz‘ar. ’abal tirosh ’umlelah gafen ne’enkhu kal simkhei leb. shabat mesos tupim khadal she’on ‘alizim shabat mesos kinor. bashir lo yishtu yayin yeimar sheikhar leshotav. nishberah qiryat tohu sugar kal bayit mibo. tsevakhah ‘al hayayin bakhutsot ‘arebah kal simkhah galah mesos ha’arets. nish’ar ba‘ir shamah ushe’iyah yukat sha‘ar. ki khoh yihyeh beqereb ha’arets betokh ha‘amim kenoqef zayit ke‘oleilot ’im kalah batsir. hemah yis’u qolam yaronu big’on yhvh tsahalu miyam. ‘al ken ba’urim kabedu yhvh be’iyei hayam shem yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. mikenaf ha’arets zemirot shama‘nu tsebi latsadiq va’omar razi li razi li ’o li bogedim bagadu ubeged bogdim bagadu. pakhad vafakhat vafakh ‘alekha yosheb ha’arets. vehayah hanas miqol hapakhad yipol ’el hapakhat veha‘oleh mitokh hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki ’arubot mimarom niftakhu vayir‘ashu mosdei ’arets. ro‘ah hitro‘a‘ah ha’arets por hitporah ’erets mot hitmotah ’arets. noa‘ tanua‘ ’erets kashikor vehitnoddah kamelunah vekhabad ‘aleha pish‘ah venafelah velo tosif qum. vehayah bayom hahu yifqod yhvh ‘al tseba hamarom bamarom ve‘al malkhei ha’adamah ‘al ha’adamah. ve’usefu ’aseifah ’asir ‘al bor vesugeru ‘al masger umeirob yamim yipaqeidu. vekhaferah halebanah uboshah hakhamah ki malakh yhvh tseba’ot behar tsiyon ubirushalim veneged zeqeinav kabod. yhvh ’elohai ’atah ’aromimkha ’odeh shimkha ki ‘asita pele ‘eitsot meirakhoq ’emunah ’omen. ki samta mei‘ir lagal qiryah betsurah lemapeilah ’armon zarim mei‘ir le‘olam lo yibaneh. ‘al ken yekhabedukha ‘am ‘az qiryat goyim ‘aritsim yira’ukha. ki hayita ma‘oz ladal ma‘oz la’ebyon batsar lo makhseh mizerem tsel meikhoreb ki ruakh ‘aritsim kezerem qir. kekhoreb betsayon she’on zarim takhnia‘ khoreb betsel ‘ab zemir ‘aritsim ya‘aneh. ve‘asah yhvh tseba’ot lekhal ha‘amim bahar hazeh mishteh shemanim mishteh shemarim shemanim memukhayim shemarim mezuqaqim. ubila‘ bahar hazeh penei halot halot ‘al kal ha‘amim vehamaseikhah hanesukhah ‘al kal hagoyim. bila‘ hamavet lanetsakh umakhah ’adonai yhvh dim‘ah mei‘al kal panim vekherpat ‘amo yasir mei‘al kal ha’arets ki yhvh diber. ve’amar bayom hahu hineh ’eloheinu zeh qivinu lo veyoshi‘einu zeh yhvh qivinu lo nagilah venismekhah bishu‘ato. ki tanuakh yad yhvh bahar hazeh venadosh mo’ab takhtav kehidush matben bemei bemo madmeinah. ufeiras yadav beqirbo ka’asher yefares hasokheh liskhot vehishpil ga’avato ‘im ’arebot yadav. umibtsar misgab khomotekha heishakh hishpil higia‘ la’arets ‘ad ‘afar. bayom hahu yushar hashir hazeh be’erets yehudah ‘ir ‘az lanu yeshu‘ah yashit khomot vakhel. pitkhu she‘arim veyabo go tsadiq shomer ’emunim. yeitser samukh titsor shalom shalom ki bekha batuakh. bitkhu yhvh ‘adei ‘ad ki beyah yhvh tsur ‘olamim. ki heishakh yoshebei marom qiryah nisgabah yashpilenah yashpilah ‘ad ’erets yagi‘enah ‘ad ‘afar. tirmesenah ragel raglei ‘ani pa‘amei dalim. ’orakh latsadiq meisharim yashar ma‘gal tsadiq tefales. ’af ’orakh mishpatekha yhvh qivinukha leshimkha ulezikhrekha ta’avat nafesh. nafshi ’ivitikha balaylah ’af rukhi beqirbi ’ashakhareka ki ka’asher mishpatekha la’arets tsedeq lamedu yoshebei teibel. yukhan rasha‘ bal lamad tsedeq be’erets nekhokhot ye‘avel ubal yir’eh gei’ut yhvh. yhvh ramah yadekha bal yekhezayun yekhezu veyeiboshu qin’at ‘am ’af ’esh tsarekha tokhelem. yhvh tishpot shalom lanu ki gam kal ma‘aseinu pa‘alta lanu. yhvh ’eloheinu be‘alunu ’adonim zulatekha lebad bekha nazkir shemekha. meitim bal yikhyu refa’im bal yaqumu lakhen paqadta vatashmidem vate’abed kal zeikher lamo. yasafta lago yhvh yasafta lago nikhbadeta rikhaqta kal qatsvei ’arets. yhvh batsar peqadukha tsaqun lakhash musarekha lamo. kemo harah taqrib laledet takhil tiz‘aq bakhabaleha ken hayinu mipanekha yhvh. harinu khalnu kemo yaladnu ruakh yeshu‘ot bal na‘aseh ’erets ubal yipelu yoshebei teibel. yikhyu meitekha nebeilati yequmun haqitsu veranenu shokhenei ‘afar ki tal ’orot talekha va’arets refa’im tapil. lekh ‘ami bo bakhadarekha usegor delatekha delatekha ba‘adekha khabi khim‘at rega‘ ‘ad ya‘abor ya‘abar za‘am. ki hineh yhvh yotsei mimeqomo lifqod ‘avon yosheb ha’arets ‘alav vegiletah ha’arets ’et dameha velo tekhaseh ‘od ‘al harugeha. bayom hahu yifqod yhvh bekharbo haqashah vehagedolah vehakhazaqah ‘al livyatan nakhash bariakh ve‘al livyatan nakhash ‘aqalaton veharag ’et hatanin ’asher bayam. bayom hahu kerem khemed ‘anu lah. ’ani yhvh notserah lirga‘im ’ashqenah pen yifqod ‘aleha laylah vayom ’etsorenah. kheimah ’en li mi yiteneini shamir shayit bamilkhamah ’efse‘ah bah ’atsitenah yakhad. ’o yakhazeq bema‘uzi ya‘aseh shalom li shalom ya‘aseh li. haba’im yashresh ya‘aqob yatsits ufarakh yisra’el umale’u fenei teibel tenubah. hakemakat makeihu hikahu ’im kehereg harugav horag. besase’ah beshalkhah teribenah hagah berukho haqashah beyom qadim. lakhen bezot yekhupar ‘avon ya‘aqob vezeh kal peri hasir khatato besumo kal ’abnei mizbeiakh ke’abnei gir menupatsot lo yaqumu ’asheirim vekhamanim. ki ‘ir betsurah badad naveh meshulakh vene‘ezab kamidbar sham yir‘eh ‘eigel vesham yirbats vekhilah se‘ifeha. bibosh qetsirah tishabarnah nashim ba’ot me’irot ’otah ki lo ‘am binot hu ‘al ken lo yerakhamenu ‘oseihu veyotsero lo yekhunenu. vehayah bayom hahu yakhbot yhvh mishibolet hanahar ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim ve’atem teluqetu le’akhad ’ekhad benei yisra’el. vehayah bayom hahu yitaqa‘ beshofar gadol uba’u ha’obedim be’erets ’ashur vehanidakhim be’erets mitsrayim vehishtakhavu yhvh behar haqodesh birushalim. ho ‘ateret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim vetsits nobel tsebi tif’arto ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim halumei yayin. hineh khazaq ve’amits ladonai kezerem barad sa‘ar qateb kezerem mayim kabirim shotefim hiniakh la’arets beyad. beraglayim teiramasnah ‘ateret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim. vehayetah tsitsat nobel tsebi tif’arto ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim kebikurah beterem qayits ’asher yir’eh haro’eh ’otah be‘odah bekhapo yibla‘enah. bayom hahu yihyeh yhvh tseba’ot la‘ateret tsebi velitsfirat tif’arah lish’ar ‘amo. uleruakh mishpat layosheb ‘al hamishpat veligburah meshibei milkhamah sha‘erah. vegam ’eleh bayayin shagu ubasheikhar ta‘u kohen venabi shagu basheikhar nible‘u min hayayin ta‘u min hasheikhar shagu baro’eh paqu peliliyah. ki kal shulkhanot male’u qi tso’ah beli maqom. ’et mi yoreh dei‘ah ve’et mi yabin shemu‘ah gemulei meikhalab ‘atiqei mishadayim. ki tsav latsav tsav latsav qav laqav qav laqav ze‘er sham ze‘er sham. ki bela‘agei safah ubelashon ’akheret yedaber ’el ha‘am hazeh. ’asher ’amar ’aleihem zot hamenukhah hanikhu le‘ayef vezot hamargei‘ah velo ’abu shemoa‘. vehayah lahem debar yhvh tsav latsav tsav latsav qav laqav qav laqav ze‘er sham ze‘er sham lema‘an yeilekhu vekhashelu ’akhor venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. lakhen shim‘u debar yhvh ’anshei latson moshelei ha‘am hazeh ’asher birushalim. ki ’amartem karatnu berit ’et mavet ve‘im she’ol ‘asinu khozeh shit shot shotef ki ‘abar ya‘abor lo yebo’einu ki samnu khazab makhseinu ubasheqer nistarenu. lakhen koh ’amar ’adonai yhvh hini yisad betsiyon ’aben ’eben bokhan pinat yiqrat musad musad hama’amin lo yakhish. vesamti mishpat leqav utsedaqah lemishqalet veya‘ah barad makhseh khazab veseiter mayim yishtofu. vekhupar beritekhem ’et mavet vekhazutekhem ’et she’ol lo taqum shot shotef ki ya‘abor vihyitem lo lemirmas. midei ‘abero yiqakh ’etkhem ki baboqer baboqer ya‘abor bayom ubalayelah vehayah raq zeva‘ah habin shemu‘ah. ki qatsar hamatsa‘ meihistareia‘ vehamaseikhah tsarah kehitkanes. ki khehar peratsim yaqum yhvh ke‘eimeq begib‘on yirgaz la‘asot ma‘aseihu zar ma‘aseihu vela‘abod ‘abodato nakheriyah ‘abodato. ve‘atah ’al titlotsatsu pen yekhzequ mosreikhem ki khalah venekheratsah shama‘ti mei’et ’adonai yhvh tseba’ot ‘al kal ha’arets. ha’azinu veshim‘u qoli haqshibu veshim‘u ’imrati. hakhol hayom yakharosh hakhoresh lizroa‘ yefatakh visaded ’admato. halo ’im shivah faneha veheifits qetsakh vekhamon yizroq vesam khitah sorah use‘orah nisman vekhusemet gebulato. veyisero lamishpat ’elohav yorenu. ki lo bekharuts yudash qetsakh ve’ofan ‘agalah ‘al kamon yusab ki bamateh yeikhabet qetsakh vekhamon bashabet. lekhem yudaq ki lo lanetsakh ’adosh yedushenu vehamam gilgal ‘eglato ufarashav lo yeduqenu. gam zot mei‘im yhvh tseba’ot yatsa’ah hifli ‘eitsah higdil tushiyah. ho ’ari’el ’ari’el qiryat khanah david sefu shanah ‘al shanah khagim yinqofu. vahatsiqoti la’ari’el vehayetah ta’aniyah va’aniyah vehayetah li ka’ari’el. vekhaniti khadur ‘alayikh vetsarti ‘alayikh mutsab vahaqimoti ‘alayikh metsurot. veshafalt mei’erets tedabeiri umei‘afar tishakh ’imratekh vehayah ke’ob mei’erets qolekh umei‘afar ’imratekh tetsaftsef. vehayah ke’abaq daq hamon zarayikh ukhemots ‘ober hamon ‘aritsim vehayah lefeta‘ pit’om. mei‘im yhvh tseba’ot tipaqed bera‘am ubera‘ash veqol gadol sufah use‘arah velahab ’esh ’okheilah. vehayah kakhalom khazon laylah hamon kal hagoyim hatsobe’im ‘al ’ari’el vekhal tsobeha umetsodatah vehametsiqim lah. vehayah ka’asher yakhalom hara‘eb vehineh ’okhel veheiqits vereiqah nafsho vekha’asher yakhalom hatsamei vehineh shoteh veheiqits vehineh ‘ayef venafsho shoqeiqah ken yihyeh hamon kal hagoyim hatsobe’im ‘al har tsiyon. hitmahmehu utemahu hishta‘ash‘u vasho‘u shakheru velo yayin na‘u velo sheikhar. ki nasakh ‘aleikhem yhvh ruakh tardeimah vai‘atsem ’et ‘eineikhem ’et hanebi’im ve’et rasheikhem hakhozim kisah. vatehi lakhem khazut hakol kedibrei haseifer hekhatum ’asher yitenu ’oto ’el yodeia‘ haseifer seifer leimor qera na zeh ve’amar lo ’ukhal ki khatum hu. venitan haseifer ‘al ’asher lo yada‘ seifer leimor qera na zeh ve’amar lo yada‘ti seifer. vayomer ’adonai ya‘an ki nigash ha‘am hazeh befiv ubisfatav kibeduni velibo rikhaq mimeni vatehi yir’atam ’oti mitsvat ’anashim melumadah. lakhen hini yosif lehafli ’et ha‘am hazeh haflei vafele ve’abedah khakhemat khakhamav ubinat nebonav tistatar. ho hama‘amiqim yhvh lastir ‘eitsah vehayah bemakhshakh ma‘aseihem vayomeru mi ro’einu umi yod‘einu. hafkekhem ’im kekhomer hayotser yeikhasheb ki yomar ma‘aseh le‘oseihu lo ‘asani veyeitser ’amar leyotsro lo heibin. halo ‘od me‘at miz‘ar veshab lebanon lakarmel vehakarmel laya‘ar yeikhasheb. veshame‘u bayom hahu hakheireshim dibrei seifer umei’ofel umeikhoshekh ‘einei ‘ivrim tir’enah. veyasefu ‘anavim yhvh simkhah ve’ebyonei ’adam biqdosh yisra’el yagilu. ki ’afes ‘arits vekhalah lets venikhretu kal shoqedei ’aven. makhati’ei ’adam bedabar velamokhiakh basha‘ar yeqoshun vayatu batohu tsadiq. lakhen koh ’amar yhvh ’el bet ya‘aqob ’asher padah ’et ’abraham lo ‘atah yeibosh ya‘aqob velo ‘atah panav yekhevaru. ki bir’oto yeladav ma‘aseh yadai beqirbo yaqdishu shemi vehiqdishu ’et qedosh ya‘aqob ve’et ’elohei yisra’el ya‘aritsu. veyade‘u to‘ei ruakh binah verognim yilmedu leqakh. ho banim sorim ne’um yhvh la‘asot ‘eitsah velo mini velinsokh maseikhah velo rukhi lema‘an sefot khatat ‘al khatat. haholekhim laredet mitsrayim ufi lo sha’alu la‘oz bema‘oz par‘oh velakhsot betsel mitsrayim. vehayah lakhem ma‘oz par‘oh leboshet vehekhasut betsel mitsrayim likhlimah. ki hayu betso‘an sarav umal’akhav khanes yagi‘u. kol hib’ish hobish ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu lamo lo le‘eizer velo leho‘il ki leboshet vegam lekherpah. masa bahamot negeb be’erets tsarah vetsuqah labi valayish meihem ’ef‘eh vesaraf me‘ofef yis’u ‘al ketef ‘ayarim kheileihem ve‘al dabeshet gemalim ’otsrotam ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu. umitsrayim hebel variq ya‘zoru lakhen qarati lazot rahab hem shabet. ‘atah bo khatebah ‘al luakh ’itam ve‘al seifer khuqah utehi leyom ’akharon la‘ad ‘ad ‘olam. ki ‘am meri hu banim kekhashim banim lo ’abu shemoa‘ torat yhvh. ’asher ’ameru laro’im lo tir’u velakhozim lo tekhezu lanu nekhokhot daberu lanu khalaqot khazu mahatalot. suru minei derekh hatu minei ’orakh hashbitu mipaneinu ’et qedosh yisra’el. lakhen koh ’amar qedosh yisra’el ya‘an ma’asekhem badabar hazeh vatibtekhu be‘osheq venaloz vatisha‘anu ‘alav. lakhen yihyeh lakhem he‘avon hazeh keferets nofel nib‘eh bekhomah nisgabah ’asher pit’om lefeta‘ yabo shibrah. ushebarah kesheiber neibel yotsrim katut lo yakhmol velo yimatsei bimkhitato kheres lakhtot ’esh miyaqud velakhsof mayim migebe. ki khoh ’amar ’adonai yhvh qedosh yisra’el beshubah vanakhat tivashei‘un behashqet ubebitkhah tihyeh geburatkhem velo ’abitem. vatomeru lo khi ‘al sus nanus ‘al ken tenusun ve‘al qal nirkab ‘al ken yiqalu rodefeikhem. ’elef ’ekhad mipenei ga‘arat ’ekhad mipenei ga‘arat khamishah tanusu ‘ad ’im notartem katoren ‘al rosh hahar vekhanes ‘al hagib‘ah. velakhen yekhakeh yhvh lakhanankhem velakhen yarum lerakhemkhem ki ’elohei mishpat yhvh ’ashrei kal khokhei lo. ki ‘am betsiyon yeisheb birushalim bakho lo tibkeh khanon yakhenekha leqol za‘aqekha keshame‘ato ‘anakh. venatan lakhem ’adonai lekhem tsar umayim lakhats velo yikanef ‘od morekha vehayu ‘einekha ro’ot ’et morekha. ve’azenekha tishma‘nah dabar mei’akharekha leimor zeh haderekh lekhu bo ki ta’aminu vekhi tasme’ilu. vetimeitem ’et tsipui pesilei khaspekha ve’et ’afudat maseikhat zehabekha tizrem kemo davah tsei tomar lo. venatan metar zar‘akha ’asher tizra‘ ’et ha’adamah velekhem tebu’at ha’adamah vehayah dashen veshamen yir‘eh miqnekha bayom hahu kar nirkhab. veha’alafim veha‘ayarim ‘obedei ha’adamah belil khamits yokheilu ’asher zoreh barakhat ubamizreh. vehayah ‘al kal har gaboha ve‘al kal gib‘ah nisa’ah pelagim yiblei mayim beyom hereg rab binfol migdalim. vehayah ’or halebanah ke’or hakhamah ve’or hakhamah yihyeh shib‘atayim ke’or shib‘at hayamim beyom khabosh yhvh ’et sheber ‘amo umakhats makato yirpa. hineh shem yhvh ba mimerkhaq bo‘er ’apo vekhobed masa’ah sefatav male’u za‘am uleshono ke’esh ’okhalet. verukho kenakhal shotef ‘ad tsavar yekhetseh lahanafah goyim benafat shav veresen mat‘eh ‘al lekhayei ‘amim. hashir yihyeh lakhem kelel hitqadesh khag vesimkhat leibab kaholekh bekhalil labo behar yhvh ’el tsur yisra’el. vehishmia‘ yhvh ’et hod qolo venakhat zero‘o yar’eh beza‘af ’af velahab ’esh ’okheilah nefets vazerem ve’eben barad. ki miqol yhvh yeikhat ’ashur basheibet yakeh. vehayah kol ma‘abar mateh musadah ’asher yaniakh yhvh ‘alav betupim ubekhinorot ubemilkhamot tenufah nilkham bah bam. ki ‘arukh mei’etmul tafeteh gam hu hi lamelekh hukhan he‘miq hirkhib meduratah ’esh ve‘eitsim harbeh nishmat yhvh kenakhal gaferit bo‘arah bah. ho hayoredim mitsrayim le‘ezrah ‘al susim yisha‘einu vayibtekhu ‘al rekheb ki rab ve‘al parashim ki ‘atsemu me’od velo sha‘u ‘al qedosh yisra’el ve’et yhvh lo darashu. vegam hu khakham vayabei ra‘ ve’et debarav lo heisir veqam ‘al bet merei‘im ve‘al ‘ezrat po‘alei ’aven. umitsrayim ’adam velo ’el vesuseihem basar velo ruakh yhvh yateh yado vekhashal ‘ozer venafal ‘azur veyakhdav kulam yikhlayun. ki khoh ’amar yhvh ’eilai ka’asher yehgeh ha’aryeh vehakefir ‘al tarpo ’asher yiqarei ‘alav melo ro‘im miqolam lo yeikhat umeihamonam lo ya‘aneh ken yeired yhvh tseba’ot litsbo ‘al har tsiyon ve‘al gib‘atah. ketsiporim ‘afot ken yagen yhvh tseba’ot ‘al yerushalim ganon vehitsil pasoakh vehimlit. shubu la’asher he‘miqu sarah benei yisra’el. ki bayom hahu yim’asun ’ish ’elilei khaspo ve’elilei zehabo ’asher ‘asu lakhem yedeikhem khet. venafal ’ashur bekhereb lo ’ish vekhereb lo ’adam tokhalenu venas lo mipenei khereb ubakhurav lamas yihyu. vesal‘o mimagor ya‘abor vekhatu mines sarav ne’um yhvh ’asher ’ur lo betsiyon vetanur lo birushalim. hen letsedeq yimlakh melekh ulesarim lemishpat yasoru. vehayah ’ish kemakhabei ruakh veseiter zarem kefalgei mayim betsayon ketsel sela‘ kabed be’erets ‘ayeifah. velo tish‘enah ‘einei ro’im ve’azenei shome‘im tiqshabnah. ulebab nimharim yabin lada‘at uleshon ‘ilegim temaher ledaber tsakhot. lo yiqarei ‘od lenabal nadib ulekhilai lo yei’amer shoa‘. ki nabal nebalah yedaber velibo ya‘aseh ’aven la‘asot khonef uledaber ’el yhvh to‘ah lehariq nefesh ra‘eb umashqeh tsamei yakhsir. vekheilai keilav ra‘im hu zimot ya‘ats lekhabel ‘anavim ‘aniyim be’imrei sheqer ubedaber ’ebyon mishpat. venadib nedibot ya‘ats vehu ‘al nedibot yaqum. nashim sha’ananot qomenah shema‘nah qoli banot botkhot ha’zenah ’imrati. yamim ‘al shanah tirgaznah botekhot ki kalah batsir ’osef beli yabo. khirdu sha’ananot regazah botekhot peshotah ve‘orah vakhagorah ‘al khalatsayim. ‘al shadayim sofedim ‘al sedei khemed ‘al gefen poriyah. ‘al ’admat ‘ami qots shamir ta‘aleh ki ‘al kal batei masos qiryah ‘alizah. ki ’armon nutash hamon ‘ir ‘uzab ‘ofel vabakhan hayah be‘ad me‘arot ‘ad ‘olam mesos pera’im mir‘eh ‘adarim. ‘ad yei‘areh ‘aleinu ruakh mimarom vehayah midbar lakarmel vekharmel vehakarmel laya‘ar yeikhasheb. veshakhan bamidbar mishpat utsedaqah bakarmel teisheb. vehayah ma‘aseh hatsedaqah shalom va‘abodat hatsedaqah hashqet vabetakh ‘ad ‘olam. veyashab ‘ami binveh shalom ubemishkenot mibtakhim ubimnukhot sha’ananot. ubarad beredet haya‘ar ubashiflah tishpal ha‘ir. ’ashreikhem zore‘ei ‘al kal mayim meshalekhei regel hashor vehakhamor. ho shoded ve’atah lo shadud uboged velo bagedu bo kahatimkha shoded tushad kanelotekha libgod yibgedu bakh. yhvh khaneinu lekha qivinu heyeh zero‘am labeqarim ’af yeshu‘ateinu be‘et tsarah. miqol hamon nadedu ‘amim meiromutekha nafetsu goyim. ve’usaf shelalkhem ’osef hekhasil kemashaq geibim shoqeq bo. nisgab yhvh ki shokhen marom milei tsiyon mishpat utsedaqah. vehayah ’emunat ‘itekha khosen yeshu‘ot khakhemat vada‘at yir’at yhvh hi ’otsaro. hen ’er’elam tsa‘aqu khutsah mal’akhei shalom mar yibkayun. nashamu mesilot shabat ‘ober ’orakh heifer berit ma’as ‘arim lo khashab ’enosh. ’abal ’umlelah ’arets hekhpir lebanon qamal hayah hasharon ka‘arabah veno‘er bashan vekharmel. ‘atah ’aqum yomar yhvh ‘atah ’eiromam ‘atah ’enasei. taharu khashash teiledu qash rukhakhem ’esh tokhalkhem. vehayu ‘amim misrefot sid qotsim kesukhim ba’esh yitsatu. shim‘u rekhoqim ’asher ‘asiti ude‘u qerobim geburati. pakhadu betsiyon khata’im ’akhazah re‘adah khaneifim mi yagur lanu ’esh ’okheilah mi yagur lanu moqdei ‘olam. holekh tsedaqot vedober meisharim mo’es bebetsa‘ ma‘ashaqot no‘er kapav mitemokh bashokhad ’otem ’azeno mishemoa‘ damim ve‘otsem ‘einav meire’ot bera‘. hu meromim yishkon metsadot sela‘im misgabo lakhmo nitan meimav ne’emanim. melekh beyafeyo tekhezenah ‘einekha tir’enah ’erets markhaqim. libekha yehgeh ’eimah ’ayeh sofer ’ayeh shoqel ’ayeh sofer ’et hamigdalim. ’et ‘am no‘az lo tir’eh ‘am ‘imqei safah mishemoa‘ nil‘ag lashon ’en binah. khazeh tsiyon qiryat mo‘adeinu ‘einekha tir’enah yerushalim naveh sha’anan ’ohel bal yits‘an bal yisa‘ yeteidotav lanetsakh vekhal khabalav bal yinateiqu. ki ’im sham ’adir yhvh lanu meqom neharim ye’orim rakhabei yadayim bal teilekh bo ’oni shayit vetsi ’adir lo ya‘abrenu. ki yhvh shofeteinu yhvh mekhoqeqeinu yhvh malkeinu hu yoshi‘einu. niteshu khabalayikh bal yekhazequ khen tarenam bal paresu nes ’az khulaq ‘ad shalal marbeh piskhim bazezu baz. ubal yomar shakhen khaliti ha‘am hayosheb bah nesu ‘avon. qirbu goyim lishmoa‘ ule’umim haqshibu tishma‘ ha’arets umelo’ah teibel vekhal tse’etsa’eha. ki qetsef yhvh ‘al kal hagoyim vekheimah ‘al kal tseba’am hekherimam netanam latabakh. vekhaleihem yushlakhu ufigreihem ya‘aleh ba’esham venamasu harim midamam. venamaqu kal tseba hashamayim venagolu khaseifer hashamayim vekhal tseba’am yibol kinbol ‘aleh migefen ukhenobelet mite’einah. ki rivetah bashamayim kharbi hineh ‘al ’edom teired ve‘al ‘am khermi lemishpat. khereb yhvh male’ah dam hudashnah meikheileb midam karim ve‘atudim meikheileb kilyot ’eilim ki zebakh yhvh bebatserah vetebakh gadol be’erets ’edom. veyaredu re’eimim ‘imam ufarim ‘im ’abirim verivetah ’artsam midam va‘afaram meikheileb yedushan. ki yom naqam yhvh shenat shilumim lerib tsiyon. venehefkhu nekhaleha lezefet va‘afarah legaferit vehayetah ’artsah lezefet bo‘eirah. laylah veyomam lo tikhbeh le‘olam ya‘aleh ‘ashanah midor lador tekherab leneitsakh netsakhim ’en ‘ober bah. vireishuha qa’at veqipod veyanshof ve‘oreb yishkenu bah venatah ‘aleha qav tohu ve’abnei bohu. khoreha ve’en sham melukhah yiqra’u vekhal sareha yihyu ’afes. ve‘aletah ’armenoteha sirim qimos vakhoakh bemibtsareha vehayetah neveh tanim khatsir libnot ya‘anah. ufageshu tsiyim ’et ’iyim vesa‘ir ‘al rei‘eihu yiqra ’akh sham hirgi‘ah lilit umatse’ah lah manoakh. shamah qinenah qipoz vatemalet ubaqe‘ah vedagerah betsilah ’akh sham niqbetsu dayot ’ishah re‘utah. dirshu mei‘al seifer yhvh uqera’u ’akhat meihenah lo ne‘darah ’ishah re‘utah lo faqadu ki fi hu tsivah verukho hu qibetsan. vehu hipil lahen goral veyado khileqatah lahem baqav ‘ad ‘olam yirashuha ledor vador yishkenu bah. yesusum midbar vetsiyah vetagel ‘arabah vetifrakh kakhabatsalet. paroakh tifrakh vetagel ’af gilat veranen kebod halebanon nitan lah hadar hakarmel vehasharon hemah yir’u khebod yhvh hadar ’eloheinu. khazequ yadayim rafot ubirkayim koshelot ’ameitsu. ’imru lenimharei leb khizqu ’al tira’u hineh ’eloheikhem naqam yabo gemul ’elohim hu yabo veyosha‘akhem. ’az tipaqakhnah ‘einei ‘ivrim ve’azenei kheireshim tipatakhnah. ’az yedaleg ka’ayal piseiakh vetaron leshon ’ilem ki nibqe‘u bamidbar mayim unekhalim ba‘arabah. vehayah hasharab la’agam vetsima’on lemabu‘ei mayim binveh tanim ribtsah khatsir leqaneh vagome. vehayah sham maslul vaderekh vederekh haqodesh yiqarei lah lo ya‘abrenu tamei vehu lamo holekh derekh ve’evilim lo yit‘u. lo yihyeh sham ’aryeh uferits khayot bal ya‘alenah lo timatsei sham vehalekhu ge’ulim. ufeduyei yhvh yeshubun uba’u tsiyon berinah vesimkhat ‘olam ‘al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigu venasu yagon va’anakhah. vayhi be’arba‘ ‘esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyahu ‘alah sankheirib melekh ’ashur ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot vayitpesem. vayishlakh melekh ’ashur ’et rab shaqeh milakhish yerushalemah ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kabed vaya‘amod bit‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah bimsilat sedeh khobes. vayeitsei ’eilav ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir. vayomer ’aleihem rab shaqeh ’imru na ’el khizqiyahu koh ’amar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur mah habitakhon hazeh ’asher batakheta. ’amarti ’akh debar sefatayim ‘eitsah ugeburah lamilkhamah ‘atah ‘al mi batakhta ki maradta bi. hineh batakhta ‘al mish‘enet haqaneh haratsuts hazeh ‘al mitsrayim ’asher yisamekh ’ish ‘alav uba bekhapo uneqabah ken par‘oh melekh mitsrayim lekhal habotekhim ‘alav. vekhi tomar ’eilai ’el yhvh ’eloheinu batakhenu halo hu ’asher heisir khizqiyahu ’et bamotav ve’et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu. ve‘atah hit‘areb na ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’ashur ve’etenah lekha ’alpayim susim ’im tukhal latet lekha rokhebim ‘aleihem. ve’ekh tashib ’et penei fakhat ’akhad ‘abdei ’adoni haqtanim vatibtakh lekha ‘al mitsrayim lerekheb ulefarashim. ve‘atah hamibal‘adei yhvh ‘aliti ‘al ha’arets hazot lehashkhitah yhvh ’amar ’eilai ‘aleh ’el ha’arets hazot vehashkhitah. vayomer ’elyaqim veshebna veyo’akh ’el rab shaqeh daber na ’el ‘abadekha ’aramit ki shome‘im ’anakhenu ve’al tedaber ’eileinu yehudit be’azenei ha‘am ’asher ‘al hakhomah. vayomer rab shaqeh ha’el ’adonekha ve’eilekha shelakhani ’adoni ledaber ’et hadebarim ha’eleh halo ‘al ha’anashim hayoshebim ‘al hakhomah le’ekhol ’et khar’eihem tso’atam velishtot ’et sheineihem meimei ragleihem ‘imakhem. vaya‘amod rab shaqeh vayiqra beqol gadol yehudit vayomer shim‘u ’et dibrei hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur. koh ’amar hamelekh ’al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehatsil ’etkhem. ve’al yabtakh ’etkhem khizqiyahu ’el yhvh leimor hatsel yatsileinu yhvh lo tinaten ha‘ir hazot beyad melekh ’ashur. ’al tishme‘u ’el khizqiyahu ki khoh ’amar hamelekh ’ashur ‘asu ’iti berakhah utse’u ’eilai ve’ikhlu ’ish gafno ve’ish te’einato ushetu ’ish mei boro. ‘ad bo’i velaqakhti ’etkhem ’el ’erets ke’artsekhem ’erets dagan vetirosh ’erets lekhem ukheramim. pen yasit ’etkhem khizqiyahu leimor yhvh yatsileinu hahitsilu ’elohei hagoyim ’ish ’et ’artso miyad melekh ’ashur. ’ayeh ’elohei khamat ve’arpad ’ayeh ’elohei sefarvayim vekhi hitsilu ’et shomeron miyadi. mi bekhal ’elohei ha’aratsot ha’eleh ’asher hitsilu ’et ’artsam miyadi ki yatsil yhvh ’et yerushalim miyadi. vayakharishu velo ‘anu ’oto dabar ki mitsvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta‘anuhu. vayabo ’elyaqim ben khilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo’akh ben ’asaf hamazkir ’el khizqiyahu qeru‘ei begadim vayagidu lo ’et dibrei rab shaqeh. vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra‘ ’et begadav vayitkas basaq vayabo bet yhvh. vayishlakh ’et ’elyaqim ’asher ‘al habayit ve’et shebna hasofer ve’et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim ’el yesha‘yahu ben ’amots hanabi. vayomeru ’eilav koh ’amar khizqiyahu yom tsarah vetokheikhah une’atsah hayom hazeh ki ba’u banim ‘ad mashber vekhoakh ’ayin leleidah. ’ulai yishma‘ yhvh ’elohekha ’et dibrei rab shaqeh ’asher shelakho melekh ’ashur ’adonav lekharef ’elohim khai vehokhiakh badebarim ’asher shama‘ yhvh ’elohekha venasata tefilah be‘ad hashe’eirit hanimtsa’ah. vayabo’u ‘abdei hamelekh khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu. vayomer ’aleihem yesha‘yahu koh tomerun ’el ’adoneikhem koh ’amar yhvh ’al tira mipenei hadebarim ’asher shama‘ta ’asher gidefu na‘arei melekh ’ashur ’oti. hini noten bo ruakh veshama‘ shemu‘ah veshab ’el ’artso vehipaltiv bakhereb be’artso. vayashab rab shaqeh vayimtsa ’et melekh ’ashur nilkham ‘al libnah ki shama‘ ki nasa‘ milakhish. vayishma‘ ‘al tirhaqah melekh kush leimor yatsa lehilakhem ’itakh vayishma‘ vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el khizqiyahu leimor. koh tomerun ’el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor ’al yashi’akha ’elohekha ’asher ’atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh ’ashur. hineh ’atah shama‘ta ’asher ‘asu malkhei ’ashur lekhal ha’aratsot lehakharimam ve’atah tinatsel. hahitsilu ’otam ’elohei hagoyim ’asher hishkhitu ’abotai ’et gozan ve’et kharan veretsef ubenei ‘eden ’asher bitlasar. ’ayeh melekh khamat umelekh ’arpad umelekh la‘ir sefarvayim heina‘ ve‘ivah. vayiqakh khizqiyahu ’et hasefarim miyad hamal’akhim vayiqra’eihu vaya‘al bet yhvh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei yhvh. vayitpalel khizqiyahu ’el yhvh leimor. yhvh tseba’ot ’elohei yisra’el yosheb hakerubim ’atah hu ha’elohim lebadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha’arets ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets. hateh yhvh ’azenekha ushema‘ peqakh yhvh ‘einekha ure’eh ushema‘ ’et kal dibrei sankheirib ’asher shalakh lekharef ’elohim khai. ’amenam yhvh hekheribu malkhei ’ashur ’et kal ha’aratsot ve’et ’artsam. venaton ’et ’eloheihem ba’esh ki lo ’elohim hemah ki ’im ma‘aseh yedei ’adam ‘ets va’eben vai’abedum. ve‘atah yhvh ’eloheinu hoshi‘einu miyado veyeide‘u kal mamlekhot ha’arets ki ’atah yhvh lebadekha. vayishlakh yesha‘yahu ben ’amots ’el khizqiyahu leimor koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher hitpalalta ’eilai ’el sankheirib melekh ’ashur. zeh hadabar ’asher diber yhvh ‘alav bazah lekha la‘agah lekha betulat bat tsiyon ’akharekha rosh heini‘ah bat yerushalim. ’et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve‘al mi harimotah qol vatisa marom ‘einekha ’el qedosh yisra’el. beyad ‘abadekha kheirafta ’adonai vatomer berob rikhbi ’ani ‘aliti merom harim yarketei lebanon ve’ekhrot qomat ’arazav mibkhar beroshav ve’abo merom qitso ya‘ar karmilo. ’ani qarti veshatiti mayim ve’akhrib bekhaf pe‘amai kol ye’orei matsor. halo shama‘ta lemeirakhoq ’otah ‘asiti mimei qedem vitsartiha ‘atah habeitiha utehi lehash’ot galim nitsim ‘arim betsurot. veyoshebeihen qitsrei yad khatu vaboshu hayu ‘eiseb sadeh viraq deshe khatsir gagot ushedeimah lifnei qamah. veshibtekha vetseitekha ubo’akha yada‘eti ve’et hitragezkha ’eilai. ya‘an hitragezkha ’eilai vesha’anankha ‘alah be’azenai vesamti khakhi be’apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashibotikha baderekh ’asher bata bah. vezeh lekha ha’ot ’akhol hashanah safiakh ubashanah hasheinit shakhis ubashanah hashelishit zir‘u veqitsru venit‘u kheramim ve’akhol ve’ikhlu firyam. veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish’arah shoresh lematah ve‘asah feri lema‘elah. ki mirushalim teitsei she’eirit ufeleitah meihar tsiyon qin’at yhvh tseba’ot ta‘aseh zot. lakhen koh ’amar yhvh ’el melekh ’ashur lo yabo ’el ha‘ir hazot velo yoreh sham khets velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh ‘oleha solelah. baderekh ’asher ba bah yashub ve’el ha‘ir hazot lo yabo ne’um yhvh. veganoti ‘al ha‘ir hazot lehoshi‘ah lema‘ani ulema‘an david ‘abdi. vayeitsei mal’akh yhvh vayakeh bemakhaneh ’ashur mei’ah ushemonim vakhamishah ’alef vayashkimu baboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. vayisa‘ vayeilekh vayashab sankheirib melekh ’ashur vayeisheb benineveh. vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh ’elohav ve’adramelekh vesar’etser banav hikuhu bakhereb vehemah nimletu ’erets ’ararat vayimlokh ’eisar khadon beno takhtav. bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayabo ’eilav yesha‘yahu ben ’amots hanabi vayomer ’eilav koh ’amar yhvh tsav lebeitekha ki met ’atah velo tikhyeh. vayaseb khizqiyahu panav ’el haqir vayitpalel ’el yhvh. vayomar ’anah yhvh zekhar na ’et ’asher hithalakhti lefanekha be’emet ubeleb shalem vehatob be‘einekha ‘asiti vayeibek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. vayhi debar yhvh ’el yesha‘yahu leimor. halokh ve’amarta ’el khizqiyahu koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei david ’abikha shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha ra’iti ’et dim‘atekha hini yosif ‘al yamekha khamesh ‘esreh shanah. umikaf melekh ’ashur ’atsilekha ve’et ha‘ir hazot veganoti ‘al ha‘ir hazot. vezeh lekha ha’ot mei’et yhvh ’asher ya‘aseh yhvh ’et hadabar hazeh ’asher diber. hini meishib ’et tsel hama‘alot ’asher yaredah bema‘alot ’akhaz bashemesh ’akhoranit ‘eser ma‘alot vatashab hashemesh ‘eser ma‘alot bama‘alot ’asher yaradah. mikhtab lekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhaloto vaykhi meikhaleyo. ’ani ’amarti bidmi yamai ’eileikhah besha‘arei she’ol puqadti yeter shenotai. ’amarti lo ’er’eh yah yah be’erets hakhayim lo ’abit ’adam ‘od ‘im yoshebei khadel. dori nisa‘ veniglah mini ke’ohel ro‘i qipadti kha’oreg khayai midalah yebatse‘eini miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. shiviti ‘ad boqer ka’ari ken yeshaber kal ‘atsmotai miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. kesus ‘agur ken ’atsaftsef ’ehgeh kayonah dalu ‘einai lamarom ’adonai ‘asheqah li ‘arebeini. mah ’adaber ve’amar li vehu ‘asah ’edadeh khal shenotai ‘al mar nafshi. ’adonai ‘aleihem yikhyu ulekhal bahen khayei rukhi vetakhalimeini vehakhayeini. hineh leshalom mar li mar ve’atah khashaqta nafshi mishakhat beli ki hishlakhta ’akharei geivekha kal khata’ai. ki lo she’ol todeka mavet yehaleka lo yesaberu yordei bor ’el ’amitekha. khai khai hu yodekha kamoni hayom ’ab lebanim yodia‘ ’el ’amitekha. yhvh lehoshi‘eini uneginotai nenagen kal yemei khayeinu ‘al bet yhvh. vayomer yesha‘yahu yis’u debelet te’einim veyimrekhu ‘al hashekhin veyekhi. vayomer khizqiyahu mah ’ot ki ’e‘eleh bet yhvh. ba‘et hahiv shalakh merodakh bal’adan ben bal’adan melekh babel sefarim uminkhah ’el khizqiyahu vayishma‘ ki khalah vayekhezaq. vayismakh ‘aleihem khizqiyahu vayar’em ’et bet nekhotah nekhoto ’et hakesef ve’et hazahab ve’et habesamim ve’et hashemen hatob ve’et kal bet keilav ve’et kal ’asher nimtsa be’otserotav lo hayah dabar ’asher lo her’am khizqiyahu bebeito ubekhal memshalto. vayabo yesha‘yahu hanabi ’el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer ’eilav mah ’ameru ha’anashim ha’eleh umei’ayin yabo’u ’eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei’erets rekhoqah ba’u ’eilai mibabel. vayomer mah ra’u bebeitekha vayomer khizqiyahu ’et kal ’asher bebeiti ra’u lo hayah dabar ’asher lo hir’itim be’otsrotai. vayomer yesha‘yahu ’el khizqiyahu shema‘ debar yhvh tseba’ot. hineh yamim ba’im venisa kal ’asher bebeitekha va’asher ’atseru ’abotekha ‘ad hayom hazeh babel lo yivater dabar ’amar yhvh. umibanekha ’asher yeitse’u mimekha ’asher tolid yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh babel. vayomer khizqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu tob debar yhvh ’asher dibarta vayomer ki yihyeh shalom ve’emet beyamai. nakhamu nakhamu ‘ami yomar ’eloheikhem. daberu ‘al leb yerushalim veqir’u ’eileha ki male’ah tseba’ah ki nirtsah ‘avonah ki laqekhah miyad yhvh kiflayim bekhal khatoteha. qol qorei bamidbar panu derekh yhvh yasheru ba‘arabah mesilah leiloheinu. kal ge yinasei vekhal har vegib‘ah yishpalu vehayah he‘aqob lemishor veharekhasim lebiq‘ah. veniglah kebod yhvh vera’u khal basar yakhdav ki pi yhvh diber. qol ’omer qera ve’amar mah ’eqra kal habasar khatsir vekhal khasdo ketsits hasadeh. yabesh khatsir nabel tsits ki ruakh yhvh nashebah bo ’akhen khatsir ha‘am. yabesh khatsir nabel tsits udebar ’eloheinu yaqum le‘olam. ‘al har gaboha ‘ali lakh mebaseret tsiyon harimi bakoakh qolekh mebaseret yerushalim harimi ’al tira’i ’imri le‘arei yehudah hineh ’eloheikhem. hineh ’adonai yhvh bekhazaq yabo uzero‘o moshelah lo hineh sekharo ’ito ufe‘ulato lefanav. kero‘eh ‘edro yir‘eh bizro‘o yeqabets tela’im ubekheiqo yisa ‘alot yenahel. mi madad besha‘olo mayim veshamayim bazeret tiken vekhal bashalish ‘afar ha’arets veshaqal bapeles harim ugeba‘ot bemozenayim. mi tiken ’et ruakh yhvh ve’ish ‘atsato yodi‘enu. ’et mi no‘ats vaybineihu vaylamedeihu be’orakh mishpat vaylamedeihu da‘at vederekh tebunot yodi‘enu. hen goyim kemar mideli ukheshakhaq mozenayim nekhshabu hen ’iyim kadaq yitol. ulebanon ’en dei ba‘er vekhayato ’en dei ‘olah. kal hagoyim ke’ayin negdo mei’efes vatohu nekhshebu lo. ve’el mi tedameyun ’el umah demut ta‘arkhu lo. hapesel nasakh kharash vetsoref bazahab yeraqe‘enu uretuqot kesef tsoref. hamsukan terumah ‘ets lo yirqab yibkhar kharash khakham yebaqesh lo lehakhin pesel lo yimot. halo teide‘u halo tishma‘u halo hugad meirosh lakhem halo habinotem mosdot ha’arets. hayosheb ‘al khug ha’arets veyoshebeha kakhagabim hanoteh khadoq shamayim vayimtakhem ka’ohel lashabet. hanoten roznim le’ayin shofetei ’erets katohu ‘asah. ’af bal nita‘u ’af bal zora‘u ’af bal shoresh ba’arets giz‘am vegam nashaf bahem vayibashu use‘arah kaqash tisa’em. ve’el mi tedameyuni ve’eshveh yomar qadosh. se’u marom ‘eineikhem ure’u mi bara ’eleh hamotsi bemispar tseba’am lekhulam beshem yiqra meirob ’onim ve’amits koakh ’ish lo ne‘dar. lamah tomar ya‘aqob utedaber yisra’el nisterah darki yhvh umei’elohai mishpati ya‘abor. halo yada‘ta ’im lo shama‘ta ’elohei ‘olam yhvh borei qetsot ha’arets lo yi‘af velo yiga‘ ’en kheiqer litbunato. noten laya‘ef koakh ule’en ’onim ‘atsemah yarbeh. veyi‘afu ne‘arim veyiga‘u ubakhurim kashol yikasheilu. veqoyei yhvh yakhalifu khoakh ya‘alu ’eiber kanesharim yarutsu velo yiga‘u yeilekhu velo yi‘afu. hakharishu ’eilai ’iyim ule’umim yakhalifu khoakh yigeshu ’az yedabeiru yakhdav lamishpat niqrabah. mi hei‘ir mimizrakh tsedeq yiqra’eihu leraglo yiten lefanav goyim umelakhim yard yiten ke‘afar kharbo keqash nidaf qashto. yirdefem ya‘abor shalom ’orakh beraglav lo yabo. mi fa‘al ve‘asah qorei hadorot meirosh ’ani yhvh rishon ve’et ’akharonim ’ani hu. ra’u ’iyim veyira’u qetsot ha’arets yekheradu qarebu vaye’etayun. ’ish ’et rei‘eihu ya‘zoru ule’akhiv yomar khazaq. vaykhazeq kharash ’et tsoref makhaliq patish ’et holem pa‘am ’omer ladebeq tob hu vaykhazeqeihu bemasmerim lo yimot. ve’atah yisra’el ‘abdi ya‘aqob ’asher bekhartikha zera‘ ’abraham ’ohabi. ’asher hekhezaqtikha miqtsot ha’arets umei’atsileha qeratikha va’omar lekha ‘abdi ’atah bekhartikha velo me’astikha. ’al tira ki ‘imekha ’ani ’al tishta‘ ki ’ani ’elohekha ’imatstikha ’af ‘azartikha ’af temakhtikha bimin tsidqi. hen yeiboshu veyikalemu kol hanekherim bakh yihyu khe’ayin veyobedu ’anshei ribekha. tebaqshem velo timtsa’em ’anshei matsutekha yihyu khe’ayin ukhe’efes ’anshei milkhamtekha. ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekha makhaziq yeminekha ha’omer lekha ’al tira ’ani ‘azartikha. ’al tire’i tola‘at ya‘aqob metei yisra’el ’ani ‘azartikh ne’um yhvh vego’alekh qedosh yisra’el. hineh samtikh lemorag kharuts khadash ba‘al pifiyot tadush harim vetadoq ugeba‘ot kamots tasim. tizrem veruakh tisa’em use‘arah tafits ’otam ve’atah tagil yhvh biqdosh yisra’el tithalal. ha‘aniyim veha’ebyonim mebaqshim mayim va’ayin leshonam batsama nashatah ’ani yhvh ’e‘enem ’elohei yisra’el lo ’e‘ezbem. ’eftakh ‘al shefayim neharot ubetokh beqa‘ot ma‘yanot ’asim midbar la’agam mayim ve’erets tsiyah lemotsa’ei mayim. ’eten bamidbar ’erez shitah vahadas ve‘ets shamen ’asim ba‘arabah berosh tidhar ute’ashur yakhdav. lema‘an yir’u veyeide‘u veyasimu veyaskilu yakhdav ki yad yhvh ‘asetah zot uqedosh yisra’el bera’ah. qarebu ribekhem yomar yhvh hagishu ‘atsumoteikhem yomar melekh ya‘aqob. yagishu veyagidu lanu ’et ’asher tiqrenah harishonot mah henah hagidu venasimah libeinu veneide‘ah ’akharitan ’o haba’ot hashmi‘unu. hagidu ha’otiyot le’akhor veneide‘ah ki ’elohim ’atem ’af teitibu vetarei‘u venishta‘ah veneire venir’eh yakhdav. hen ’atem mei’ayin ufa‘alekhem mei’afa‘ to‘eibah yibkhar bakhem. ha‘iroti mitsafon vayat mimizrakh shemesh yiqra bishmi veyabo seganim kemo khomer ukhemo yotser yirmas tit. mi higid meirosh veneida‘ah umilefanim venomar tsadiq ’af ’en magid ’af ’en mashmia‘ ’af ’en shomeia‘ ’imreikhem. rishon letsiyon hineh hinam velirushalim mebaser ’eten. ve’eire ve’en ’ish umei’eleh ve’en yo‘ets ve’esh’alem veyashibu dabar. hen kulam ’aven ’efes ma‘aseihem ruakh vatohu niskeihem. hen ‘abdi ’etmakh bo bekhiri ratsetah nafshi natati rukhi ‘alav mishpat lagoyim yotsi. lo yits‘aq velo yisa velo yashmia‘ bakhuts qolo. qaneh ratsuts lo yishbor ufishtah kheihah lo yekhabenah le’emet yotsi mishpat. lo yikhheh velo yaruts ‘ad yasim ba’arets mishpat uletorato ’iyim yeyakheilu. koh ’amar ha’el yhvh borei hashamayim venoteihem roqa‘ ha’arets vetse’etsa’eha noten neshamah la‘am ‘aleha veruakh laholekhim bah. ’ani yhvh qeratikha betsedeq ve’akhzeq beyadekha ve’etsarekha ve’etenkha librit ‘am le’or goyim. lifqoakh ‘einayim ‘ivrot lehotsi mimasger ’asir mibet kele yoshebei khoshekh. ’ani yhvh hu shemi ukhebodi le’akher lo ’eten utehilati lapesilim. harishonot hineh ba’u vakhadashot ’ani magid beterem titsmakhnah ’ashmi‘ ’etkhem. shiru yhvh shir khadash tehilato miqtseh ha’arets yordei hayam umelo’o ’iyim veyoshebeihem. yis’u midbar ve‘arav khatseirim teisheb qeidar yaronu yoshebei sela‘ meirosh harim yitsvakhu. yasimu yhvh kabod utehilato ba’iyim yagidu. yhvh kagibor yeitsei ke’ish milkhamot ya‘ir qin’ah yaria‘ ’af yatsriakh ‘al ’oyebav yitgabar. hekhesheiti mei‘olam ’akharish ’et’apaq kayoleidah ’ef‘eh ’eshom ve’esh’af yakhad. ’akharib harim ugeba‘ot vekhal ‘esbam ’obish vesamti neharot la’iyim va’agamim ’obish. veholakhti ‘ivrim bederekh lo yada‘u bintibot lo yade‘u ’adrikhem ’asim makhshakh lifneihem la’or uma‘aqashim lemishor ’eleh hadebarim ‘asitim velo ‘azabtim. nasogu ’akhor yeiboshu boshet habotekhim bapasel ha’omerim lemaseikhah ’atem ’eloheinu. hakheireshim shema‘u veha‘ivrim habitu lir’ot. mi ‘iver ki ’im ‘abdi vekheiresh kemal’akhi ’eshlakh mi ‘iver kimshulam ve‘iver ke‘ebed yhvh. ra’ita ra’ot rabot velo tishmor paqoakh ’azenayim velo yishma‘. yhvh khafets lema‘an tsidqo yagdil torah veya’dir. vehu ‘am bazuz veshasui hafeiakh bakhurim kulam ubebatei khela’im hakheba’u hayu labaz ve’en matsil meshisah ve’en ’omer hashab. mi bakhem ya’azin zot yaqshib veyishma‘ le’akhor. mi natan limshoseh limshisah ya‘aqob veyisra’el lebozezim halo yhvh zu khatanu lo velo ’abu bidrakhav halokh velo shame‘u betorato. vayishpokh ‘alav kheimah ’apo ve‘ezuz milkhamah vatelahateihu misabib velo yada‘ vatib‘ar bo velo yasim ‘al leb. ve‘atah koh ’amar yhvh bora’akha ya‘aqob veyotserkha yisra’el ’al tira ki ge’altikha qarati beshimkha li ’atah. ki ta‘abor bamayim ’itekha ’ani ubaneharot lo yishtefukha ki teilekh bemo ’esh lo tikaveh velehabah lo tib‘ar bakh. ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekha qedosh yisra’el moshi‘ekha natati khaferekha mitsrayim kush useba takhtekha. mei’asher yaqarta be‘einai nikhbadta va’ani ’ahabtikha ve’eten ’adam takhtekha ule’umim takhat nafshekha. ’al tira ki ’itekha ’ani mimizrakh ’abi zar‘ekha umima‘arab ’aqabetseka. ’omar latsafon teini uleteiman ’al tikhla’i habi’i banai meirakhoq ubenotai miqtseh ha’arets. kol haniqra bishmi velikhbodi berativ yetsartiv ’af ‘asitiv. hotsi ‘am ‘iver ve‘einayim yesh vekheireshim ve’azenayim lamo. kal hagoyim niqbetsu yakhdav veyei’asefu le’umim mi bahem yagid zot verishonot yashmi‘unu yitenu ‘eideihem veyitsdaqu veyishme‘u veyomeru ’emet. ’atem ‘eidai ne’um yhvh ve‘abdi ’asher bakhareti lema‘an teide‘u veta’aminu li vetabinu ki ’ani hu lefanai lo notsar ’el ve’akharai lo yihyeh. ’anokhi ’anokhi yhvh ve’en mibal‘adai moshia‘. ’anokhi higadti vehosha‘ti vehishma‘ti ve’en bakhem zar ve’atem ‘eidai ne’um yhvh va’ani ’el. gam miyom ’ani hu ve’en miyadi matsil ’ef‘al umi yeshibenah. koh ’amar yhvh go’alkhem qedosh yisra’el lema‘ankhem shilakhti babelah vehoradti barikhim kulam vekhasdim ba’oniyot rinatam. ’ani yhvh qedoshekhem borei yisra’el malkekhem. koh ’amar yhvh hanoten bayam darekh ubemayim ‘azim netibah. hamotsi rekheb vasus khayil ve‘izuz yakhdav yishkebu bal yaqumu da‘akhu kapishtah khabu. ’al tizkeru rishonot veqadmoniyot ’al titbonanu. hini ‘oseh khadashah ‘atah titsmakh halo teida‘uha ’af ’asim bamidbar derekh bishimon neharot. tekhabedeini khayat hasadeh tanim ubenot ya‘anah ki natati bamidbar mayim neharot bishimon lehashqot ‘ami bekhiri. ‘am zu yatsarti li tehilati yesapeiru. velo ’oti qarata ya‘aqob ki yaga‘ta bi yisra’el. lo heibeita li seh ‘olotekha uzebakhekha lo khibadtani lo he‘ebadtikha beminkhah velo hoga‘tikha bilbonah. lo qanita li bakesef qaneh vekheileb zebakhekha lo hirvitani ’akh he‘ebadtani bekhatotekha hoga‘tani ba‘avonotekha. ’anokhi ’anokhi hu mokheh fesha‘ekha lema‘ani vekhatotekha lo ’ezkor. hazkireini nishafetah yakhad saper ’atah lema‘an titsdaq. ’abikha harishon khata umelitsekha pashe‘u bi. va’akhalel sarei qodesh ve’etenah lakheirem ya‘aqob veyisra’el legidufim. ve‘atah shema‘ ya‘aqob ‘abdi veyisra’el bakharti bo. koh ’amar yhvh ‘osekha veyotserkha mibeten ya‘zereka ’al tira ‘abdi ya‘aqob vishurun bakharti bo. ki ’etsaq mayim ‘al tsamei venozelim ‘al yabashah ’etsoq rukhi ‘al zar‘ekha ubirkhati ‘al tse’etsa’ekha. vetsamekhu beben khatsir ka‘arabim ‘al yiblei mayim. zeh yomar yhvh ’ani vezeh yiqra beshem ya‘aqob vezeh yikhtob yado yhvh ubeshem yisra’el yekhaneh. koh ’amar yhvh melekh yisra’el vego’alo yhvh tseba’ot ’ani rishon va’ani ’akharon umibal‘adai ’en ’elohim. umi khamoni yiqra veyagideha veya‘rekheha li misumi ‘am ‘olam ve’otiyot va’asher tabonah yagidu lamo. ’al tifkhadu ve’al tirhu halo mei’az hishma‘tikha vehigadti ve’atem ‘eidai hayesh ’eloah mibal‘adai ve’en tsur bal yada‘eti. yotserei fesel kulam tohu vakhamudeihem bal yo‘ilu ve‘eideihem hemah bal yir’u ubal yeide‘u lema‘an yeiboshu. mi yatsar ’el ufesel nasakh lebilti ho‘il. hen kal khabeirav yeiboshu vekharashim hemah mei’adam yitqabetsu khulam ya‘amodu yifkhadu yeiboshu yakhad. kharash barzel ma‘atsad ufa‘al bapekham ubamaqabot yitsereihu vayif‘aleihu bizroa‘ kokho gam ra‘eb ve’en koakh lo shatah mayim vayi‘af. kharash ‘eitsim natah qav yeta’areihu basered ya‘aseihu bamaqtsu‘ot ubamekhugah yeta’oreihu vaya‘aseihu ketabnit ’ish ketif’eret ’adam lashebet bayit. likhrat lo ’arazim vayiqakh tirzah ve’alon vai’amets lo ba‘atsei ya‘ar nata‘ ’oren vegeshem yegadel. vehayah le’adam leba‘er vayiqakh meihem vayakham ’af yasiq ve’afah lakhem ’af yif‘al ’el vayishtakhu ‘asahu fesel vayisgad lamo. khetsyo saraf bemo ’esh ‘al khetsyo basar yokhel yitsleh tsali veyisba‘ ’af yakhom veyomar he’akh khamoti ra’iti ’ur. ushe’eirito le’el ‘asah lefislo yisgod yisgad lo veyishtakhu veyitpalel ’eilav veyomar hatsileini ki ’eili ’atah. lo yade‘u velo yabinu ki takh meire’ot ‘eineihem meihaskil libotam. velo yashib ’el libo velo da‘at velo tebunah leimor khetsyo sarafti bemo ’esh ve’af ’afiti ‘al gekhalav lekhem ’etsleh basar ve’okhel veyitro leto‘eibah ’e‘eseh lebul ‘ets ’esgod. ro‘eh ’eifer leb hutal hitahu velo yatsil ’et nafsho velo yomar halo sheqer bimini. zekhar ’eleh ya‘aqob veyisra’el ki ‘abdi ’atah yetsartikha ‘ebed li ’atah yisra’el lo tinasheini. makhiti kha‘ab pesha‘ekha vekhe‘anan khatotekha shubah ’eilai ki ge’altikha. ranu shamayim ki ‘asah yhvh hari‘u takhtiyot ’arets pitskhu harim rinah ya‘ar vekhal ‘ets bo ki ga’al yhvh ya‘aqob ubeyisra’el yitpa’ar. koh ’amar yhvh go’alekha veyotserkha mibaten ’anokhi yhvh ‘oseh kol noteh shamayim lebadi roqa‘ ha’arets mi ’iti mei’iti. meifer ’otot badim veqosemim yeholel meishib khakhamim ’akhor veda‘tam yesakel. meiqim debar ‘abdo va‘atsat mal’akhav yashlim ha’omer lirushalim tushab ule‘arei yehudah tibanenah vekhareboteha ’aqomem. ha’omer latsulah khorabi venaharotayikh ’obish. ha’omer lekhoresh ro‘i vekhal kheftsi yashlim veleimor lirushalim tibaneh veheikhal tivased. koh ’amar yhvh limshikho lekhoresh ’asher hekhezaqti bimino lerad lefanav goyim umatenei melakhim ’afateiakh liftoakh lefanav delatayim ushe‘arim lo yisageiru. ’ani lefanekha ’eilekh vahadurim ’oshir ’ayasher daltot nekhushah ’ashaber uberikhei barzel ’agadeia‘. venatati lekha ’otsrot khoshekh umatmunei mistarim lema‘an teida‘ ki ’ani yhvh haqorei beshimkha ’elohei yisra’el. lema‘an ‘abdi ya‘aqob veyisra’el bekhiri va’eqra lekha bishmekha ’akhanekha velo yeda‘tani. ’ani yhvh ve’en ‘od zulati ’en ’elohim ’a’azerkha velo yeda‘tani. lema‘an yeide‘u mimizrakh shemesh umima‘arabah ki ’efes bil‘adai ’ani yhvh ve’en ‘od. yotser ’or uborei khoshekh ‘oseh shalom uborei ra‘ ’ani yhvh ‘oseh khal ’eleh. har‘ifu shamayim mima‘al ushekhaqim yizelu tsedeq tiftakh ’erets veyifru yesha‘ utsedaqah tatsmiakh yakhad ’ani yhvh berativ. ho rab ’et yotsero kheres ’et kharsei ’adamah hayomar khomer leyotsero mah ta‘aseh ufa‘alekha ’en yadayim lo. ho ’omer le’ab mah tolid ule’ishah mah tekhilin. koh ’amar yhvh qedosh yisra’el veyotsero ha’otiyot she’aluni ‘al banai ve‘al po‘al yadai tetsavuni. ’anokhi ‘asiti ’erets ve’adam ‘aleha barati ’ani yadai natu shamayim vekhal tseba’am tsiveiti. ’anokhi ha‘irotihu betsedeq vekhal derakhav ’ayasher hu yibneh ‘iri vegaluti yeshaleiakh lo bimkhir velo beshokhad ’amar yhvh tseba’ot. koh ’amar yhvh yegia‘ mitsrayim usekhar kush useba’im ’anshei midah ‘alayikh ya‘aboru velakh yihyu ’akharayikh yeileikhu baziqim ya‘aboru ve’eilayikh yishtakhavu ’eilayikh yitpalalu ’akh bakh ’el ve’en ‘od ’efes ’elohim. ’akhen ’atah ’el mistater ’elohei yisra’el moshia‘. boshu vegam nikhlemu kulam yakhdav halekhu bakelimah kharashei tsirim. yisra’el nosha‘ yhvh teshu‘at ‘olamim lo teiboshu velo tikalemu ‘ad ‘olmei ‘ad. ki khoh ’amar yhvh borei hashamayim hu ha’elohim yotser ha’arets ve‘osah hu khonah lo tohu bera’ah lashebet yetsarah ’ani yhvh ve’en ‘od. lo baseiter dibarti bimqom ’erets khoshekh lo ’amarti lezera‘ ya‘aqob tohu baqeshuni ’ani yhvh dober tsedeq magid meisharim. hiqabetsu vabo’u hitnageshu yakhdav pelitei hagoyim lo yade‘u hanose’im ’et ‘ets pislam umitpalim ’el ’el lo yoshia‘. hagidu vehagishu ’af yiva‘atsu yakhdav mi hishmia‘ zot miqedem mei’az higidah halo ’ani yhvh ve’en ‘od ’elohim mibal‘adai ’el tsadiq umoshia‘ ’ayin zulati. penu ’eilai vehivashe‘u kal ’afsei ’arets ki ’ani ’el ve’en ‘od. bi nishba‘ti yatsa mipi tsedaqah dabar velo yashub ki li tikhra‘ kal berekh tishaba‘ kal lashon. ’akh yhvh li ’amar tsedaqot va‘oz ‘adav yabo veyeiboshu kol hanekherim bo. yhvh yitsdequ veyithalu kal zera‘ yisra’el. kara‘ bel qores nebo hayu ‘atsabeihem lakhayah velabeheimah nesu’oteikhem ‘amusot masa la‘ayeifah. qaresu khare‘u yakhdav lo yakhelu malet masa venafsham bashebi halakhah. shim‘u ’eilai bet ya‘aqob vekhal she’eirit bet yisra’el ha‘amusim mini beten hanesu’im mini rakham. ve‘ad ziqnah ’ani hu ve‘ad sheibah ’ani ’esbol ’ani ‘asiti va’ani ’esa va’ani ’esbol va’amalet. lemi tedamyuni vetashvu vetamshiluni venidmeh. hazalim zahab mikis vekhesef baqaneh yishqolu yiskeru tsoref veya‘aseihu ’el yisgedu ’af yishtakhavu yisa’uhu ‘al katef yisbeluhu veyanikhuhu takhtav veya‘amod mimeqomo lo yamish ’af yits‘aq ’eilav velo ya‘aneh mitsarato lo yoshi‘enu. zikhru zot vehit’oshashu hashibu foshe‘im ‘al leb. zikhru rishonot mei‘olam ki ’anokhi ’el ve’en ‘od ’elohim ve’efes kamoni. magid meireishit ’akharit umiqedem ’asher lo na‘asu ’omer ‘atsati taqum vekhal kheftsi ’e‘eseh. qorei mimizrakh ‘ayit mei’erets merkhaq ’ish ‘atsato ‘atsati ’af dibarti ’af ’abi’enah yatsarti ’af ’e‘esenah. shim‘u ’eilai ’abirei leb harekhoqim mitsedaqah. qeirabti tsidqati lo tirkhaq uteshu‘ati lo te’akher venatati betsiyon teshu‘ah leyisra’el tif’arti. redi ushebi ‘al ‘afar betulat bat babel shebi la’arets ’en kisei bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh rakah va‘anugah. qekhi reikhayim vetakhani qamakh gali tsamatekh khespi shobel gali shoq ‘ibri neharot. tigal ‘ervatekh gam teira’eh kherpatekh naqam ’eqakh velo ’efga‘ ’adam. go’aleinu yhvh tseba’ot shemo qedosh yisra’el. shebi dumam ubo’i bakhoshekh bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh geberet mamlakhot. qatsafti ‘al ‘ami khilalti nakhalati va’etenem beyadekh lo samt lahem rakhamim ‘al zaqen hikhbadt ‘ulekh me’od. vatomeri le‘olam ’ehyeh gebaret ‘ad lo samt ’eleh ‘al libekh lo zakhart ’akharitah. ve‘atah shim‘i zot ‘adinah hayoshebet labetakh ha’omerah bilbabah ’ani ve’afsi ‘od lo ’eisheb ’almanah velo ’eida‘ shekhol. vetabonah lakh shetei ’eleh rega‘ beyom ’ekhad shekhol ve’almon ketumam ba’u ‘alayikh berob keshafayikh be‘atsemat khabarayikh me’od. vatibtekhi bera‘atekh ’amart ’en ro’ani khakhematekh veda‘tekh hi shobbatekh vatomeri belibekh ’ani ve’afsi ‘od. uba ‘alayikh ra‘ah lo teide‘i shakhrah vetipol ‘alayikh hoah lo tukheli kaperah vetabo ‘alayikh pit’om sho’ah lo teida‘i. ‘imdi na bakhabarayikh uberob keshafayikh ba’asher yaga‘at mine‘urayikh ’ulai tukheli ho‘il ’ulai ta‘arotsi. nil’et berob ‘atsatayikh ya‘amdu na veyoshi‘ukh haberu hoberei shamayim hakhozim bakokhabim modi‘im lekhodashim mei’asher yabo’u ‘alayikh. hineh hayu kheqash ’esh serafatam lo yatsilu ’et nafsham miyad lehabah ’en gakhelet lakhmam ’ur lashebet negdo. ken hayu lakh ’asher yaga‘at sokharayikh mine‘urayikh ’ish le‘ebro ta‘u ’en moshi‘ekh. shim‘u zot bet ya‘aqob haniqra’im beshem yisra’el umimei yehudah yatsa’u hanishba‘im beshem yhvh ubeilohei yisra’el yazkiru lo be’emet velo bitsdaqah. ki mei‘ir haqodesh niqra’u ve‘al ’elohei yisra’el nismakhu yhvh tseba’ot shemo. harishonot mei’az higadti umipi yatse’u ve’ashmi‘em pit’om ‘asiti vatabonah. mida‘ti ki qasheh ’atah vegid barzel ‘arepekha umitskhakha nekhushah. va’agid lekha mei’az beterem tabo hishma‘tikha pen tomar ‘atsebi ‘asam ufisli veniski tsivam. shama‘ta khazeh kulah ve’atem halo tagidu hishma‘tikha khadashot mei‘atah unetsurot velo yeda‘tam. ‘atah nibre’u velo mei’az velifnei yom velo shema‘tam pen tomar hineh yeda‘tin. gam lo shama‘ta gam lo yada‘ta gam mei’az lo fitekhah ’azenekha ki yada‘ti bagod tibgod ufosheia‘ mibeten qora lakh. lema‘an shemi ’a’arikh ’api utehilati ’ekhetam lakh lebilti hakhritekha. hineh tseraftikha velo bekhasef bekhartikha bekhur ‘oni. lema‘ani lema‘ani ’e‘eseh ki ’ekh yeikhal ukhebodi le’akher lo ’eten. shema‘ ’eilai ya‘aqob veyisra’el meqora’i ’ani hu ’ani rishon ’af ’ani ’akharon. ’af yadi yasedah ’erets vimini tipekhah shamayim qorei ’ani ’aleihem ya‘amdu yakhdav. hiqabetsu khulekhem ushama‘u mi bahem higid ’et ’eleh yhvh ’aheibo ya‘aseh kheftso bebabel uzero‘o kasdim. ’ani ’ani dibarti ’af qerativ habi’otiv vehitsliakh darko. qirbu ’eilai shim‘u zot lo meirosh baseiter dibarti mei‘et heyotah sham ’ani ve‘atah ’adonai yhvh shelakhani verukho. koh ’amar yhvh go’alkha qedosh yisra’el ’ani yhvh ’elohekha melamedkha leho‘il madrikhakha bederekh teilekh. lu hiqshabta lemitsvotai vayhi khanahar shelomekha vetsidqatekha kegalei hayam. vayhi khakhol zar‘ekha vetse’etsa’ei mei‘ekha kim‘otav lo yikaret velo yishamed shemo milefanai. tse’u mibabel birkhu mikasdim beqol rinah hagidu hashmi‘u zot hotsi’uha ‘ad qetseh ha’arets ’imru ga’al yhvh ‘abdo ya‘aqob. velo tsame’u bakhorabot holikham mayim mitsur hizil lamo vayibqa‘ tsur vayazubu mayim. ’en shalom ’amar yhvh laresha‘im. shim‘u ’iyim ’eilai vehaqshibu le’umim meirakhoq yhvh mibeten qera’ani mime‘ei ’imi hizkir shemi. vayasem pi kekhereb khadah betsel yado hekhbi’ani vaysimeini lekhets barur be’ashpato histirani. vayomer li ‘abdi ’atah yisra’el ’asher bekha ’etpa’ar. va’ani ’amarti leriq yaga‘ti letohu vehebel kokhi khileiti ’akhen mishpati ’et yhvh ufe‘ulati ’et ’elohai. ve‘atah ’amar yhvh yotseri mibeten le‘ebed lo leshobeb ya‘aqob ’eilav veyisra’el lo lo yei’asef ve’ekabed be‘einei yhvh veilohai hayah ‘uzi. vayomer naqel mihyotkha li ‘ebed lehaqim ’et shibtei ya‘aqob unetsirei unetsurei yisra’el lehashib unetatikha le’or goyim lihyot yeshu‘ati ‘ad qetseh ha’arets. koh ’amar yhvh go’el yisra’el qedosho libzoh nefesh limta‘eb go le‘ebed moshelim melakhim yir’u vaqamu sarim veyishtakhavu lema‘an yhvh ’asher ne’eman qedosh yisra’el vayibkhareka. koh ’amar yhvh be‘et ratson ‘anitikha ubeyom yeshu‘ah ‘azartikha ve’etsarekha ve’etenkha librit ‘am lehaqim ’erets lehankhil nekhalot shomeimot. leimor la’asurim tsei’u la’asher bakhoshekh higalu ‘al derakhim yir‘u ubekhal shefayim mar‘itam. lo yir‘abu velo yitsma’u velo yakem sharab vashamesh ki merakhamam yenahagem ve‘al mabu‘ei mayim yenahalem. vesamti khal harai ladarekh umesilotai yerumun. hineh ’eleh meirakhoq yabo’u vehineh ’eleh mitsafon umiyam ve’eleh mei’erets sinim. ranu shamayim vegili ’arets yiftsekhu ufitskhu harim rinah ki nikham yhvh ‘amo va‘aniyav yerakhem. vatomer tsiyon ‘azabani yhvh vadonai shekheikhani. hatishkakh ’ishah ‘ulah meirakhem ben bitnah gam ’eleh tishkakhnah ve’anokhi lo ’eshkakhekh. hen ‘al kapayim khaqotikh khomotayikh negdi tamid. miharu banayikh meharesayikh umakharibayikh mimekh yeitsei’u. se’i sabib ‘einayikh ure’i kulam niqbetsu ba’u lakh khai ’ani ne’um yhvh ki khulam ka‘adi tilbashi uteqasherim kakalah. ki kharebotayikh veshomemotayikh ve’erets harisutekh ki ‘atah teitseri miyosheb verakhaqu mebale‘ayikh. ‘od yomeru be’azenayikh benei shikulayikh tsar li hamaqom geshah li ve’eisheibah. ve’amart bilbabekh mi yalad li ’et ’eleh va’ani shekhulah vegalmudah golah vesurah ve’eleh mi gidel hen ’ani nish’arti lebadi ’eleh ’eifoh hem. koh ’amar ’adonai yhvh hineh ’esa ’el goyim yadi ve’el ‘amim ’arim nisi veheibi’u banayikh bekhotsen ubenotayikh ‘al katef tinasenah. vehayu melakhim ’omenayikh vesaroteihem meiniqotayikh ’apayim ’erets yishtakhavu lakh va‘afar raglayikh yelakheikhu veyada‘at ki ’ani yhvh ’asher lo yeiboshu qoai. hayuqakh migibor malqoakh ve’im shebi tsadiq yimalet. ki khoh ’amar yhvh gam shebi gibor yuqakh umalqoakh ‘arits yimalet ve’et yeribekh ’anokhi ’arib ve’et banayikh ’anokhi ’oshia‘. veha’akhalti ’et monayikh ’et besaram vekhe‘asis damam yishkarun veyade‘u khal basar ki ’ani yhvh moshi‘ekh vego’alekh ’abir ya‘aqob. koh ’amar yhvh ’ei zeh seifer keritut ’imekhem ’asher shilakhtiha ’o mi minoshai ’asher makharti ’etkhem lo hen ba‘avonoteikhem nimkartem ubefish‘eikhem shulekhah ’imekhem. madua‘ bati ve’en ’ish qarati ve’en ‘oneh haqatsor qatserah yadi mipedut ve’im ’en bi khoakh lehatsil hen bega‘arati ’akharib yam ’asim neharot midbar tib’ash degatam mei’en mayim vetamot batsama. ’albish shamayim qadrut vesaq ’asim kesutam. ’adonai yhvh natan li leshon limudim lada‘at la‘ut ’et ya‘ef dabar ya‘ir baboqer baboqer ya‘ir li ’ozen lishmoa‘ kalimudim. ’adonai yhvh patakh li ’ozen ve’anokhi lo mariti ’akhor lo nesugoti. geivi natati lemakim ulekhayai lemoretim panai lo histarti mikelimot varoq. vadonai yhvh ya‘azar li ‘al ken lo nikhlameti ‘al ken samti fanai kakhalamish va’eida‘ ki lo ’eibosh. qarob matsdiqi mi yarib ’iti na‘amdah yakhad mi ba‘al mishpati yigash ’eilai. hen ’adonai yhvh ya‘azar li mi hu yarshi‘eini hen kulam kabeged yiblu ‘ash yokhelem. mi bakhem yerei yhvh shomeia‘ beqol ‘abdo ’asher halakh khasheikhim ve’en nogah lo yibtakh beshem yhvh veyisha‘en beilohav. hen kulekhem qodekhei ’esh me’azerei ziqot lekhu be’ur ’eshkhem ubeziqot bi‘artem miyadi hayetah zot lakhem lema‘atseibah tishkabun. shim‘u ’eilai rodefei tsedeq mebaqshei yhvh habitu ’el tsur khutsabtem ve’el maqebet bor nuqartem. habitu ’el ’abraham ’abikhem ve’el sarah tekholelkhem ki ’ekhad qerativ va’abarekheihu ve’arbeihu. ki nikham yhvh tsiyon nikham kal khareboteha vayasem midbarah ke‘eiden ve‘arbatah kegan yhvh sason vesimkhah yimatsei bah todah veqol zimrah. haqshibu ’eilai ‘ami ule’umi ’eilai ha’azinu ki torah mei’iti teitsei umishpati le’or ‘amim ’argia‘. qarob tsidqi yatsa yish‘i uzero‘ai ‘amim yishpotu ’eilai ’iyim yeqavu ve’el zero‘i yeyakheilun. se’u lashamayim ‘eineikhem vehabitu ’el ha’arets mitakhat ki shamayim ke‘ashan nimlakhu veha’arets kabeged tibleh veyoshebeha kemo khen yemutun vishu‘ati le‘olam tihyeh vetsidqati lo teikhat. shim‘u ’eilai yode‘ei tsedeq ‘am torati belibam ’al tire’u kherpat ’enosh umigidufotam ’al teikhatu. ki khabeged yokhelem ‘ash vekhatsemer yokhelem sas vetsidqati le‘olam tihyeh vishu‘ati ledor dorim. ‘uri ‘uri libshi ‘oz zeroa‘ yhvh ‘uri kimei qedem dorot ‘olamim halo ’at hi hamakhtsebet rahab mekholelet tanin. halo ’at hi hamakharebet yam mei tehom rabah hasamah ma‘amaqei yam derekh la‘abor ge’ulim. ufeduyei yhvh yeshubun uba’u tsiyon berinah vesimkhat ‘olam ‘al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigun nasu yagon va’anakhah. ’anokhi ’anokhi hu menakhemkhem mi ’at vatire’i mei’enosh yamut umiben ’adam khatsir yinaten. vatishkakh yhvh ‘osekha noteh shamayim veyosed ’arets vatefakhed tamid kal hayom mipenei khamat hameitsiq ka’asher konen lehashkhit ve’ayeh khamat hameitsiq. mihar tso‘eh lehipateiakh velo yamut lashakhat velo yekhsar lakhmo. ve’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha roga‘ hayam vayehemu galav yhvh tseba’ot shemo. va’asim debarai befikha ubetsel yadi kisitikha lintoa‘ shamayim velisod ’arets veleimor letsiyon ‘ami ’atah. hit‘ori hit‘ori qumi yerushalim ’asher shatit miyad yhvh ’et kos khamato ’et quba‘at kos hatar‘eilah shatit matsit. ’en menahel lah mikal banim yaladah ve’en makhaziq beyadah mikal banim gideilah. shetayim henah qore’otayikh mi yanud lakh hashod vehasheber vehara‘ab vehakhereb mi ’anakhamekh. banayikh ‘ulefu shakhebu berosh kal khutsot keto mikhmar hamlei’im khamat yhvh ga‘arat ’elohayikh. lakhen shim‘i na zot ‘aniyah ushekhurat velo miyayin. koh ’amar ’adonayikh yhvh veilohayikh yarib ‘amo hineh laqakhti miyadekh ’et kos hatar‘eilah ’et quba‘at kos khamati lo tosifi lishtotah ‘od. vesamtiha beyad mogayikh ’asher ’ameru lenafshekh shekhi vena‘aborah vatasimi kha’arets geivekh vekhakhuts la‘oberim. ‘uri ‘uri libshi ‘uzekh tsiyon libshi bigdei tif’artekh yerushalim ‘ir haqodesh ki lo yosif yabo bakh ‘od ‘arel vetamei. hitna‘ari mei‘afar qumi shebi yerushalim hitpatekhu hitpatekhi mosrei tsavarekh shebiyah bat tsiyon. ki khoh ’amar yhvh khinam nimkartem velo bekhesef tiga’eilu. ki khoh ’amar ’adonai yhvh mitsrayim yarad ‘ami barishonah lagur sham ve’ashur be’efes ‘ashaqo. ve‘atah mi li mah li foh ne’um yhvh ki luqakh ‘ami khinam moshelo moshelav yeheililu ne’um yhvh vetamid kal hayom shemi mino’ats. lakhen yeida‘ ‘ami shemi lakhen bayom hahu ki ’ani hu hamdaber hineini. mah navu ‘al heharim raglei mebaser mashmia‘ shalom mebaser tob mashmia‘ yeshu‘ah ’omer letsiyon malakh ’elohayikh. qol tsofayikh nase’u qol yakhdav yeraneinu ki ‘ayin be‘ayin yir’u beshub yhvh tsiyon. pitskhu ranenu yakhdav kharebot yerushalim ki nikham yhvh ‘amo ga’al yerushalim. khasaf yhvh ’et zeroa‘ qadesho le‘einei kal hagoyim vera’u kal ’afsei ’arets ’et yeshu‘at ’eloheinu. suru suru tse’u misham tamei ’al tiga‘u tse’u mitokhah hibaru nose’ei kelei yhvh. ki lo bekhipazon teitsei’u ubimnusah lo teileikhun ki holekh lifneikhem yhvh ume’asifkhem ’elohei yisra’el. hineh yaskil ‘abdi yarum venisa vegabah me’od. ka’asher shamemu ‘alekha rabim ken mishkhat mei’ish mar’eihu veto’aro mibenei ’adam. ken yazeh goyim rabim ‘alav yiqpetsu melakhim pihem ki ’asher lo supar lahem ra’u va’asher lo shame‘u hitbonanu. mi he’emin lishmu‘ateinu uzeroa‘ yhvh ‘al mi niglatah. vaya‘al kayoneq lefanav vekhashoresh mei’erets tsiyah lo to’ar lo velo hadar venir’eihu velo mar’eh venekhmedeihu. nibzeh vakhadal ’ishim ’ish makh’obot vidua‘ kholi ukhemaster panim mimenu nibzeh velo khashabnuhu. ’akhen kholayeinu hu nasa umakh’obeinu sebalam va’anakhnu khashabnuhu nagua‘ mukeh ’elohim ume‘uneh. vehu mekholal mipesha‘einu meduka mei‘avonoteinu musar shelomeinu ‘alav ubakhaburato nirpa lanu. kulanu katson ta‘inu ’ish ledarko paninu yhvh hifgia‘ bo ’et ‘avon kulanu. nigas vehu na‘aneh velo yiftakh piv kaseh latebakh yubal ukherakhel lifnei gozezeha ne’elamah velo yiftakh piv. mei‘otser umimishpat luqakh ve’et doro mi yesokheiakh ki nigzar mei’erets khayim mipesha‘ ‘ami nega‘ lamo. vayiten ’et resha‘im qibro ve’et ‘ashir bemotav ‘al lo khamas ‘asah velo mirmah befiv. yhvh khafets dake’o hekheli ’im tasim ’asham nafsho yir’eh zera‘ ya’arikh yamim vekheifets yhvh beyado yitslakh. mei‘amal nafsho yir’eh yisba‘ beda‘to yatsdiq tsadiq ‘abdi larabim va‘avonotam hu yisbol. lakhen ’akhaleq lo barabim ve’et ‘atsumim yekhaleq shalal takhat ’asher he‘erah lamavet nafsho ve’et poshe‘im nimnah vehu khet rabim nasa velaposhe‘im yafgia‘. rani ‘aqarah lo yaladah pitskhi rinah vetsahali lo khalah ki rabim benei shomeimah mibenei be‘ulah ’amar yhvh. harkhibi meqom ’aholekh viri‘ot mishkenotayikh yatu ’al takhsokhi ha’arikhi meitarayikh viteidotayikh khazeiqi. ki yamin usemol tifrotsi vezar‘ekh goyim yirash ve‘arim neshamot yoshibu. ’al tire’i ki lo teiboshi ve’al tikalemi ki lo takhpiri ki boshet ‘alumayikh tishkakhi vekherpat ’almenutayikh lo tizkeri ‘od. ki bo‘alayikh ‘osayikh yhvh tseba’ot shemo vego’alekh qedosh yisra’el ’elohei khal ha’arets yiqarei. ki khe’ishah ‘azubah va‘atsubat ruakh qera’akh yhvh ve’eishet ne‘urim ki tima’es ’amar ’elohayikh. berega‘ qaton ‘azabtikh uberakhamim gedolim ’aqabetsekh. beshetsef qetsef histarti fanai rega‘ mimekh ubekhesed ‘olam rikhamtikh ’amar go’alekh yhvh. ki mei noakh zot li ’asher nishba‘ti mei‘abor mei noakh ‘od ‘al ha’arets ken nishba‘ti miqetsof ‘alayikh umige‘ar bakh. ki heharim yamushu vehageba‘ot temutenah vekhasdi mei’itekh lo yamush uberit shelomi lo tamut ’amar merakhamekh yhvh. ‘aniyah so‘arah lo nukhamah hineh ’anokhi marbits bapukh ’abanayikh visadtikh basapirim. vesamti kadkhod shimshotayikh ushe‘arayikh le’abnei ’eqdakh vekhal gebulekh le’abnei kheifets. vekhal banayikh limudei yhvh verab shelom banayikh. bitsdaqah tikonani rakhaqi mei‘osheq ki lo tira’i umimekhitah ki lo tiqrab ’eilayikh. hen gor yagur ’efes mei’oti mi gar ’itakh ‘alayikh yipol. hen hineh ’anokhi barati kharash nofeiakh be’esh pekham umotsi kheli lema‘aseihu ve’anokhi barati mashkhit lekhabel. kal keli yutsar ‘alayikh lo yitslakh vekhal lashon taqum ’itakh lamishpat tarshi‘i zot nakhalat ‘abdei yhvh vetsidqatam mei’iti ne’um yhvh. ho kal tsamei lekhu lamayim va’asher ’en lo kasef lekhu shibru ve’ekholu ulekhu shibru belo khesef ubelo mekhir yayin vekhalab. lamah tishqelu khesef belo lekhem vigi‘akhem belo lesabe‘ah shim‘u shamoa‘ ’eilai ve’ikhlu tob vetit‘anag badeshen nafshekhem. hatu ’azenekhem ulekhu ’eilai shim‘u utekhi nafshekhem ve’ekhretah lakhem berit ‘olam khasdei david hane’emanim. hen ‘ed le’umim netativ nagid umetsaveh le’umim. hen go lo teida‘ tiqra vego lo yeda‘ukha ’eilekha yarutsu lema‘an yhvh ’elohekha veliqdosh yisra’el ki fei’arakh. dirshu yhvh behimatse’o qera’uhu bihyoto qarob. ya‘azob rasha‘ darko ve’ish ’aven makhshebotav veyashob ’el yhvh virakhameihu ve’el ’eloheinu ki yarbeh lisloakh. ki lo makhshebotai makhsheboteikhem velo darkheikhem derakhai ne’um yhvh. ki gabehu shamayim mei’arets ken gabehu derakhai midarkheikhem umakhshebotai mimakhsheboteikhem. ki ka’asher yeired hageshem vehasheleg min hashamayim veshamah lo yashub ki ’im hirvah ’et ha’arets veholidah vehitsmikhah venatan zera‘ lazoreia‘ velekhem la’okhel. ken yihyeh debari ’asher yeitsei mipi lo yashub ’eilai reiqam ki ’im ‘asah ’et ’asher khafatsti vehitsliakh ’asher shelakhtiv. ki besimkhah teitsei’u ubeshalom tubalun heharim vehageba‘ot yiftsekhu lifneikhem rinah vekhal ‘atsei hasadeh yimkha’u khaf. takhat hana‘atsuts ya‘aleh berosh takhat vetakhat hasirpad ya‘aleh hadas vehayah yhvh leshem le’ot ‘olam lo yikaret. koh ’amar yhvh shimru mishpat va‘asu tsedaqah ki qerobah yeshu‘ati labo vetsidqati lehigalot. ’ashrei ’enosh ya‘aseh zot uben ’adam yakhaziq bah shomer shabat meikhalelo veshomer yado mei‘asot kal ra‘. ve’al yomar ben haneikhar hanilvah ’el yhvh leimor habdel yabdilani yhvh mei‘al ‘amo ve’al yomar hasaris hen ’ani ‘ets yabesh. ki khoh ’amar yhvh lasarisim ’asher yishmeru ’et shabetotai ubakharu ba’asher khafatseti umakhaziqim bibriti. venatati lahem bebeiti ubekhomotai yad vashem tob mibanim umibanot shem ‘olam ’eten lo ’asher lo yikaret. ubenei haneikhar hanilvim ‘al yhvh leshareto ule’ahabah ’et shem yhvh lihyot lo la‘abadim kal shomer shabat meikhalelo umakhaziqim bibriti. vahabi’otim ’el har qadshi vesimakhtim bebet tefilati ‘oloteihem vezibkheihem leratson ‘al mizbekhi ki beiti bet tefilah yiqarei lekhal ha‘amim. ne’um ’adonai yhvh meqabets nidkhei yisra’el ‘od ’aqabets ‘alav leniqbatsav. kol khayto sadai ’eitayu le’ekhol kal khayto baya‘ar. tsafu tsofav ‘ivrim kulam lo yada‘u kulam kelabim ’ilemim lo yukhelu linboakh hozim shokhebim ’ohabei lanum. vehakelabim ‘azei nefesh lo yade‘u sabe‘ah vehemah ro‘im lo yade‘u habin kulam ledarkam panu ’ish lebits‘o miqatseihu. ’eitayu ’eqkhah yayin venisbe’ah sheikhar vehayah khazeh yom makhar gadol yeter me’od. hatsadiq ’abad ve’en ’ish sam ‘al leb ve’anshei khesed ne’esafim be’en meibin ki mipenei hara‘ah ne’esaf hatsadiq. yabo shalom yanukhu ‘al mishkebotam holekh nekhokho. ve’atem qirbu henah benei ‘onenah zera‘ mena’ef vatizneh. ‘al mi tit‘anagu ‘al mi tarkhibu feh ta’arikhu lashon halo ’atem yildei fesha‘ zera‘ shaqer. haneikhamim ba’eilim takhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan shokhatei hayladim banekhalim takhat se‘ifei hasela‘im. bekhaleqei nakhal khelqekh hem hem goralekh gam lahem shafakht nesekh he‘elit minkhah ha‘al ’eleh ’enakhem. ‘al har gaboah venisa samt mishkabekh gam sham ‘alit lizboakh zabakh. ve’akhar hadelet vehamezuzah samt zikhronekh ki mei’iti gilit vata‘ali hirkhabt mishkabekh vatikhrat lakh meihem ’ahabt mishkabam yad khazit. vatashuri lamelekh bashemen vatarbi riqukhayikh vateshalekhi tsiraykh ‘ad meirakhoq vatashpili ‘ad she’ol. berob darkekh yaga‘at lo ’amart no’ash khayat yadekh matsat ‘al ken lo khalit. ve’et mi da’agt vatire’i ki tekhazeibi ve’oti lo zakhart lo samt ‘al libekh halo ’ani makhsheh umei‘olam ve’oti lo tira’i. ’ani ’agid tsidqatekh ve’et ma‘asayikh velo yo‘ilukh. beza‘aqekh yatsilukh qibutsayikh ve’et kulam yisa ruakh yiqakh habel vehakhoseh bi yinkhal ’erets veyirash har qadshi ve’amar solu solu
