khen tekhineha. telameha raveh nakhet gedudeha birbibim temogegenah tsimkhah tebarekh. ‘itarta shenat tobatekha uma‘galekha yir‘afun dashen. yir‘afu ne’ot midbar vegil geba‘ot takhgorenah. labeshu kharim hatson va‘amaqim ya‘atfu bar yitro‘a‘u ’af yashiru. lamnatseiakh shir mizmor hari‘u leilohim kal ha’arets. zameru khebod shemo simu khabod tehilato. ’imru leilohim mah nora ma‘asekha berob ‘uzekha yekhakhashu lekha ’oyebekha. kal ha’arets yishtakhavu lekha vizameru lakh yezameru shimkha selah. lekhu ure’u mif‘alot ’elohim nora ‘alilah ‘al benei ’adam. hafakh yam leyabashah banahar ya‘abru beragel m nismekhah bo. moshel bigburato ‘olam ‘einav bagoyim titspenah hasorim ’al yarimu yarumu lamo selah. barekhu ‘amim ’eloheinu vehashmi‘u qol tehilato. hasam nafsheinu bakhayim velo natan lamot ragleinu. ki bekhantanu ’elohim tseraftanu kitsraf kasef. habeitanu bametsudah samta mu‘aqah bemateneinu. hirkabta ’enosh lerosheinu banu ba’esh ubamayim vatotsi’einu larevayah. ’abo beitekha be‘olot ’ashalem lekha nedarai. ’asher patsu sefatai vediber pi batsar li. ‘olot meikhim ’a‘aleh lakh ‘im qetoret ’eilim ’e‘eseh baqar ‘im ‘atudim selah. lekhu shim‘u va’asaperah kal yir’ei ’elohim ’asher ‘asah lenafshi. ’eilav pi qarati veromam takhat leshoni. ’aven ’im ra’iti belibi lo yishma‘ ’adonai. ’akhen shama‘ ’elohim hiqshib beqol tefilati. barukh ’elohim ’asher lo heisir tefilati vekhasdo mei’iti. lamnatsekh binginot mizmor shir. ’elohim yekhaneinu vibarekheinu ya’er panav ’itanu selah. lada‘at ba’arets darkekha bekhal goyim yeshu‘atekha. yodukha ‘amim ’elohim yodukha ‘amim kulam. yismekhu viranenu le’umim ki tishpot ‘amim mishor ule’umim ba’arets tankhem selah. yodukha ‘amim ’elohim yodukha ‘amim kulam. ’erets natenah yebulah yebarekheinu ’elohim ’eloheinu. yebarekheinu ’elohim veyire’u ’oto kal ’afsei ’arets. lamnatseiakh ledavid mizmor shir. yaqum ’elohim yafutsu ’oybav veyanusu mesan’av mipanav. kehindof ‘ashan tindof kehimes donag mipenei ’esh yobedu resha‘im mipenei ’elohim. vetsadiqim yismekhu ya‘altsu lifnei ’elohim veyasisu besimkhah. shiru leilohim zameru shemo solu larokheb ba‘arabot beyah shemo ve‘ilzu lefanav. ’abi yetomim vedayan ’almanot ’elohim bim‘on qadesho. ’elohim moshib yekhidim baytah motsi ’asirim bakosharot ’akh sorarim shakhenu tsekhikhah. ’elohim betseitekha lifnei ‘amekha betsa‘dekha bishimon selah. ’erets ra‘ashah ’af shamayim natefu mipenei ’elohim zeh sinai mipenei ’elohim ’elohei yisra’el. geshem nedabot tanif ’elohim nakhalatekha venil’ah ’atah khonantah. khayatekha yashebu bah takhin betobatekha le‘ani ’elohim. ’adonai yiten ’omer hambaserot tsaba rab. malkhei tseba’ot yidodun yidodun unevat bayit tekhaleq shalal. ’im tishkebun ben shefatayim kanfei yonah nekhpah bakesef ve’ebroteha biraqraq kharuts. befares shadai melakhim bah tashleg betsalmon. har ’elohim har bashan har gabnunim har bashan. lamah teratsedun harim gabnunim hahar khamad ’elohim leshibto ’af yhvh yishkon lanetsakh. rekheb ’elohim ribotayim ’alfei shin’an ’adonai bam sinai baqodesh. ‘alita lamarom shabita shebi laqakhta matanot ba’adam ve’af sorim lishkon yah ’elohim. barukh ’adonai yom yom ya‘amas lanu ha’el yeshu‘ateinu selah. ha’el lanu ’el lemosha‘ot yhvh ’adonai lamavet totsa’ot. ’akh ’elohim yimkhats rosh ’oyebav qadeqod sei‘ar mithalekh ba’ashamav. ’amar ’adonai mibashan ’ashib ’ashib mimetsulot yam. lema‘an timkhats raglekha bedam leshon kelabekha mei’oyebim mineihu. ra’u halikhotekha ’elohim halikhot ’eili malki baqodesh. qidemu rim ’akhar nogenim betokh ‘alamot tofeifot. bemaqheilot barekhu ’elohim yhvh mimeqor yisra’el. sham binyamin tsa‘ir rodem sarei yehudah rigmatam sarei zebulun sarei naftali. tsivah ’elohekha ‘uzekha ‘uzah ’elohim zu pa‘alta lanu. meiheikhalekha ‘al yerushalim lekha yobilu melakhim shai. ge‘ar khayat qaneh ‘adat ’abirim be‘eglei ‘amim mitrapes beratsei khasef bizar ‘amim qerabot yekhpatsu. ye’etayu khashmanim mini mitsrayim kush tarits yadav leilohim. mamlekhot ha’arets shiru leilohim zameru ’adonai selah. larokheb bishmei shemei qedem hen yiten beqolo qol ‘oz. tenu ‘oz leilohim ‘al yisra’el ga’avato ve‘uzo bashekhaqim. nora ’elohim mimiqdashekha ’el yisra’el hu noten ‘oz veta‘atsumot la‘am barukh ’elohim. lamnatseiakh ‘al shoshanim ledavid. hoshi‘eini ’elohim ki ba’u mayim ‘ad nafesh. taba‘ti biven metsulah ve’en ma‘omad bati bema‘amaqei mayim veshibolet shetafateni. yaga‘ti beqare’i nikhar geroni kalu ‘einai meyakhel leilohai. rabu misa‘arot roshi sone’ai khinam ‘atsemu matsmitai ’oyebai sheqer ’asher lo gazalti ’az ’ashib. ’elohim ’atah yada‘ta le’ivalti ve’ashmotai mimekha lo nikhkhadu. ’al yeiboshu bi qoekha ’adonai yhvh tseba’ot ’al yikalemu bi mebaqshekha ’elohei yisra’el. ki ‘alekha nasati kherpah kisetah khelimah fanai. muzar hayiti le’ekhai venakheri libnei ’imi. ki qin’at beitekha ’akhalateni vekherpot khorfekha nafelu ‘alai. va’ebkeh batsom nafshi vatehi lakharafot li. va’etenah lebushi saq va’ehi lahem lemashal. yasikhu bi yoshebei sha‘ar uneginot shotei sheikhar. va’ani tefilati lekha yhvh ‘et ratson ’elohim berab khasdekha ‘aneini be’emet yish‘ekha. hatsileini mitit ve’al ’etba‘ah ’inatselah misone’ai umima‘amaqei mayim. ’al tishtefeini shibolet mayim ve’al tibla‘eini metsulah ve’al te’tar ‘alai be’er piha. ‘aneini yhvh ki tob khasdekha kerob rakhamekha peneh ’eilai. ve’al taster panekha mei‘abdekha ki tsar li maher ‘aneini. qarebah ’el nafshi ge’alah lema‘an ’oyebai pedeini. ’atah yada‘ta kherpati ubasheti ukhelimati negdekha kal tsorai. kherpah shaberah libi va’anushah va’aqaveh lanud va’ayin velamnakhamim velo matsati. vayitenu bebaruti rosh velitsma’i yashquni khomets. yehi shulkhanam lifneihem lefakh velishlomim lemoqesh. tekhshakhnah ‘eineihem meire’ot umateneihem tamid ham‘ad. shefakh ‘aleihem za‘mekha vakharon ’apekha yasigem. tehi tiratam neshamah be’aholeihem ’al yehi yosheb. ki ’atah ’asher hikita radafu ve’el makh’ob khalalekha yesapeiru. tenah ‘avon ‘al ‘avonam ve’al yabo’u betsidqatekha. yimakhu miseifer khayim ve‘im tsadiqim ’al yikateibu. va’ani ‘ani vekho’eb yeshu‘atekha ’elohim tesagebeini. ’ahalah shem ’elohim beshir va’agadelenu betodah. vetitab yhvh mishor par maqrin mafris. ra’u ‘anavim yismakhu doreshei ’elohim vikhi lebabkhem. ki shomeia‘ ’el ’ebyonim yhvh ve’et ’asirav lo bazah. yehaluhu shamayim va’arets yamim vekhal romes bam. ki ’elohim yoshia‘ tsiyon veyibneh ‘arei yehudah veyashebu m vireishuha. vezera‘ ‘abadav yinkhaluha ve’ohabei mo yishkenu bah. lamnatseiakh ledavid lehazkir. ’elohim lehatsileini yhvh le‘ezrati khushah. yeiboshu veyakhperu mebaqshei nafshi yisogu ’akhor veyikalemu khafeitsei ra‘ati. yashubu ‘al ‘eiqeb bashetam ha’omerim he’akh he’akh. yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mebaqshekha veyomeru tamid yigdal ’elohim ’ohabei yeshu‘atekha. va’ani ‘ani ve’ebyon ’elohim khushah li ‘ezri umefalti ’atah yhvh ’al te’akhar. bekha yhvh khasiti ’al ’eiboshah le‘olam. betsidqatekha tatsileini utefaleteini hateh ’eilai ’azenekha vehoshi‘eini. heyeh li letsur ma‘on labo tamid tsivita lehoshi‘eini ki sal‘i umetsudati ’atah. ’elohai paleteini miyad rasha‘ mikaf me‘avel vekhomets ki ’atah tiqvati ’adonai yhvh mibtakhi mine‘urai. ‘alekha nismakhti mibeten mime‘ei ’imi ’atah gozi bekha tehilati tamid. kemofet hayiti lerabim ve’atah makhasi ‘oz. yimalei fi tehilatekha kal hayom tif’artekha. ’al tashlikheini le‘et ziqnah kikhlot kokhi ’al ta‘azbeini. ki ’ameru ’oybai li veshomerei nafshi no‘atsu yakhdav. leimor ’elohim ‘azabo ridfu vetifsuhu ki ’en matsil. ’elohim ’al tirkhaq mimeni ’elohai le‘ezrati khishah khushah. yeiboshu yikhlu sotenei nafshi ya‘atu kherpah ukhelimah mebaqshei ra‘ati. va’ani tamid ’ayakhel vehosafti ‘al kal tehilatekha. pi yesaper tsidqatekha kal hayom teshu‘atekha ki lo yada‘ti seforot. ’abo bigburot ’adonai yhvh ’azkir tsidqatekha lebadekha. ’elohim limadtani mine‘urai ve‘ad henah ’agid nifle’otekha. vegam ‘ad ziqnah veseibah ’elohim ’al ta‘azbeini ‘ad ’agid zero‘akha ledor lekhal yabo geburatekha. vetsidqatekha ’elohim ‘ad marom ’asher ‘asita gedolot ’elohim mi khamokha. ’asher hir’itanu hir’itani tsarot rabot vera‘ot tashub tekhayeinu tekhayeini umitehomot ha’arets tashub ta‘aleini. tereb gedulati vetisob tenakhameini. gam ’ani ’odkha bikhli nebel ’amitekha ’elohai ’azamerah lekha bekhinor qedosh yisra’el. teranenah fatai ki ’azamerah lakh venafshi ’asher padita. gam leshoni kal hayom tehgeh tsidqatekha ki boshu khi khaferu mebaqshei ra‘ati. lishlomoh ’elohim mishpatekha lemelekh ten vetsidqatekha leben melekh. yadin ‘amekha betsedeq va‘aniyekha bemishpat. yis’u harim shalom la‘am ugeba‘ot bitsdaqah. yishpot ‘aniyei ‘am yoshia‘ libnei ’ebyon vidakei ‘osheq. yira’ukha ‘im shamesh velifnei yareiakh dor dorim. yeired kematar ‘al gez kirbibim zarzif ’arets. yifrakh beyamav tsadiq verob lom ‘ad beli yareiakh. veyeired miyam ‘ad yam uminahar ‘ad ’afsei ’arets. lefanav yikhre‘u tsiyim ve’oyebav ‘afar yelakheikhu. malkhei tarshish ve’iyim minkhah yashibu malkhei sheba useba ’eshkar yaqribu. veyishtakhavu lo khal melakhim kal goyim ya‘abduhu. ki yatsil ’ebyon meshaveia‘ ve‘ani ve’en ‘ozer lo. yakhos ‘al dal ve’ebyon venafshot ’ebyonim yoshia‘. mitokh umeikhamas yig’al nafsham veyeiqar damam be‘einav. vikhi veyiten lo mizehab sheba veyitpalel ba‘ado tamid kal hayom yebarakhenhu. yehi fisat bar ba’arets berosh harim yir‘ash kalebanon piryo veyatsitsu mei‘ir ke‘eiseb ha’arets. yehi shemo le‘olam lifnei shemesh yanin yinon shemo veyitbarekhu bo kal goyim ye’asheruhu. barukh yhvh ’elohim ’elohei yisra’el ‘oseh nifla’ot lebado. ubarukh shem kebodo le‘olam veyimalei khebodo ’et kol ha’arets ’amen ve’amen. kalu tefilot david ben yishai. mizmor le’asaf ’akh tob leyisra’el ’elohim lebarei leibab. va’ani kim‘at natui natayu raglai ke’ayin shupekhah shupekhu ’ashurai. ki qineiti baholim shelom resha‘im ’er’eh. ki ’en khartsubot lemotam ubari ’ulam. ba‘amal ’enosh ’eineimo ve‘im ’adam lo yenuga‘u. lakhen ‘anaqatmo ga’avah ya‘atafoshi t khamas lamo. yatsa meikheileb ‘eineimo ‘aberu maskiyot leibab. yamiqu vidaberu bera‘ ‘osheq mimarom yedabeiru. shatu bashamayim pihem uleshonam tihalakh ba’arets. lakhen yashib yashub ‘amo halom umei malei yimatsu lamo. ve’ameru ’eikhah yada‘ ’el veyesh dei‘ah be‘elyon. hineh ’eleh resha‘im veshalvei ‘olam hisgu khayil. ’akh riq zikiti lebabi va’erkhats beniqayon kapai. va’ehi nagua‘ kal hayom vetokhakhti labeqarim. ’im ’amarti ’asaperah khemo hineh dor banekha bagadeti. va’akhashebah lada‘at zot ‘amal hi hu be‘einai. ‘ad ’abo ’el miqdeshei ’el ’abinah le’akharitam. ’akh bakhalaqot tashit lamo hipaltam lemashu’ot. ’ekh hayu leshamah kheraga‘ safu tamu min balahot. kakhalom meihaqits ’adonai ba‘ir tsalmam tibzeh. ki yitkhamets lebabi vekhilyotai ’eshtonan. va’ani ba‘ar velo ’eida‘ beheimot hayiti ‘imakh. va’ani tamid ‘imakh ’akhazta beyad yemini. ba‘atsatekha tankheini ve’akhar kabod tiqakheini. mi li bashamayim ve‘imekha lo khafatsti ba’arets. kalah she’eiri ulebabi tsur lebabi vekhelqi ’elohim le‘olam. ki hineh rekheiqekha yobeidu hitsmatah kal zoneh mimeka. va’ani qirabat ’elohim li tob shati badonai yhvh makhsi lesaper kal mal’akhotekha. maskil le’asaf lamah ’elohim zanakhta lanetsakh ye‘shan ’apekha betson mar‘itekha. zekhor ‘adatekha qanita qedem ga’alta sheibet nakhalatekha har tsiyon zeh shakhanta bo. harimah fe‘amekha lemashu’ot netsakh kal heira‘ ’oyeb baqodesh. sha’agu tsorerekha beqereb mo‘adekha samu ’ototam ’otot. yivada‘ kemeibi lema‘elah bisabakh ‘ets qardumot. ve‘et ve‘atah pitukheha yakhad bekhashil vekheilapot yahalomun. shilkhu ba’esh miqdashekha la’arets khilelu mishkan shemekha. ’ameru belibam ninam yakhad sarefu khal mo‘adei ’el ba’arets. ’ototeinu lo ra’inu ’en ‘od nabi velo ’itanu yodeia‘ ‘ad mah. ‘ad matai ’elohim yekharef tsar yena’ets ’oyeb shimkha lanetsakh. lamah tashib yadekha viminekha miqereb khoqkha kheiqekha khaleh. veilohim malki miqedem po‘el yeshu‘ot beqereb ha’arets. ’atah forarta be‘azekha yam shibarta rashei taninim ‘al hamayim. ’atah ritsatsta rashei livyatan titenenu ma’akhal le‘am letsiyim. ’atah baqa‘ta ma‘yan vanakhal ’atah hobashta naharot ’eitan. lekha yom ’af lekha layelah ’atah hakhinota ma’or vashamesh. ’atah hitsabta kal gebulot ’arets qayits vakhoref ’atah yetsartam zekhar zot ’oyeb kheiref yhvh ve‘am nabal ni’atsu shemekha. ’al titen lekhayat nefesh torekha khayat ‘aniyekha ’al tishkakh lanetsakh. habet laberit ki male’u makhashakei ’erets ne’ot khamas. ’al yashob dakh nikhlam ‘ani ve’ebyon yehalu shemekha. qumah ’elohim ribah ribekha zekhor kherpatekha mini nabal kal hayom. ’al tishkakh qol tsorerekha she’on qamekha ‘oleh tamid. lamnatseiakh ’al tashkhet mizmor le’asaf shir. hodinu lekha ’elohim hodinu veqarob shemekha siperu nifle’otekha. ki ’eqakh mo‘ed ’ani meisharim ’eshpot. nemogim ’erets vekhal yoshebeha ’anokhi tikanti ‘amudeha selah. ’amarti laholim ’al taholu velaresha‘im ’al tarimu qaren. ’al tarimu lamarom qarnekhem tedaberu betsavar ‘ataq. ki lo mimotsa umima‘arab velo mimidbar harim. ki ’elohim shofet zeh yashpil vezeh yarim. ki khos beyad yhvh veyayin khamar malei mesekh vayager mizeh ’akhosh mareha yimtsu yishtu kol rish‘ei ’arets. va’ani ’agid le‘olam ’azamerah leilohei ya‘aqob. vekhal qarnei resha‘im ’agadeia‘ teromamnah qarnot tsadiq. lamnatseiakh binginot mizmor le’asaf shir. noda‘ bihudah ’elohim beyisra’el gadol shemo. vayhi beshalem suko ume‘onato betsiyon. mah shibar rishfei qashet magen vekhereb umilkhamah selah. na’or ’atah ’adir meiharei taref. ’eshtolu ’abirei leb namu shenatam velo matse’u khal ’anshei khayil yedeihem. miga‘aratekha ’elohei ya‘aqob nirdam verekheb vasus. ’atah nora ’atah umi ya‘amod lefanekha mei’az ’apekha. mishamayim hishma‘ta din ’erets yare’ah veshaqatah. bequm lamishpat ’elohim lehoshia‘ kal ‘anvei ’erets selah. ki khamat ’adam todeka she’eirit kheimot takhgor. nidaru veshalemu yhvh ’eloheikhem kal sebibav yobilu shai lamora. yibtsor ruakh negidim nora lemalkhei ’arets. lamnatseiakh ‘al yeditun yedutun le’asaf mizmor. qoli ’el ’elohim ve’ets‘aqah qoli ’el ’elohim veha’azin ’eilai. beyom tsarati ’adonai darasheti yadi laylah nigerah velo tafug mei’anah hinakhem nafshi. ’ezkerah ’elohim ve’ehemayah ’asikhah vetit‘atef rukhi selah. ’akhazta shemurot ‘einai nif‘amti velo ’adaber. khishabti yamim miqedem not ‘olamim. ’ezkerah neginati balayelah ‘im lebabi ’asikhah vaykhapes rukhi. hal‘olamim yiznakh ’adonai velo yosif lirtsot ‘od. he’afes lanetsakh khasdo gamar ’omer ledor vador. hashakhakh khanot ’el ’im qafats be’af rakhamav selah. va’omar khaloti hi not yemin ‘elyon. ’azkir ’ezkor ma‘alei yah ki ’ezkerah miqedem pil’ekha. vehagiti bekhal pa‘olekha uba‘alilotekha ’asikhah. ’elohim baqodesh darkekha mi ’el gadol keilohim. ’atah ha’el ‘oseh fele hoda‘ta ba‘amim ‘uzekha. ga’alta bizroa‘ ‘amekha benei ya‘aqob veyosef selah. ra’ukha mayim ’elohim ra’ukha mayim yakhilu ’af yirgezu tehomot. zoremu mayim ‘abot qol natenu shekhaqim ’af khatsatsekha yithalakhu. qol ra‘amkha bagalgal hei’iru beraqim teibel ragezah vatir‘ash ha’arets. bayam darkekha ushebilekha ushebilekha bemayim rabim ve‘iqebotekha lo noda‘u. nakhita khatson ‘amekha beyad mosheh ve’aharon. maskil le’asaf ha’azinah ‘ami torati hatu ’azenekhem le’imrei fi. ’eftekhah bemashal pi ’abi‘ah khidot mini qedem. ’asher ma‘nu vaneida‘em va’aboteinu siperu lanu. lo nekhakhed mibeneihem ledor ’akharon mesaperim tehilot yhvh ve‘ezuzo venifle’otav ’asher ‘asah. vayaqem ‘eidut beya‘aqob vetorah sam beyisra’el ’asher tsivah ’et ’aboteinu lehodi‘am libneihem. lema‘an yeide‘u dor ’akharon banim yivaleidu yaqumu visaperu libneihem. veyasimu beilohim kislam velo yishkekhu ma‘alei ’el umitsvotav yintsoru. velo yihyu ka’abotam dor sorer umoreh dor lo heikhin libo velo ne’emnah ’et ’el rukho. benei ’efrayim nosheqei romei qashet hafekhu beyom qerab. lo meru berit ’elohim ubetorato mei’anu lalekhet. vayishkekhu ‘alilotav venifle’otav ’asher her’am. neged ’abotam ‘asah fele be’erets mitsrayim sedeh tso‘an. baqa‘ yam vaya‘abirem vayatseb mayim kemo ned. vayankhem be‘anan yomam vekhal halaylah be’or ’esh. yebaqa‘ tsurim bamidbar vayashq kithomot rabah. vayotsi nozlim misala‘ vayored kaneharot mayim. vayosifu ‘od lakhato lo lamrot ‘elyon batsiyah. vaynasu ’el bilbabam lish’al ’okhel lenafsham. vaydaberu beilohim ’ameru hayukhal ’el la‘arokh lekhan bamidbar. hen hikah tsur vayazubu mayim unekhalim yishtofu hagam lekhem yukhal tet ’im yakhin she’er le‘amo. lakhen shama‘ yhvh vayit‘abar ve’esh niseqah beya‘aqob vegam ’af ‘alah beyisra’el. ki lo he’eminu beilohim velo batekhu bishu‘ato. vaytsav shekhaqim mima‘al vedaltei shamayim patakh. vayamter ‘aleihem man le’ekhol udeganosha mayim natan lamo. lekhem ’abirim ’akhal ’ish tseidah shalakh lahem lasoba‘. yasa‘ qadim bashamayim vaynaheg be‘uzo teiman. vayamter ‘aleihem ke‘afar she’er ukhekhol yamim ‘of kanaf. vayapel beqereb makhaneihu sabib lemishkenotav. vayokhelu vayisbe‘u me’od veta’avatam yabi lahem. lo zaru mita’avatam ‘od ’akhelam befihem. ve’af ’elohim ‘alah bahem vayaharog bemishmaneihem ubakhurei yisra’el hikhria‘. bekhal zot khate’u ‘od velo he’eminu benifle’otav. vaykhal bahebel yemeihem ushenotam babehalah. ’im haragam uderashuhu veshabu veshikharu ’el. vayizkeru ki ’elohim tsuram ve’el ‘elyon go’alam. vayfatuhu befihem ubilshonam yekhazebu lo. velibam lo nakhon ‘imo velo ne’emnu bibrito. vehu rakhum yekhaper ‘avon velo yashkhit vehirbah lehashib ’apo velo ya‘ir kal khamato. vayizkor ki basar hemah ruakh holekh velo yashub. kamah yamruhu bamidbar ya‘atsibuhu bishimon. vayashubu vaynasu ’el uqedosh yisra’el hitvu. lo zakheru ’et yado yom ’asher padam mini tsar. ’asher sam bemitsrayim ’ototav umoftav bisdeh tso‘an. vayahafokh ledam ye’oreihem venozeleihem bal yishtayun. yeshalakh bahem ‘arob vayokhelem utsefardeia‘ vatashkhitem. vayiten lekhasil yebulam vigi‘am la’arbeh. yaharog babarad gafnam veshiqmotam bakhanamal. vayasger labarad be‘iram umiqneihem lareshafim. yeshalakh bam kharon ’apo ‘ebrah vaza‘am vetsarah mishlakhat mal’akhei ra‘im. yefales natib le’apo lo khasakh mimavet nafsham vekhayatam ladeber hisgir. vayakh kal bekhor bemitsrayim reishit ’onim be’aholei kham. vayasa‘ katson ‘amo vaynahagem ka‘eider bamidbar. vayankhem labetakh velo fakhadu ve’et ’oybeihem kisah hayam. vaybi’em ’el gebul qadesho har zeh qanetah yemino. vaygaresh mipeneihem goyim vayapilem bekhebel nakhalah vayashken be’aholeihem shibtei yisra’el. vaynasu vayamru ’et ’elohim ‘elyon ve‘eidotav lo shamaru. vayisogu vayibgedu ka’abotam nehpekhu keqeshet remiyah. vayakh‘isuhu bebamotam ubifsileihem yaqni’uhu. shama‘ ’elohim vayit‘abar vayim’as me’od beyisra’el. vayitosh mishkan shilo ’ohel shiken ba’adam. vayiten lashebi ‘uzo vetif’arto beyad tsar. vayasger lakhereb ‘amo ubenakhalato hit‘abar. bakhurav ’akhelah ’esh ubetulotav lo hulalu. kohanav bakhereb nafalu ve’almenotav lo tibkenah. vayiqats keyashen ’adonai kegibor mitronen miyayin. vayakh tsarav ’akhor kherpat ‘olam natan lamo. vayim’as be’ohel yosef ubesheibet ’efrayim lo bakhar. vayibkhar ’et sheibet yehudah ’et har tsiyon ’asher ’aheb. vayiben kemo ramim miqdasho ke’erets yesadah le‘olam. vayibkhar bedavid ‘abdo vayiqakheihu mimikhle’ot tson. mei’akhar ‘alot hebi’o lir‘ot beya‘aqob ‘amo ubeyisra’el nakhalato. vayir‘em ketom lebabo ubitbunot kapav yankhem. mizmor le’asaf ’elohim ba’u goyim benakhalatekha time’u ’et heikhal qadshekha samu ’et yerushalim le‘iyim. natenu ’et niblat ‘abadekha ma’akhal le‘of hashamayim besar khasidekha lekhayto ’arets. shafekhu damam kamayim sebibot yerushalim ve’en qober. hayinu kherpah lishkheineinu la‘ag vaqeles lisbiboteinu. ‘ad mah yhvh te’enaf lanetsakh tib‘ar kemo ’esh qin’atekha. shefokh khamatekha ’el hagoyim ’asher lo yeda‘ukha ve‘al mamlakhot ’asher beshimkha lo qara’u. ki ’akhal ’et ya‘aqob ve’et naveihu heishamu. ’al tizkar lanu ‘avonot rishonim maher yeqademunu rakhamekha ki dalonu me’od. ‘azereinu ’elohei yish‘einu ‘al debar kebod shemekha vehatsileinu vekhaper ‘al khatoteinu lema‘an shemekha. lamah yomeru hagoyim ’ayeh ’eloheihem yivada‘ bagiyim bagoyim le‘eineinu niqmat dam ‘abadekha hashafukh. tabo lefanekha ’enqat ’asir kegodel zero‘akha hoter benei temutah. vehasheb lishkheineinu be‘atayim ’el kheiqam kherpatam ’asher kheirefukha ’adonai. va’anakhnu ‘amekha vetson mar‘itekha nodeh lekha le‘olam ledor vador nesaper tehilatekha. lamnatseiakh ’el shoshanim ‘eidut le’asaf mizmor. ro‘eh yisra’el ha’azinah noheg katson yosef yosheb hakerubim hofi‘ah. lifnei ’efrayim ubinyamin umenasheh ‘orah ’et geburatekha ulekhah lishu‘atah lanu. ’elohim hashibeinu veha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. yhvh ’elohim tseba’ot ‘ad matai ‘ashanta bitfilat ‘amekha. he’ekhaltam lekhem dim‘ah vatashqeimo bidma‘ot shalish. tesimeinu madon lishkheineinu ve’oyebeinu yil‘agu lamo. ’elohim tseba’ot hashibeinu veha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. gefen mimitsrayim tasia‘ tegaresh goyim vatita‘eha. pinita lefaneha vatashresh rasheha vatemalei ’arets. kasu harim tsilah va‘anafeha ’arzei ’el. teshalakh qetsireha ‘ad yam ve’el nahar yonqoteha. lamah paratsta gedeireha ve’aruha kal ‘oberei darekh. yekharsemenah khazir miya‘ar veziz sadai yir‘enah. ’elohim tseba’ot shub na habet mishamayim ure’eh ufeqod gefen zot. vekhanah ’asher nate‘ah yeminekha ve‘al ben ’imatstah lakh. serufah ba’esh kesukhah miga‘arat panekha yobeidu. tehi yadekha ‘al ’ish yeminekha ‘al ben ’adam ’imatsta lakh. velo nasog mimeka tekhayeinu ubeshimkha niqra. yhvh ’elohim tseba’ot hashibeinu ha’er panekha venivashei‘ah. lamnatseiakh ‘al hagitit le’asaf. harninu leilohim ‘uzeinu hari‘u leilohei ya‘aqob. se’u zimrah utenu tof kinor na‘im ‘im nabel. tiq‘u bakhodesh shofar bakeiseh leyom khageinu. ki khoq leyisra’el hu mishpat leilohei ya‘aqob. ‘eidut bihosef samo betseito ‘al ’erets mitsrayim sefat lo yada‘ti ’eshma‘. hasiroti miseibel shikhmo kapav midud ta‘aborenah. batsarah qarata va’akhaletseka ’e‘enkha beseiter ra‘am ’ebkhanekha ‘al mei meribah selah. shema‘ ‘ami ve’a‘idah bakh yisra’el ’im tishma‘ li. lo yihyeh bekha ’el zar velo tishtakhaveh le’el neikhar. ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha hama‘alkha mei’erets mitsrayim harkheb pikha va’amal’eihu. velo shama‘ ‘ami leqoli veyisra’el lo ’abah li. va’ashalekheihu bishrirut libam yeilekhu bemo‘atsoteihem. lu ‘ami shomeia‘ li yisra’el bidrakhai yehaleikhu. kim‘at ’oybeihem ’akhnia‘ ve‘al tsareihem ’ashib yadi. mesan’ei yhvh yekhakhashu lo vihi ‘itam le‘olam. vaya’akhileihu meikheileb khitah umitsur debash ’asbi‘ekha. mizmor le’asaf ’elohim nitsab ba‘adat ’el beqereb ’elohim yishpot. ‘ad matai tishpetu ‘avel ufenei resha‘im tis’u selah. shiftu dal veyatom ‘ani varash hatsdiqu. paletu dal ve’ebyon miyad resha‘im hatsilu. lo yade‘u velo yabinu bakhasheikhah yithalakhu yimotu kal mosdei ’arets. ’ani ’amarti ’elohim ’atem ubenei ‘elyon kulekhem. ’akhen ke’adam temutun ukhe’akhad hasarim tipolu. qumah ’elohim shafetah ha’arets ki ’atah tinkhal bekhal hagoyim. shir mizmor le’asaf. ’elohim ’al domi lakh ’al tekherash ve’al tishqot ’el. ki hineh ’oybekha yehemayun umesan’ekha nase’u rosh. ‘al ‘amekha ya‘arimu sod veyitya‘atsu ‘al tsefunekha. ’ameru lekhu venakhkhidem migo velo yizakher shem yisra’el ‘od. ki no‘atsu leb yakhdav ‘alekha berit yikhrotu. ’aholei ’edom veyishme‘eilim mo’ab vehagrim. gebal ve‘amon va‘amaleq peleshet ‘im yoshebei tsor. gam ’ashur nilvah ‘imam hayu zeroa‘ libnei lot selah. ‘aseh lahem kemidyan kesisera kheyabin benakhal qishon. nishmedu be‘en dor hayu domen la’adamah. shiteimo nedibeimo ke‘oreb vekhiz’eb ukhezebakh ukhetsalmuna‘ kal nesikheimo. ’asher ’ameru nirashah lanu ’et ne’ot ’elohim. ’elohai shiteimo khagalgal keqash lifnei ruakh. ke’esh tib‘ar ya‘ar ukhelehabah telahet harim. ken tirdefem besa‘arekha ubesufatekha tebahalem. malei feneihem qalon vibaqshu shimkha yhvh. yeiboshu veyibahalu ‘adei ‘ad veyakhperu veyobeidu. veyeide‘u ki ’atah shimkha yhvh lebadekha ‘elyon ‘al kal ha’arets. lamnatseiakh ‘al hagitit libnei qorakh mizmor. mah yedidot mishkenotekha yhvh tseba’ot. nikhsefah vegam kaletah nafshi lekhatsrot yhvh libi ubesari yeranenu ’el ’el khai. gam tsipor matse’ah bayit uderor qen lah ’asher shatah ’efrokheha ’et mizbekhotekha yhvh tseba’ot malki veilohai. ’ashrei yoshebei beitekha ‘od yehalukha selah. ’ashrei ’adam ‘oz lo bakh mesilot bilbabam. ‘oberei be‘eimeq habakha ma‘yan yeshituhu gam berakhot ya‘teh moreh. yeilekhu meikhayil ’el khayil yeira’eh ’el ’elohim betsiyon. yhvh ’elohim tseba’ot shim‘ah tefilati ha’azinah ’elohei ya‘aqob selah. magineinu re’eh ’elohim vehabet penei meshikhekha. ki tob yom bakhatseirekha mei’alef bakharti histofef bebet ’elohai midur be’aholei resha‘. ki shemesh umagen yhvh ’elohim khen vekhabod yiten yhvh lo yimna‘ tob laholekhim betamim. yhvh tseba’ot ’ashrei ’adam boteiakh bakh. lamnatseiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. ratsita yhvh ’artsekha beta shebut shebit ya‘aqob. nasata ‘avon ‘amekha kisita khal khatatam selah. ’asafta khal ‘ebratekha heshibota meikharon ’apekha. ubeinu ’elohei yish‘einu vehafer ka‘askha ‘imanu. hal‘olam te’enaf banu timshokh ’apekha ledor vador. halo ’atah tashub tekhayeinu ve‘amekha yismekhu bakh. har’einu yhvh khasdekha veyesh‘akha titen lanu. ’eshme‘ah mah yedaber ha’el yhvh ki yedaber shalom ’el ‘amo ve’el khasidav ve’al yashubu lekhislah. ’akh qarob lirei’av yish‘o lishkon kabod be’artseinu. khesed ve’emet nifgashu tsedeq veshalom nashaqu. ’emet mei’erets titsmakh vetsedeq mishamayim nishqaf. gam yhvh yiten hatob ve’artseinu titen yebulah. tsedeq lefanav yehalekh veyasem lederekh pe‘amav. tefilah ledavid hateh yhvh ’azenekha ‘aneini ki ‘ani ve’ebyon ’ani. shamerah nafshi ki khasid ’ani hosha‘ ‘abdekha ’atah ’elohai haboteiakh ’eilekha. khaneini ’adonai ki ’eilekha ’eqra kal hayom. meiakh nefesh ‘abdekha ki ’eilekha ’adonai nafshi ’esa. ki ’atah ’adonai tob vesalakh verab khesed lekhal qore’ekha. ha’azinah yhvh tefilati vehaqshibah beqol takhanunotai. beyom tsarati ’eqra’eka ki ta‘aneini. ’en kamokha ba’elohim ’adonai ve’en kema‘asekha. kal goyim ’asher ‘asita yabo’u veyishtakhavu lefanekha ’adonai vikhabedu lishmekha. ki gadol ’atah ve‘oseh nifla’ot ’atah ’elohim lebadekha. horeini yhvh darkekha ’ahalekh ba’amitekha yakhed lebabi leyir’ah shemekha. ’odkha ’adonai ’elohai bekhal lebabi va’akhabedah shimkha le‘olam. ki khasdekha gadol ‘alai vehitsalta nafshi mishe’ol takhtiyah. ’elohim zeidim qamu ‘alai va‘adat ‘aritsim biqshu nafshi velo samukha lenegdam. ve’atah ’adonai ’el rakhum vekhanun ’erekh ’apayim verab khesed ve’emet. peneh ’eilai vekhaneini tenah ‘uzekha le‘abdekha vehoshi‘ah leben ’amatekha. ‘aseh ‘imi ’ot letobah veyir’u sone’ai veyeiboshu ki ’atah yhvh ‘azartani venikhamtani. libnei qorakh mizmor shir yesudato beharei qodesh. ’oheb yhvh sha‘arei tsiyon mikol mishkenot ya‘aqob. nikhbadot medubar bakh ‘ir ha’elohim selah. ’azkir rahab ubabel leyode‘ai hineh feleshet vetsor ‘im kush zeh yulad sham. ulatsiyon yei’amar ’ish ve’ish yulad bah vehu yekhoneha ‘elyon. yhvh yispor bikhtob ‘amim zeh yulad sham selah. vesharim kekholelim kal ma‘yanai bakh. shir mizmor libnei qorakh lamnatseiakh ‘al makhalat le‘anot maskil leheiman ha’ezrakhi. yhvh ’elohei yeshu‘ati yom tsa‘aqti balaylah negdekha. tabo lefanekha tefilati hateh ’azenekha lerinati. ki sabe‘ah bera‘ot nafshi vekhayai lish’ol higi‘u. nekhshabti ‘im yordei bor hayiti kegeber ’en ’eyal. bameitim khafeshi kemo khalalim shokhebei qeber ’asher lo zekhartam ‘od vehemah miyadekha nigzaru. tani bebor takhtiyot bemakhashakim bimtsolot. ‘alai samekhah khamatekha vekhal mishbarekha ‘inita selah. hirkhaqta meyuda‘ai mimeni shatani to‘eibot lamo kalu velo ’eitsei. ‘eini da’abah mini ‘oni qeratikha yhvh bekhal yom shitakhti ’eilekha khapai. halameitim ta‘aseh pele ’im refa’im yaqumu yodukha selah. haysupar baqeber khasdekha ’emunatekha ba’abadon. hayivada‘ bakhoshekh pil’ekha vetsidqatekha be’erets neshiyah. va’ani ’eilekha yhvh shiva‘ti ubaboqer tefilati teqademeka. lamah yhvh tiznakh nafshi tastir panekha mimeni. ‘ani ’ani vegoeia‘ mino‘ar nasati ’eimekha ’afunah. ‘alai ‘aberu kharonekha bi‘utekha tsimetutuni. sabuni khamayim kal hayom hiqifu ‘alai yakhad. hirkhaqta mimeni ’oheb vareia‘ meyuda‘ai makhshakh. maskil le’eitan ha’ezrakhi. khasdei yhvh ‘olam ’ashirah ledor vador ’odia‘ ’emunatekha befi. ki ’amarti ‘olam khesed yibaneh shamayim takhin ’emunatekha bahem. karati berit libkhiri nishba‘ti ledavid ‘abdi. ‘ad ‘olam ’akhin zar‘ekha ubaniti ledor vador kis’akha selah. veyodu shamayim pil’akha yhvh ’af ’emunatekha biqhal qedoshim. ki mi bashakhaq ya‘arokh yhvh yidmeh yhvh bibnei ’eilim ’el na‘arats besod qedoshim rabah venora ‘al kal sebibav. yhvh ’elohei tseba’ot mi khamokha khasin yah ve’emunatekha sebibotekha. ’atah moshel begei’ut hayam beso galav ’atah teshabekhem. ’atah dikita khekhalal rahab bizroa‘ ‘uzekha pizarta ’oybekha. lekha mayim ’af lekha ’arets teibel umelo’ah ’atah yesadtam. tsafon veyamin ’atah beratam tabor vekhermon beshimkha yeraneinu. lekha zeroa‘ ‘im geburah ta‘oz yadekha tarum yeminekha. tsedeq umishpat mekhon kis’ekha khesed ve’emet yeqademu fanekha. ’ashrei ha‘am yod‘ei teru‘ah yhvh be’or panekha yehaleikhun. beshimkha yegilun kal hayom ubetsidqatekha yarumu. ki tif’eret ‘uzamo ’atah ubirtsonekha tarim tarum qarneinu. ki yhvh magineinu veliqdosh yisra’el malkeinu. ’az dibarta bekhazon lakhasidekha vatomer shiviti ‘eizer ‘al gibor harimoti bakhur mei‘am. matsati david ‘abdi beshemen qadshi meshakhtiv. ’asher yadi tikon ‘imo ’af zero‘i te’ametsenu. lo yashi ’oyeb bo uben ‘avlah lo ye‘anenu. vekhatoti mipanav tsarav umesan’av ’egof. ve’emunati vekhasdi ‘imo ubishmi tarum qarno. vesamti bayam yado ubaneharot yemino. hu yiqra’eini ’abi ’atah ’eili vetsur yeshu‘ati. ’af ’ani bekhor ’eteneihu ‘elyon lemalkhei ’arets. le‘olam ’eshmor ’eshmar lo khasdi uberiti ne’emenet lo. vesamti la‘ad zar‘o vekhis’o kimei shamayim. ’im ya‘azbu banav torati ubemishpatai lo yeileikhun. ’im khuqotai yekhaleilu umitsvotai lo yishmoru. ufaqadti besheibet pish‘am ubinga‘im ‘avonam. vekhasdi lo ’afir mei‘imo velo ’ashaqer be’emunati. lo ’akhalel beriti umotsa fatai lo ’ashaneh. ’akhat nishba‘ti beqadeshi ’im ledavid ’akhazeb. zar‘o le‘olam yihyeh vekhis’o khashemesh negdi. keyareiakh yikon ‘olam ve‘ed bashakhaq ne’eman selah. ve’atah zanakhta vatim’as hit‘abarta ‘im meshikhekha. nei’artah berit ‘abdekha khilalta la’arets nizro. paratsta khal gedeirotav samta mibtsarav mekhitah suhu kal ‘oberei darekh hayah kherpah lishkheinav. harimota yemin tsarav hismakhta kal ’oybav. ’af tashib tsur kharbo velo haqeimoto bamilkhamah. hishbata miteharo vekhis’o la’arets migartah. hiqtsarta yemei ‘alumav he‘etita ‘alav bushah selah. ‘ad mah yhvh tisater lanetsakh tib‘ar kemo ’esh khamatekha. zekhar ’ani meh khaled ‘al mahosha v barata khal benei ’adam. mi geber yikhyeh velo yir’eh mavet yemalet nafsho miyad she’ol selah. ’ayeh khasadekha harishonim ’adonai nishba‘ta ledavid be’emunatekha. zekhor ’adonai kherpat ‘abadekha se’eiti bekheiqi kal rabim ‘amim. ’asher kheirefu ’oybekha yhvh ’asher kheirefu ‘iqebot meshikhekha. barukh yhvh le‘olam ’amen ve’amen. tefilah lemosheh ’ish ha’elohim ’adonai ma‘on ’atah hayita lanu bedor vador. beterem harim yuladu vatekholel ’erets veteibel umei‘olam ‘ad ‘olam ’atah ’el. tasheb ’enosh ‘ad daka vatomer shubu benei ’adam. ki ’elef shanim be‘einekha keyom ’etmol ki ya‘abor ve’ashmurah balayelah. zeramtam sheinah yihyu baboqer kekhatsir yakhalof. baboqer yatsits vekhalaf la‘ereb yemolel veyabesh. ki khalinu be’apekha ubakhamatekha nibhalenu. shata shatah ‘avonoteinu lenegdekha ‘alumeinu lim’or panekha. ki khal yameinu panu be‘ebratekha kilinu shaneinu khemo hegeh. yemei shenoteinu bahem shib‘im shanah ve’im bigburot shemonim shanah verahebam ‘amal va’aven ki gaz khish vana‘ufah. mi yodeia‘ ‘oz ’apekha ukheyir’atekha ‘ebratekha. limnot yameinu ken hoda‘ venabi lebab khakhmah shubah yhvh ‘ad matai vehinakhem ‘al ‘abadekha. sabe‘einu baboqer khasdekha uneranenah venismekhah bekhal yameinu. mekheinu kimot ‘initanu not ra’inu ra‘ah. yeira’eh ’el ‘abadekha fa‘olekha vahadarekha ‘al beneihem. vihi no‘am ’adonai ’eloheinu ‘aleinu uma‘aseh yadeinu konah ‘aleinu uma‘aseh yadeinu koneihu. yosheb beseiter ‘elyon betsel dai yitlonan. ’omar yhvh makhsi umetsudati ’elohai ’ebtakh bo. ki hu yatsilekha mipakh yaqush mideber havot. be’ebrato yasekh lakh vetakhat kenafav tekhseh tsinah vesokheirah ’amito. lo tira mipakhad layelah meikhets ya‘uf yomam. mideber ba’ofel yahalokh miqeteb yashud tsahorayim. yipol mitsidekha ’elef urebabah miminekha ’eilekha lo yigash. raq be‘einekha tabit veshilumat resha‘im tir’eh. ki ’atah yhvh makhsi ‘elyon samta me‘onekha. lo te’uneh ’eilekha ra‘ah venega‘ lo yiqrab be’aholekha. ki mal’akhav yetsaveh lakh lishmarekha bekhal derakhekha. ‘al kapayim yisa’unekha pen tigof ba’eben raglekha. ‘al shakhal vafeten tidrokh tirmos kefir vetanin. ki bi khashaq va’afaleteihu ’asagebeihu ki yada‘ shemi. yiqra’eini ve’e‘eneihu ‘imo ’anokhi betsarah ’akhaletseihu va’akhabedeihu. ’orekh yamim ’asbi‘eihu ve’ar’eihu bishu‘ati. mizmor shir leyom hashabat. tob lehodot yhvh ulezamer leshimkha ‘elyon. lehagid baboqer khasdekha ve’emunatekha baleilot. ‘alei ‘asor va‘alei nabel ‘alei higayon bekhinor. ki simakhtani yhvh befa‘olekha bema‘asei yadekha ’aranen. mah gadelu ma‘asekha yhvh me’od ‘amequ makhshebotekha. ’ish ba‘ar lo yeida‘ ukhesil lo yabin ’et zot. bifroakh resha‘im kemo ‘eiseb vayatsitsu kal po‘alei ’aven lehishamedam ‘adei ‘ad. ve’atah marom le‘olam yhvh. ki hineh ’oyebekha yhvh ki hineh ’oyebekha yobeidu yitparedu kal po‘alei ’aven. vatarem kir’em qarni baloti beshemen ra‘anan. vatabet ‘eini beshurai baqamim ‘alai merei‘im tishma‘nah ’azenai. tsadiq katamar yifrakh ke’erez balebanon yisgeh. tulim bebet yhvh bekhatsrot ’eloheinu yafrikhu. ‘od yenubun beseibah desheinim vera‘ananim yihyu. lehagid ki yashar yhvh tsuri velo ‘olatah ‘avlatah bo. yhvh malakh gei’ut labesh labesh yhvh ‘oz hit’azar ’af tikon teibel bal timot. nakhon kis’akha mei’az mei‘olam ’atah. nase’u neharot yhvh nase’u neharot qolam yis’u neharot dakheyam. miqolot mayim rabim ’adirim mishberei yam ’adir bamarom yhvh. ‘eidotekha ne’emnu me’od lebeitekha na’avah qodesh yhvh le’orekh yamim. ’el neqamot yhvh ’el neqamot hofiya‘. hinasei shofet ha’arets hasheb gemul ‘al gei’im. ‘ad matai resha‘im yhvh ‘ad matai resha‘im ya‘alozu. yabi‘u yedaberu ‘ataq yit’ameru kal po‘alei ’aven. ‘amekha yhvh yedake’u venakhalatekha ye‘anu. ’almanah veger yaharogu vitomim yeratseikhu. vayomeru lo yir’eh yah velo yabin ’elohei ya‘aqob. binu bo‘arim ba‘am ukhesilim matai taskilu. hanota‘ ’ozen halo yishma‘ ’im yotser ‘ayin halo yabit. hayoser goyim halo yokhiakh hamlamed ’adam da‘at. yhvh yodeia‘ makhshebot ’adam ki hemah habel. ’ashrei hageber ’asher teyaserenu yah umitoratekha telamedenu. lehashqit lo mimei ra‘ ‘ad yikareh larasha‘ shakhat. ki lo yitosh yhvh ‘amo venakhalato lo ya‘azob. ki ‘ad tsedeq yashub mishpat ve’akharav kal yishrei leb. mi yaqum li ‘im merei‘im mi yityatseb li ‘im po‘alei ’aven. lulei yhvh ‘ezratah li kim‘at shakhenah dumah nafshi. ’im ’amarti matah ragli khasdekha yhvh yis‘adeini. berob sar‘apai beqirbi tankhumekha yesha‘ash‘u nafshi. haykhaberekha kisei havot yotser ‘amal ‘alei khoq. yagodu ‘al nefesh tsadiq vedam naqi yarshi‘u. vayhi yhvh li lemisgab veilohai letsur makhsi. vayasheb ‘aleihem ’et ’onam ubera‘atam yatsmitem yatsmitem yhvh ’eloheinu. lekhu neranenah yhvh nari‘ah letsur yish‘einu. neqademah fanav betodah bizmirot naria‘ lo. ki ’el gadol yhvh umelekh gadol ‘al kal ’elohim. ’asher beyado mekhqerei ’arets veto‘afot harim lo. ’asher lo hayam vehu ‘asahu veyabeshet yadav yatsaru. bo’u nishtakhaveh venikhra‘ah nibrekhah lifnei yhvh ‘oseinu. ki hu ’eloheinu va’anakhnu ‘am mar‘ito vetson yado hayom ’im beqolo tishma‘u. ’al taqshu lebabkhem kimribah keyom masah bamidbar. ’asher nisuni ’aboteikhem bekhanuni gam ra’u fa‘oli. ’arba‘im shanah ’aqut bedor va’omar ‘am to‘ei leibab hem vehem lo yade‘u derakhai. ’asher nishba‘ti be’api ’im yebo’un ’el menukhati. shiru yhvh shir khadash shiru yhvh kal ha’arets. shiru yhvh barakhu shemo baseru miyom leyom yeshu‘ato. saperu bagoyim kebodo bekhal ha‘amim nifle’otav. ki gadol yhvh umehulal me’od nora hu ‘al kal ’elohim. ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim yhvh shamayim ‘asah. hod vehadar lefanav ‘oz vetif’eret bemiqdasho. habu yhvh mishpekhot ‘amim habu yhvh kabod va‘oz. habu yhvh kebod shemo se’u minkhah ubo’u lekhatsrotav. hishtakhavu yhvh behadrat qodesh khilu mipanav kal ha’arets. ’imru bagoyim yhvh malakh ’af tikon teibel bal timot yadin ‘amim bemeisharim. yismekhu hashamayim vetagel ha’arets yir‘am hayam umelo’o. ya‘aloz dai vekhal ’asher bo ’az yeranenu kal ‘atsei ya‘ar. lifnei yhvh ki ba ki ba lishpot ha’arets yishpot teibel betsedeq ve‘amim be’emunato. yhvh malakh tagel ha’arets yismekhu ’iyim rabim. ‘anan va‘arafel sebibav tsedeq umishpat mekhon kis’o. ’esh lefanav teilekh utelahet sabib tsarav. hei’iru beraqav teibel ra’atah vatakhel ha’arets. harim kadonag namasu milifnei yhvh milifnei ’adon kal ha’arets. higidu hashamayim tsidqo vera’u khal ha‘amim kebodo. yeiboshu kal ‘obedei fesel hamithalim ba’elilim hishtakhavu lo kal ’elohim. shame‘ah vatismakh tsiyon vatageilenah benot yehudah lema‘an mishpatekha yhvh. ki ’atah yhvh ‘elyon ‘al kal ha’arets me’od na‘aleita ‘al kal ’elohim. ’ohabei yhvh sin’u ra‘ mer nafshot khasidav miyad resha‘im yatsilem. ’or zarua‘ latsadiq uleyishrei leb simkhah. simkhu tsadiqim yhvh vehodu lezeikher qadesho. mizmor shiru yhvh shir khadash ki nifla’ot ‘asah hoshi‘ah lo yemino uzeroa‘ qadesho. hodia‘ yhvh yeshu‘ato le‘einei hagoyim gilah tsidqato. zakhar khasdo ve’emunato lebet yisra’el ra’u khal ’afsei ’arets ’et yeshu‘at ’eloheinu. hari‘u yhvh kal ha’arets pitskhu veranenu vezameiru. zameru yhvh bekhinor bekhinor veqol zimrah. bakhatsotserot veqol shofar hari‘u lifnei hamelekh yhvh. yir‘am hayam umelo’o teibel veyoshebei bah. neharot yimkha’u khaf yakhad harim yeraneinu. lifnei yhvh ki ba lishpot ha’arets yishpot teibel betsedeq ve‘amim bemeisharim. yhvh malakh yirgezu ‘amim yosheb kerubim tanut ha’arets. yhvh betsiyon gadol veram hu ‘al kal ha‘amim. yodu mekha gadol venora qadosh hu. ve‘oz melekh mishpat ’aheb ’atah konanta meisharim mishpat utsedaqah beya‘aqob ’atah ‘asita. romu yhvh ’eloheinu vehishtakhavu lahadom raglav qadosh hu. mosheh ve’aharon bekhohanav ushemu’el beqore’ei shemo qorim ’el yhvh vehu ya‘anem. be‘amud ‘anan yedaber ’aleihem shameru ‘eidotav vekhoq natan lamo. yhvh ’eloheinu ’atah ‘anitam ’el nosei hayita lahem venoqem ‘al ‘alilotam. romu yhvh ’eloheinu vehishtakhavu lehar qadesho ki qadosh yhvh ’eloheinu. mizmor letodah hari‘u yhvh kal ha’arets. ‘ibdu ’et yhvh besimkhah bo’u lefanav birnanah. de‘u ki yhvh hu ’elohim hu ‘asanu velo velo ’anakhnu ‘amo vetson mar‘ito. bo’u she‘arav betodah khatseirotav bithilah hodu lo barakhu shemo. ki tob yhvh le‘olam khasdo ve‘ad dor vador ’emunato. ledavid mizmor khesed umishpat ’ashirah lekha yhvh ’azameirah. ’askilah bederekh tamim matai tabo ’eilai ’ethalekh betam lebabi beqereb beiti. lo ’ashit leneged ‘einai debar beliya‘al ‘asoh seitim saneiti lo yidbaq bi. leibab ‘iqesh yasur mimeni ra‘ lo ’eida‘. melosheni melasheni baseiter rei‘eihu ’oto ’atsmit gebah ‘einayim urekhab leibab ’oto lo ’ukhal. ‘einai bene’emnei ’erets lashebet ‘imadi holekh bederekh tamim hu yeshareteini. lo yeisheb beqereb beiti ‘oseh remiyah dober sheqarim lo yikon leneged ‘einai. labeqarim ’atsmit kal rish‘ei ’arets lehakhrit mei‘ir yhvh kal po‘alei ’aven. tefilah le‘ani khi ya‘atof velifnei yhvh yishpokh sikho. yhvh shim‘ah tefilati veshav‘ati ’eilekha tabo. ’al taster panekha mimeni beyom tsar li hateh ’eilai ’azenekha beyom ’eqra maher ‘aneini. ki khalu be‘ashan yamai ve‘atsmotai kemo qed nikharu. hukah kha‘eiseb vayibash libi kisha khakhti mei’akhol lakhmi. miqol ’ankhati dabeqah ‘atsmi libsari. damiti liq’at midbar hayiti kekhos khorabot. shaqadti va’ehyeh ketsipor boded ‘al gag. kal hayom kheirefuni ’oybai meholalai bi nishba‘u. ki ’eifer kalekhem ’akhaleti veshiquvai bibkhi masakheti. mipenei za‘amkha veqitspekha ki nesatani vatashlikheini. yamai ketsel natui va’ani ka‘eiseb ’ibash. ve’atah yhvh le‘olam teisheb vezikhrekha ledor vador. ’atah taqum terakhem tsiyon ki ‘et lekhenah ki ba mo‘ed. ki ratsu ‘abadekha ’et ’abaneha ve’et ‘afarah yekhoneinu. veyire’u goyim ’et shem yhvh vekhal malkhei ha’arets ’et kebodekha. ki banah yhvh tsiyon nir’ah bikhbodo. panah ’el tefilat ha‘ar‘ar velo bazah ’et tefilatam. tikateb zot ledor ’akharon ve‘am nibra yehalel yah. ki hishqif mimerom qadesho yhvh mishamayim ’el ’erets hibit. lishmoa‘ ’enqat ’asir lefateiakh benei temutah. lesaper betsiyon shem yhvh utehilato birushalim. behiqabets ‘amim yakhdav umamlakhot la‘abod ’et yhvh. ‘inah baderekh kokho kokhi qitsar yamai. ’omar ’eili ’al ta‘aleini bakhatsi yamai bedor dorim shenotekha. lefanim ha’arets yasadta uma‘aseh yadekha shamayim. hemah yobeidu ve’atah ta‘amod vekhulam kabeged yiblu kalebush takhalifem veyakhalofu. ve’atah hu ushenotekha lo yitamu. benei ‘abadekha yishkonu vezar‘am lefanekha yikon. ledavid barakhi nafshi ’et yhvh vekhal qerabai ’et shem qadesho. barakhi nafshi ’et yhvh ve’al tishkekhi kal gemulav. hasoleiakh lekhal ‘avoneikhi harofei lekhal takhalu’ayekhi. hago’el mishakhat khayayekhi ham‘atereikhi khesed verakhamim. hamasbiya‘ batob ‘edyekh titkhadesh kanesher ne‘urayekhi. ‘oseh tsedaqot yhvh umishpatim lekhal ‘ashuqim. yodia‘ derakhav lemosheh libnei yisra’el ‘alilotav. rakhum vekhanun yhvh ’erekh ’apayim verab khased. lo lanetsakh yarib velo le‘olam yitor. lo khakhata’einu ‘asah lanu velo kha‘avonoteinu gamal ‘aleinu. ki khigboah mayim ‘al ha’arets gabar khasdo ‘al yerei’av. kirkhoq mizrakh mima‘arab hirkhiq mimenu ’et pesha‘einu. kerakhem ’ab ‘al banim rikham yhvh ‘al yerei’av. ki hu yada‘ yitsreinu zakhur ki ‘afar ’anakhenu. ’enosh kekhatsir yamav ketsits hasadeh ken yatsits. ki ruakh ‘aberah bo ve’einenu velo yakirenu ‘od meqomo. vekhesed yhvh mei‘olam ve‘ad ‘olam ‘al yerei’av vetsidqato libnei banim. leshomerei berito ulezokherei fiqudav la‘asotam. yhvh bashamayim heikhin kis’o umalkhuto bakol mashalah. barakhu yhvh mal’akhav giborei khoakh ‘osei debaro lishmoa‘ beqol debaro. barakhu yhvh kal tseba’av mesharetav ‘osei retsono. barakhu yhvh kal ma‘asav bekhal meqomot memshalto barakhi nafshi ’et yhvh. barakhi nafshi ’et yhvh yhvh ’elohai gadalta me’od hod vehadar labasheta. ‘oteh ’or kasalmah noteh mayim kayri‘ah. hamqareh bamayim ‘aliyotav hasam ‘abim rekhubo hamhalekh ‘al kanfei ruakh. ‘oseh mal’akhav rukhot mesharetav ’esh lohet. yasad ’erets ‘al mekhoneha bal timot ‘olam va‘ed. tehom kalebush kisito ‘al harim ya‘amdu mayim. min ga‘aratekha yenusun min qol ra‘amkha yeikhafeizun. ya‘alu harim yeiredu beqa‘ot ’el meqom zeh yasadta lahem. gebulsa meta bal ya‘aborun bal yeshubun lekhasot ha’arets. hamshaleiakh ma‘yanim banekhalim ben harim yehaleikhun. yashqu kal khayto sadai yishberu fera’im tsema’am. ‘aleihem ‘of hashamayim yishkon miben ‘ofayim yitenu qol. mashqeh harim mei‘aliyotav miperi ma‘asekha tisba‘ ha’arets. matsmiakh khatsir labeheimah ve‘eiseb la‘abodat ha’adam lehotsi lekhem min ha’arets. veyayin yesamakh lebab ’enosh lehatshil panim mishamen velekhem lebab ’enosh yis‘ad. yisbe‘u ‘atsei yhvh ’arzei lebanon ’asher nata‘. ’asherosha m tsiporim yeqaneinu khasidah beroshim beitah. harim hagebohim laye‘eilim sela‘im makhseh lashfanim. ‘asah yareiakh lemo‘adim mesh yada‘ mebo’o. tashet khoshekh vihi layelah bo tirmos kal khayto ya‘ar. hakefirim sho’agim lataref ulebaqesh mei’el ’akhelam. tizrakh hashemesh yei’aseifun ve’el me‘onotam yirbatsun. yeitsei ’adam lefa‘olo vela‘abodato ‘adei ‘areb. mah rabu ma‘asekha yhvh kulam bekhakhemah ‘asita male’ah ha’arets qinyanekha. zeh hayam gadol urekhab yadayim sham remes ve’en mispar khayot qetanot ‘im gedolot. m ’oniyot yehaleikhun livyatan zeh yatsarta lesakheq bo. kulam ’eilekha yesabeirun latet ’akhelam be‘ito. titen lahem yilqotun tiftakh yadekha yisbe‘un tob. tastir panekha yibaheilun tosef rukham yigva‘un ve’el ‘afaram yeshubun. teshalakh rukhakha yibarei’un utekhadesh penei ’adamah. yehi khebod yhvh le‘olam yismakh yhvh bema‘asav. hamabit la’arets vatir‘ad yiga‘ beharim veye‘eshanu. ’ashirah yhvh bekhayai ’azamerah leilohai be‘odi. ye‘erab ‘alav sikhi ’anokhi ’esmakh yhvh. yitamu khata’im min ha’arets uresha‘im ‘od ’einam barakhi nafshi ’et yhvh halu yah. hodu yhvh qir’u bishmo hodi‘u ba‘amim ‘alilotav. shiru lo zameru lo khu bekhal nifle’otav. hithalu beshem qadesho yismakh leb mebaqshei yhvh. dirshu yhvh ve‘uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. zikhru nifle’otav ’asher ‘asah mofetav umishpetei fiv. zera‘ ’abraham ‘abdo benei ya‘aqob bekhirav. hu yhvh ’eloheinu bekhal ha’arets mishpatav. zakhar le‘olam berito dabar tsivah le’elef dor. ’asher karat ’et ’abraham ushebu‘ato leyiskhaq. vaya‘amideha leya‘aqob lekhoq leyisra’el berit ‘olam. leimor lekha ’eten ’et ’erets kena‘an khebel nakhalatkhem. bihyotam metei mispar kim‘at vegarim bah. vayithalekhu migo ’el go mimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’akher. lo hiniakh ’adam le‘asheqam vayokhakh ‘aleihem melakhim. ’al tige‘u bimshikhai velinbi’ai ’al tarei‘u. vayiqra ra‘ab ‘al ha’arets kal mateh lekhem shabar. shalakh lifneihem ’ish le‘ebed nimkar yosef. ‘inu bakebel raglav raglo barzel ba’ah nafsho. ‘ad ‘et bo debaro ’imrat yhvh tserafatehu. shalakh melekh vayatireihu moshel ‘amim vayfatekheihu. samo ’adon lebeito umoshel bekhal qinyano. le’sor sarav benafsho uzeqeinav yekhakem. vayabo yisra’el mitsrayim veya‘aqob gar be’erets kham. vayefer ’et ‘amo me’od vaya‘atsimeihu mitsarav. hafakh libam lisno ‘amo lehitnakel ba‘abadav. lakh mosheh ‘abdo ’aharon ’asher bakhar bo. samu bam dibrei ’ototav umofetim be’erets kham. shalakh khoshekh vayakhshikh velo maru ’et debarav debaro. hafakh ’et meimeihem ledam vayamet ’et degatam. sharats ’artsam tsefarde‘im bekhadrei malkheihem. ’amar vayabo ‘arob kinim bekhal gebulam. natan gishmeihem barad ’esh lehabot be’artsam. vayakh gafnam ute’einatam vayshaber ‘ets gebulam. ’amar vayabo ’arbeh veyeleq ve’en mispar. vayokhal kal ‘eiseb be’artsam vayokhal peri ’admatam. vayakh kal bekhor be’artsam reishit lekhal ’onam. vayotsi’em bekhesef vezahab ve’en bishbatav koshel. samakh mitsrayim betseitam ki nafal pakhdam ‘aleihem. paras ‘anan lemasakh ve’esh leha’ir layelah. sha’al vayabei selav velekhem mayim yasbi‘em. patakh tsur vayazubu mayim halekhu batsiyot nahar. ki zakhar ’et debar qadesho ’et ’abraham ‘abdo. vayotsi ‘amo besason berinah ’et bekhirav. vayiten lahem ’artsot goyim va‘amal le’umim yirashu. ba‘abur yishmeru khuqav vetorotav yintsoru halu yah. haluyah hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. mi yemalel geburot yhvh yashmia‘ kal tehilato. ’ashrei shomerei mishpat ‘oseh tsedaqah bekhal ‘et. zakhereini yhvh birtson ‘amekha paqedeini bishu‘atekha. lir’ot betobat bekhirekha lismoakh besimkhat goyekha lehithalel ‘im nakhalatekha. khatanu ‘im ’aboteinu he‘evinu hirsha‘enu. ’aboteinu bemitsrayim lo hiskilu nifle’otekha lo zakheru ’et rob khasadekha vayamru ‘al yam beyam suf. vayoshi‘em lema‘an shemo lehodia‘ ’et geburato. vayig‘ar beyam suf vayekherab vayolikhem batehomot kamidbar. vayoshi‘em miyad sonei vayig’alem miyad ’oyeb. vaykhasu mayim tsareihem ’ekhad meihem lo notar. vaya’aminu bidbarav yashiru tehilato. miharu shakhekhu ma‘asav lo khiku la‘atsato. vayit’avu ta’avah bamidbar vaynasu ’el bishimon. vayiten lahem she’elatam vayshalakh razon benafsham. vayqan’u lemosheh bamakhaneh le’aharon qedosh yhvh. tiftakh ’erets vatibla‘ datan vatekhas ‘al ‘adat ’abiram. vatib‘ar ’esh ba‘adatam lehabah telahet resha‘im. ya‘asu ‘eigel bekhoreb vayishtakhavu lemaseikhah. vayamiru ’et kebodam betabnit vr ’okhel ‘eiseb. khekhu ’el moshi‘am ‘oseh gedolot bemitsrayim. nifla’ot be’erets kham nora’ot ‘al yam suf. vayomer lehashmidam lulei mosheh bekhiro ‘amad baperets lefanav lehashib khamato meihashkhit. vayim’asu be’erets khemdah lo he’eminu lidbaro. vayeiragenu be’aholeihem lo me‘u beqol yhvh. vayisa yado lahem lehapil ’otam bamidbar. ulehapil zar‘am bagoyim ulezarotam ba’aratsot. vayitsamedu leba‘al pe‘or vayokhelu zibkhei meitim. vayakh‘isu bema‘aleihem vatifrats bam mageifah. vaya‘amod pinekhas vayfalel vatei‘atsar hamageifah. vateikhasheb lo litsdaqah ledor vador ‘ad ‘olam. vayaqtsifu ‘al mei meribah vayeira‘ lemosheh ba‘aburam. ki himru ’et rukho vaybatei bisfatav. lo hishmidu ’et ha‘amim ’asher ’amar yhvh lahem. vayit‘arebu bagoyim vayilmedu ma‘aseihem. vaya‘abdu ’et ‘atsabeihem vayihyu lahem lemoqesh. vayizbekhu ’et beneihem ve’et benoteihem lasheidim. vayishpekhu dam naqi dam beneihem ubenoteihem ’asher zibekhu la‘atsabei khena‘an vatekhenaf ha’arets badamim. vayitme’u bema‘aseihem vayiznu bema‘aleihem. vayikhar ’af yhvh be‘amo vayta‘eb ’et nakhalato. vayitenem beyad goyim vayimshelu bahem sone’eihem. vayilkhatsum ’oybeihem vayikane‘u takhat yadam. pe‘amim rabot yatsilem vehemah yamru ba‘atsatam vayamoku ba‘avonam. vayar batsar lahem beshame‘o ’et rinatam. vayizkor lahem berito vayinakhem kerob khasdo khasadav. vayiten ’otam lerakhamim lifnei kal shobeihem. hoshi‘einu yhvh ’eloheinu veqabetseinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. barukh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el min ha‘olam ve‘ad ha‘olam ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen halu yah. hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. yomeru ge’ulei yhvh ’asher ge’alam miyad tsar. umei’aratsot qibetsam mimizrakh umima‘arab mitsafon umiyam. ta‘u bamidbar bishimon darekh ‘ir moshab lo matsa’u. re‘eibim gam tsemei’im nafsham bahem tit‘ataf. vayits‘aqu ’el yhvh batsar lahem mimetsuqoteihem yatsilem. vayadrikhem bederekh yesharah lalekhet ’el ‘ir moshab. yodu yhvh khasdo venifle’otav libnei ’adam. ki hisbia‘ nefesh shoqeiqah venefesh re‘eibah milei tob. yoshebei khoshekh vetsalmavet ’asirei ‘oni ubarzel. ki himru ’imrei ’el va‘atsat ‘elyon na’atsu. vayakhna‘ be‘amal libam kashelu ve’en ‘ozer. vayiz‘aqu ’el yhvh batsar lahem mimetsuqoteihem yoshi‘em. yotsi’em meikhoshekh vetsalmavet umosroteihem yenateq. yodu yhvh khasdo venifle’otav libnei ’adam. kishi bar daltot nekhoshet uberikhei barzel gideia‘. ’evilim miderekh pish‘am umei‘avonoteihem yit‘anu. kal ’okhel teta‘eb nafsham vayagi‘u ‘ad sha‘arei mavet. vayiz‘aqu ’el yhvh batsar lahem mimetsuqoteihem yoshi‘em. yishlakh debaro veyirpa’em vimalet mishekhitotam. yodu yhvh khasdo venifle’otav libnei ’adam. veyizbekhu zibkhei todah visaperu ma‘asav berinah. yordei hayam ba’oniyot ‘osei melakhah bemayim rabim. hemah ra’u ma‘asei yhvh venifle’otav bimtsulah. vayomer vaya‘amed ruakh se‘arah vateromem galav. ya‘alu mayim yeiredu tehomot nafsham bera‘ah titmogag. yakhogu veyanu‘u kashikor vekhal khakhematam titbala‘. vayits‘aqu ’el yhvh batsar lahem umimetsuqoteihem yotsi’em. yaqem se‘arah lidmamah vayekheshu galeihem. vayismekhu khi yishtoqu vayankhem ’el mekhoz kheftsam. yodu yhvh khasdo venifle’otav libnei ’adam. viromemuhu biqhal ‘am ubemoshab zeqeinim yehaluhu. yasem neharot lemidbar umotsa’ei mayim letsima’on. ’erets peri limleikhah meira‘at yoshebei bah. yasem midbar la’agam mayim ve’erets tsiyah lemotsa’ei mayim. vayosheb sham re‘eibim vaykhonu ‘ir moshab. vayizre‘u dot vayite‘u kheramim vaya‘asu peri tebu’ah. vaybarakhem vayirbu me’od ubehemtam lo yam‘it. vayim‘atu vayashokhu mei‘otser ra‘ah veyagon. shofekh buz ‘al nedibim vayat‘em betohu lo darekh. vaysageb ’ebyon mei‘oni vayasem katson mishpakhot. yir’u yesharim veyismakhu vekhal ‘avlah qafetsah piha. mi khakham veyishmar ’eleh veyitbonu khasdei yhvh. shir mizmor ledavid. nakhon libi ’elohim ’ashirah va’azamerah ’af kebodi. ‘urah haneibel vekhinor ’a‘irah shakhar. ’odkha ba‘amim yhvh va’azamerkha bal ’umim. ki gadol mei‘al shamayim khasdekha ve‘ad shekhaqim ’amitekha. rumah ‘al shamayim ’elohim ve‘al kal ha’arets kebodekha. lema‘an yeikhaletsun yedidekha hoshi‘ah yeminekha va‘aneini. ’elohim diber beqadesho ’e‘lozah ’akhaleqah shekhem ve‘eimeq sukot ’amaded. li gil‘ad li menasheh ve’efrayim ma‘oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi. mo’ab sir rakhtsi ‘al ’edom ’ashlikh na‘ali ‘alei feleshet ’etro‘a‘. mi yobileini ‘ir mibtsar mi nakhani ‘ad ’edom. halo ’elohim zenakhtanu velo teitsei ’elohim betsib’oteinu. habah lanu ‘ezrat mitsar veshav teshu‘at ’adam. beilohim na‘aseh khayil vehu yabus tsareinu. lamnatseiakh ledavid mizmor ’elohei tehilati ’al tekherash. ki fi rasha‘ ufi mirmah ‘alai patakhu diberu ’iti leshon shaqer. vedibrei sin’ah sebabuni vayilakhamuni khinam. takhat ’ahabati yistenuni va’ani tefilah. vayasimu ‘alai ra‘ah takhat tobah vesin’ah takhat ’ahabati. hafqed ‘alav rasha‘ vesatan ya‘amod ‘al yemino. behishafeto yeitsei rasha‘ utefilato tihyeh lakhata’ah. yihyu yamav me‘atim pequdato yiqakh ’akher. yihyu banav yetomim ve’ishto ’almanah. venoa‘ yanu‘u banav veshi’eilu vedareshu meikhareboteihem. yenaqesh nosheh lekhal ’asher lo veyabozu zarim yegi‘o. ’al yehi lo moshekh khased ve’al yehi khonen litomav. yehi ’akharito lehakhrit bedor ’akher yimakh shemam. yizakher ‘avon ’abotav ’el yhvh vekhatat ’imo ’al timakh. yihyu neged yhvh tamid veyakhret mei’erets zikhram. ya‘an ’asher lo zakhar ‘asot khased vayirdof ’ish ‘ani ve’ebyon venikh’eh leibab lemotet. vaye’ehab qelalah vatebo’eihu velo khafets bibrakhah vatirkhaq mimenu. vayilbash qelalah kemado vatabo khamayim beqirbo vekhashemen be‘atsmotav. tehi lo kebeged ya‘teh ulemeizakh tamid yakhgereha. zot pe‘ulat tenai mei’et yhvh vehadoberim ra‘ ‘al nafshi. ve’atah yhvh ’adonai ‘aseh ’iti lema‘an shemekha ki tob khasdekha hatsileini. ki ‘ani ve’ebyon ’anokhi velibi khalal beqirbi. ketsel kintoto nehelakheti nin‘arti ka’arbeh. birkai kashelu mitsom ubesari kakhash mishamen. va’ani hayiti kherpah lahem yir’uni yeni‘un rosham. ‘azereini yhvh ’elohai hoshi‘eini khekhasdekha. veyeide‘u ki yadekha zot ’atah yhvh ‘asitah. yeqalu hemah ve’atah tebarekh qamu vayeiboshu ve‘abdekha yismakh. yilbeshu sotnai kelimah veya‘atu kham‘il bashetam. ’odeh yhvh me’od befi ubetokh rabim ’ahalenu. ki ya‘amod limin ’ebyon lehoshia‘ mishofetei nafsho. ledavid mizmor ne’um yhvh ladoni sheb limini ‘ad ’ashit ’oyebekha hadom leraglekha. mateh ‘uzekha yishlakh yhvh mitsiyon redeh beqereb ’oyebekha. ‘amekha nedabot beyom kheilekha behadrei qodesh meirekhem mishkhar lekha tal yaldutekha. nishba‘ yhvh velo yinakhem ’atah khohen le‘olam ‘al dibrati malki tsedeq. ’adonai ‘al yeminekha makhats beyom ’apo melakhim. yadin bagoyim malei geviyot makhats rosh ‘al ’erets rabah. minakhal baderekh yishteh ‘al ken yarim rosh. halu yah ’odeh yhvh bekhal leibab besod yesharim ve‘eidah. gedolim ma‘asei yhvh derushim lekhal kheftseihem. hod vehadar pa‘olo vetsidqato ‘omedet la‘ad. zeikher ‘asah lenifle’otav khanun verakhum yhvh. teref natan lirei’av yizkor le‘olam berito. koakh ma‘asav higid le‘amo latet lahem nakhalat goyim. ma‘asei yadav ’emet umishpat ne’emanim kal piqudav. semukhim la‘ad le‘olam ‘asuyim be’emet veyashar. pedut shalakh le‘amo tsivah le‘olam berito qadosh venora shemo. reishit khakhmah yir’at yhvh seikhel tob lekhal ‘oseihem tehilato ‘omedet la‘ad. halu yah ’ashrei ’ish yarei ’et yhvh bemitsvotav khafets me’od. gibor ba’arets yihyeh zar‘o dor yesharim yeborakh. hon va‘osher bebeito vetsidqato ‘omedet la‘ad. zarakh bakhoshekh ’or laysharim khanun verakhum vetsadiq. tob ’ish khonen umalveh yekhalkel debarav bemishpat. ki le‘olam lo yimot lezeikher ‘olam yihyeh tsadiq. mishemu‘ah ra‘ah lo yira nakhon libo batuakh yhvh. samukh libo lo yira ‘ad ’asher yir’eh betsarav. pizar natan la’ebyonim tsidqato ‘omedet la‘ad qarno tarum bekhabod. rasha‘ yir’eh vekha‘as shinav yakharoq venamas ta’avat resha‘im tobed. halu yah halu ‘abdei yhvh halu ’et shem yhvh. yehi shem yhvh meborakh mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. mimizrakh shemesh ‘ad mebo’o mehulal shem yhvh. ram ‘al kal goyim yhvh ‘al hashamayim kebodo. mi yhvh ’eloheinu hamagbihi lashabet. hamashpili lir’ot bashamayim uba’arets. meqimi mei‘afar dal mei’ashpot yarim ’ebyon. lehoshibi ‘im nedibim ‘im nedibei ‘amo. moshibi ‘aqeret habayit ’em habanim semeikhah halu yah. betset yisra’el mimitsrayim bet ya‘aqob mei‘am lo‘ez. hayetah yehudah leqadesho yisra’el mamshelotav. hayam ra’ah vayanos hayarden yisob le’akhor. heharim raqedu khe’eilim geba‘ot kibnei tson. mah lekha hayam ki tanus hayarden tisob le’akhor. heharim tirqedu khe’eilim geba‘ot kibnei tson. milifnei ’adon khuli ’arets milifnei ’eloah ya‘aqob. hahofekhi hatsur ’agam mayim khalamish lema‘yeno mayim. lo lanu yhvh lo lanu ki leshimkha ten kabod ‘al khasdekha ‘al ’amitekha. lamah yomeru hagoyim ’ayeh na ’eloheihem. veiloheinu bashamayim kol ’asher khafets ‘asah. ‘atsabeihem kesef vezahab ma‘aseh yedei ’adam. peh lahem velo yedabeiru ‘einayim lahem velo yir’u. ’azenayim lahem velo yishma‘u ’af lahem velo yerikhun. yedeihem velo yemishun ragleihem velo yehaleikhu lo yehgu bigronam. kemohem yihyu ‘oseihem kol ’asher boteiakh bahem. yisra’el betakh yhvh ‘ezram umaginam hu. bet ’aharon bitkhu yhvh ‘ezram umaginam hu. yir’ei yhvh bitkhu yhvh ‘ezram umaginam hu. yhvh zekharanu yebarekh yebarekh ’et bet yisra’el yebarekh ’et bet ’aharon. yebarekh yir’ei yhvh haqetanim ‘im hagedolim. yosef yhvh ‘aleikhem ‘aleikhem ve‘al beneikhem. berukhim ’atem yhvh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. hashamayim mayim yhvh veha’arets natan libnei ’adam. lo hameitim yehalu yah velo kal yoredei dumah. va’anakhnu nebarekh yah mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam halu yah. ’ahabti ki yishma‘ yhvh ’et qoli takhanunai. ki hitah ’azeno li ubeyamai ’eqra. ’afafuni kheblei mavet umetsarei she’ol metsa’uni tsarah veyagon ’emtsa. ubeshem yhvh ’eqra ’anah yhvh maletah nafshi. khanun yhvh vetsadiq veiloheinu merakhem. shomer petayim yhvh daloti veli yehoshia‘. shubi nafshi limnukhayekhi ki yhvh gamal ‘alayekhi. ki khilatsta nafshi mimavet ’et ‘eini min dim‘ah ’et ragli midekhi. ’ethalekh lifnei yhvh be’artsot hakhayim. he’emanti ki ’adaber ’ani ‘aniti me’od. ’ani ’amarti bekhafezi kal ha’adam kozeb. mah ’ashib yhvh kal tagmulohi ‘alai. kos yeshu‘ot ’esa ubeshem yhvh ’eqra. nedarai yhvh ’ashalem negdah na lekhal ‘amo. yaqar be‘einei yhvh hamavetah lakhasidav. ’anah yhvh ki ’ani ‘abdekha ’ani ‘abdekha ben ’amatekha pitakhta lemoseirai. lekha ’ezbakh zebakh todah ubeshem yhvh ’eqra. nedarai yhvh ’ashalem negdah na lekhal ‘amo. bekhatsrot bet yhvh betokheikhi yerushalim halu yah. halu ’et yhvh kal goyim bekhuhu kal ha’umim. ki gabar ‘aleinu khasdo ve’emet yhvh le‘olam halu yah. hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. yomar na yisra’el ki le‘olam khasdo. yomeru na bet ’aharon ki le‘olam khasdo. yomeru na yir’ei yhvh ki le‘olam khasdo. min hameitsar qarati yah ‘anani bamerkhab yah. yhvh li lo ’ira mah ya‘aseh li ’adam. yhvh li be‘ozerai va’ani ’er’eh besone’ai. tob lakhasot yhvh mibetoakh ba’adam. tob lakhasot yhvh mibetoakh bindibim. kal goyim sebabuni beshem yhvh ki ’amilam. sabuni gam sebabuni beshem yhvh ki ’amilam. sabuni khidborim do‘akhu ke’esh qotsim beshem yhvh ki ’amilam. dakhoh dekhitani linpol yhvh ‘azarani. ‘azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu‘ah. qol rinah vishu‘ah be’aholei tsadiqim yemin yhvh ‘osah khayil. yemin yhvh romeimah yemin yhvh ‘osah khayil. lo ’amut ki ’ekhyeh va’asaper ma‘asei yah. yasor yiserani yah velamavet lo netanani. pitkhu li sha‘arei tsedeq ’abo bam ’odeh yah. zeh hasha‘ar yhvh tsadiqim yabo’u bo. ’odkha ki ‘anitani vatehi li lishu‘ah. ’eben ma’asu habonim hayetah lerosh pinah. mei’et yhvh hayetah zot hi niflat be‘eineinu. zeh hayom ‘asah yhvh nagilah venismekhah bo. ’ana yhvh hoshi‘ah na ’ana yhvh hatslikhah na. barukh haba beshem yhvh beirakhnukhem mibet yhvh. ’el yhvh vaya’er lanu ’isru khag ba‘abotim ‘ad qarnot hamizbeiakh. ’eili ’atah ve’odeka ’elohai ’aromeka. hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. ’ashrei temimei darekh haholekhim betorat yhvh. ’ashrei notserei ‘eidotav bekhal leb yidreshuhu. ’af lo fa‘alu ‘avlah bidrakhav halakhu. ’atah tsivitah fiqudekha lishmor me’od. ’akhalai yikonu derakhai lishmor khuqekha. ’az lo ’eibosh behabiti ’el kal mitsvotekha. ’odkha beyosher leibab belamedi mishpetei tsidqekha. ’et khuqekha ’eshmor ’al ta‘azbeini ‘ad me’od. bameh yezakeh na‘ar ’et ’arekho lishmor kidbarekha. bekhal libi derashtikha ’al tashgeini mimitsvotekha. belibi tsafanti ’imratekha lema‘an lo ’ekheta lakh. barukh ’atah yhvh lamedeini khuqekha. bisfatai siparti kol mishpetei fikha. bederekh ‘eidevotekha sasti ke‘al kal hon. befiqudekha ’asikhah ve’abitah ’orekhotekha. bekhuqotekha ’eshta‘asha‘ lo ’eshkakh debarekha. gemol ‘al ‘abdekha ’ekhyeh ve’eshmerah debarekha. gal ‘einai ve’abitah nifla’ot mitoratekha. ger ’anokhi ba’arets ’al taster mimeni mitsvotekha. garesah nafshi leta’abah ’el mishpatekha bekhal ‘et. ga‘arta zeidim ’arurim hashogim mimitsvotekha. gal mei‘alai kherpah vabuz ki ‘eidotekha natsareti. gam yashebu rim bi nidbaru ‘abdekha yasiakh bekhuqekha. gam ‘eidotekha sha‘ashu‘ai ’anshei ‘atsati. dabeqah le‘afar nafshi khayeini kidbarekha. derakhai siparti vata‘aneini lamedeini khuqekha. derekh piqudekha habineini ve’asikhah benifle’otekha. dalefah nafshi mitugah qayemeini kidbarekha. derekhoshe qer haser mimeni vetoratekha khaneini derekh ’emunah bakhareti mishpatekha shiviti. dabaqti be‘eidevotekha yhvh ’al tebisheini. derekh mitsvotekha ’aruts ki tarkhib libi. horeini yhvh derekh khuqekha ve’etserenah ‘eiqeb. habineini ve’etserah toratekha ve’eshmerenah bekhal leb. hadrikheini bintib mitsvotekha ki bo khafatseti. hat libi ’el ‘eidevotekha ve’al ’el batsa‘. ha‘aber ‘einai meire’ot shav bidrakhekha khayeini. haqem le‘abdekha ’imratekha ’asher leyir’atekha. ha‘aber kherpati ’asher yagoreti ki mishpatekha tobim. hineh ta’abti lefiqudekha betsidqatekha khayeini. vibo’uni khasadekha yhvh teshu‘atekha ke’imratekha. ve’e‘eneh khorefi dabar ki batakhti bidbarekha. ve’al tatsel mipi debar ’emet ‘ad me’od ki lemishpatekha yikhaleti. ve’eshmerah toratekha tamid le‘olam va‘ed. ve’ethalekhah barekhabah ki fiqudekha darasheti. va’adaberah be‘eidotekha neged melakhim velo ’eibosh. ve’eshta‘asha‘ bemitsvotekha ’asher ’ahabeti. ve’esa khapai ’el mitsvotekha ’asher ’ahabeti ve’asikhah bekhuqekha. zekhor dabar le‘abdekha ‘al ’asher yikhaltani. zot nekhamati be‘aneyi ki ’imratekha khiyateni. zeidim helitsuni ‘ad me’od mitoratekha lo natiti. zakharti mishpatekha mei‘olam yhvh va’etnekham. zal‘afah ’akhazatni meiresha‘im ‘ozebei toratekha. zemirot hayu li khuqekha bebet megurai. zakharti balaylah shimkha yhvh va’eshmerah toratekha. zot hayetah li ki fiqudekha natsareti. khelqi yhvh ’amarti lishmor debarekha. khiliti fanekha bekhal leb khaneini ke’imratekha. khishabti derakhai va’ashibah raglai ’el ‘eidotekha. khashti velo hitmahmaheti lishmor mitsvotekha. kheblei resha‘im ‘iveduni toratekha lo shakhakheti. khatsot laylah ’aqum lehodot lakh ‘al mishpetei tsidqekha. khaber ’ani lekhal ’asher yerei’ukha uleshomerei piqudekha. khasdekha yhvh male’ah ha’arets khuqekha lamedeini. tob ‘asita ‘im ‘abdekha yhvh kidbarekha. tub ta‘am vada‘at lamedeini ki bemitsvotekha he’emaneti. terem ’e‘eneh ’ani shogeg ve‘atah ’imratekha shamareti. tob ’atah umeitib lamedeini khuqekha. tafelu ‘alai sheqer zeidim ’ani bekhal leb ’etsor piqudekha. tafash kakheileb libam ’ani toratekha shi‘asha‘eti. tob li khi ‘uneiti lema‘an ’elmad khuqekha. tob li torat pikha mei’alfei zahab vakhasef. yadekha ‘asuni vaykhonuni habineini ve’elmedah mitsvotekha. yerei’ekha yir’uni veyismakhu ki lidbarekha yikhaleti. yada‘ti yhvh ki tsedeq mishpatekha ve’emunah ‘initani. yehi na khasdekha lenakhameini ke’imratekha le‘abdekha. yebo’uni rakhamekha ve’ekhyeh ki toratekha sha‘ashu‘ai. yeiboshu zeidim ki sheqer ‘ivetuni ’ani ’asiakh befiqudekha. yashubu li yerei’ekha veyade‘u veyode‘ei ‘eidotekha. yehi libi tamim bekhuqekha lema‘an lo ’eibosh. kaletah litshu‘atekha nafshi lidbarekha yikhaleti. kalu ‘einai le’imratekha leimor matai tenakhameini. ki hayiti kenod beqitor khuqekha lo shakhakheti. kamah yemei ‘abdekha matai ta‘aseh berodefai mishpat. karu li zeidim shikhot ’asher lo khetoratekha. kal mitsvotekha ’emunah sheqer redafuni ‘azereini. kim‘at kiluni ba’arets va’ani lo ‘azabti fiquvdekha kekhasdekha khayeini ve’eshmerah ‘eidut pikha. le‘olam yhvh debarekha nitsab bashamayim. ledor vador ’emunatekha konanta ’erets vata‘amod. lemishpatekha ‘amedu hayom ki hakol ‘abadekha. lulei toratekha sha‘ashu‘ai ’az ’abadti be‘aneyi. le‘olam lo ’eshkakh piqudekha ki bam khiyitani. lekha ’ani hoshi‘eini ki fiqudekha darasheti. li qivu resha‘im le’abedeini ‘eidotekha ’etbonan. lekhal tikhlah ra’iti qets rekhabah mitsvatekha me’od. mah ’ahabti toratekha kal hayom hi sikhati. mei’oyebai tekhakemeini mitsvotekha ki le‘olam hi li. mikal melamedai hiskalti ki ‘eidevotekha sikhah lyi. mizeqeinim ’etbonan ki fiqudekha natsareti. mikal ’orakh ra‘ kaliti raglai lema‘an ’eshmor debarekha. mimishpatekha lo sareti ki ’atah horeitani. mah nimletsu lekhiki ’imratekha midebash lefi. mipiqudekha ’etbonan ‘al ken saneiti kal ’orakh shaqer. ner leragli debarekha ve’or lintibati. nishba‘ti va’aqayeimah lishmor mishpetei tsidqekha. na‘aneiti ‘ad me’od yhvh khayeini khidbarekha. nidbot pi retseh na yhvh umishpatekha lamedeini. nafshi bekhapi tamid vetoratekha lo shakhakheti. natenu resha‘im pakh li umipiqudekha lo ta‘iti. nakhalti ‘eidevotekha le‘olam ki seson libi hemah. natiti libi la‘asot khuqekha le‘olam ‘eiqeb. sei‘afim saneiti vetoratekha ’ahabeti. sitri umagini ’atah lidbarekha yikhaleti. suru mimeni merei‘im ve’etserah mitsvot ’elohai. samekheini khe’imratekha ve’ekhyeh ve’al tebisheini misibri. se‘adeini ve’ivashei‘ah ve’esh‘ah bekhuqekha tamid. salita kal shogim meikhuqekha kishe qer tarmitam. sigim hishbata khal rish‘ei ’arets lakhen ’ahabti ‘eidotekha. samar mipakhdekha besari umimishpatekha yareiti. ‘asiti mishpat vatsedeq bal tanikheini le‘osheqai. ‘arob ‘abdekha letob ’al ya‘ashquni zeidim. ‘einai kalu lishu‘atekha ule’imrat tsidqekha. ‘aseh ‘im ‘abdekha khekhasdekha vekhuqekha lamedeini. ‘abdekha ’ani habineini ve’eide‘ah ‘eidotekha. ‘et la‘asot yhvh heifeiru toratekha. ‘al ken ’ahabti mitsvotekha mizahab umipaz. ‘al ken kal piqudei khol yishareti kal ’orakh sheqer saneiti. pela’ot ‘eidevotekha ‘al ken netsaratam nafshi. peitakh debarekha ya’ir meibin petayim. pi fa‘arti va’esh’afah ki lemitsvotekha ya’abeti. peneh ’eilai vekhaneini kemishpat le’ohabei shemekha. pe‘amai hakhen be’imratekha ve’al tashlet bi khal ’aven. pedeini mei‘osheq ’adam ve’eshmerah piqudekha. panekha ha’er be‘abdekha velamedeini ’et khuqekha. palgei mayim yaredu ‘einai ‘al lo shameru toratekha. tsadiq ’atah yhvh veyashar mishpatekha. tsivita tsedeq ‘eidotekha ve’emunah me’od. tsimetatni qin’ati ki shakhekhu debarekha tsarai. tserufah ’imratekha me’od ve‘abdekha ’aheibah. tsa‘ir ’anokhi venibzeh piqudekha lo shakhakheti. tsidqatekha tsedeq le‘olam vetoratekha ’emet. tsar umatsoq metsa’uni mitsvotekha sha‘ashu‘ai. tsedeq ‘eidevotekha le‘olam habineini ve’ekhyeh. qarati bekhal leb ‘aneini yhvh khuqekha ’etsorah. qeratikha hoshi‘eini ve’eshmerah ‘eidotekha. qidamti baneshef va’ashavei‘ah lidbarekha lidbarekha yikhaleti. qidemu ‘einai ’ashmurot lasiakh be’imratekha. qoli shim‘ah khekhasdekha yhvh kemishpatekha khayeini. qarebu rodefei zimah mitoratekha rakhaqu. qarob ’atah yhvh vekhal mitsvotekha ’emet. qedem yada‘ti mei‘eidotekha ki le‘olam yesadtam. re’eh ‘aneyi vekhaletseini ki toratekha lo shakhakheti. ribah ribi uge’aleini le’imratekha khayeini. rakhoq meiresha‘im yeshu‘ah ki khuqekha lo darashu. rakhamekha rabim yhvh kemishpatekha khayeini. rabim rodefai vetsarai mei‘eidevotekha lo natiti. ra’iti bogedim va’etqotatah ’asher ’imratekha lo shamaru. re’eh ki fiqudekha ’ahabeti yhvh kekhasdekha khayeini. rosh debarekha ’emet ule‘olam kal mishpat tsidqekha. rim redafuni khinam umidebarekha umidebarekha pakhad libi. sas ’anokhi ‘al ’imratekha kemotsei shalal rab. sheqer neiti va’ata‘eibah toratekha ’ahabeti. sheba‘ bayom hilaltikha ‘al mishpetei tsidqekha. shalom rab le’ohabei toratekha ve’en lamo mikhshol. sibarti lishu‘atekha yhvh umitsvotekha ‘asiti. shamerah nafshi ‘eidotekha va’ohabem me’od. shamarti fiqudekha ve‘eidotekha ki khal derakhai negdekha. tiqrab rinati lefanekha yhvh kidbarekha habineini. tabo tekhinati lefanekha ke’imratekha hatsileini. taba‘nah sefatai tehilah ki telamedeini khuqekha. ta‘an leshoni ’imratekha ki khal mitsvotekha tsedeq. tehi yadekha le‘azereini ki fiqudekha bakhareti. ta’abti lishu‘atekha yhvh vetoratekha sha‘ashu‘ai. tekhi nafshi utehaleka umishpatekha ya‘azruni. ta‘iti keseh ’obed baqesh ‘abdekha ki mitsvotekha lo shakhakheti. shir hama‘alot ’el yhvh batsaratah li qarati vaya‘aneini. yhvh hatsilah nafshi misefat sheqer milashon remiyah. mah yiten lekha umah yosif lakh lashon remiyah. khitsei gibor shenunim ‘im gakhalei retamim. ’oyah li ki garti meshekh khanti ‘im ’aholei qeidar. rabat shakhenah lah nafshi ‘im sonei shalom. ’anisha lom vekhi ’adaber hemah lamilkhamah. shir lama‘alot ’esa ‘einai ’el heharim mei’ayin yabo ‘ezri. ‘ezri mei‘im yhvh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. ’al yiten lamot raglekha ’al yanum shomerekha. hineh lo yanum velo yishan vmer yisra’el. yhvh shomerekha yhvh tsilekha ‘al yad yeminekha. yomam hashemesh lo yakekah veyareiakh balayelah. yhvh yishmarekha mikal ra‘ yishmor ’et nafshekha. yhvh yishmar tseitekha ubo’ekha mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. shir hama‘alot ledavid makhti be’omerim li bet yhvh neilekh. ‘omedot hayu ragleinu bish‘arayikh yerushalim. yerushalim habenuyah ke‘ir shekhuberah lah yakhdav. shesham ‘alu shebatim shibtei yah ‘eidut leyisra’el lehodot leshem yhvh. ki shamah yashebu khis’ot lemishpat kis’ot lebet david. ’alu shelom yerushalim yishlayu ’ohabayikh. yehi shalom bekheilekh levah be’armenotayikh. lema‘an ’akhai verei‘ai ’adaberah na shalom bakh. lema‘an bet yhvh ’eloheinu ’abaqshah tob lakh. shir hama‘alot ’eilekha nasati ’et ‘einai hayoshebi bashamayim. hineh khe‘einei ‘abadim ’el yad ’adoneihem ke‘einei shifkhah ’el yad gebirtah ken ‘eineinu ’el yhvh ’eloheinu ‘ad sheyekhaneinu. khaneinu yhvh khaneinu ki rab saba‘nu buz. rabat sabe‘ah lah nafsheinu hala‘ag hasha’ananim habuz lig’eiyonim shir hama‘alot ledavid lulei yhvh shehayah lanu yomar na yisra’el. lulei yhvh shehayah lanu bequm ‘aleinu ’adam. ’azai khayim bela‘unu bakharot ’apam banu. ’azai hamayim shetafunu nakhlah ‘abar ‘al nafsheinu. ’azai ‘abar ‘al nafsheinu hamayim hazeidonim. barukh yhvh shelo netananu teref leshineihem. nafsheinu ketsipor nimletah mipakh yoqshim hapakh nishbar va’anakhnu nimlatenu. ‘ezreinu beshem yhvh ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. shir hama‘alot habotekhim yhvh kehar tsiyon lo yimot le‘olam yeisheb. yerushalim harim sabib lah yhvh sabib le‘amo mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. ki lo yanuakh sheibet haresha‘ ‘al goral hatsadiqim lema‘an lo yishlekhu hatsadiqim be‘avlatah yedeihem. heitibah yhvh latobim velisharim belibotam. vehamatim ‘aqalqalotam yolikhem yhvh ’et po‘alei ha’aven lom ‘al yisra’el. shir hama‘alot beshub yhvh ’et shibat tsiyon hayinu kekholemim. ’az yimalei sekhoq pinu uleshoneinu rinah ’az yomeru bagoyim higdil yhvh la‘asot ‘im ’eleh. higdil yhvh la‘asot ‘imanu hayinu semeikhim. shubah yhvh ’et shebuteinu shebiteinu ka’afiqim banegeb. hazore‘im bedim‘ah berinah yiqtsoru. halokh yeilekh ubakhoh nosei meshekh hazara‘ bo yabo berinah nosei ’alumotav. shir hama‘alot lishlomoh ’im yhvh lo yibneh bayit shav ‘amelu bonav bo ’im yhvh lo yishmar ‘ir shav shaqad shomer. shav lakhem mashkimei qum me’akharei shebet ’okhelei lekhem ha‘atsabim ken yiten lidido sheina. hineh nakhalat yhvh banim khar peri habaten. kekhitsim beyad gibor ken benei hane‘urim. ’ashrei hageber ’asher milei ’et ’ashpato meihem lo yeiboshu ki yedaberu ’et ’oybim basha‘ar. shir hama‘alot ’ashrei kal yerei yhvh haholekh bidrakhav. yegia‘ kapekha ki tokhel ’ashrekha vetob lakh. ’eshtekha kegefen poriyah beyarketei beitekha banekha kishtilei zeitim sabib leshulkhanekha. hineh khi khen yeborakh gaber yerei yhvh. yebarekhkha yhvh mitsiyon ure’eh betub yerushalim kol yemei khayekha. ure’eh banim lebanekha lom ‘al yisra’el. shir hama‘alot rabat tseraruni mine‘urai yomar na yisra’el. rabat tseraruni mine‘urai gam lo yakhelu li. ‘al gabi khareshu khoreshim he’erikhu lema‘anotam lema‘anitam. yhvh tsadiq qitsets ‘abot resha‘im. yeiboshu veyisogu ’akhor kol sone’ei tsiyon. yihyu kakhatsir gagot sheqadmat shalaf yabesh. shelo milei khapo qotser vekhitsno me‘amer. velo ’ameru ha‘oberim birkat yhvh ’aleikhem beirakhnu ’etkhem beshem yhvh. shir hama‘alot mima‘amaqim qeratikha yhvh. ’adonai shim‘ah beqoli tihyenah ’azenekha qashubot leqol takhanunai. ’im ‘avonot tishmar yah ’adonai mi ya‘amod. ki ‘imekha haselikhah lema‘an tivarei. qiviti yhvh qivetah nafshi velidbaro hokhaleti. nafshi ladonai mishomerim laboqer shomerim laboqer. yakhel yisra’el ’el yhvh ki ‘im yhvh hakhesed veharbeh ‘imo fedut. vehu yifdeh ’et yisra’el mikol ‘avonotav. shir hama‘alot ledavid yhvh lo gabah libi velo ramu ‘einai velo hilakhti bigdolot ubenifla’ot mimeni. ’im lo shiviti vedomamti nafshi kegamul ‘alei ’imo kagamul ‘alai nafshi. yakhel yisra’el ’el yhvh mei‘atah ve‘ad ‘olam. shir hama‘alot zekhor yhvh ledavid ’et kal ‘unoto. ’asher nishba‘ yhvh nadar la’abir ya‘aqob. ’im ’abo be’ohel beiti ’im ’e‘eleh ‘al ‘eres yetsu‘ai. ’im ’eten shenat le‘einai le‘af‘apai tenumah. ‘ad ’emtsa maqom yhvh mishkanot la’abir ya‘aqob. hineh shema‘anuha be’efratah metsanuha bisdei ya‘ar. nabo’ah lemishkenotav nishtakhaveh lahadom raglav. qumah yhvh limnukhatekha ’atah va’aron ‘uzekha. kohanekha yilbeshu tsedeq vakhasidekha yeraneinu. ba‘abur david ‘abdekha ’al tasheb penei meshikhekha. nishba‘ yhvh ledavid ’emet lo yashub mimenah miperi bitnekha ’ashit lekhisei lakh. ’im yishmeru banekha beriti ve‘eidoti zo ’alamedem gam beneihem ‘adei ‘ad yeishebu lekhisei lakh. ki bakhar yhvh betsiyon ’ivah lemoshab lo. zot menukhati ‘adei ‘ad poh ’eisheb ki ’ivitiha. tseidah barekh ’abarekh ’ebyoneha ’asbia‘ lakhem. vekhohaneha ’albish yesha‘ vakhasideha ranen yeraneinu. sham ’atsmiakh qeren ledavid ‘arakhti ner limshikhi. ’oybav ’albish boshet ve‘alav yatsits nizro. shir hama‘alot ledavid hineh mah tob umah na‘im shebet ’akhim gam yakhad. kashemen hatob ‘al harosh yored ‘al hazaqan zeqan ’aharon yored ‘al pi midotav. ketal khermon sheyored ‘al harei tsiyon ki sham tsivah yhvh ’et haberakhah khayim ‘ad ha‘olam. shir hama‘alot hineh barakhu ’et yhvh kal ‘abdei yhvh ha‘omedim bebet yhvh baleilot. se’u yedeikhem qodesh ubarakhu ’et yhvh. yebarekhkha yhvh mitsiyon ‘oseh shamayim va’arets. halu yah halu ’et shem yhvh halu ‘abdei yhvh. ‘omedim bebet yhvh bekhatsrot bet ’eloheinu. halu yah ki tob yhvh zameru lishmo ki na‘im. ki ya‘aqob bakhar lo yah yisra’el lisgulato. ki ’ani yada‘ti ki gadol yhvh va’adoneinu mikal ’elohim. kol ’asher khafets yhvh ‘asah bashamayim uba’arets bayamim vekhal tehomot. ma‘aleh nesi’im miqtseh ha’arets beraqim lamatar ‘asah motsei ruakh mei’otsrotav. hikah bekhorei mitsrayim mei’adam ‘ad beheimah. shalakh ’otot umofetim betokheikhi mitsrayim befar‘oh ubekhal ‘abadav. hikah goyim rabim veharag melakhim ‘atsumim. lesikhon melekh ha’emori ule‘og melekh habashan ulekhol mamlekhot kena‘an. venatan ’artsam nakhalah nakhalah leyisra’el ‘amo. yhvh shimkha le‘olam yhvh zikhrekha ledor vador. ki yadin yhvh ‘amo ve‘al ‘abadav yitnekham. ‘atsabei hagoyim kesef vezahab ma‘aseh yedei ’adam. peh lahem velo yedabeiru ‘einayim lahem velo yir’u. ’azenayim lahem velo ya’azinu ’af ’en yesh ruakh befihem. kemohem yihyu ‘oseihem kol ’asher boteiakh bahem. bet yisra’el barakhu ’et yhvh bet ’aharon barakhu ’et yhvh. bet haleivi barakhu ’et yhvh yir’ei yhvh barakhu ’et yhvh. barukh yhvh mitsiyon shokhen yerushalim halu yah. hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. hodu leilohei ha’elohim ki le‘olam khasdo. hodu la’adonei ha’adonim ki le‘olam khasdo. le‘oseh nifla’ot gedolot lebado ki le‘olam khasdo. le‘oseh hashamayim bitbunah ki le‘olam khasdo. leroqa‘ ha’arets ‘al hamayim ki le‘olam khasdo. le‘oseh ’orim gedolim ki le‘olam khasdo. ’et hashemesh lememshelet bayom ki le‘olam khasdo. ’et hayareiakh vekhokhabim lememshelot balayelah ki le‘olam khasdo. lemakeh mitsrayim bibkhoreihem ki le‘olam khasdo. vayotsei yisra’el mitokham ki le‘olam khasdo. beyad khazaqah ubizroa‘ netuyah ki le‘olam khasdo. legozer yam suf ligzarim ki le‘olam khasdo. vehe‘ebir yisra’el betokho ki le‘olam khasdo. veni‘er par‘oh vekheilo beyam suf ki le‘olam khasdo. lemolikh ‘amo bamidbar ki le‘olam khasdo. lemakeh melakhim gedolim ki le‘olam khasdo. vayaharog melakhim ’adirim ki le‘olam khasdo. lesikhon melekh ha’emori ki le‘olam khasdo. ule‘og melekh habashan ki le‘olam khasdo. venatan ’artsam lenakhalah ki le‘olam khasdo. nakhalah leyisra’el ‘abdo ki le‘olam khasdo. beshifleinu zakhar lanu ki le‘olam khasdo. vayifreqeinu mitsareinu ki le‘olam khasdo. noten lekhem lekhal basar ki le‘olam khasdo. hodu le’el hashamayim ki le‘olam khasdo. ‘al naharot babel sham yashabnu gam bakhinu bezakhereinu ’et tsiyon. ‘al ‘arabim betokhah talinu kinoroteinu. ki sham she’eilunu shobeinu dibreishi r vetolaleinu simkhah shiru lanu mishir tsiyon. ’ekh nashir ’et shir yhvh ‘al ’admat neikhar. ’im ’eshkakhekh yerushalim tishkakh yemini. tidbaq leshoni lekhiki ’im lo ’ezkereikhi ’im lo ’a‘aleh ’et yerushalim ‘al rosh simkhati. zekhor yhvh libnei ’edom ’et yom yerushalim ha’omerim ‘aru ‘aru ‘ad haysod bah. bat babel hashedudah ’ashrei sheyshalem lakh ’et gemulekh shegamalt lanu. ’ashrei sheyokhez venipets ’et ‘olalayikh ’el hasala‘. ledavid ’odkha bekhal libi neged ’elohim ’azamereka. ’eshtakhaveh ’el heikhal qadshekha ve’odeh ’et shemekha ‘al khasdekha ve‘al ’amitekha ki higdalta ‘al kaloshi mekha ’imratekha. beyom qarati vata‘aneini tarhibeini benafshi ‘oz. yodukha yhvh kal malkhei ’arets ki me‘u ’imrei fikha. veyashiru bedarkhei yhvh ki gadol kebod yhvh. ki ram yhvh veshafal yir’eh vegaboah mimerkhaq yeyeida‘. ’im ’eilekh beqereb tsarah tekhayeini ‘al ’af ’oyebai tishlakh yadekha vetoshi‘eini yeminekha. yhvh yigmor ba‘adi yhvh khasdekha le‘olam ma‘asei yadekha ’al teref. lamnatseiakh ledavid mizmor yhvh khaqartani vateida‘. ’atah yada‘ta shibti vequmi bantah lerei‘i meirakhoq. ’arekhi verib‘i zeirita vekhal derakhai hiskantah. ki ’en milah bilshoni hen yhvh yada‘ta khulah. ’akhor vaqedem tsartani vatashet ‘alai kapekhah. pil’iyah peli’ah da‘at mimeni nisgebah lo ’ukhal lah. ’anah ’eilekh meirukhekha ve’anah mipanekha ’ebrakh. ’im ’esaq mayim sham ’atah ve’atsi‘ah she’ol hineka. ’esa khanfei shakhar ’eshkenah be’akharit yam. gamosha m yadekha tankheini vetokhazeini yeminekha. va’omar ’akh khoshekh yeshufeini velaylah ’or ba‘adeini. gam khoshekh lo yakhshikh mimekha velaylah kayom ya’ir kakhasheikhah ka’orah. ki ’atah qanita khilyotai tesukeini bebeten ’imi. ’odkha ‘al ki nora’ot nifleiti nifla’im ma‘asekha venafshi yoda‘at me’od. lo nikhkhad ‘atsemi mimeka ’asher ‘useiti baseiter ruqamti betakhtiyot ’arets. galemi ra’u ‘einekha ve‘al sifrekha kulam yikateibu yamim yutsaru velo velo ’ekhad bahem. veli mah yaqeru rei‘ekha ’el meh ‘atsemu rasheihem. ’esperem meikhol yirbun heqitsoti ve‘odi ‘imakh. ’im tiqtol ’eloah rasha‘ ve’anshei damim suru meni. ’asher yomerukha limzimah nasu lashav ‘arekha. halo mesan’ekha yhvh ’esna ubitqomekha ’etqotat. takhlit sin’ah seneitim le’oybim hayu li. khaqereini ’el veda‘ lebabi bekhaneini veda‘ sar‘apai. ure’eh ’im derekh ‘otseb bi unekheini bederekh ‘olam. lamnatseiakh mizmor ledavid. khaletseini yhvh mei’adam ra‘ mei’ish khamasim tintsereini. ’asher khashebu ra‘ot beleb kal yom yaguru milkhamot. shananu leshonam kemo nakhash khamat ‘akhshub takhat sefateimo selah. shamereini yhvh midei rasha‘ mei’ish khamasim tintsereini ’asher khashebu lidkhot pe‘amai. tamenu gei’im pakh li vakhabalim paresu reshet leyad ma‘gal moqeshim shatu li selah. ’amarti yhvh ’eili ’atah ha’azinah yhvh qol takhanunai. yhvh ’adonai ‘oz yeshu‘ati sakotah leroshi beyom nasheq. ’al titen yhvh ma’avayei rasha‘ zemamo ’al tafeq yarumu selah. rosh mesibai ‘amal sefateimo yekhasumo yekhaseimo yamitu yimotu ‘aleihem gekhalim ba’esh yapilem bemahamorot bal yaqumu. ’ish lashon bal yikon ba’arets ’ish khamas ra‘ yetsudenu lemadkheifot. yada‘ta yada‘ti ki ya‘aseh yhvh din ‘ani mishpat ’ebyonim. ’akh tsadiqim yodu lishmekha yeishebu yesharim ’et panekha. mizmor ledavid yhvh qeratikha khushah li ha’azinah qoli beqare’i lakh. tikon tefilati qetoret lefanekha mas’at kapai minkhat ‘areb. shitah yhvh shamerah lefi nitserah ‘al dal sefatai. ’al tat libi ledabar ra‘ lehit‘olel ‘alilot beresha‘ ’et ’ishim po‘alei ’aven ubal ’elkham beman‘ameihem. yehelmeini tsadiq khesed veyokhikheini shemen rosh ’al yani roshi ki ‘od utefilati bera‘oteihem. nishmetu bidei sela‘ shofeteihem veshame‘u ’amarai ki na‘eimu. kemo
