foleiakh uboqeia‘ ba’arets nifzeru ‘atsameinu lefi she’ol. ki ’eilekha yhvh ’adonai ‘einai bekhah khasiti ’al te‘ar nafshi. shamereini midei fakh yaqeshu li umoqeshot po‘alei ’aven. yipelu bemakhmorav resha‘im yakhad ’anokhi ‘ad ’e‘ebor. maskil ledavid bihyoto bame‘arah tefilah. qoli ’el yhvh ’ez‘aq qoli ’el yhvh ’etkhanan. ’eshpokh lefanav sikhi tsarati lefanav ’agid. behit‘atef ‘alai rukhi ve’atah yada‘ta netibati be’orakh zu ’ahalekh tamenu fakh li. habet yamin ure’eh ve’en li makir ’abad manos mimeni ’en doresh lenafshi. za‘aqti ’eilekha yhvh ’amarti ’atah makhsi khelqi be’erets hakhayim. haqshibah ’el rinati ki daloti me’od hatsileini meirodefai ki ’ametsu mimeni. hotsi’ah mimasger nafshi lehodot ’et shemekha bi yakhtiru tsadiqim ki tigmol ‘alai. mizmor ledavid yhvh shema‘ tefilati ha’azinah ’el takhanunai be’emunatekha ‘aneini betsidqatekha. ve’al tabo bemishpat ’et ‘abdekha ki lo yitsdaq lefanekha khal khai. ki radaf ’oyeb nafshi dika la’arets khayati hoshibani bemakhashakim kemeitei ‘olam. vatit‘atef ‘alai rukhi betokhi yishtomem libi. zakharti yamim miqedem hagiti bekhal pa‘olekha bema‘aseh yadekha ’asokheiakh. peirasti yadai ’eilekha nafshi ke’erets ‘ayeifah lekha selah. maher ‘aneini yhvh kaletah rukhi ’al taster panekha mimeni venimshalti ‘im yoredei bor. hashmi‘eini baboqer khasdekha ki bekha batakheti hodi‘eini derekh zu ’eilekh ki ’eilekha nasati nafshi. hatsileini mei’oyebai yhvh ’eilekha khisiti. lamedeini la‘asot retsonekha ki ’atah ’elohai rukhakha tobah tankheini be’erets mishor. lema‘an shimkha yhvh tekhayeini betsidqatekha totsi mitsarah nafshi. ubekhasdekha tatsmit ’oyebai veha’abadta kal tsorarei nafshi ki ’ani ‘abdekha. ledavid barukh yhvh tsuri hamlamed yadai laqrab ’etsbe‘otai lamilkhamah. khasdi umetsudati misgabi umefalti li magini ubo khasiti haroded ‘ami takhtai. yhvh mah ’adam vateida‘eihu ben ’enosh vatekhashebeihu. ’adam lahebel damah yamav ketsel ‘ober. yhvh hat shamekha veteired ga‘ beharim veye‘eshanu. beroq baraq utefitsem shelakh khitsekha utehumem. shelakh yadekha mimarom petseini vehatsileini mimayim rabim miyad benei neikhar. ’asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. ’elohim shir khadash ’ashirah lakh beneibel ‘asor ’azamerah lakh. hanoten teshu‘ah lamelakhim hapotseh ’et david ‘abdo meikhereb ra‘ah. petseini vehatsileini miyad benei neikhar ’asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. ’asher baneinu kinti‘im megudalim bin‘ureihem benoteinu khezaviyot mekhutabot tabnit heikhal. mezaveinu melei’im mefiqim mizan ’el zan tsoneinu ma’alifot merubabot bekhutsoteinu. ’alufeinu mesubalim ’en perets ve’en yotset ve’en tsevakhah birkhoboteinu. ’ashrei ha‘am shekakhah lo ’ashrei ha‘am yhvh ’elohav. tehilah ledavid ’aromimkha ’elohai hamelekh va’abarakhah mekha le‘olam va‘ed. bekhal yom ’abarakheka va’ahalah mekha le‘olam va‘ed. gadol yhvh umehulal me’od veligdulato ’en kheiqer. dor ledor yeshabakh ma‘asekha ugeburotekha yagidu. hadar kebod hodekha vedibrei nifle’otekha ’asikhah. ve‘ezuz nor’otekha yomeiru ugedulotekha ugedulatekha ’asaperenah. zeikher rab tubekha yabi‘u vetsidqatekha yeraneinu. khanun verakhum yhvh ’erekh ’apayim ugedal khased. tob yhvh lakol verakhamav ‘al kal ma‘asav. yodukha yhvh kal ma‘asekha vakhasidekha yebarakhukhah. kebod malkhutekha yomeiru ugeburatekha yedabeiru. lehodia‘ libnei ha’adam geburotav ukhebod hadar malkhuto. malkhutekha malkhut kal ‘olamim umemsheltekha bekhal dor vador. somekh yhvh lekhal hanofelim vezoqef lekhal hakefufim. ‘einei khol ’eilekha yesabeiru ve’atah noten lahem ’et ’akhelam be‘ito. poteiakh ’et yadekha umasbia‘ lekhal khai ratson. tsadiq yhvh bekhal derakhav vekhasid bekhal ma‘asav. qarob yhvh lekhal qore’av lekhol ’asher yiqra’uhu be’emet. retson yerei’av ya‘aseh ve’et shav‘atam yishma‘ veyoshi‘em. shomer yhvh ’et kal ’ohabav ve’et kal haresha‘im yashmid. tehilat yhvh yedaber pi vibarekh kal basar shem qadesho le‘olam va‘ed. halu yah hali nafshi ’et yhvh. ’ahalah yhvh bekhayai ’azamerah leilohai be‘odi. ’al tibtekhu bindibim beben ’adam she’en lo teshu‘ah. teitsei rukho yashub le’admato bayom hahu ’abedu ‘eshtonotav. ’ashrei she’el ya‘aqob be‘ezro bero ‘al yhvh ’elohav. ‘oseh shamayim va’arets ’et hayam ve’et kal ’asher bam hashomer ’emet le‘olam. ‘oseh mishpat la‘ashuqim noten lekhem lare‘eibim yhvh matir ’asurim. yhvh poqeiakh ‘ivrim yhvh zoqef kefufim yhvh ’oheb tsadiqim. yhvh shomer ’et geirim yatom ve’almanah ye‘oded vederekh resha‘im ye‘avet. yimlokh yhvh le‘olam ’elohayikh tsiyon ledor vador halu yah. halu yah ki tob zamerah ’eloheinu ki na‘im navah tehilah. boneh yerushalim yhvh nidkhei yisra’el yekhanes. harofei lishburei leb umekhabesh le‘atsebotam. moneh mispar lakokhabim lekhulam sheimot yiqra. gadol ’adoneinu verab koakh litbunato ’en mispar. me‘oded ‘anavim yhvh mashpil resha‘im ‘adei ’arets. ‘enu yhvh betodah zameru leiloheinu bekhinor. hamkhaseh shamayim be‘abim hameikhin la’arets matar hamatsmiakh harim khatsir. noten libheimah lakhmah libnei ‘oreb ’asher yiqra’u. lo bigburat hasus yekhpats lo beshoqei ha’ish yirtseh. rotseh yhvh ’et yerei’av ’et hamyakhalim lekhasdo. shabekhi yerushalim ’et yhvh hali ’elohayikh tsiyon. ki khizaq berikhei she‘arayikh beirakh banayikh beqirbekh. hasam gebulekh shalom kheileb khitim yasbi‘ekh. hasholeiakh ’imrato ’arets ‘ad meheirah yaruts debaro. hanoten sheleg katsamer kefor ka’eifer yefazer. mashlikh qarkho khefitim lifnei qarato mi ya‘amod. yishlakh debaro veyamsem yasheb rukho yizelu mayim. magid debaro debarav leya‘aqob khuqav umishpatav leyisra’el. lo ‘asah khen lekhal go umishpatim bal yeda‘um halu yah. halu yah halu ’et yhvh min hashamayim haluhu bameromim. haluhu khal mal’akhav haluhu kal tseba’o tseba’av. haluhu shemesh veyareiakh haluhu kal kokhbei ’or. haluhu shemei hashamayim vehamayim ’asher mei‘al hashamayim. yehalu ’et shem yhvh ki hu tsivah venibra’u. vaya‘amidem la‘ad le‘olam khaq natan velo ya‘abor. halu ’et yhvh min ha’arets taninim vekhal tehomot. ’esh ubarad sheleg veqitor ruakh se‘arah ‘osah debaro. heharim vekhal geba‘ot ‘ets peri vekhal ’arazim. hakhayah vekhal beheimah remes vetsipor kanaf. malkhei ’erets vekhal le’umim rim vekhal shofetei ’arets. bakhurim vegam betulot zeqeinim ‘im ne‘arim. yehalu ’et shem yhvh ki nisgab shemo lebado hodo ‘al ’erets veshamayim. vayarem qeren le‘amo tehilah lekhal khasidav libnei yisra’el ‘am qerobo halu yah. halu yah shiru yhvh shir khadash tehilato biqhal khasidim. yismakh yisra’el be‘osav benei tsiyon yagilu bemalkam. yehalu shemo bemakhol betof vekhinor yezameru lo. ki rotseh yhvh be‘amo yefa’er ‘anavim bishu‘ah. ya‘lezu khasidim bekhabod yeranenu ‘al mishkebotam. romot ’el bigronam vekhereb pifiyot beyadam. la‘asot neqamah bagoyim tokheikhot bal ’umim. le’sor malkheihem beziqim venikhbedeihem bekhablei barzel. la‘asot bahem mishpat katub hadar hu lekhal khasidav halu yah. halu yah halu ’el beqadesho haluhu birqia‘ ‘uzo. haluhu bigburotav haluhu kerob gudlo. haluhu beteiqa‘ shofar haluhu beneibel vekhinor. haluhu betof umakhol haluhu beminim ve‘ugab. haluhu betsiltselei shama‘ haluhu betsiltselei teru‘ah. kol haneshamah tehalel yah halu yah. mishlei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra’el. lada‘at khakhmah umusar lehabin ’imrei binah. laqakhat musar haskel tsedeq umishpat umeisharim. latet liftayim ‘aremah lena‘ar da‘at umezimah. yishma‘ khakham veyosef leqakh venabon takhbulot yiqneh. lehabin mashal umelitsah dibrei khakhamim vekhidotam. yir’at yhvh reishit da‘at khakhmah umusar ’evilim bazu. shema‘ beni musar ’abikha ve’al titosh torat ’imekha. ki livyat khen hem leroshekha va‘anaqim legargerotekha. beni ’im yefatukha khata’im ’al tobei. ’im yomeru lekhah ’itanu ne’erbah ledam nitspenah lenaqi khinam. nibla‘em kish’ol khayim utemimim keyordei bor. kal hon yaqar nimtsa nemalei bateinu shalal. goralekha tapil betokheinu kis ’ekhad yihyeh lekhulanu. beni ’al teilekh bederekh ’itam mena‘ raglekha minetibatam. ki ragleihem lara‘ yarutsu vimaharu lishpakh dam. ki khinam mezorah harashet be‘einei khal ba‘al kanaf. vehem ledamam ye’erobu yitspenu lenafshotam. ken ’arekhot kal botseia‘ batsa‘ ’et nefesh be‘alav yiqakh. khakhemot bakhuts taronah barekhobot titen qolah. berosh homiyot tiqra befitkhei she‘arim ba‘ir ’amareha tomer. ‘ad matai petayim te’eihabu feti veleitsim latson khamedu lahem ukhesilim yisne’u da‘at. tashubu letokhakhti hineh ’abi‘ah lakhem rukhi ’odi‘ah debarai ’etkhem. ya‘an qarati vatema’einu natiti yadi ve’en maqshib. vatifre‘u khal ‘atsati vetokhakhti lo ’abitem. gam ’ani be’eidekhem ’eskhaq ’el‘ag bebo fakhdekhem. bebo khesha’avah khesho’ah pakhdekhem ve’eidekhem kesufah ye’eteh bebo ‘aleikhem tsarah vetsuqah. ’az yiqra’uni velo ’e‘eneh yeshakharuni velo yimtsa’uni. takhat ki sane’u da‘at veyir’at yhvh lo bakharu. lo ’abu la‘atsati na’atsu kal tokhakhti. veyokhelu miperi darkam umimo‘atsoteihem yisba‘u. ki meshubat petayim tahargem veshalvat kesilim te’abedem. veshomeia‘ li yishkan betakh vesha’anan mipakhad ra‘ah. beni ’im tiqakh ’amarai umitsvotai titspon ’itakh. lehaqshib lakhakhemah ’azenekha tateh libekha latebunah. ki ’im labinah tiqra latebunah titen qolekha. ’im tebaqshenah khakasef vekhamatmonim takhpesenah. ’az tabin yir’at yhvh veda‘at ’elohim timtsa. ki yhvh yiten khakhmah mipiv da‘at utebunah. vetsafan yitspon laysharim tushiyah magen leholekhei tom. lintsor ’arekhot mishpat vederekh khasido khasidav yishmor. ’az tabin tsedeq umishpat umeisharim kal ma‘gal tob. ki tabo khakhmah belibekha veda‘at lenafshekha yin‘am. mezimah tishmor ‘alekha tebunah tintserekah. lehatsilekha miderekh ra‘ mei’ish medaber tahpukhot. ha‘ozebim ’arekhot yosher lalekhet bedarkhei khoshekh. hasemeikhim la‘asot ra‘ yagilu betahpukhot ra‘. ’asher ’arekhoteihem ‘iqeshim unelozim bema‘gelotam. lehatsilekha mei’ishah zarah minakheriyah ’amareha hekheliqah. ha‘ozebet ’aluf ne‘ureha ve’et berit ’eloheha shakheikhah. ki shakhah ’el mavet beitah ve’el refa’im ma‘geloteha. kal ba’eha lo yeshubun velo yasigu ’arekhot khayim. lema‘an teilekh bederekh tobim ve’arekhot tsadiqim tishmor. ki yesharim yishkenu ’arets utemimim yivateru bah. uresha‘im mei’erets yikareitu ubogdim yisekhu mimenah. beni torati ’al tishkakh umitsvotai yitsor libekha. ki ’orekh yamim ushenot khayim veshalom yosifu lakh. khesed ve’emet ’al ya‘azbukha qasherem ‘al gargerotekha katebem ‘al luakh libekha. umetsa khen veseikhel tob be‘einei ’elohim ve’adam. betakh ’el yhvh bekhal libekha ve’el binatekha ’al tisha‘en. bekhal derakhekha da‘eihu vehu yeyasher ’orekhotekha. ’al tehi khakham be‘einekha yera ’et yhvh vesur meira‘. rif’ut tehi lesharekha veshiqui le‘atsmotekha. kabed ’et yhvh meihonekha umeireishit kal tebu’atekha. veyimale’u ’asamekha saba‘ vetirosh yeqabekha yifrotsu. musar yhvh beni ’al tim’as ve’al taqots betokhakhto. ki ’et ’asher ye’ehab yhvh yokhiakh ukhe’ab ’et ben yirtseh. ’ashrei ’adam matsa khakhmah ve’adam yafiq tebunah. ki tob sakhrah misekhar kasef umeikharuts tebu’atah. yeqarah hi mipeniyim mipeninim vekhal khafatsekha lo yishvu bah. ’orekh yamim biminah bismolah ‘osher vekhabod. derakheha darkhei no‘am vekhal netiboteha shalom. ‘ets khayim hi lamakhaziqim bah vetomekheha me’ushar. yhvh bekhakhemah yasad ’arets konen mayim bitbunah. beda‘to tehomot nibqa‘u ushekhaqim yir‘afu tal. beni ’al yaluzu mei‘einekha netsor tushiyah umezimah. veyihyu khayim lenafshekha vekhen legargerotekha. ’az teilekh labetakh darkekha veraglekha lo tigof. ’im tishkab lo tifkhad veshakhabta ve‘arebah shenatekha. ’al tira mipakhad pit’om umisho’at resha‘im ki tabo. ki yhvh yihyeh bekhislekha veshamar raglekha milakhed. ’al timna‘ tob mibe‘alav bihyot le’el yadekha yadekha la‘asot. ’al tomar lerei‘ekha lerei‘akha lekh vashub umakhar ’eten veyesh ’itakh. ’al takharosh ‘al rei‘akha ra‘ah vehu yosheb labetakh ’itakh. ’al tarob tarib ‘im ’adam khinam ’im lo gemalekha ra‘ah. ’al teqanei be’ish khamas ve’al tibkhar bekhal derakhav. ki to‘abat yhvh naloz ve’et yesharim sodo. me’eirat yhvh bebet rasha‘ uneveh tsadiqim yebarekh. ’im laleitsim hu yalits vela‘aniyim vela‘anavim yiten khen. kabod khakhamim yinkhalu ukhesilim meirim qalon. shim‘u banim musar ’ab vehaqshibu lada‘at binah. ki leqakh tob natati lakhem torati ’al ta‘azobu. ki ben hayiti le’abi rakh veyakhid lifnei ’imi. vayoreini vayomer li yitmakh debarai libekha shemor mitsvotai vekhyeh. qeneh khakhmah qeneh binah ’al tishkakh ve’al tet mei’imrei fi. ’al ta‘azbeha vetishmereka ’ehabeha vetitsereka. reishit khakhmah qeneh khakhmah ubekhal qinyanekha qeneh binah. salseleha uteromeka tekhabeidekha ki tekhabeqenah. titen leroshekha livyat khen ‘ateret tif’eret temageneka. shema‘ beni veqakh ’amarai veyirbu lekha shenot khayim. bederekh khakhmah horeitikha hidrakhtikha bema‘gelei yosher. belekhtekha lo yeitsar tsa‘adekha ve’im taruts lo tikashel. hakhazeq bamusar ’al teref nitsereha ki hi khayekha. be’orakh resha‘im ’al tabo ve’al te’asher bederekh ra‘im. pera‘eihu ’al ta‘abar bo seteh mei‘alav va‘abor. ki lo yishnu ’im lo yarei‘u venigzelah natam ’im lo yikhsholu yakhshilu. ki lakhamu lekhem resha‘ veyen khamasim yishtu. ve’orakh tsadiqim ke’or nogah holekh va’or ‘ad nekhon hayom. derekh resha‘im ka’afeilah lo yade‘u bameh yikasheilu. beni lidbarai haqshibah la’amarai hat ’azenekha. ’al yalizu mei‘einekha merem betokh lebabekha. ki khayim hem lemotse’eihem ulekhal besaro marpei. mikal mishmar netsor libekha ki mimenu tots’ot khayim. haser mimekha ‘iqeshut peh ulezut fatayim harkheq mimeka. ‘einekha lenokhakh yabitu ve‘af‘apekha yayshiru negdekha. pales ma‘gal raglekha vekhal derakhekha yikonu. ’al tet yamin usemol haser raglekha meira‘. beni lekhakhemati haqshibah litbunati hat ’azenekha. lishmor mezimot veda‘at sefatekha yintsoru. ki nofet titofenah siftei zarah vekhalaq mishemen khikah. ve’akharitah marah khala‘anah khadah kekhereb piyot. ragleha yoredot mavet ’ol tse‘adeha yitmokhu. ’orakh khayim pen tefales na‘u ma‘geloteha lo teida‘. ve‘atah banim shim‘u li ve’al tasuru mei’imrei fi. harkheq mei‘aleha darkekha ve’al tiqrab ’el petakh beitah. pen titen la’akheirim hodekha ushenotekha le’akhzari. pen yisbe‘u zarim kokhekha va‘atsabekha bebet nakheri. venahamta be’akharitekha bikhlot besarekha ushe’eirekha. ve’amarta ’ekh saneiti musar vetokhakhat na’ats libi. velosha ma‘ti beqol morai velimlamedai lo hititi ’azeni. kim‘at hayiti bekhal ra‘ betokh qahal ve‘eidah. sheteh mayim miborekha venozelim mitokh be’eirekha. yafutsu ma‘yenotekha khutsah barekhobot palgei mayim. yihyu lekha lebadekha ve’en lezarim ’itakh. yehi meqorkha barukh usemakh mei’eishet ne‘urekha. ’ayelet ’ahabim veya‘alat khen dadeha yeravukha bekhal ‘et be’ahabatah tishgeh tamid. velamah tishgeh beni bezarah utekhabeq kheq nakheriyah. ki nokhakh ‘einei yhvh darkhei ’ish vekhal ma‘gelotav mefales. ‘avonotav yilkeduno ’et harasha‘ ubekhablei khatato yitamekh. hu yamut be’en musar uberob ’ivalto yishgeh. beni ’im ‘arabta lerei‘ekha taqa‘ta lazar kapekha. noqashta be’imrei fikha nilkadta be’imrei fikha. ‘aseh zot ’eifo beni vehinatsel ki bata bekhaf rei‘ekha lekh hitrapes urehab rei‘ekha. ’al titen sheinah le‘einekha utenumah le‘af‘apekha. hinatsel kitsbi miyad ukhetsipor miyad yaqush. lekh ’el nemalah ‘atsel re’eh derakheha vakhakham. ’asher ’en lah qatsin shoter umoshel. takhin baqayits lakhmah ’agerah baqatsir ma’akhalah. ‘ad matai ‘atsel tishkab matai taqum mishenatekha. me‘at not me‘at tenumot me‘at khibuq yadayim lishkab. uba khimhalekh reishekha umakhsorekha ke’ish magen. ’adam beliya‘al ’ish ’aven holekh ‘iqeshut peh. qorets be‘einav molel beraglav moreh be’etsbe‘otav. tahpukhot belibo khoresh ra‘ bekhal ‘et medanim midyanim yeshaleiakh. ‘al ken pit’om yabo ’eido peta‘ yishaber ve’en marpei. shesh henah sanei yhvh vesheba‘ to‘abot to‘abat nafsho. ‘einayim ramot leshon shaqer veyadayim shofekhot dam naqi. leb khoresh makhshebot ’aven raglayim memaharot laruts lara‘ah. yafiakh kezabim ‘ed shaqer umeshaleiakh medanim ben ’akhim. netsor beni mitsvat ’abikha ve’al titosh torat ’imekha. qasherem ‘al libekha tamid ‘anedem ‘al gargerotekha. behithalekhkha tankheh ’otakh beshakhebekha tishmor ‘alekha vahaqitsota hi tesikhekha. ki ner mitsvah vetorah ’or vederekh khayim tokhkhot musar. lishmarekha mei’eishet ra‘ meikhelqat lashon nakheriyah. ’al takhmod yafeyah bilbabekha ve’al tiqakhakha be‘af‘apeha. ki be‘ad ’ishah zonah ‘ad kikar lakhem ve’eishet ’ish nefesh yeqarah tatsud. hayakhteh ’ish ’esh bekheiqo ubegadav lo tisarafnah. ’im yehalekh ’ish ‘al hagekhalim veraglav lo tikavenah. ken haba ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu lo yinaqeh kal hanogeia‘ bah. lo yabuzu laganab ki yignob lemalei nafsho ki yir‘ab. venimtsa yeshalem shib‘atayim ’et kal hon beito yiten. no’ef ’ishah khasar leb mashkhit nafsho hu ya‘asenah. nega‘ veqalon yimtsa vekherpato lo timakheh. ki qin’ah khamat gaber velo yakhmol beyom naqam. lo yisa penei khal kofer velo yobeh ki tarbeh shokhad. beni shemor ’amarai umitsvotai titspon ’itakh. shemor mitsvotai vekhyeh vetorati ke’ishon ‘einekha. qasherem ‘al ’etsbe‘otekha katebem ‘al luakh libekha. ’emor lakhakhemah ’akhoti ’at umoda‘ labinah tiqra. lishmarekha mei’ishah zarah minakheriyah ’amareha hekheliqah. ki bekhalon beiti be‘ad ’eshnabi nishqafeti. va’eire bapetayim ’abinah babanim na‘ar khasar leb. ‘ober bashuq ’eitsel pinah vederekh beitah yits‘ad. beneshef be‘ereb yom be’ishon laylah va’afeilah. vehineh ’ishah liqrato shit zonah unetsurat leb. homiyah hi vesoraret bebeitah lo yishkenu ragleha. pa‘am bakhuts pa‘am barekhobot ve’eitsel kal pinah te’erob. vehekheziqah bo venasheqah lo hei‘eizah faneha vatomar lo. zibkhei shelamim ‘alai hayom shilamti nedarai. ‘al ken yatsati liqratekha leshakher panekha va’emtsa’eka. marbadim rabadti ‘arsi khatubot ’eitun mitsrayim. nafti mishkabi mor ’ahalim veqinamon. lekhah nirveh dodim ‘ad haboqer nit‘alesah ba’ohabim. ki ’en ha’ish bebeito halakh bederekh meirakhoq. tseror hakesef laqakh beyado leyom hakeise yabo beito. hitatu berob liqkhah bekheileq fateha tadikhenu. holekh ’akhareha pit’om keshor ’el tabakh yabo ukhe‘ekhes ’el musar ’evil. ‘ad yefalakh khets kebeido kemaher tsipor ’el pakh velo yada‘ ki benafsho hu. ve‘atah banim shim‘u li vehaqshibu le’imrei fi. ’al yeiset ’el derakheha libekha ’al teita‘ bintiboteha. ki rabim khalalim hipilah va‘atsumim kal harugeha. darkhei she’ol beitah yoredot ’el khadrei mavet. halo khakhmah tiqra utebunah titen qolah. berosh meromim ‘alei darekh bet netibot nitsabah. leyad she‘arim lefi qaret mebo fetakhim taronah. ’aleikhem ’ishim ’eqra veqoli ’el benei ’adam. habinu fetayim ‘aremah ukhesilim habinu leb. me‘u ki negidim ’adaber umiftakh fatai meisharim. ki ’emet yehgeh khiki veto‘abat sefatai resha‘. betsedeq kal ’imrei fi ’en bahem niftal ve‘iqesh. kulam nekhokhim lameibin visharim lemotse’ei da‘at. qekhu musari ve’al kasef veda‘at meikharuts nibkhar. ki tobah khakhmah mipeninim vekhal khafatsim lo yishvu bah. ’ani khakhmah shakhanti ‘aremah veda‘at mezimot ’emtsa. yir’at yhvh senot ra‘ gei’ah vega’on vederekh ra‘ ufi tahpukhot saneiti. li ‘eitsah vetushiyah ’ani binah li geburah. bi melakhim yimlokhu veroznim yekhoqequ tsedeq. bi sarim yasoru unedibim kal shofetei tsedeq. ’ani ’ohabeha ’ohabai ’eihab umeshakharai yimtsa’uni. ‘osher vekhabod ’iti hon ‘ateq utsedaqah. tob piryi meikharuts umipaz utebu’ati mikesef nibkhar. be’orakh tsedaqah ’ahalekh betokh netibot mishpat. lehankhil ’ohabai yesh ve’otseroteihem ’amalei. yhvh qanani reishit darko qedem mif‘alav mei’az. mei‘olam nisakhti meirosh miqadmei ’arets. be’en tehomot kholaleti be’en ma‘yanot nikhbadei mayim. beterem harim hateba‘u lifnei geba‘ot kholaleti. ‘ad lo ‘asah ’erets vekhutsot verosh ‘aferot teibel. bahakhino mayim sham ’ani bekhuqo khug ‘al penei tehom. be’ametso shekhaqim mima‘al ba‘azoz ‘inot tehom besumo layam khuqo umayim lo ya‘abru fiv bekhuqo mosdei ’arets. va’ehyeh ’etslo ’amon va’ehyeh ‘ashu‘im yom yom mesakheqet lefanav bekhal ‘et. mesakheqet beteibel ’artso vesha‘ashu‘ai ’et benei ’adam. ve‘atah banim shim‘u li ve’ashrei derakhai yishmoru. shim‘u musar vakhakhamu ve’al tifra‘u. ’ashrei ’adam shomeia‘ li lishqod ‘al daltotai yom yom lishmor mezuzot petakhai. ki motse’i motse’ei matsa khayim vayafeq ratson yhvh. vekhote’i khomes nafsho kal mesan’ai ’ahabu mavet. khakhemot banetah beitah khatsebah ‘amudeha shib‘ah. tabekhah tibkhah masekhah yeinah ’af ‘arekhah shulkhanah. shalekhah na‘aroteha tiqra ‘al gapei meromei qaret. mi feti yasur henah khasar leb ’amerah lo. lekhu lakhamu belakhami ushetu beyayin masakheti. ‘izbu fetayim vikhyu ve’ishru bederekh binah. yoser lets loqeiakh lo qalon umokhiakh lerasha‘ mumo. ’al tokhakh lets pen yisna’eka hokhakh lekhakham veye’ehabeka. ten lekhakham veyekhkam ‘od hoda‘ letsadiq veyosef leqakh. tekhilat khakhmah yir’at yhvh veda‘at qedoshim binah. ki bi yirbu yamekha veyosifu lekha shenot khayim. ’im khakhamta khakhamta lakh velatsta lebadekha tisa. ’eishet kesilut homiyah petayut ubal yade‘ah mah. veyashebah lefetakh beitah ‘al kisei meromei qaret. liqro le‘oberei darekh hamyasherim ’orekhotam. mi feti yasur henah vakhasar leb ve’amerah lo. mayim genubim yimtaqu velekhem setarim yin‘am. velo yada‘ ki refa’im sham be‘imqei she’ol qeru’eha. mishlei shelomoh ben khakham yesamakh ’ab uben kesil tugat ’imo. lo yo‘ilu ’otsrot resha‘ utsedaqah tatsil mimavet. lo yar‘ib yhvh nefesh tsadiq vehavat resha‘im yehdof. rash ‘oseh khaf remiyah veyad kharutsim ta‘ashir. ’oger baqayits ben maskil nirdam baqatsir ben meibish. berakhot lerosh tsadiq ufi resha‘im yekhaseh khamas. zeikher tsadiq librakhah veshem resha‘im yirqab. khakham leb yiqakh mitsvot ve’evil fatayim yilabet. holekh batom yeilekh betakh ume‘aqesh derakhav yivadeia‘. qorets ‘ayin yiten ‘atsabet ve’evil fatayim yilabet. meqor khayim pi tsadiq ufi resha‘im yekhaseh khamas. ne’ah te‘orer medanim ve‘al kal pesha‘im tekhaseh ’ahabah. besiftei nabon timatsei khakhmah vesheibet legev khasar leb. khakhamim yitspenu da‘at ufi ’evil mekhitah qerobah. hon ‘ashir qiryat ‘uzo mekhitat dalim reisham. pe‘ulat tsadiq lekhayim tebu’at rasha‘ lekhatat. ’orakh lekhayim shomer musar ve‘ozeb tokhakhat mat‘eh. mekhaseh ne’ah siftei shaqer umotsi dibah hu khesil. berob debarim lo yekhdal pasha‘ vekhosekh sefatav maskil. kesef nibkhar leshon tsadiq leb resha‘im kim‘at. siftei tsadiq yir‘u rabim ve’evilim bakhasar leb yamutu. birkat yhvh hi ta‘ashir velo yosif ‘etseb ‘imah. kiskhoq likhsil ‘asot zimah vekhakhemah le’ish tebunah. megorat rasha‘ hi tebo’enu veta’avat tsadiqim yiten. ka‘abor sufah ve’en rasha‘ vetsadiq yesod ‘olam. kakhomets lashinayim vekhe‘ashan la‘einayim ken he‘atsel lesholekhav. yir’at yhvh tosif yamim ushenot resha‘im tiqtsorenah. tokhelet tsadiqim simkhah vetiqvat resha‘im tobed. ma‘oz latom derekh yhvh umekhitah lefo‘alei ’aven. tsadiq le‘olam bal yimot uresha‘im lo yishkenu ’arets. pi tsadiq yanub khakhmah uleshon tahpukhot tikaret. siftei tsadiq yeide‘un ratson ufi resha‘im tahpukhot. mozenei mirmah to‘abat yhvh ve’eben sheleimah retsono. ba zadon vayabo qalon ve’et tsenu‘im khakhmah tumat yesharim tankhem veselef bogdim veshadam yeshadem. lo yo‘il hon beyom ‘ebrah utsedaqah tatsil mimavet. tsidqat tamim teyasher darko uberish‘ato yipol rasha‘. tsidqat yesharim tatsilem ubehavat bogedim yilakheidu. bemot ’adam rasha‘ tobad tiqvah vetokhelet ’onim ’abadah. tsadiq mitsarah nekhelats vayabo rasha‘ takhtav. befeh khanef yashkhit rei‘eihu ubeda‘at tsadiqim yeikhaleitsu. betub tsadiqim ta‘alots qiryah uba’abod resha‘im rinah. bebirkat yesharim tarum qaret ubefi resha‘im teihares. baz lerei‘eihu khasar leb ve’ish tebunot yakharish. holekh rakhil megaleh sod vene’eman ruakh mekhaseh dabar. be’en takhbulot yipal ‘am uteshu‘ah berob yo‘ets. ra‘ yeiroa‘ ki ‘arab zar vesonei toqe‘im boteiakh. ’eishet khen titmokh kabod ve‘aritsim yitmekhu ‘osher. gomel nafsho ’ish khased ve‘okher ’eiro ’akhzari. rasha‘ ‘oseh fe‘ulat shaqer vezoreia‘ tsedaqah sekher ’emet. ken tsedaqah lekhayim umeradef ra‘ah lemoto. to‘abat yhvh ‘iqeshei leb uretsono temimei darekh. yad leyad lo yinaqeh ra‘ vezera‘ tsadiqim nimlat. nezem zahab be’af khazir ’ishah yafah vesarat ta‘am. ta’avat tsadiqim ’akh tob tiqvat resha‘im ‘ebrah. yesh mefazer venosaf ‘od vekhosekh miyosher ’akh lemakhsor. nefesh berakhah tedushan umarveh gam hu yore. moneia‘ bar yiqebuhu le’om uberakhah lerosh mashbir. shokher tob yebaqesh ratson vedoresh ra‘ah tebo’enu. boteiakh be‘ashero hu yipol vekhe‘aleh tsadiqim yifrakhu. ‘okher beito yinkhal ruakh ve‘ebed ’evil lakhakham leb. peri tsadiq ‘ets khayim veloqeiakh nefasot khakham. hen tsadiq ba’arets yeshulam ’af ki rasha‘ vekhotei. ’oheb musar ’oheb da‘at vesonei tokhakhat ba‘ar. tob yafiq ratson yhvh ve’ish mezimot yarshia‘. lo yikon ’adam beresha‘ veshoresh tsadiqim bal yimot. ’eishet khayil ‘ateret ba‘lah ukheraqab be‘atsmotav mebishah. makhshebot tsadiqim mishpat takhbulot resha‘im mirmah. dibrei resha‘im ’erab dam ufi yesharim yatsilem. hafokh resha‘im ve’einam ubet tsadiqim ya‘amod. lefisi khelo yehulal ’ish vena‘aveh leb yihyeh labuz. tob niqleh ve‘ebed lo mimetakabed vakhasar lakhem. yodeia‘ tsadiq nefesh behemto verakhamei resha‘im ’akhzari. ‘obed ’admato yisba‘ lakhem umeradef reiqim khasar leb. khamad rasha‘ metsod ra‘im veshoresh tsadiqim yiten. befesha‘ fatayim moqesh ra‘ vayeitsei mitsarah tsadiq. miperi fi ’ish yisba‘ tob ugemul yedei ’adam yashub yashib lo. derekh ’evil yashar be‘einav veshomeia‘ le‘eitsah khakham. ’evil bayom yivada‘ ka‘so vekhoseh qalon ‘arum. yafiakh ’emunah yagid tsedeq ve‘ed sheqarim mirmah. yesh boteh kemadqerot khareb uleshon khakhamim marpei. sefat ’emet tikon la‘ad ve‘ad ’argi‘ah leshon shaqer. mirmah beleb khoreshei ra‘ uleyo‘atsei shalom simkhah. lo ye’uneh latsadiq kal ’aven uresha‘im male’u ra‘. to‘abat yhvh siftei shaqer ve‘osei ’emunah retsono. ’adam ‘arum koseh da‘at veleb kesilim yiqra ’ivelet. yad kharutsim timshol uremiyah tihyeh lamas. de’agah beleb ’ish yashkhenah vedabar tob yesamekhenah. yater meirei‘eihu tsadiq vederekh resha‘im tat‘em. lo yakharokh remiyah tseido vehon ’adam yaqar kharuts. be’orakh tsedaqah khayim vederekh netibah ’al mavet. ben khakham musar ’ab velets lo shama‘ ge‘arah. miperi fi ’ish yokhal tob venefesh bogedim khamas. notser piv shomer nafsho poseq fatav mekhitah lo. mit’avah va’ayin nafsho ‘atsel venefesh kharutsim tedushan. debaroshe qer yisna tsadiq verasha‘ yab’ish veyakhpir. tsedaqah titsor tam darekh verish‘ah tesalef khatat. yesh mit‘asher ve’en kol mitroshesh vehon rab. kofer nefesh ’ish ‘ashero verash lo shama‘ ge‘arah. ’or tsadiqim yismakh vener resha‘im yid‘akh. raq bezadon yiten matsah ve’et no‘atsim khakhmah hon meihebel yim‘at veqobets ‘al yad yarbeh. tokhelet memushakhah makhalah leb ve‘ets khayim ta’avah ba’ah. baz ledabar yeikhabel lo virei mitsvah hu yeshulam. torat khakham meqor khayim lasur mimoqeshei mavet. seikhel tob yiten khen vederekh bogedim ’eitan. kal ‘arum ya‘aseh beda‘at ukhesil yifros ’ivelet. mal’akh rasha‘ yipol bera‘ vetsir ’emunim marpei. resh veqalon poreia‘ musar veshomer tokhakhat yekhubad. ta’avah nihyah te‘erab lenafesh veto‘abat kesilim sur meira‘. halokh holekh ’et khakhamim vakhakham yekhkam vero‘eh khesilim yeiroa‘. khata’im teradef ra‘ah ve’et tsadiqim yeshalem tob. tob yankhil benei banim vetsafun latsadiq khel khotei. rab ’okhel nir rashim veyesh nispeh belo mishpat. khosekh beto sonei beno ve’ohabo shikharo musar. tsadiq ’okhel lesoba‘ nafsho ubeten resha‘im tekhsar. khakhmot nashim banetah beitah ve’ivelet beyadeha tehersenu. holekh beyashero yerei yhvh uneloz derakhav bozeihu. befi ’evil khoter ga’avah vesiftei khakhamim tishmurem. be’en ’alafim ’eibus bar verab tebu’ot bekhoakh shor. ‘ed ’emunim lo yekhazeb veyafiakh kezabim ‘ed shaqer. biqesh lets khakhmah va’ayin veda‘at lenabon naqal. lekh mineged le’ish kesil ubal yada‘ta siftei da‘at. khakhemat ‘arum habin darko ve’ivelet kesilim mirmah. ’evilim yalits ’asham uben yesharim ratson. leb yodeia‘ marat nafsho ubesimkhato lo yit‘arab zar. bet resha‘im yishamed ve’ohel yesharim yafriakh. yesh derekh yashar lifnei ’ish ve’akharitah darkhei mavet. gam biskhoq yikh’ab leb ve’akharitah simkhah tugah. miderakhav yisba‘ sug leb umei‘alav ’ish tob. peti ya’amin lekhal dabar ve‘arum yabin la’ashuro. khakham yarei vesar meira‘ ukhesil mit‘aber uboteiakh. qetsar ’apayim ya‘aseh ’ivelet ve’ish mezimot yisanei. nakhalu fetayim ’ivelet va‘arumim yakhtiru da‘at. shakhu ra‘im lifnei tobim uresha‘im ‘al sha‘arei tsadiq. gam lerei‘eihu yisanei rash ve’ohabei ‘ashir rabim. baz lerei‘eihu khotei umekhonen ‘anayim ‘anavim ’ashrav. halo yit‘u khoreshei ra‘ vekhesed ve’emet khoreshei tob. bekhal ‘etseb yihyeh motar udebars fatayim ’akh lemakhsor. ‘ateret khakhamim ‘asheram ’ivelet kesilim ’ivelet. matsil nefashot ‘ed ’emet veyafiakh kezabim mirmah. beyir’at yhvh mibtakh ‘oz ulebanav yihyeh makhseh. yir’at yhvh meqor khayim lasur mimoqeshei mavet. berab ‘am hadrat melekh ube’efes le’om mekhitat razon. ’erekh ’apayim rab tebunah uqetsar ruakh meirim ’ivelet. khayei besarim leb marpei ureqab ‘atsamot qin’ah. ‘osheq dal kheiref ‘oseihu umekhabedo khonen ’ebyon. bera‘ato yidakheh rasha‘ vekhoseh bemoto tsadiq. beleb nabon tanuakh khakhmah ubeqereb kesilim tivadeia‘. tsedaqah teromem go vekhesed le’umim khatat. retson melekh le‘ebed maskil ve‘ebrato tihyeh meibish. ma‘aneh rakh yashib kheimah udebar ‘etseb ya‘aleh ’af. leshon khakhamim teitib da‘at ufi khesilim yabia‘ ’ivelet. bekhal maqom ‘einei yhvh tsofot ra‘im vtobim marpei lashon ‘ets khayim veselef bah sheber beruakh. ’evil yin’ats musar ’abiv veshomer tokhakhat ya‘rim. bet tsadiq khosen rab ubitbu’at rasha‘ ne‘karet. siftei khakhamim yezaru da‘at veleb kesilim lo khen. zebakh resha‘im to‘abat yhvh utefilat yesharim retsono. to‘abat yhvh derekh rasha‘ umeradef tsedaqah ye’ehab. musar ra‘ le‘ozeb ’orakh sonei tokhakhat yamut. she’ol va’abadon neged yhvh ’af ki libot benei ’adam. lo ye’ehab lets hokheiakh lo ’el khakhamim lo yeilekh. leb meiakh yeitib panim ube‘atsebat leb ruakh nekhei’ah. leb nabon yebaqesh da‘at ufenei ufi khesilim yir‘eh ’ivelet. kal yemei ‘ani ra‘im vetob leb mishteh tamid. tob me‘at beyir’at yhvh mei’otsar rab umehumah bo. tob ’arukhat yaraq ve’ahabah sham mishor ’abus vesin’ah bo. ’ish kheimah yegareh madon ve’erekh ’apayim yashqit rib. derekh ‘atsel kimsukhat khadeq ve’orakh yesharim selulah. ben khakham yesamakh ’ab ukhesil ’adam bozeh ’imo. ’ivelet simkhah lakhasar leb ve’ish tebunah yeyasher lakhet. hafer makhashabot be’en sod uberob yo‘atsim taqum. simkhah la’ish bema‘aneh fiv vedabar be‘ito mah tob. ’orakh khayim lema‘lah lemaskil lema‘an sur mishe’ol matah. bet gei’im yisakh yhvh veyatseb gebul ’almanah. to‘abat yhvh makhshebot ra‘ utehorim ’imrei no‘am. ‘okher beito botseia‘ batsa‘ vesonei matanot yikhyeh. leb tsadiq yehgeh la‘anot ufi resha‘im yabia‘ ra‘ot. rakhoq yhvh meiresha‘im utefilat tsadiqim yishma‘. me’or ‘einayim yesamakh leb shemu‘ah tobah tedashen ‘atsem. ’ozen shoma‘at tokhakhat khayim beqereb khakhamim talin. poreia‘ musar mo’es nafsho veshomeia‘ tokhakhat qoneh leb. yir’at yhvh musar khakhmah velifnei khabod ‘anavah. le’adam ma‘arkhei leb yhvh ma‘aneh lashon. kal darkhei ’ish zakh be‘einav vetokhen rukhot yhvh. gol ’el yhvh ma‘asekha veyikonu makhshebotekha. kol pa‘al yhvh lama‘aneihu vegam rasha‘ leyom ra‘ah. to‘abat yhvh kal gebah leb yad leyad lo yinaqeh. bekhesed ve’emet yekhupar ‘avon ubeyir’at yhvh sur meira‘. birtsot yhvh darkhei ’ish gam ’oybav yashlim ’ito. tob me‘at bitsdaqah meirob tebu’ot belo mishpat. leb ’adam yekhasheb darko yhvh yakhin tsa‘ado. qesem ‘al siftei melekh bemishpat lo yim‘al piv. peles umozenei mishpat yhvh ma‘aseihu kal ’abnei khis. to‘abat melakhim ‘asot resha‘ ki bitsdaqah yikon kisei. retson melakhim siftei tsedeq vedober yesharim ye’ehab. khamat melekh mal’akhei mavet ve’ish khakham yekhaperenah. be’or penei melekh khayim uretsono ke‘ab malqosh. qenoh khakhmah mah tob meikharuts uqenot binah nibkhar mikasef. mesilat yesharim sur meira‘ shomer nafsho notser darko. lifnei sheber ga’on velifnei khishalon gobah ruakh. tob shefal ruakh ’et ‘aniyim ‘anavim meikhaleq lal ’et gei’im. maskil ‘al dabar yimtsa tob uboteiakh yhvh ’ashrav. lakhakham leb yiqarei nabon umeteq fatayim yosif leqakh. meqor khayim seikhel be‘alav umusar ’evilim ’ivelet. leb khakham yaskil pihu ve‘als fatav yosif leqakh. tsuf debash ’imrei no‘am matoq lanefesh umarpei la‘atsem. yesh derekh yashar lifnei ’ish ve’akharitah darkhei mavet. nefesh ‘amel ‘amelah lo ki ’akhaf ‘alav pihu. ’ish beliya‘al koreh ra‘ah ve‘al sefatav fato ke’esh tsarabet. ’ish tahpukhot yeshalakh madon venirgan mafrid ’aluf. ’ish khamas yefateh rei‘eihu veholikho bederekh lo tob. ‘otseh ‘einav lakhshob tahpukhot qorets fatav kilah ra‘ah. ‘ateret tif’eret seibah bederekh tsedaqah timatsei. tob ’erekh ’apayim migibor umoshel berukho milokhed ‘ir. bakheq yutal ’et hagoral yhvh kal mishpato. tob pat khareibah veshalvah bah mibayit malei zibkhei rib. ‘ebed maskil yimshol beben meibish ubetokh ’akhim yakhaloq nakhalah. matsref lakesef vekhur lazahab ubokhen libot yhvh. meira‘ maqshib ‘al sefat ’aven sheqer meizin ‘al leshon havot. lo‘eg larash kheiref ‘oseihu sameiakh le’ed lo yinaqeh. ‘ateret zeqeinim benei banim vetif’eret banim ’abotam. lo navah lenabal sefat yeter ’af ki lenadib sefat shaqer. ’eben khen hashokhad be‘einei be‘alav ’el kal ’asher yifneh yaskil. mekhaseh pesha‘ mebaqesh ’ahabah veshoneh bedabar mafrid ’aluf. teikhat ge‘arah bemeibin meihakot kesil mei’ah. ’akh meri yebaqesh ra‘ umal’akh ’akhzari yeshulakh bo. pagosh dob shakul be’ish ve’al kesil be’ivalto. meishib ra‘ah takhat tobah lo tamish tamush ra‘ah mibeito. poter mayim reishit madon velifnei hitgala‘ harib netosh. matsdiq rasha‘ umarshia‘ tsadiq to‘abat yhvh gam sheneihem. lamah zeh mekhir beyad kesil liqnot khakhmah veleb ’ayin. bekhal ‘et ’oheb hareia‘ ve’akh letsarah yivaled. ’adam khasar leb toqeia‘ kaf ‘oreb ‘arubah lifnei rei‘eihu. ’oheb pesha‘ ’oheb matsah magbiah pitkho mebaqesh shaber. ‘iqesh leb lo yimtsa tob venehpakh bilshono yipol bera‘ah. yoled kesil letugah lo velo yismakh ’abi nabal. leb meiakh yeitib geihah veruakh nekhei’ah teyabesh garem. shokhad meikheq rasha‘ yiqakh lehatot ’arekhot mishpat. ’et penei meibin khakhmah ve‘einei khesil biqtseh ’arets. ka‘as le’abiv ben kesil umemer leyoladto. gam ‘anosh latsadiq lo tob lehakot nedibim ‘al yosher. khosekh ’amarav yodeia‘ da‘at veqar yeqar ’ish tebunah. gam ’evil makharish khakham yeikhasheb ’otem sefatav nabon. leta’avah yebaqesh nifrad bekhal tushiyah yitgala‘. lo yakhpots kesil bitbunah ki ’im behitgalot libo. bebo rasha‘ ba gam buz ve‘im qalon kherpah. mayim ‘amuqim dibrei fi ’ish nakhal nobeia‘ meqor khakhmah se’et penei rasha‘ lo tob lehatot tsadiq bamishpat. siftei khesil yabo’u berib ufiv lemahalumot yiqra. pi khesil mekhitah lo usefatav moqesh nafsho. dibrei nirgan kemitlahamim vehem yaredu khadrei baten. gam mitrapeh bimlakhto ’akh hu leba‘al mashkhit. migdal ‘oz shem yhvh bo yaruts tsadiq venisgab. hon ‘ashir qiryat ‘uzo ukhekhomah nisgabah bemaskito. lifneishe ber yigbah leb ’ish velifnei khabod ‘anavah. meishib dabar beterem yishma‘ ’ivelet hi lo ukhelimah. ruakh ’ish yekhalkel makhaleihu veruakh nekhei’ah mi yisa’enah. leb nabon yiqneh da‘at ve’ozen khakhamim tebaqesh da‘at. matan ’adam yarkhib lo velifnei gedolim yankhenu. tsadiq harishon beribo yabo uba vakhaqaro. midyanim yashbit hagoral uben ‘atsumim yafrid. ’akh nifsha‘ miqiryat ‘oz umedonim umidyanim kibriakh ’armon. miperi fi ’ish tisba‘ bitno tebu’at sefatav yisba‘. mavet vekhayim beyad lashon ve’ohabeha yokhal piryah. matsa ’ishah matsa tob vayafeq ratson yhvh. takhanunim yedaber rash ve‘ashir ya‘aneh ‘azot. ’ish rei‘im lehitro‘eia‘ veyesh ’oheb dabeq mei’akh. tob rash holekh betumo mei‘iqesh fatav vehu khesil. gam belo da‘at nefesh lo tob ve’ats beraglayim khotei. ’ivelet ’adam tesalef darko ve‘al yhvh yiz‘af libo. hon yosif rei‘im rabim vedal meirei‘hu yipared. ‘ed qarim lo yinaqeh veyafiakh kezabim lo yimalet. rabim yekhalu fenei nadib vekhal hareia‘ le’ish matan. kal ’akhei rash senei’uhu ’af ki merei‘eihu rakhaqu mimenu meradef ’amarim lo lo hemah. qoneh leb ’oheb nafsho shomer tebunah limtso tob. ‘ed qarim lo yinaqeh veyafiakh kezabim yobed. lo naveh likhsil ta‘anug ’af ki le‘ebed meshol besarim. seikhel ’adam he’erikh ’apo vetif’arto ‘abor ‘al pasha‘. naham kakefir za‘af melekh ukhetal ‘al ‘eiseb retsono. havot le’abiv ben kesil vedelef tored midyenei ’ishah. bayit vahon nakhalat ’abot yhvh ’ishah maskalet. ‘atslah tapil tardeimah venefesh remiyah tir‘ab. shomer mitsvah shomer nafsho bozeh derakhav yumat yamut. malveh yhvh khonen dal ugemulo yeshalem lo. yaser binkha ki yesh tiqvah ve’el hamito ’al tisa nafshekha. goral gedal kheimah nosei ‘onesh ki ’im tatsil ve‘od tosif. shema‘ ‘eitsah veqabel musar lema‘an tekhkam be’akharitekha. rabot makhashabot beleb ’ish va‘atsat yhvh hi taqum. ta’avat ’adam khasdo vetob rash mei’ish kazab. yir’at yhvh lekhayim vesabeia‘ yalin bal yipaqed ra‘. taman ‘atsel yado batsalakhat gam ’el pihu lo yeshibenah. lets takeh ufeti ya‘rim vehokhiakh lenabon yabin da‘at. meshaded ’ab yabriakh ’em ben meibish umakhpir. khadal beni lishmoa‘ musar lishgot mei’imrei da‘at. ‘ed beliya‘al yalits mishpat ufi resha‘im yebala‘ ’aven. nakhonu laleitsim shefatim umahalumot legev kesilim. lets hayayn homeh sheikhar vekhal shogeh bo lo yekhkam. naham kakefir ’eimat melekh mit‘abero khotei nafsho. kabod la’ish shebet meirib vekhal ’evil yitgala‘. meikhoref ‘atsel lo yakharosh yish’al vesha’al baqatsir va’ayin. mayim ‘amuqim ‘eitsah beleb ’ish ve’ish tebunah yidlenah. rab ’adam yiqra ’ish khasdo ve’ish ’emunim mi yimtsa. mithalekh betumo tsadiq ’ashrei banav ’akharav. melekh yosheb ‘al kisei din mezareh be‘einav kal ra‘. mi yomar zikiti libi taharti meikhatati. ’eben va’eben ’eifah ve’eifah to‘abat yhvh gam sheneihem. gam bema‘alalav yitnaker na‘ar ’im zakh ve’im yashar pa‘olo. ’ozen ma‘at ve‘ayin ro’ah yhvh ‘asah gam sheneihem. ’al te’ehab nah pen tivaresh peqakh ‘einekha seba‘ lakhem. ra‘ ra‘ yomar haqoneh ve’ozel lo ’az yithalal. yesh zahab verab peninim ukheli yeqar siftei da‘at. leqakh bigdo ki ‘arab zar ube‘ad nakherim nakheriyah khableihu. ‘areb la’ish lekhem shaqer ve’akhar yimalei fihu khatsats. makhashabot be‘eitsah tikon ubetakhbulot ‘aseh milkhamah. goleh sod holekh rakhil ulefoteh fatav lo tit‘arab. meqalel ’abiv ve’imo yid‘akh neiro be’ishon be’eshun khoshekh. nakhalah mebukhelet mebohelet barishonah ve’akharitah lo teborakh. ’al tomar ’ashalemah ra‘ qaveh yhvh veyosha‘ lakh. to‘abat yhvh ’eben va’aben umozenei mirmah lo tob. yhvh mits‘adei gaber ve’adam mah yabin darko. moqesh ’adam yala‘ qodesh ve’akhar nedarim lebaqer. mezareh resha‘im melekh khakham vayasheb ‘aleihem ’ofan. ner yhvh nishmat ’adam khofes kal khadrei baten. khesed ve’emet yitseru melekh vesa‘ad bakhesed kis’o. tif’eret bakhurim kokham vahadar zeqeinim seibah. khaburot petsa‘ tamriq tamruq bera‘ umakot khadrei baten. palgei mayim leb melekh beyad yhvh ‘al kal ’asher yakhpots yatenu. kal derekh ’ish yashar be‘einav vetokhen libot yhvh. ‘asoh tsedaqah umishpat nibkhar yhvh mizabakh. rum ‘einayim urekhab leb nir resha‘im khatat. makhshebot kharuts ’akh lemotar vekhal ’ats ’akh lemakhsor. po‘al ’otsarot bilshon shaqer hebel nidaf mebaqshei mavet. shod resha‘im yegorem ki mei’anu la‘asot mishpat. hafakhpakh derekh ’ish vazar vezakh yashar pa‘olo. tob lashebet ‘al pinat gag mei’eishet midyanim ubet khaber. nefesh rasha‘ ’ivetah ra‘ lo yukhan be‘einav rei‘eihu. ba‘nash lets yekhkam peti ubehaskil lekhakham yiqakh da‘at. maskil tsadiq lebet rasha‘ mesalef resha‘im lara‘. ’otem ’azeno miza‘aqat dal gam hu yiqra velo yei‘aneh. matan baseiter yikhpeh ’af veshokhad bakheq kheimah ‘azah. simkhah latsadiq ‘asot mishpat umekhitah lefo‘alei ’aven. ’adam to‘eh miderekh haskel biqhal refa’im yanuakh. ’ish makhsor ’oheb simkhah ’oheb yayin vashemen lo ya‘ashir. kofer latsadiq rasha‘ vetakhat yesharim boged. tob shebet be’erets midbar mei’eishet medonim midyanim vakha‘as. ’otsar nekhmad vashemen binveh khakham ukhesil ’adam yebale‘enu. rodef tsedaqah vakhased yimtsa khayim tsedaqah vekhabod. ‘ir giborim ‘alah khakham vayored ‘oz mibtekhah. shomer piv uleshono shomer mitsarot nafsho. zed yahir lets shemo ‘oseh be‘ebrat zadon. ta’avat ‘atsel temitenu ki mei’anu yadav la‘asot. kal hayom hit’avah ta’avah vetsadiq yiten velo yakhsokh. zebakh resha‘im to‘eibah ’af ki bezimah yebi’enu. ‘ed kezabim yobed ve’ish vmeia‘ lanetsakh yedaber. hei‘ez ’ish rasha‘ befanav veyashar hu yakhin yabin derakhav darko. ’en khakhmah ve’en tebunah ve’en ‘eitsah leneged yhvh. sus mukhan leyom milkhamah yhvh hateshu‘ah. nibkhar m mei‘osher rab mikesef umizahab khen tob. ‘ashir varash nifgashu ‘oseh khulam yhvh. ‘arum ra’ah ra‘ah veyisater venistar ufetayim ‘aberu vene‘enashu. ‘eiqeb ‘anavah yir’at yhvh ‘osher vekhabod vekhayim. tsinim pakhim bederekh ‘iqesh shomer nafsho yirkhaq meihem. khanokh lana‘ar ‘al pi darko gam ki yazqin lo yasur mimenah. ‘ashir berashim yimshol ve‘ebed loeh le’ish malveh. zoreia‘ ‘avlah yiqtsor yiqtsar ’aven vesheibet ‘ebrato yikhleh. tob ‘ayin hu yeborakh ki natan milakhmo ladal. garesh lets veyeitsei madon veyishbot din veqalon. ’oheb tehor tehar leb khen fatav rei‘eihu melekh. ‘einei yhvh natseru da‘at vaysalef dibrei boged. ’amar ‘atsel ’ari bakhuts betokh rekhobot ’eiratseiakh. shukhah ‘amuqah pi zarot ze‘um yhvh yipol yipal sham. ’ivelet qeshurah beleb na‘ar sheibet musar yarkhiqenah mimenu. ‘osheq dal leharbot lo noten le‘ashir ’akh lemakhsor. hat ’azenekha ushema‘ dibrei khakhamim velibekha tashit leda‘ti. ki na‘im ki tishmerem bebitnekha yikonu yakhdav ‘al sefatekha. lihyot yhvh mibtakhekha hoda‘tikha hayom ’af ’atah. halo khatabti lekha shilshom shalishim bemo‘eitsot vada‘at. lehodi‘akha qoshet ’imrei ’emet lehashib ’amarim ’emet lesholekhekha. ’al tigzal dal ki dal hu ve’al tedakei ‘ani basha‘ar. ki yhvh yarib ribam veqaba‘ ’et qobe‘eihem nafesh. ’al titra‘ ’et ba‘al ’af ve’et ’ish kheimot lo tabo. pen te’elaf ’arekhato ’orekhotav velaqakhta moqesh lenafshekha. ’al tehi betoqe‘ei khaf ba‘orebim masha’ot. ’im ’en lekha leshalem lamah yiqakh mishkabekha mitakhtekha. ’al taseg gebul ‘olam ’asher ‘asu ’abotekha. khazita ’ish mahir bimlakhto lifnei melakhim yityatsab bal yityatseb lifnei khashukim. ki teisheb lilkhom ’et moshel bin tabin ’et ’asher lefanekha. vesamta sakin belo‘ekha ’im ba‘al nefesh ’atah. ’al tit’av lemat‘amotav vehu lekhem kezabim. ’al tiga‘ leha‘ashir mibinatekha khadal. hata‘uf hata‘if ‘einekha bo ve’einenu ki ‘asoh ya‘aseh lo khenafayim kenesher ve‘ayef ya‘uf hashamayim. ’al tilkham ’et lekhem ra‘ ‘ayin ve’al tit’av tit’av lemat‘amotav. ki kemo sha‘ar benafsho ken hu ’ekhol usheteh yomar lakh velibo bal ‘imakh. pitekha ’akhalta teqi’enah veshikhata debarekha hane‘imim. be’azenei khesil ’al tedaber ki yabuz leseikhel milekha. ’al taseg gebul ‘olam ubisdei yetomim ’al tabo. ki go’alam khazaq hu yarib ’et ribam ’itakh. habi’ah lamusar libekha ve’azenekha le’imrei da‘at. ’al timna‘ mina‘ar musar ki takenu basheibet lo yamut. ’atah basheibet takenu venafsho mishe’ol tatsil. beni ’im khakham libekha yismakh libi gam ’ani. veta‘lozenah khilyotai bedaber fatekha meisharim. ’al yeqanei libekha bakhata’im ki ’im beyir’at yhvh kal hayom. ki ’im yesh ’akharit vetiqvatekha lo tikaret. shema‘ ’atah beni vakhakham ve’asher baderekh libekha. ’al tehi besobe’ei yayin bezolalei basar lamo. ki sobei vezolel yivaresh uqera‘im talbish numah. shema‘ le’abikha zeh yeladekha ve’al tabuz ki zaqenah ’imekha. ’emet qeneh ve’al timkor khakhmah umusar ubinah. gol gil yagol yagil ’abi tsadiq yoled veyoled khakham veyismakh yismakh bo. yismakh ’abikha ve’imekha vetagel yoladtekha. tenah beni libekha li ve‘einekha derakhai tirtsenah titsorenah ki shukhah ‘amuqah zonah ube’er tsarah nakheriyah. ’af hi kekhetef te’erob ubogdim be’adam tosif. lemi ’o lemi ’abo lemi midonim midyanim lemi siakh lemi petsa‘im khinam lemi khakhlilut ‘einayim. lam’akharim ‘al hayayin laba’im lakhqor mimsakh. ’al teire yayin ki yit’adam ki yiten bakis bakos ‘eino yithalekh bemeisharim. ’akharito kenakhash yishakh ukhetsif‘oni yafrish. ‘einekha yir’u zarot velibekha yedaber tahpukhot. vehayita keshokheb beleb yam ukheshokheb berosh khibel. hikuni bal khaliti halamuni bal yada‘eti matai ’aqits ’osif ’abaqshenu ‘od. ’al teqanei be’anshei ra‘ah ve’al tit’av tit’av lihyot ’itam. ki shod yehgeh libam ve‘amal sifteihem tedabeirenah. bekhakhemah yibaneh bayit ubitbunah yitkonan. ubeda‘at khadarim yimale’u kal hon yaqar vena‘im. geber khakham ba‘oz ve’ish da‘at me’amets koakh. ki betakhbulot ta‘aseh lekha milkhamah uteshu‘ah berob yo‘ets. ramot le’evil khakhemot basha‘ar lo yiftakh pihu. mekhasheb lehareia‘ lo ba‘al mezimot yiqra’u. zimat ’ivelet khatat veto‘abat le’adam lets. hitrapita beyom tsarah tsar kokhekhah. hatsel lequkhim lamavet umatim lahereg ’im takhsokh. ki tomar hen lo yada‘nu zeh halo tokhen libot hu yabin venotser nafshekha hu yeida‘ veheishib le’adam kefa‘olo. ’ekhal beni debash ki tob venofet matoq ‘al khikekha. ken de‘eh khakhmah lenafshekha ’im matsata veyesh ’akharit vetiqvatekha lo tikaret. ’al te’erob rasha‘ linveh tsadiq ’al teshaded ribtso. ki sheba‘ yipol tsadiq vaqam uresha‘im yikashelu bera‘ah. binfol ’oybekha ’oyibkha ’al tismakh ubikashelo ’al yagel libekha. pen yir’eh yhvh vera‘ be‘einav veheishib mei‘alav ’apo. ’al titkhar bamerei‘im ’al teqanei baresha‘im. ki lo tihyeh ’akharit lara‘ ner resha‘im yid‘akh. yera ’et yhvh beni vamelekh ‘imosho vnim ’al tit‘arab. ki fit’om yaqum ’eidam ufid neihem mi yodeia‘. gam ’eleh lakhakhamim haker panim bemishpat bal tob. ’omer lerasha‘ tsadiq ’atah yiqebuhu ‘amim yiz‘amuhu le’umim. velamokhikhim yin‘am va‘aleihem tabo birkat tob. sefatayim yishaq meishib debarim nekhokhim. hakhen bakhuts melakhtekha ve‘atedah basadeh lakh ’akhar ubanita beitekha. ’al tehi ‘ed khinam berei‘ekha vahafitita bisfatekha. ’al tomar ka’asher ‘asah li ken ’e‘eseh lo ’ashib la’ish kefa‘olo. ‘al sedeh ’ish ‘atsel ‘abarti ve‘al kerem ’adam khasar leb. vehineh ‘alah khulo qimesonim kasu fanav kharulim vegeder ’abanav neherasah. va’ekhezeh ’anokhi ’ashit libi ra’iti laqakhti musar. me‘at not me‘at tenumot me‘at khibuq yadayim lishkab. uba mithalekh reishekha umakhsorekha ke’ish magen. gam ’eleh mishlei shelomoh ’asher he‘tiqu ’anshei khizqiyah melekh yehudah. kebod ’elohim haster dabar ukhebod melakhim khaqor dabar. shamayim larum va’arets la‘omeq veleb melakhim ’en kheiqer. hago sigim mikasef vayeitsei latsoref keli. hago rasha‘ lifnei melekh veyikon batsedeq kis’o. ’al tithadar lifnei melekh ubimqom gedolim ’al ta‘amod. ki tob ’amar lekha ‘aleh henah meihashpilekha lifnei nadib ’asher ra’u ‘einekha. ’al teitsei larib maher pen mah ta‘aseh be’akharitah behakhlim ’otekha rei‘ekha. ribekha rib ’et rei‘ekha vesod ’akher ’al tegal. pen yekhasedkha shomeia‘ vedibatekha lo tashub. tapukhei zahab bemaskiyot kasef dabar dabur ‘al ’afenav. nezem zahab vakhali khatem mokhiakh khakham ‘al ’ozen shoma‘at. ketsinat sheleg beyom qatsir tsir ne’eman lesholekhav venefesh ’adonav yashib. nesi’im veruakh vegeshem ’ayin ’ish mithalel bematat shaqer. be’orekh ’apayim yefuteh qatsin velashon rakah tishbar garem. debash matsata ’ekhol dayeka pen tisba‘enu vahaqeito. hoqar raglekha mibet rei‘ekha pen yisba‘akha usenei’ekha. meifits vekhereb vekhets shanun ’ish ‘oneh berei‘eihu ‘ed shaqer. shen ro‘ah veregel mu‘adet mibtakh boged beyom tsarah. ma‘adeh beged beyom qarah khomets ‘al nater veshar bashirim ‘al leb ra‘. ’im ra‘eb na’akha ha’akhileihu lakhem ve’im tsamei hashqeihu mayim. ki gekhalim ’atah khoteh ‘al rosho yhvh yeshalem lakh. ruakh tsafon tekholel gashem ufanim niz‘amim leshon sater. tob shebet ‘al pinat gag mei’eishet midonim midyanim ubet khaber. mayim qarim ‘al nefesh ‘ayeifah ushemu‘ah tobah mei’erets merkhaq. ma‘yan nirpas umaqor mashekhat tsadiq mat lifnei rasha‘. ’akhol debash harbot lo tob vekheiqer kebodam kabod. ‘ir perutsah ’en khomah ’ish ’asher ’en ma‘tsar lerukho. kasheleg baqayits vekhamatar baqatsir ken lo naveh likhsil kabod. katsipor lanud kaderor la‘uf ken qilat khinam lo lo tabo. shot lasus meteg lakhamor vesheibet legev kesilim. ’al ta‘an kesil ke’ivalto pen tishveh lo gam ’atah. ‘aneh khesil ke’ivalto pen yihyeh khakham be‘einav. meqatseh raglayim khamas shoteh sholeiakh debarim beyad kesil. dalyu qayim mipiseiakh umashal befi khesilim. kitsror ’eben bemargeimah ken noten likhsil kabod. khoakh ‘alah beyad shikor umashal befi khesilim. rab mekholel kol vesokher kesil vesokher ‘oberim. kekheleb shab ‘al qei’o kesil shoneh be’ivalto. ra’ita ’ish khakham be‘einav tiqvah likhsil mimenu. ’amar ‘atsel shakhal badarekh ’ari ben harekhobot. hadelet tisob ‘al tsirah ve‘atsel ‘al mitato. taman ‘atsel yado batsalakhat nil’ah lahashibah ’el piv. khakham ‘atsel be‘einav mishib‘ah meshibei ta‘am. makhaziq be’azenei khaleb ‘ober mit‘aber ‘al rib lo lo. kemitlahleiah hayoreh ziqim khitsim vamavet. ken ’ish rimah ’et rei‘eihu ve’amar halo mesakheq ’ani. be’efes ‘eitsim tikhbeh ’esh ube’en nirgan yishtoq madon. pekham legekhalim ve‘eitsim le’esh ve’ish midonim midyanim lekharkhar rib. dibrei nirgan kemitlahamim vehem yaredu khadrei baten. kesef sigim metsupeh ‘al khares sefatayim doleqim veleb ra‘. bisfato bisfatav yinakher sonei ubeqirbo yashit mirmah. ki yekhanen qolo ’al ta’amen bo ki sheba‘ to‘eibot belibo. tikaseh ne’ah bemasha’on tigaleh ra‘ato beqahal. korehosha khat bah yipol vegolel ’eben ’eilav tashub. leshonoshe qer yisna dakav ufeh khalaq ya‘aseh midkheh. ’al tithalel beyom makhar ki lo teida‘ mah yeiled yom. yehalelkha zar velo fikha nakheri ve’al sefatekha. kobed ’eben veneitel hakhol vekha‘as ’evil kabed misheneihem. ’akhzeriyut kheimah veshetef ’af umi ya‘amod lifnei qin’ah. tobah tokhakhat megulah mei’ahabah mesutaret. ne’emanim pits‘ei ’oheb vena‘tarot neshiqot sonei. nefesh bei‘ah tabus nofet venefesh re‘eibah kal mar matoq. ketsipor nodedet min qinah ken ’ish noded mimeqomo. shemen uqetoret yesamakh leb umeteq rei‘eihu mei‘atsat nafesh. rei‘akha verei‘eh vereia‘ ’abikha ’al ta‘azob ubet ’akhikha ’al tabo beyom ’eidekha tob shakhen qarob mei’akh rakhoq. khakham beni vesamakh libi ve’ashibah khorefi dabar. ‘arum ra’ah ra‘ah nistar petayim ‘aberu ne‘enashu. qakh bigdo ki ‘arab zar ube‘ad nakheriyah khableihu. mebarekh rei‘eihu beqol gadol baboqer hashkem qelalah teikhasheb lo. delef tored beyom sagrir ve’eishet midonim midyanim nishtavah. tsofeneha tsafan ruakh veshemen yemino yiqra. barzel bebarzel yakhad ve’ish yakhad penei rei‘eihu. notser te’einah yokhal piryah veshomer ’adonav yekhubad. kamayim hapanim lapanim ken leb ha’adam la’adam. she’ol va’abadoh va’abado lo tisba‘nah ve‘einei ha’adam lo tisba‘nah. matsref lakesef vekhur lazahab ve’ish lefi mahalalo. ’im tikhtosh ’et ha’evil bamakhtesh betokh harifot ba‘eli lo tasur mei‘alav ’ivalto. yadoa‘ teida‘ penei tsonekha shit libekha la‘adarim. ki lo le‘olam khosen ve’im neizer ledor dor vador. galah khatsir venir’ah deshe vene’esfu ‘isebot harim. kebasim lilbushekha umekhir deh ‘atudim. vedei khaleb ‘izim lelakhmekha lelekhem beitekha vekhayim lena‘arotekha. nasu ve’en rodef rasha‘ vetsadiqim kikhfir yibtakh. befesha‘ ’erets rabim sareha ube’adam meibin yodeia‘ ken ya’arikh. geber rash ve‘osheq dalim matar sokhef ve’en lakhem. ‘ozebei torah yehalu rasha‘ veshomerei torah yitgaru bam. ’anshei ra‘ lo yabinu mishpat umebaqshei yhvh yabinu khol. tob rash holekh betumo mei‘iqesh derakhayim vehu ‘ashir. notser torah ben meibin vero‘eh zolim yakhlim ’abiv. marbeh hono beneshekh ubetarbit vetarbit lekhonen dalim yiqbetsenu. meisir ’azeno mishemoa‘ torah gam tefilato to‘eibah. mashgeh yesharim bederekh ra‘ bishkhuto hu yipol utemimim yinkhalu tob. khakham be‘einav ’ish ‘ashir vedal meibin yakhqerenu. ba‘alots tsadiqim rabah tif’aret ubequm resha‘im yekhupas ’adam. mekhaseh fesha‘av lo yatsliakh umodeh ve‘ozeb yerukham. ’ashrei ’adam mefakhed tamid umaqsheh libo yipol bera‘ah. ’ari nohem vedob shoqeq moshel rasha‘ ‘al ‘am dal. nagid khasar tebunot verab ma‘ashaqot sone’ei sonei betsa‘ ya’arikh yamim. ’adam ‘ashuq bedam nafesh ‘ad bor yanus ’al yitmekhu bo. holekh tamim yivasheia‘ vene‘qash derakhayim yipol be’ekhat. ‘obed ’admato yisba‘ lakhem umeradef reiqim yisba‘ rish. ’ish ’emunot rab berakhot ve’ats leha‘ashir lo yinaqeh. haker panim lo tob ve‘al pat lekhem yifsha‘ gaber. nibohal lahon ’ish ra‘ ‘ayin velo yeida‘ ki kheser yebo’enu. mokhiakh ’adam ’akharai khen yimtsa mimakhaliq lashon. gozel ’abiv ve’imo ve’omer ’en pasha‘ khaber hu le’ish mashkhit. rekhab nefesh yegareh madon uboteiakh ‘al yhvh yedushan. boteiakh belibo hu khesil veholekh bekhakhemah hu yimalet. noten larash ’en makhsor uma‘lim ‘einav rab me’eirot. bequm resha‘im yisater ’adam ube’abedam yirbu tsadiqim. ’ish tokhakhot maqsheh ‘oref peta‘ yishaber ve’en marpei. birbot tsadiqim yismakh ha‘am ubimshol rasha‘ yei’anakh ‘am. ’ish ’oheb khakhmah yesamakh ’abiv vero‘eh zonot ye’abed hon. melekh bemishpat ya‘amid ’arets ve’ish terumot yehersenah. geber makhaliq ‘al rei‘eihu reshet pores ‘al pe‘amav. befesha‘ ’ish ra‘ moqesh vetsadiq yarun vesameiakh. yodeia‘ tsadiq din dalim rasha‘ lo yabin da‘at. ’anshei latson yafikhu qiryah vakhakhamim yashibu ’af. ’ish khakham nishpat ’et ’ish ’evil veragaz vesakhaq ve’en nakhat. ’anshei damim yisne’u tam visharim yebaqshu nafsho. kal rukho yotsi khesil vekhakham be’akhor yeshabekhenah. moshel maqshib ‘al debar shaqer kal mesharetav resha‘im. rash ve’ish tekhakhim nifgashu mei’ir ‘einei sheneihem yhvh. melekh shofet be’emet dalim kis’o la‘ad yikon. sheibet vetokhakhat yiten khakhmah vena‘ar meshulakh meibish ’imo. birbot resha‘im yirbeh pasha‘ vetsadiqim bemapaltam yir’u. yaser binkha vinikhekha veyiten ma‘adanim lenafshekha. be’en khazon yipara‘ ‘am veshomer torah ’ashreihu. bidbarim lo yivaser ‘abed ki yabin ve’en ma‘aneh. khazita ’ish ’ats bidbarav tiqvah likhsil mimenu. mefaneq mino‘ar ‘abdo ve’akharito yihyeh manon. ’ish ’af yegareh madon uba‘al kheimah rab pasha‘. ga’avat ’adam tashpilenu ushefal ruakh yitmokh kabod. kholeq ‘im ganab sonei nafsho ’alah yishma‘ velo yagid. kherdat ’adam yiten moqesh uboteiakh yhvh yesugab. rabim mebaqshim penei moshel yhvh mishpat ’ish. to‘abat tsadiqim ’ish ‘avel veto‘abat rasha‘ yeshar darekh. dibrei ’agur bin yaqeh hamasa ne’um hageber le’iti’el le’iti’el ve’ukhal. ki ba‘ar ’anokhi mei’ish velo binat ’adam li. velo lamadti khakhmah veda‘at qedoshim ’eida‘. mi ‘alah shamayim vayeirad mi ’asaf ruakh bekhafenav mi tsarar mayim basimlah mi heiqim kal ’afsei ’arets mah shemo umah shem beno ki teida‘. kal ’imrat ’eloah tserufah magen hu lakhosim bo. ’al tosp ‘al debarav pen yokhiakh bekha venikhzabeta. tayim sha’alti mei’itakh ’al timna‘ mimeni beterem ’amut. shav udebar kazab harkheq mimeni resh va‘osher ’al titen li hatrifeini lekhem khuqi. pen ’esba‘ vekhikhashti ve’amarti mi yhvh ufen ’ivaresh veganabti vetafasti shem ’elohai. ’al talshen ‘ebed ’el ’adono ’adonav pen yeqalelkha ve’ashameta. dor ’abiv yeqalel ve’et ’imo lo yebarekh. dor tahor be‘einav umitso’ato lo rukhats. dor mah ramu ‘einav ve‘af‘apav yinasei’u. dor kharabot shinav uma’akhalot metale‘otav le’ekhol ‘aniyim mei’erets ve’ebyonim mei’adam. la‘aluqah shetei banot hab hab shalosh henah lo tisba‘nah ’arba‘ lo ’ameru hon. she’ol ve‘otser rakham ’erets lo sabe‘ah mayim ve’esh lo ’amerah hon. ‘ayin til‘ag le’ab vetabuz liqahat ’em yiqeruha ‘orebei nakhal veyokheluha benei nasher. sheloshah hemah nifle’u mimeni ve’arba‘ ve’arba‘ah lo yeda‘tim. derekh hanesher bashamayim derekh nakhash ‘alei tsur derekh ’oniyah beleb yam vederekh geber be‘almah. ken derekh ’ishah mena’afet ’akhelah umakhatah fiha ve’amerah lo fa‘alti ’aven. takhat losh ragezah ’erets vetakhat ’arba‘ lo tukhal se’et. takhat ‘ebed ki yimlokh venabal ki yisba‘ lakhem. takhat nu’ah ki tiba‘el veshifkhah ki tirash gebirtah. ’arba‘ah hem qetanei ’arets vehemah khakhamim mekhukamim. hanemalim ‘am lo ‘az vayakhinu baqayits lakhmam. fanim ‘am lo ‘atsum vayasimu basela‘ beitam. melekh ’en la’arbeh vayeitsei khotsets kulo. mamit beyadayim tetapes vehi beheikhelei melekh. sheloshah hemah meitibei tsa‘ad ve’arba‘ah meitibei lakhet. layish gibor babeheimah velo yashub mipenei khol. zarzir matenayim ’o tayish umelekh ’alqum ‘imo. ’im nabalta behitnasei ve’im zamota yad lefeh. ki mits khalab yotsi khem’ah umits ’af yotsi dam umits ’apayim yotsi rib. dibrei lemu’el melekh masa ’asher yiseratu ’imo. mah beri umah bar bitni umeh bar nedarai. ’al titen lanashim kheilekha uderakhekha lamkhot melakhin. ’al lamlakhim lemo’el ’al lamlakhim sheto yayin uleroznim ’o ’ei sheikhar. pen yishteh veyishkakh mekhuqaq vishaneh din kal benei ‘oni. tenu sheikhar le’obed veyayin lemarei nafesh. yishteh veyishkakh risho va‘amalo lo yizkar ‘od. petakh pikha le’ilem ’el din kal benei khalof. petakh pikha shefat tsedeq vedin ‘ani ve’ebyon. ’eishet khayil mi yimtsa verakhoq mipeninim mikhrah. batakh bah leb ba‘lah veshalal lo yekhsar. gemalathu tob velo ra‘ kol yemei khayeh dareshah tsemer ufishtim vata‘as bekheifets kapeha. hayetah ka’oniyot sokher mimerkhaq tabi lakhmah. vataqam be‘od laylah vatiten teref lebeitah vekhoq lena‘aroteha. zamemah deh vatiqakheihu miperi khapeha neta‘ nate‘ah karem. khagerah be‘oz mateneha vate’amets zero‘oteha. ta‘amah ki tob sakhrah lo yikhbeh balayil balaylah neirah. yadeha shilekhah bakishor vekhapeha tamekhu falekh. kapah paresah le‘ani veyadeha shilekhah la’ebyon. lo tira lebeitah mishaleg ki khal beitah labush shanim. marbadim ‘asetah lah shesh ve’argaman lebushah. noda‘ bashe‘arim ba‘lah beshibto ‘im ziqnei ’arets. sadin ‘asetah vatimkor vakhagor natenah lakena‘ani. ‘oz vehadar lebushah vatiskhaq leyom ’akharon. piha patekhah bekhakhemah vetorat khesed ‘al leshonah. tsofiyah halikhot beitah velekhem ‘atslut lo tokhel. qamu baneha vai’asheruha ba‘lah vayhalah. rabot banot ‘asu khayil ve’at ‘alit ‘al kulanah. sheqer hakhen vehebel hayofi ’ishah yir’at yhvh hi tithalal. tenu lah miperi yadeha vihaluha bashe‘arim ma‘aseha. ’ish hayah be’erets ‘uts ’iyob shemo vehayah ha’ish hahu tam veyashar virei ’elohim vesar meira‘. vayivaledu lo shib‘ah banim veshalosh banot. vayhi miqneihu shib‘at ’alfei tson usheloshet ’alfei gemalim vakhamesh mei’ot tsemed baqar vakhamesh mei’ot ’atonot va‘abudah rabah me’od vayhi ha’ish hahu gadol mikal benei qedem. vehalekhu banav ve‘asu mishteh bet ’ish yomo veshalekhu veqare’u lishloshet ’akhyoteihem ’akhyoteihem le’ekhol velishtot ‘imahem. vayhi ki hiqifu yemei hamishteh vayishlakh ’iyob vayqadeshem vehishkim baboqer vehe‘elah ‘olot mispar kulam ki ’amar ’iyob ’ulai khate’u banai ubeirakhu ’elohim bilbabam kakhah ya‘aseh ’iyob kal hayamim. vayhi hayom vayabo’u benei ha’elohim lehityatseb ‘al yhvh vayabo gam hasatan betokham. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan mei’ayin tabo vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhvh vayomar mishut ba’arets umeihithalekh bah. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan hasamta libekha ‘al ‘abdi ’iyob ki ’en kamohu ba’arets ’ish tam veyashar yerei ’elohim vesar meira‘. vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhvh vayomar hakhinam yarei ’iyob ’elohim. halo ’at ’atah sakhta ba‘ado ube‘ad beito ube‘ad kal ’asher lo misabib ma‘aseh yadav beirakhta umiqneihu parats ba’arets. ve’ulam shelakh na yadekha vega‘ bekhal ’asher lo ’im lo ‘al panekha yebarakheka. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan hineh khal ’asher lo beyadekha raq ’eilav ’al tishlakh yadekha vayeitsei hasatan mei‘im penei yhvh. vayhi hayom ubanav ubenotav ’okhelim veshotim yayin bebet ’akhihem habekhor. umal’akh ba ’el ’iyob vayomar habaqar hayu khoreshot veha’atonot ro‘ot ‘al yedeihem. vatipol sheba vatiqakhem ve’et hane‘arim hiku lefi khareb va’imaletah raq ’ani lebadi lehagid lakh. ‘od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar ’esh ’elohim nafelah min hashamayim vatib‘ar batson ubane‘arim vatokhelem va’imaletah raq ’ani lebadi lehagid lakh. ‘od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar kasdim samu sheloshah rashim vayifshetu ‘al hagemalim vayiqakhum ve’et hane‘arim hiku lefi khareb va’imaletah raq ’ani lebadi lehagid lakh. ‘ad zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar banekha ubenotekha ’okhelim veshotim yayin bebet ’akhihem habekhor. vehineh ruakh gedolah ba’ah mei‘eiber hamidbar vayiga‘ be’arba‘ pinot habayit vayipol ‘al hane‘arim vayamutu va’imaletah raq ’ani lebadi lehagid lakh. vayaqam ’iyob vayiqra‘ ’et me‘ilo vayagaz ’et rosho vayipol ’artsah vayishtakhu. vayomer ‘arom yatsati yatsati mibeten ’imi ve‘arom ’ashub shamah yhvh natan yhvh laqakh yehi shem yhvh meborakh. bekhal zot lo khata ’iyob velo natan tiflah leilohim. vayhi hayom vayabo’u benei ha’elohim lehityatseb ‘al yhvh vayabo gam hasatan betokham lehityatseb ‘al yhvh. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan ’ei mizeh tabo vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhvh vayomar mishut ba’arets umeihithalekh bah. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan hasamta libekha ’el ‘abdi ’iyob ki ’en kamohu ba’arets ’ish tam veyashar yerei ’elohim vesar meira‘ ve‘odenu makhaziq betumato vatesiteini bo lebale‘o khinam. vaya‘an hasatan ’et yhvh vayomar ‘or be‘ad ‘or vekhol ’asher la’ish yiten be‘ad nafsho. ’ulam shelakh na yadekha vega‘ ’el ‘atsmo ve’el besaro ’im lo ’el panekha yebarakheka. vayomer yhvh ’el hasatan hino beyadekha ’akh ’et nafsho shemor. vayeitsei hasatan mei’et penei yhvh vayakh ’et ’iyob bishkhin ra‘ mikaf raglo ‘ad ve‘ad qadeqodo. vayiqakh lo kheres lehitgared bo vehu yosheb betokh ha’eifer. vatomer lo ’ishto ‘odekha makhaziq betumatekha barekh ’elohim vamut. vayomer ’eileha kedaber ’akhat hanebalot tedabeiri gam ’et hatob neqabel mei’et ha’elohim ve’et hara‘ lo neqabel bekhal zot lo khata ’iyob bisfatav. vayishme‘u sheloshet rei‘ei ’iyob ’et kal hara‘ah hazot haba’ah ‘alav vayabo’u ’ish mimeqomo ’elifaz hateimani ubildad hashukhi vetsofar hana‘amati vayiva‘adu yakhdav labo lanud lo ulenakhamo. vayis’u ’et ‘eineihem meirakhoq velo hikiruhu vayis’u qolam vayibku vayiqre‘u ’ish me‘ilo vayizrequ ‘afar ‘al rasheihem hashamayemah. vayeishebu ’ito la’arets shib‘at yamim veshib‘at leilot ve’en dober ’eilav dabar ki ra’u ki gadal hake’eb me’od. ’akharei khen patakh ’iyob ’et pihu vayqalel ’et yomo. vaya‘an ’iyob vayomar. yobad yom ’ivaled bo vehalaylah ’amar horah gaber. hayom hahu yehi khoshekh ’al yidresheihu ’eloah mima‘al ve’al tofa‘ ‘alav neharah. yig’aluhu khoshekh vetsalmavet tishkan ‘alav ‘ananah yeba‘atuhu kimrirei yom. halaylah hahu yiqakheihu ’ofel ’al yikhad bimei shanah bemispar yerakhim ’al yabo. hineh halaylah hahu yehi galmud ’al tabo renanah bo. yiqebuhu ’orerei yom ha‘atidim ‘orer livyatan. yekhshekhu kokhbei nishpo yeqav le’or va’ayin ve’al yir’eh be‘af‘apei shakhar. ki lo sagar daltei bitni vayaster ‘amal mei‘einai. lamah lo meirekhem ’amut mibeten yatsati ve’egva‘. madua‘ qidemuni birkayim umahosha dayim ki ’inaq. ki ‘atah shakhabti ve’eshqot yashanti ’az yanuakh li. ‘im melakhim veyo‘atsei ’arets habonim khorabot lamo. ’o ‘imsa rim zahab lahem hamal’im bateihem kasef. ’o kheneifel tamun lo ’ehyeh ke‘olelim lo ra’u ’or. sham resha‘im khadelu rogez vesham yanukhu yegi‘ei khoakh. yakhad ’asirim sha’ananu lo me‘u qol noges. qaton vegadol sham hu ve‘ebed khafeshi mei’adonav. lamah yiten le‘amel ’or vekhayim lemarei nafesh. hamkhakim lamavet ve’einenu vayakhperuhu mimatmonim. hasemeikhim ’elei gil yasisu ki yimtse’u qaber. legeber ’asher darko nistarah vayasekh ’eloah ba‘ado. ki lifnei lakhmi ’ankhati tabo vayitekhu khamayim sha’agotai. ki fakhad pakhadti vaye’etayeini va’asher yagoreti yabo li. lo shalavti velo shaqati velo nakheti vayabo rogez. vaya‘an ’elifaz hateimani vayomar. hanisah dabar ’eilekha til’eh va‘tsor bemilin mi yukhal. hineh yisarta rabim veyadayim rafot tekhazeq. koshel yeqimun milekha ubirkayim kore‘ot te’amets. ki ‘atah tabo ’eilekha vateile tiga‘ ‘adekha vatibahel. halo yir’atekha kislatekha tiqvatekha vetom derakhekha. zekhar na mi hu naqi ’abad ve’eifoh yesharim nikhkhadu. ka’asher ra’iti khoreshei ’aven vezore‘ei ‘amal yiqtseruhu. minishmat ’eloha yobeidu umeiruakh ’apo yikhlu. sha’agat ’aryeh veqol shakhal veshinei khefirim nita‘u. layish ’obed mibeli taref ubenei labi yitparadu. ve’eilai dabar yegunab vatiqakh ’azeni sheimets menhu. bis‘ipim meikhezyonot layelah binfol tardeimah ‘al ’anashim. pakhad qera’ani ure‘adah verob ‘atsmotai hifkhid. veruakh ‘al panai yakhalof tesamer sa‘arat besari. ya‘amod velo ’akir mar’eihu temunah leneged ‘einai demamah vaqol ’eshma‘. ha’enosh mei’eloha yitsdaq ’im mei‘oseihu yithar gaber. hen ba‘abadav lo ya’amin ubemal’akhav yasim taholah. ’af shokhenei batei khomer ’asher be‘afar yesodam yedake’um lifnei ‘ash. miboqer la‘ereb yukatu mibeli meisim lanetsakh yobeidu. halo nisa‘ yitram bam yamutu velo bekhakhemah. qera na hayesh ‘oneka ve’el mi miqedoshim tifneh. ki le’evil yaharag ka‘as ufoteh tamit qin’ah. ’ani ra’iti ’evil mashrish va’eqob naveihu fit’om. yirkhaqu banav miyesha‘ veyidake’u basha‘ar ve’en matsil. ’asher qetsiro ra‘eb yokhel ve’el mitsinim yiqakheihu vesha’af tsamim kheilam. ki lo yeitsei mei‘afar ’aven umei’adamah lo yitsmakh ‘amal. ki ’adam le‘amal yulad ubenei reshef yagbihu ‘uf. ’ulam ’ani ’edrosh ’el ’el ve’el ’elohim ’asim dibrati. ‘oseh gedolot ve’en kheiqer nifla’ot ‘ad ’en mispar. hanoten matar ‘al penei ’arets vesholeiakh mayim ‘al penei khutsot. lasum shefalim lemarom veqoderim sagebu yesha‘. meifer makhshebot ‘arumim velo ta‘asenah yedeihem tushiyah. lokhed khakhamim be‘aremam va‘atsat niftalim nimharah. yomam yefageshu khoshekh vekhalaylah yemashu batsahorayim. vayosha‘ meikhereb mipihem umiyad khazaq ’ebyon. vatehi ladal tiqvah ve‘olatah qafetsah piha. hineh ’ashrei ’enosh yokhikhenu ’eloah umusar dai ’al tim’as. ki hu yakh’ib veyekhbash yimkhats veyado veyadav tirpenah. beshesh tsarot yatsileka ubesheba‘ lo yiga‘ bekha ra‘. bera‘ab padekha mimavet ubemilkhamah midei khareb. beshot lashon teikhabei velo tira mishod ki yabo. leshod ulekhafan tiskhaq umeikhayat ha’arets ’al tira. ki ‘im ’abnei hasadeh beritekha vekhayat hasadeh hashelemah lakh. veyada‘ta ki shalom ’aholekha ufaqadta navekha velo tekheta. veyada‘ta ki rab zar‘ekha vetse’etsa’ekha ke‘eiseb ha’arets. tabo bekhelakh ’elei qaber ka‘alot gadish be‘ito. hineh zot khaqarnuha ken hi ma‘enah ve’atah da‘ lakh. vaya‘an ’iyob vayomar. lu shaqol yishaqel ka‘si vehayati vehavati bemozenayim yis’u yakhad. ki ‘atah meikhol yamim yikhbad ‘al ken debarai la‘u. ki khitsei shadai ‘imadi ’asher khamatam shotah rukhi bi‘utei ’eloah ya‘arkhuni. hayinhaq pere ‘alei deshe ’im yig‘ehosho vr ‘al belilo. hayei’akhel tafel mibeli melakh ’im yesh ta‘am berir khalamut. mei’anah lingoa‘ nafshi hemah kidvei lakhmi. mi yiten tabo she’elati vetiqvati yiten ’eloah. veyo’el ’eloah vidake’eini yater yado vibatse‘eini. utehi ‘od nekhamati va’asaledah bekhilah lo yakhmol ki lo khikhadti ’imrei qadosh. mah kokhi khi ’ayakhel umah qitsi ki ’a’arikh nafshi. ’im koakh ’abanim kokhi ’im besari nakhush. ha’im ’en ‘ezrati bi vetushiyah nidekhah mimeni. lamas meirei‘eihu khased veyir’at shadai ya‘azob. ’akhai bagedu khemo nakhal ka’afiq nekhalim ya‘aboru. haqoderim mini qarakh ‘aleimo yit‘alem shaleg. be‘et yezorebu nitsmatu bekhumo nid‘akhu mimeqomam. yilafetu ’arekhot darkam ya‘alu batohu veyobeidu. hibitu ’arekhot teima halikhot ba qivu lamo. boshu ki batakh ba’u ‘adeha vayekhparu. ki ‘atah heyitem lo lo tir’u khatat vatira’u. hakhi ’amarti habu li umikokhakhem shikhadu ba‘adi. umaletuni miyad tsar umiyad ‘aritsim tifduni. horuni va’ani ’akharish umahosha giti habinu li. mah nimretsu ’imrei yosher umah yokhiakh hokheiakh mikem. halhokhakh milim takhshobu uleruakh ’imrei no’ash. ’af ‘al yatom tapilu vetikhru ‘al rei‘akhem. ve‘atah ho’ilu fenu bi ve‘al peneikhem ’im ’akhazeb. shubu na ’al tehi ‘avlah veshubi veshubu ‘od tsidqi bah. hayesh bilshoni ‘avlah ’im khiki lo yabin havot. halo tsaba le’enosh ‘al ‘alei ’arets vekhimei sakhir yamav. ke‘ebed yish’af tsel ukhesakhir yeqaveh fa‘olo. ken hanekhalti li yarkhei shav veleilot ‘amal minu li. ’im shakhabti ve’amarti matai ’aqum umidad ‘areb vesaba‘ti nedudim ‘adei nashef. labash besari rimah vegish vegush ‘afar ‘ori raga‘ vayima’es. yamai qalu mini ’areg vayikhlu be’efes tiqvah. zekhor ki ruakh khayai lo tashub ‘eini lir’ot tob. lo teshureini ‘en ro’i ‘einekha bi ve’eineni. kalah ‘anan vayeilakh ken yored ’ol lo ya‘aleh. lo yashub ‘od lebeito velo yakirenu ‘od meqomo. gam ’ani lo ’ekhesakh pi ’adaberah betsar rukhi ’asikhah bemar nafshi. hayam ’ani ’im tanin ki tasim ‘alai mishmar. ki ’amarti tenakhameini ‘arsi yisa besikhi mishkabi. vekhitatani bakhalomot umeikhezyonot teba‘atani. vatibkhar makhanaq nafshi mavet mei‘atsmotai. ma’asti lo le‘olam ’ekhyeh khadal mimeni ki hebel yamai. mah ’enosh ki tegadelenu vekhi tashit ’eilav libekha. vatifqedenu libqarim lirga‘im tibkhanenu. kamah lo tish‘eh mimeni lo tarpeini ‘ad bil‘i ruqi. khatati mah ’ef‘al lakh notser ha’adam lamah samtani lemifga‘ lakh va’ehyeh ‘alai lemasa. umeh lo tisa fish‘i veta‘abir ’et ‘avoni ki ‘atah le‘afar ’eshkab veshikhartani ve’eineni. vaya‘an bildad hashukhi vayomar ‘ad ’an temalel ’eleh veruakh kabir ’imrei fikha. ha’el ye‘avet mishpat ve’imosha dai ye‘avet tsedeq. ’im banekha khate’u lo vayshalekhem beyad pish‘am. ’im ’atah teshakher ’el ’el ve’elosha dai titkhanan. ’im zakh veyashar ’atah ki ‘atah ya‘ir ‘alekha veshilam nevat tsidqekha. vehayah reishitekha mits‘ar ve’akharitekha yisgeh me’od. ki she’al na ledor rishon vekhonen lekheiqer ’abotam. ki temol ’anakhnu velo neida‘ ki tsel yameinu ‘alei ’arets. halo hem yorukha yomeru lakh umilibam yotsi’u milim. hayig’eh gome belo bitsah yisgeh ’akhu beli mayim. ‘odenu be’ibo lo yiqatef velifnei khal khatsir yibash. ken ’arekhot kal shokhekhei ’el vetiqvat khanef tobed. ’asher yaqot kislo ubet ‘akabish mibtakho. yisha‘en ‘al beito velo ya‘amod yakhaziq bo velo yaqum. ratob hu lifnei shamesh ve‘al ganato yonaqto teitsei. ‘al gal sharashav yesubakhu bet ’abanim yekhezeh. ’im yebale‘enu mimeqomo vekhikhesh bo lo re’itikha. hen hu mesos darko umei‘afar ’akher yitsmakhu. hen ’el lo yim’as tam velo yakhaziq beyad merei‘im. ‘ad yemaleh sekhoq pikha usefatekha teru‘ah. sone’ekha yilbeshu boshet ve’ohel resha‘im ’einenu. vaya‘an ’iyob vayomar. ’amenam yada‘ti khi khen umah yitsdaq ’enosh ‘im ’el. ’im yakhpots larib ‘imo lo ya‘anenu ’akhat mini ’alef. khakham leibab ve’amits koakh mi hiqshah ’eilav vayishlam. hama‘tiq harim velo yada‘u ’asher hafakham be’apo. hamargiz ’erets mimeqomah ve‘amudeha yitfalatsun ha’omer lakheres velo yizrakh ube‘ad kokhabim yakhtom. noteh shamayim lebado vedorekh ‘al bamotei yam. ‘oseh ‘ash kesil vekhimah vekhadrei teiman. ‘oseh gedolot ‘ad ’en kheiqer venifla’ot ‘ad ’en mispar. hen ya‘abor ‘alai velo ’er’eh veyakhalof velo ’abin lo. hen yakhtof mi yeshibenu mi yomar ’eilav mah ta‘aseh. ’eloah lo yashib ’apo takhato takhtav khakhu ‘ozerei rahab. ’af ki ’anokhi ’e‘enenu ’ebkharah debarai ‘imo. ’asher ’im tsadaqti lo ’e‘eneh limshofeti ’etkhanan. ’im qarati vaya‘aneini lo ’a’amin ki ya’azin qoli. ’asher bis‘arah yeshufeini vehirbah fetsa‘ai khinam. lo yiteneini hasheb rukhi ki yasbi‘ani mamerorim. ’im lekhoakh ’amits hineh ve’im lemishpat mi yo‘ideini. ’im ’etsdaq pi yarshi‘eini tam ’ani vaya‘qesheini. tam ’ani lo ’eida‘ nafshi ’em’as khayai. ’akhat hi ‘al ken ’amarti tam verasha‘ hu mekhaleh. ’imosho vt yamit pit’om lemasat neqiyim yil‘ag. ’erets nitenah beyad rasha‘ penei shofeteha yekhaseh ’im lo ’eifo mi hu. veyamai qalu mini rats barekhu lo ra’u tobah. khalefu ‘im ’oniyot ’eibeh kenesher yatus ‘alei ’okhel. ’im ’ameri ’eshkekhah sikhi ’e‘ezbah fanai ve’abligah. yagoreti khal ‘atsebotai yada‘ti ki lo tenaqeini. ’anokhi ’ersha‘ lamah zeh hebel ’iga‘. ’im hitrakhatsti bemo bemei shaleg vahazikoti bebor kapai. ’az bashakhat titbeleini veti‘abuni salmotai. ki lo ’ish kamoni ’e‘enenu nabo yakhdav bamishpat. lo yesh beineinu mokhiakh yashet yado ‘al sheneinu. yaser mei‘alai shibto ve’eimato ’al teba‘atani. ’adaberah velo ’ira’enu ki lo khen ’anokhi ‘imadi. naqetah nafshi bekhayai ’e‘ezbah ‘alai sikhi ’adaberah bemar nafshi. ’omar ’el ’eloah ’al tarshi‘eini hodi‘eini ‘al mah teribeini. hatob lekha ki ta‘ashoq ki tim’as yegia‘ kapekha ve‘al ‘atsat resha‘im hofa‘eta. ha‘einei basar lakh ’im kir’ot ’enosh tir’eh. hakhimei ’enosh yamekha ’imosh notekha kimei gaber. ki tebaqesh la‘avoni ulekhatati tidrosh. ‘al da‘tekha ki lo ’ersha‘ ve’en miyadekha matsil. yadekha ‘itsebuni vaya‘asuni yakhad sabib vatebale‘eini. zekhar na ki khakhomer ‘asitani ve’el ‘afar teshibeini. halo khekhalab tatikheini vekhagebinah taqpi’eini. ‘or ubasar talbisheini uba‘atsamot vegidim tesokhekheini. khayim vakhesed ‘asita ‘imadi ufequdatekha shamerah rukhi. ve’eleh tsafanta bilbabekha yada‘ti ki zot ‘imakh. ’im khatati ushemartani umei‘avoni lo tenaqeini. ’im rasha‘ti ’alai li vetsadaqti lo ’esa roshi seba‘ qalon ure’eh ‘aneyi. veyig’eh kashakhal tetsudeini vetashob titpala bi. tekhadesh ‘eidekha negdi vetereb ka‘askha ‘imadi khalifot vetsaba ‘imi. velamah meirekhem hotseitani ’egva‘ ve‘ayin lo tir’eini. ka’asher lo hayiti ’ehyeh mibeten laqeber ’ubal. halo me‘at yamai yekhdal vakhadal yashit veshit mimeni ve’abligah me‘at. beterem ’eilekh velo ’ashub ’el ’erets khoshekh vetsalmavet. ’erets ‘eifatah kemo ’ofel tsalmavet velo sedarim vatofa‘ kemo ’ofel. vaya‘an tsofar hana‘amati vayomar. harob debarim lo yei‘aneh ve’im ’ish sefatayim yitsdaq. badekha metim yakharishv vatil‘ag ve’en makhlim. vatomer zakh liqkhi ubar hayiti be‘einekha. ve’ulam mi yiten ’eloah daber veyiftakh sefatav ‘imakh. veyaged lekha ta‘alumot khakhmah ki khiflayim letushiyah veda‘ ki yasheh lekha ’eloha mei‘avonekha. hakheiqer ’eloha timtsa ’im ‘ad takhlit shadai timtsa. gabehei mayim mah tif‘al ‘amuqah mishe’ol mah teida‘. ’arukah mei’erets midah urekhabah mini yam. ’im yakhalof veyasgir veyaqhil umi yeshibenu. ki hu yada‘ metei shav vayar ’aven velo yitbonan. ve’ish nabub yilabeb ve‘ayir pere ’adam yivaled. ’im ’atah hakhinota libekha ufarasta ’eilav kapekha. ’im ’aven beyadekha harkhiqeihu ve’al tashken be’ohalekha ‘avlah. ki ’az tisa fanekha mimum vehayita mutsaq velo tira. ki ’atah ‘amal tishkakh kemayim ‘aberu tizkor. umitsahorayim yaqum khaled ta‘ufah kaboqer tihyeh. ubatakhta ki yesh tiqvah vekhafarta labetakh tishkab. verabatsta ve’en makharid vekhilu fanekha rabim. ve‘einei resha‘im tikhlenah umanos ’abad minhem vetiqvatam mapakh nafesh. vaya‘an ’iyob vayomar. ’amenam ki ’atem ‘am ve‘imakhem tamut khakhmah gam li leibab kemokhem lo nofel ’anokhi mikem ve’et mi ’en kemo ’eleh. sekhoq lerei‘eihu ’ehyeh qorei le’eloah vaya‘aneihu khoq tsadiq tamim. lapid buz le‘ashtut sha’anan nakhon lemo‘adei ragel. yishlayu ’ohalim leshodedim ubatukhot lemargizei ’el la’asher heibi ’eloah beyado. ve’ulam she’al na beheimot vetoreka ve‘of hashamayim veyaged lakh. ’o siakh la’arets vetoreka visaperu lekha degei hayam. mi lo yada‘ bekhal ’eleh ki yad yhvh ‘asetah zot. ’asher beyado nefesh kal khai veruakh kal besar ’ish. halo ’ozen milin tibkhan vekhekh ’okhel yit‘am lo. bishishim khakhmah ve’orekh yamim tebunah. ‘imo khakhmah ugeburah lo ‘eitsah utebunah. hen yaharos velo yibaneh yisgor ‘al ’ish velo yipateiakh. hen ya‘tsor bamayim veyibashu vishalekhem veyahafkhu ’arets. ‘imo ‘oz vetushiyah lo shogeg umashgeh. molikh yo‘atsim sholal veshofetim yeholel. musar melakhim piteiakh vaye’sor ’eizor bemateneihem. molikh kohanim sholal ve’eitanim yesalef. meisir fah lene’emanim veta‘am zeqeinim yiqakh. shofekh buz ‘al nedibim umeziakh ’afiqim ripah. megaleh ‘amuqot mini khoshekh vayotsei la’or tsalmavet. masgi lagoyim vai’abedem shoteiakh lagoyim vayankhem. meisir leb rashei ‘am ha’arets vayat‘em betohu lo darekh. yemashu khoshekh velo ’or vayat‘em kashikor. hen kol ra’atah ‘eini shame‘ah ’azeni vataben lah. keda‘tekhem yada‘ti gam ’ani lo nofel ’anokhi mikem. ’ulam ’ani ’el shadai ’adaber vehokheiakh ’el ’el ’ekhpats. ve’ulam ’atem tofelei shaqer rofe’ei ’elil kulekhem. mi yiten hakharesh takharishun utehi lakhem lekhakhemah. shim‘u na tokhakhti veribot sefatai haqshibu. hal’el tedaberu ‘avlah velo tedaberu remiyah. hafanav tisa’un ’im la’el teribun. hatob ki yakhqor ’etkhem ’im kehatel be’enosh tehatelu bo. hokheiakh yokhiakh ’etkhem ’im baseiter panim tisa’un. halo ’eito teba‘et ’etkhem ufakhdo yipol ‘aleikhem. zikhroneikhem mishlei ’eifer legabei khomer gabeikhem. hakharishu mimeni va’adaberah ’ani veya‘abor ‘alai mah. ‘al mah ’esa besari beshinai venafshi ’asim bekhapi. hen yiqteleini lo lo ’ayakhel ’akh derakhai ’el panav ’okhiakh. gam hu li lishu‘ah ki lo lefanav khanef yabo. shim‘u moa‘ milati ve’akhavati be’azeneikhem. hineh na ‘arakhti mishpat yada‘ti ki ’ani ’etsdaq. mi hu yarib ‘imadi ki ‘atah ’akharish ve’egva‘. ’akhosh tayim ’al ta‘as ‘imadi ’az mipanekha lo ’esater. kapekha mei‘alai harkhaq ve’eimatekha ’al teba‘atani. uqera ve’anokhi ’e‘eneh ’o ’adaber vahashibeini. kamah li ‘avonot vekhata’ot pish‘i vekhatati hodi‘eini lamah fanekha tastir vetakhshebeini le’oyeb lakh. he‘aleh nidaf ta‘arots ve’et qash yabesh tirdof. ki tikhtob ‘alai merorot vetorisheini ‘avonot ne‘urai. vetasem basad raglai vetishmor kal ’arekhotai ‘al shareshei raglai titkhaqeh. vehu keraqab yibleh kebeged ’akhalo ‘ash. ’adam yelud ’ishah qetsar yamim useba‘ rogez. ketsits yatsa vayimal vayibrakh katsel velo ya‘amod. ’af ‘al zeh paqakhta ‘einekha ve’oti tabi bemishpat ‘imakh. mi yiten tahor mitamei lo ’ekhad. ’im kharutsim yamav mispar khodashav ’itakh khuqo khuqav ‘asita velo ya‘abor. she‘eh mei‘alav veyekhdal ‘ad yirtseh kesakhir yomo. ki yesh la‘ets tiqvah ’im yikaret ve‘od yakhalif veyonaqto lo tekhdal. ’im yazqin ba’arets sharesho ube‘afar yamut giz‘o. meireiakh mayim yafriakh ve‘asah qatsir kemo nata‘. vegeber yamut vayekhelash vayigva‘ ’adam ve’ayo. ’azelu mayim mini yam venahar yekherab veyabesh. ve’ish shakhab velo yaqum ‘ad bilti mayim lo yaqitsu velo yei‘oru mishenatam. mi yiten bish’ol tatspineini tastireini ‘ad shub ’apekha tashit li khoq vetizkereini. ’im yamut geber hayikhyeh kal yemei tseba’i ’ayakhel ‘ad bo khalifati. tiqra ve’anokhi ’e‘eneka lema‘aseh yadekha tikhsof. ki ‘atah tse‘adai tispor lo tishmor ‘al khatati. khatum bitsror pish‘i vatitpol ‘al ‘avoni. ve’ulam har nofel yibol vetsur ye‘taq mimeqomo. ’abanim shakhaqu mayim tishtof sefikheha ‘afar ’arets vetiqvat ’enosh he’ebadta. titqefeihu lanetsakh vayahalokh meshaneh fanav vateshalekheihu. yikhbedu banav velo yeida‘ veyits‘aru velo yabin lamo. ’akh besaro ‘alav yikh’ab venafsho ‘alav te’ebal. vaya‘an ’elifaz hateimani vayomar. hekhakham ya‘aneh da‘at ruakh vimalei qadim bitno. hokheiakh bedabar lo yiskon umilim lo yo‘il bam. ’af ’atah tafer yir’ah vetigra‘ khah lifnei ’el. ki ye’alef ‘avonekha fikha vetibkhar leshon ‘arumim. yarshi‘akha fikha velo ’ani usefatekha ya‘anu bakh. hariyoshon ’adam tivaled velifnei geba‘ot kholaleta. habsod ’eloha tishma‘ vetigra‘ ’eilekha khakhmah mah yada‘ta velo neida‘ tabin velo ‘imanu hu. gam sab gam yashish banu kabir mei’abikha yamim. ham‘at mimekha tankhumot ’el vedabar la’at ‘imakh. mah yiqakhakha libekha umah yirzemun ‘einekha. ki tashib ’el ’el rukhekha vehotseita mipikha milin. mah ’enosh ki yizkeh vekhi yitsdaq yelud ’ishah. hen biqdosho biqdoshav lo ya’amin veshamayim lo zaku be‘einav. ’af ki nit‘ab vene’elakh ’ish shoteh khamayim ‘avlah. ’akhavkha shema‘ li vezeh khaziti va’asapeirah. ’asher khakhamim yagidu velo khikhadu mei’abotam. lahem lebadam nitenah ha’arets velo ‘abar zar betokham. kal yemei rasha‘ hu mitkholel umispar nim nitspenu le‘arits. qol pekhadim be’azenav bashalom shoded yebo’enu. lo ya’amin ub mini khoshekh vetsafu vetsafui hu ’elei khareb. noded hu lalekhem ’ayeh yada‘ ki nakhon beyado yom khoshekh. yeba‘atuhu tsar umetsuqah titqefeihu kemelekh ‘atid lakidor. ki natah ’el ’el yado ve’elosha dai yitgabar. yaruts ’eilav betsavar ba‘abi gabei maginav. ki khisah fanav bekhelbo vaya‘as pimah ‘alei khasel. vayishkon ‘arim nikhkhadot batim lo yeishebu lamo ’asher hit‘atedu legalim. lo ye‘shar velo yaqum kheilo velo yiteh la’arets minlam. lo yasur mini khoshekh yonaqto teyabesh shalhabet veyasur beruakh piv. ’al ya’amen basho bashav nit‘ah kisha v tihyeh temurato. belo yomo timalei vekhipato lo ra‘ananah. yakhmos kagefen bisro veyashlekh kazayit nitsato. ki ‘adat khanef galmud ve’esh ’akhelah ’aholei shokhad. haroh ‘amal veyalod ’aven ubitnam takhin mirmah. vaya‘an ’iyob vayomar. shama‘ti khe’eleh rabot menakhamei ‘amal kulekhem. haqets ledibrei ruakh ’o mah yamritsekha ki ta‘aneh. gam ’anokhi kakhem ’adabeirah lu yesh nafshekhem takhat nafshi ’akhbirah ‘aleikhem
