hakhakhemah ta‘oz lekhakham mei‘asarah shalitim ’asher hayu ba‘ir. ki ’adam ’en tsadiq ba’arets ’asher ya‘aseh tob velo yekheta. gam lekhal hadebarim ’asher yedabeiru ’al titen libekha ’asher lo tishma‘ ’et ‘abdekha meqalekha. ki gam pe‘amim rabot yada‘ libekha ’asher gam ’at ’atah qilalta ’akheirim. kal zoh nisiti bakhakhemah ’amarti ’ekhkamah vehi rekhoqah mimeni. rakhoq mah shehayah ve‘amoq ‘amoq mi yimtsa’enu. saboti ’ani velibi lada‘at velatur ubaqesh khakhmah vekheshbon velada‘at resha‘ kesel vehasikhlut holeilot. umotse ’ani mar mimavet ’et ha’ishah ’asher hi metsodim vakharamim libah ’asurim yadeha tob lifnei ha’elohim yimalet mimenah vekhotei yilakhed bah. re’eh zeh matsati ’amerah qohelet ’akhat le’akhat limtso kheshbon. ’asher ‘od biqshah nafshi velo matsati ’adam ’ekhad mei’elef matsati ve’ishah bekhal ’eleh lo matsati. lebad re’eh zeh matsati ’asher ‘asah ha’elohim ’et ha’adam yashar vehemah biqshu khishebonot rabim. mi kehekhakham umi yodeia‘ peisher dabar khakhemat ’adam ta’ir panav ve‘oz panav yeshune. ’ani pi melekh shemor ve‘al dibrat shebu‘at ’elohim. ’al tibahel mipanav teilekh ’al ta‘amod bedabar ra‘ ki kal ’asher yakhpots ya‘aseh. ba’asher debar melekh shilton umi yomar lo mah ta‘aseh. shomer mitsvah lo yeida‘ dabar ra‘ ve‘et umishpat yeida‘ leb khakham. ki lekhal kheifets yesh ‘et umishpat ki ra‘at ha’adam rabah ‘alav. ki ’einenu yodeia‘ mah sheyihyeh ki ka’asher yihyeh mi yagid lo. ’en ’adam shalit baruakh likhlo ’et haruakh ve’en shilton beyom hamavet ve’en mishlakhat bamilkhamah velo yemalet resha‘ ’et be‘alav. ’et kal zeh ra’iti venaton ’et libi lekhal ma‘aseh ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamesh ‘et ’asher shalat ha’adam be’adam lera‘ lo. ubekhen ra’iti resha‘im qeburim vaba’u umimeqom qadosh yehaleikhu veyishtakekhu ba‘ir ’asher ken ‘asu gam zeh habel. ’asher ’en na‘asah fitgam ma‘aseh hara‘ah meheirah ‘al ken malei leb benei ha’adam bahem la‘asot ra‘. ’asher khote ‘oseh ra‘ me’at uma’arikh lo ki gam yodeia‘ ’ani ’asher yihyeh tob leyir’ei ha’elohim ’asher yire’u milefanav. vetob lo yihyeh larasha‘ velo ya’arikh yamim katsel ’asher ’einenu yarei milifnei ’elohim. yesh hebel ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arets ’asher yesh tsadiqim ’asher magia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseh haresha‘im veyesh resha‘im shemagia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseh hatsadiqim ’amarti shegam zeh habel. veshibakhti ’ani ’et hasimkhah ’asher ’en tob la’adam takhat hashemesh ki ’im le’ekhol velishtot velismoakh vehu yilvenu ba‘amalo yemei khayav ’asher natan lo ha’elohim takhat hashamesh. ka’asher natati ’et libi lada‘at khakhmah velir’ot ’et ha‘inyan ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arets ki gam bayom ubalaylah sheinah be‘einav ’einenu ro’eh. vera’iti ’et kal ma‘aseh ha’elohim ki lo yukhal ha’adam limtso ’et hama‘aseh ’asher na‘asah takhat hashemesh beshel ’asher ya‘amol ha’adam lebaqesh velo yimtsa vegam ’im yomar hekhakham lada‘at lo yukhal limtso. ki ’et kal zeh natati ’el libi velabur ’et kal zeh ’asher hatsadiqim vehakhakhamim va‘abadeihem beyad ha’elohim gam ’ahabah gam sin’ah ’en yodeia‘ ha’adam hakol lifneihem. hakol ka’asher lakol miqreh ’ekhad latsadiq velarasha‘ latob velatahor velatamei velazobeiakh vela’asher ’einenu zobeiakh katob kakhote hanishba‘ ka’asher shebu‘ah yarei. zeh ra‘ bekhol ’asher na‘asah takhat hashemesh ki miqreh ’ekhad lakol vegam leb benei ha’adam malei ra‘ veholeilot bilbabam bekhayeihem ve’akharav ’el hameitim. ki mi ’asher yibakher yekhubar ’el kal hakhayim yesh bitakhon ki lekheleb khai hu tob min ha’aryeh hamet. ki hakhayim yod‘im sheyamutu vehameitim ’einam yod‘im me’umah ve’en ‘od lahem sakhar ki nishkakh zikhram. gam ’ahabatam gam sin’atam gam qin’atam kebar ’abadah vekheileq ’en lahem ‘od le‘olam bekhol ’asher na‘asah takhat hashamesh. lekh ’ekhol besimkhah lakhmekha ushateh beleb tob yeinekha ki khebar ratsah ha’elohim ’et ma‘asekha. bekhal ‘et yihyu begadekha lebanim veshemen ‘al roshekha ’al yekhsar. re’eh khayim ‘im ’ishah ’asher ’ahabta kal yemei khayei heblekha ’asher natan lekha takhat hashemesh kol yemei heblekha ki hu khelqekha bakhayim uba‘amalekha ’asher ’atah ‘amel takhat hashamesh. kol ’asher timtsa yadekha la‘asot bekhokhakha ‘aseh ki ’en ma‘aseh vekheshbon veda‘at vekhakhemah bish’ol ’asher ’atah holekh shamah. shabti vera’oh takhat hashemesh ki lo laqalim hameirots velo lagiborim hamilkhamah vegam lo lakhakhamim lekhem vegam lo lanebonim ‘osher vegam lo layode‘im khen ki ‘et vafega‘ yiqreh ’et kulam. ki gam lo yeida‘ ha’adam ’et ‘ito kadagim shene’ekhazim bimtsodah ra‘ah vekhatsiporim ha’akhuzot bapakh kahem yuqashim benei ha’adam le‘et ra‘ah keshetipol ‘aleihem pit’om. gam zoh ra’iti khakhmah takhat hashamesh ugedolah hi ’eilai. ‘ir qetanah va’anashim bah me‘at uba ’eileha melekh gadol vesabab ’otah ubanah ‘aleha metsodim gedolim. umatsa bah ’ish misken khakham umilat hu ’et ha‘ir bekhakhemato ve’adam lo zakhar ’et ha’ish hamisken hahu. ve’amarti ’ani tobah khakhmah migeburah vekhakhemat hamisken bezuyah udebarav ’einam nishma‘im. dibrei khakhamim benakhat nishma‘im miza‘aqat moshel bakesilim. tobah khakhmah mikelei qerab vekhote ’ekhad ye’abed tobah harbeh. zebubei mavet yab’ish yabia‘ shemen roqeiakh yaqar meikhakhemah mikabod sikhlut me‘at. leb khakham limino veleb kesil lismolo. vegam baderekh keshehasakhal keshesakhal holekh libo khaser ve’amar lakol sakhal hu. ’im ruakh hamoshel ta‘aleh ‘alekha meqomkha ’al tanakh ki marpei yaniakh khata’im gedolim. yesh ra‘ah ra’iti takhat hashamesh kishgagah sheyotsa milifnei hashalit. nitan hasekhel bameromim rabim va‘ashirim basheifel yeisheibu. ra’iti ‘abadim ‘al susim vesarim holekhim ka‘abadim ‘al ha’arets. khofer gumats bo yipol uforets gader yishekhenu nakhash. masia‘ ’abanim yei‘atseb bahem boqeia‘ ‘eitsim yisakhen bam. ’im qeihah habarzel vehu lo fanim qilqal vakhayalim yegaber veyitron hakhsher khakhmah ’im yishokh hanakhash belo lakhash ve’en yitron leba‘al halashon. dibrei fi khakham khen vesiftot kesil tebale‘enu. tekhilat dibrei fihu sikhlut ve’akharit pihu holeilut ra‘ah. vehasakhal yarbeh debarim lo yeida‘ ha’adam mah sheyihyeh va’asher yihyeh mei’akharav mi yagid lo. ‘amal hakesilim teyage‘enu ’asher lo yada‘ lalekhet ’el ‘ir. ’i lakh ’erets shemalkekh na‘ar vesarayikh baboqer yokheilu. ’ashrekh ’erets shemalkekh ben khorim vesarayikh ba‘et yokheilu bigburah velo basheti. ba‘atsaltayim yimakh hameqareh ubeshiflut yadayim yidlof habayit. liskhoq ‘osim lekhem veyayin yesamakh khayim vehakesef ya‘aneh ’et hakol. gam bemada‘akha melekh ’al teqalel ubekhadrei mishkabekha ’al teqalel ‘ashir ki ‘of hashamayim yolikh ’et haqol uba‘al hakenafayim kenafayim yaged dabar. shalakh lakhmekha ‘al penei hamayim ki berob hayamim timtsa’enu. ten kheileq leshib‘ah vegam lishmonah ki lo teida‘ mah yihyeh ra‘ah ‘al ha’arets. ’im yimale’u he‘abim geshem ‘al ha’arets yariqu ve’im yipol ‘ets badarom ve’im batsafon meqom sheyipol ha‘ets sham yehu. shomer ruakh lo yizra‘ vero’eh be‘abim lo yiqtsor. ka’asher ’einekha yodeia‘ mah derekh haruakh ka‘atsamim bebeten hamelei’ah kakhah lo teida‘ ’et ma‘aseh ha’elohim ’asher ya‘aseh ’et hakol. baboqer zera‘ ’et zar‘ekha vela‘ereb ’al tanakh yadekha ki ’einekha yodei‘ ’ei zeh yikhshar hazeh ’o zeh ve’im sheneihem ke’ekhad tobim. umatoq ha’or vetob la‘einayim lir’ot ’et hashamesh. ki ’im shanim harbeh yikhyeh ha’adam bekhulam yismakh veyizkor ’et yemei hakhoshekh ki harbeh yihyu kal sheba habel. semakh bakhur beyaldutekha vitibekha libekha bimei bekhurotekha vehalekh bedarkhei libekha ubemar’ei ‘einekha veda‘ ki ‘al kal ’eleh yebi’akha ha’elohim bamishpat. vehaser ka‘as milibekha veha‘aber ra‘ah mibesarekha ki hayaldut vehashakharut habel. uzekhor ’et bor’ekha bimei bekhurotekha ‘ad ’asher lo yabo’u yemei hara‘ah vehigi‘u shanim ’asher tomar ’en li bahem kheifets. ‘ad ’asher lo tekhshakh hashemesh veha’or vehayareiakh vehakokhabim veshabu he‘abim ’akhar hagashem. bayom sheyazu‘u shomerei habayit vehit‘avetu ’anshei hekhayil ubatelu hatokhanot ki mi‘eitu vekhashekhu haro’ot ba’arubot. vesugeru delatayim bashuq bishfal qol hatakhanah veyaqum leqol hatsipor veyishakhu kal benot hashir. gam migaboah yira’u vekhatkhatim baderekh veyanets hashaqed veyistabel hekhagab vetafer ha’abiyonah ki holekh ha’adam ’el bet ‘olamo vesabebu bashuq hasofedim. ‘ad ’asher lo yirkhaq yeirateq khebel hakesef vetaruts gulat hazahab vetishaber kad ‘al hamabua‘ venarots hagalgal ’el habor. veyashob he‘afar ‘al ha’arets keshehayah veharuakh tashub ’el ha’elohim ’asher netanah. habel habalim ’amar haqohelet hakol habel. veyoter shehayah qohelet khakham ‘od limad da‘at ’et ha‘am ve’izen vekhiqer tiqen meshalim harbeh. biqesh qohelet limtso dibrei kheifets vekhatub yosher dibrei ’emet. dibrei khakhamim kadarebonot ukhemasmerot netu‘im ba‘alei ’asupot nitenu meiro‘eh ’ekhad. veyoter meihemah beni hizaher ‘asot sefarim harbeh ’en qets velahag harbeh yegi‘at basar. sof dabar hakol nishma‘ ’et ha’elohim yera ve’et mitsvotav shemor ki zeh kal ha’adam. ki ’et kal ma‘aseh ha’elohim yabi bemishpat ‘al kal ne‘lam ’im tob ve’im ra‘. vayhi bimei ’akhashveirosh hu ’akhashveirosh hamolekh meihodu ve‘ad kush sheba‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah. bayamim hahem keshebet hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ‘al kisei malkhuto ’asher beshushan habirah. bishnat shalosh lemalekho ‘asah mishteh lekhal sarav va‘abadav khel paras umadai hapartemim vesarei hamedinot lefanav. behar’oto ’et ‘osher kebod malkhuto ve’et yeqar tif’eret gedulato yamim rabim shemonim ume’at yom. ubimlot hayamim ha’eleh ‘asah hamelekh lekhal ha‘am hanimtse’im beshushan habirah lemigadol ve‘ad qatan mishteh shib‘at yamim bakhatsar ginat bitan hamelekh. khur karpas utekheilet ’akhuz bekhablei buts ve’argaman ‘al gelilei khesef ve‘amudei shesh mitot zahab vakhesef ‘al ritsfat bahat vashesh vedar vesokharet. vehashqot bikhlei zahab vekheilim mikeilim shonim veyen malkhut rab keyad hamelekh. vehashetiyah khadat ’en ’ones ki khen yisad hamelekh ‘al kal rab beito la‘asot kirtson ’ish va’ish. gam vashti hamalkah ‘asetah mishteh nashim bet hamalkhut ’asher lamelekh ’akhashveirosh. bayom hashebi‘i ketob leb hamelekh bayayin ’amar limhuman bizeta kharbona bigta va’abagta zeitar vekharkas shib‘at hasarisim hamsharetim ’et penei hamelekh ’akhashveirosh. lehabi ’et vashti hamalkah lifnei hamelekh bekheter malkhut lehar’ot ha‘amim vehasarim ’et yafeyah ki tobat mar’eh hi. vatema’en hamalkah vashti labo bidbar hamelekh ’asher beyad hasarisim vayiqtsof hamelekh me’od vakhamato ba‘arah bo. vayomer hamelekh lakhakhamim yode‘ei ha‘itim ki khen debar hamelekh lifnei kal yode‘ei dat vadin. vehaqarob ’eilav karshena sheitar ’admata tarshish meres marsena memukhan shib‘at sarei paras umadai ro’ei penei hamelekh hayoshebim rishonah bamalkhut. kedat mah la‘asot bamalkah vashti ‘al ’asher lo ‘asetah ’et ma’amar hamelekh ’akhashveirosh beyad hasarisim. vayomer mumekhan memukhan lifnei hamelekh vehasarim lo ‘al hamelekh lebado ‘avetah vashti hamalkah ki ‘al kal hasarim ve‘al kal ha‘amim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh. ki yeitsei debar hamalkah ‘al kal hanashim lehabzot ba‘leihen be‘eineihen be’ameram hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’amar lehabi ’et vashti hamalkah lefanav velo ba’ah. vehayom hazeh tomarnah sarot paras umadai ’asher shame‘u ’et debar hamalkah lekhol sarei hamelekh ukhedai bizayon vaqatsef. ’im ‘al hamelekh tob yeitsei debar malkhut milefanav veyikateb bedatei faras umadai velo ya‘abor ’asher lo tabo vashti lifnei hamelekh ’akhashveirosh umalkhutah yiten hamelekh lir‘utah hatobah mimenah. venishma‘ pitgam hamelekh ’asher ya‘aseh bekhal malkhuto ki rabah hi vekhal hanashim yitenu yeqar leba‘leihen lemigadol ve‘ad qatan. vayitab hadabar be‘einei hamelekh vehasarim vaya‘as hamelekh kidbar memukhan. vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal medinot hamelekh ’el medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve’el ‘am va‘am kilshono lihyot kal ’ish sorer bebeito umedaber kilshon ‘amo. ’akhar hadebarim ha’eleh keshokh khamat hamelekh ’akhashveirosh zakhar ’et vashti ve’et ’asher ‘asatah ve’et ’asher nigzar ‘aleha. vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetav yebaqshu lamelekh ne‘arot betulot tobot mar’eh. veyafqed hamelekh peqidim bekhal medinot malkhuto veyiqbetsu ’et kal na‘arah betulah tobat mar’eh ’el shushan habirah ’el bet hanashim ’el yad heige seris hamelekh shomer hanashim venaton tamruqeihen. vehana‘arah ’asher titab be‘einei hamelekh timlokh takhat vashti vayitab hadabar be‘einei hamelekh vaya‘as ken. ’ish yehudi hayah beshushan habirah ushemo maredokhai ben ya’ir ben shim‘i ben qish ’ish yemini. ’asher hagelah mirushalayim ‘im hagolah ’asher hageletah ‘im yekhaneyah melekh yehudah ’asher heglah nebukhadnetsar melekh babel. vayhi ’omen ’et hadasah hi ’ester bat dodo ki ’en lah ’ab va’em vehana‘arah yefat to’ar vetobat mar’eh ubemot ’abiha ve’imah leqakhah maredokhai lo lebat. vayhi behishama‘ debar hamelekh vedato ubehiqabets ne‘arot rabot ’el shushan habirah ’el yad heigai vatilaqakh ’ester ’el bet hamelekh ’el yad heigai shomer hanashim. vatitab hana‘arah be‘einav vatisa khesed lefanav vaybahel ’et tamruqeha ve’et manoteha latet lah ve’et sheba‘ hane‘arot hare’uyot latet lah mibet hamelekh vayshaneha ve’et na‘aroteha letob bet hanashim. lo higidah ’ester ’et ‘amah ve’et moladtah ki maredokhai tsivah ‘aleha ’asher lo tagid. ubekhal yom vayom maredokhai mithalekh lifnei khatsar bet hanashim lada‘at ’et shelom ’ester umah yei‘aseh bah. ubehagia‘ tor na‘arah vena‘arah labo ’el hamelekh ’akhashveirosh miqets heyot lah kedat hanashim shenem ‘asar khodesh ki ken yimle’u yemei meruqeihen shishah khodashim beshemen hamor veshishah khodashim babesamim ubetamruqei hanashim. ubazeh hana‘arah ba’ah ’el hamelekh ’et kal ’asher tomar yinaten lah labo ‘imah mibet hanashim ‘ad bet hamelekh. ba‘ereb hi ba’ah ubaboqer hi shabah ’el bet hanashim sheini ’el yad sha‘ashgaz seris hamelekh shomer hapilagshim lo tabo ‘od ’el hamelekh ki ’im khafets bah hamelekh veniqre’ah beshem. ubehagia‘ tor ’ester bat ’abikhayil dod maredokhai ’asher laqakh lo lebat labo ’el hamelekh lo biqshah dabar ki ’im ’et ’asher yomar heigai seris hamelekh shomer hanashim vatehi ’ester noset khen be‘einei kal ro’eha. vatilaqakh ’ester ’el hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’el bet malkhuto bakhodesh ha‘asiri hu khodesh teibet bishnat sheba‘ lemalkhuto. vaye’ehab hamelekh ’et ’ester mikal hanashim vatisa khen vakhesed lefanav mikal habetulot vayasem keter malkhut beroshah vayamlikheha takhat vashti. vaya‘as hamelekh mishteh gadol lekhal sarav va‘abadav ’et mishteh ’ester vahanakhah lamedinot ‘asah vayiten mas’et keyad hamelekh. ubehiqabets betulot sheinit umaredokhai yosheb besha‘ar hamelekh. ’en ’ester magedet moladtah ve’et ‘amah ka’asher tsivah ‘aleha maredokhai ve’et ma’amar maredokhai ’ester ‘osah ka’asher hayetah be’amenah ’ito. bayamim hahem umaredokhai yosheb besha‘ar hamelekh qatsaf bigtan vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf vaybaqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh ’akhashveirosh. vayivada‘ hadabar lemaredokhai vayaged le’ester hamalkah vatomer ’ester lamelekh beshem maredokhai. vaybuqash hadabar vayimatsei vayitalu sheneihem ‘al ‘ets vayikateb beseifer dibrei hayamim lifnei hamelekh. ’akhar hadebarim ha’eleh gidal hamelekh ’akhashveirosh ’et haman ben hamedata ha’agagi vaynase’eihu vayasem ’et kis’o mei‘al kal hasarim ’asher ’ito. vekhal ‘abdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh kore‘im umishtakhavim lehaman ki khen tsivah lo hamelekh umaredokhai lo yikhra‘ velo yishtakhaveh. vayomeru ‘abdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh lemaredokhai madua‘ ’atah ‘ober ’et mitsvat hamelekh. vayhi be’ameram ke’ameram ’eilav yom vayom velo shama‘ ’aleihem vayagidu lehaman lir’ot haya‘amdu dibrei maredokhai ki higid lahem ’asher hu yehudi. vayar haman ki ’en maredokhai koreia‘ umishtakhaveh lo vayimalei haman kheimah. vayibez be‘einav lishlokh yad bemaredokhai lebado ki higidu lo ’et ‘am maredokhai vaybaqesh haman lehashmid ’et kal hayehudim ’asher bekhal malkhut ’akhashveirosh ‘am maredokhai. bakhodesh harishon hu khodesh nisan bishnat shetem ‘esreh lamelekh ’akhashveirosh hipil pur hu hagoral lifnei haman miyom leyom umeikhodesh lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar. vayomer haman lamelekh ’akhashveirosh yeshno ‘am ’ekhad mefuzar umeforad ben ha‘amim bekhol medinot malkhutekha vedateihem shonot mikal ‘am ve’et datei hamelekh ’einam ‘osim velamelekh ’en shoeh lehanikham. ’im ‘al hamelekh tob yikateb le’abedam va‘aseret ’alafim kikar kesef ’eshqol ‘al yedei ‘osei hamelakhah lehabi ’el ginzei hamelekh. vayasar hamelekh ’et taba‘to mei‘al yado vayitenah lehaman ben hamedata ha’agagi tsorer hayehudim. vayomer hamelekh lehaman hakesef natun lakh veha‘am la‘asot bo katob be‘einekha. vayiqare’u soferei hamelekh bakhodesh harishon bishloshah ‘asar yom bo vayikateb kekhal ’asher tsivah haman ’el ’akhashdarpenei hamelekh ve’el hapakhot ’asher ‘al medinah umedinah ve’el sarei ‘am va‘am medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve‘am va‘am kilshono beshem hamelekh ’akhashveirosh nikhtab venekhtam betaba‘at hamelekh. venishloakh sefarim beyad haratsim ’el kal medinot hamelekh lehashmid laharog ule’abed ’et kal hayehudim mina‘ar ve‘ad zaqen taf venashim beyom ’ekhad bishloshah ‘asar lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar ushelalam laboz. patshegen haketab lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha‘amim lihyot ‘atidim layom hazeh. haratsim yatse’u dekhufim bidbar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah vehamelekh vehaman yashebu lishtot veha‘ir shushan nabokhah. umaredokhai yada‘ ’et kal ’asher na‘asah vayiqra‘ maredokhai ’et begadav vayilbash saq va’eifer vayeitsei betokh ha‘ir vayiz‘aq ze‘aqah gedolah umarah. vayabo ‘ad lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh ki ’en labo ’el sha‘ar hamelekh bilbush saq. ubekhal medinah umedinah meqom ’asher debar hamelekh vedato magia‘ ’eibel gadol layehudim vetsom ubekhi umisped saq va’eifer yutsa‘ larabim. vatebo’enah na‘arot ’ester vesariseha vayagidu lah vatitkhalkhal hamalkah me’od vatishlakh begadim lehalbish ’et maredokhai ulehasir saqo mei‘alav velo qibel. vatiqra ’ester lahatakh misarisei hamelekh ’asher he‘emid lefaneha vatetsaveihu ‘al maredokhai lada‘at mah zeh ve‘al mah zeh. vayeitsei hatakh ’el maredokhai ’el rekhob ha‘ir ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh. vayaged lo maredokhai ’et kal ’asher qarahu ve’et parashat hakesef ’asher ’amar haman lishqol ‘al ginzei hamelekh bayehudiyim bayehudim le’abedam. ve’et patshegen ketab hadat ’asher nitan beshushan lehashmidam natan lo lehar’ot ’et ’ester ulehagid lah uletsavot ‘aleha labo ’el hamelekh lehitkhanen lo ulebaqesh milefanav ‘al ‘amah. vayabo hatakh vayaged le’ester ’et dibrei maredokhai. vatomer ’ester lahatakh vatetsaveihu ’el maredokhai. kal ‘abdei hamelekh ve‘am medinot hamelekh yod‘im ’asher kal ’ish ve’ishah ’asher yabo ’el hamelekh ’el hekhatser hapenimit ’asher lo yiqarei ’akhat dato lehamit lebad mei’asher yoshit lo hamelekh ’et sharbit hazahab vekhayah va’ani lo niqreiti labo ’el hamelekh zeh sheloshim yom. vayagidu lemaredokhai ’et dibrei ’ester. vayomer maredokhai lehashib ’el ’ester ’al tedami benafshekh lehimalet bet hamelekh mikal hayehudim. ki ’im hakharesh takharishi ba‘et hazot revakh vehatsalah ya‘amod layehudim mimaqom ’akher ve’at ubet ’abikh tobeidu umi yodeia‘ ’im le‘et kazot higa‘at lamalkhut. vatomer ’ester lehashib ’el maredokhai. lekh kenos ’et kal hayehudim hanimtse’im beshushan vetsumu ‘alai ve’al tokhelu ve’al tishtu sheloshet yamim laylah vayom gam ’ani vena‘arotai ’atsum ken ubekhen ’abo ’el hamelekh ’asher lo khadat vekha’asher ’abadti ’abadeti. vaya‘abor maredokhai vaya‘as kekhol ’asher tsivetah ‘alav ’ester. vayhi bayom hashelishi vatilbash ’ester malkhut vata‘amod bakhatsar bet hamelekh hapenimit nokhakh bet hamelekh vehamelekh yosheb ‘al kisei malkhuto bebet hamalkhut nokhakh petakh habayit. vayhi khir’ot hamelekh ’et ’ester hamalkah ‘omedet bekhatser nase’ah khen be‘einav vayoshet hamelekh le’ester ’et sharbit hazahab ’asher beyado vatiqrab ’ester vatiga‘ berosh hasharbit. vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh ’ester hamalkah umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut veyinaten lakh. vatomer ’ester ’im ‘al hamelekh tob yabo hamelekh vehaman hayom ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asiti lo. vayomer hamelekh maharu ’et haman la‘asot ’et debar ’ester vayabo hamelekh vehaman ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’ester. vayomer hamelekh le’ester bemishteh hayayin mah she’eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut vetei‘as. vata‘an ’ester vatomar she’eilati ubaqashati. ’im matsati khen be‘einei hamelekh ve’im ‘al hamelekh tob latet ’et she’eilati vela‘asot ’et baqashati yabo hamelekh vehaman ’el hamishteh ’asher ’e‘eseh lahem umakhar ’e‘eseh kidbar hamelekh. vayeitsei haman bayom hahu sameiakh vetob leb vekhir’ot haman ’et maredokhai besha‘ar hamelekh velo qam velo za‘ mimenu vayimalei haman ‘al maredokhai kheimah. vayit’apaq haman vayabo ’el beito vayishlakh vayabei ’et ’ohabav ve’et zeresh ’ishto. vaysaper lahem haman ’et kebod ‘ashero verob banav ve’et kal ’asher gidelo hamelekh ve’et ’asher nise’o ‘al hasarim ve‘abdei hamelekh. vayomer haman ’af lo heibi’ah ’ester hamalkah ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asatah ki ’im ’oti vegam lemakhar ’ani qaru lah ‘im hamelekh. vekhal zeh ’einenu shoeh li bekhal ‘et ’asher ’ani ro’eh ’et maredokhai hayehudi yosheb besha‘ar hamelekh. vatomer lo zeresh ’ishto vekhal ’ohabav ya‘asu ‘ets gaboah khamishim ’amah ubaboqer ’emor lamelekh veyitlu ’et maredokhai ‘alav ubo ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh sameiakh vayitab hadabar lifnei haman vaya‘as ha‘ets. balaylah hahu nadedah shenat hamelekh vayomer lehabi ’et seifer hazikhronot dibrei hayamim vayihyu niqra’im lifnei hamelekh. vayimatsei khatub ’asher higid maredokhai ‘al bigtana vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf ’asher biqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh ’akhashveirosh. vayomer hamelekh mah na‘asah yeqar ugedulah lemaredokhai ‘al zeh vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetav lo na‘asah ‘imo dabar. vayomer hamelekh mi bekhatser vehaman ba lakhatsar bet hamelekh hakhitsonah leimor lamelekh litlot ’et maredokhai ‘al ha‘ets ’asher heikhin lo. vayomeru na‘arei hamelekh ’eilav hineh haman ‘omed bekhatser vayomer hamelekh yabo. vayabo haman vayomer lo hamelekh mah la‘asot ba’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro vayomer haman belibo lemi yakhpots hamelekh la‘asot yeqar yoter mimeni. vayomer haman ’el hamelekh ’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. yabi’u lebush malkhut ’asher labash bo hamelekh vesus ’asher rakhab ‘alav hamelekh va’asher nitan keter malkhut berosho. venaton halebush vehasus ‘al yad ’ish misarei hamelekh hapartemim vehilbishu ’et ha’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro vehirkibuhu ‘al hasus birkhob ha‘ir veqare’u lefanav kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. vayomer hamelekh lehaman maher qakh ’et halebush ve’et hasus ka’asher dibarta va‘aseh khen lemaredokhai hayehudi hayosheb besha‘ar hamelekh ’al tapel dabar mikol ’asher dibarta. vayiqakh haman ’et halebush ve’et hasus vayalbesh ’et maredokhai vayarkibeihu birkhob ha‘ir vayiqra lefanav kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish ’asher hamelekh khafets biqaro. vayashab maredokhai ’el sha‘ar hamelekh vehaman nidkhaf ’el beito ’abel vakhafui rosh. vaysaper haman lezeresh ’ishto ulekhal ’ohabav ’et kal ’asher qarahu vayomeru lo khakhamav vezeresh ’ishto ’im mizera‘ hayehudim maredokhai ’asher hakhilota linpol lefanav lo tukhal lo ki nafol tipol lefanav. ‘odam medaberim ‘imo vesarisei hamelekh higi‘u vayabhilu lehabi ’et haman ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’ester. vayabo hamelekh vehaman lishtot ‘im ’ester hamalkah. vayomer hamelekh le’ester gam bayom hasheini bemishteh hayayin mah she’eilatekh ’ester hamalkah vetinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘ad khatsi hamalkhut vetei‘as. vata‘an ’ester hamalkah vatomar ’im matsati khen be‘einekha hamelekh ve’im ‘al hamelekh tob tinaten li nafshi bish’eilati ve‘ami bebaqashati. ki nimkarnu ’ani ve‘ami lehashmid laharog ule’abed ve’ilu la‘abadim velishfakhot nimkarnu hekherashti ki ’en hatsar shoeh beneizeq hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh ’akhashveirosh vayomer le’ester hamalkah mi hu zeh ve’ei zeh hu ’asher mela’o libo la‘asot ken. vatomer ’ester ’ish tsar ve’oyeb haman hara‘ hazeh vehaman nib‘at milifnei hamelekh vehamalkah. vehamelekh qam bakhamato mimishteh hayayin ’el ginat habitan vehaman ‘amad lebaqesh ‘al nafsho mei’ester hamalkah ki ra’ah ki khaletah ’eilav hara‘ah mei’et hamelekh. vehamelekh shab miginat habitan ’el bet mishteh hayayin vehaman nofel ‘al hamitah ’asher ’ester ‘aleha vayomer hamelekh hagam likhbosh ’et hamalkah ‘imi babayit hadabar yatsa mipi hamelekh ufenei haman khafu. vayomer kharbonah ’ekhad min hasarisim lifnei hamelekh gam hineh ha‘ets ’asher ‘asah haman lemaredokhai ’asher diber tob ‘al hamelekh ‘omed bebet haman gaboah khamishim ’amah vayomer hamelekh teluhu ‘alav. vayitlu ’et haman ‘al ha‘ets ’asher heikhin lemaredokhai vakhamat hamelekh shakhakhah. bayom hahu natan hamelekh ’akhashveirosh le’ester hamalkah ’et bet haman tsorer hayehudiyim hayehudim umaredokhai ba lifnei hamelekh ki higidah ’ester mah hu lah. vayasar hamelekh ’et taba‘to ’asher he‘ebir meihaman vayitenah lemaredokhai vatasem ’ester ’et maredokhai ‘al bet haman. vatosef ’ester vatedaber lifnei hamelekh vatipol lifnei raglav vateibek vatitkhanen lo leha‘abir ’et ra‘at haman ha’agagi ve’et makhashabto ’asher khashab ‘al hayehudim. vayoshet hamelekh le’ester ’et sharbit hazahab vataqam ’ester vata‘amod lifnei hamelekh. vatomer ’im ‘al hamelekh tob ve’im matsati khen lefanav vekhasher hadabar lifnei hamelekh vetobah ’ani be‘einav yikateb lehashib ’et hasefarim makhashebet haman ben hamedata ha’agagi ’asher katab le’abed ’et hayehudim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh. ki ’eikhakhah ’ukhal vera’iti bara‘ah ’asher yimtsa ’et ‘ami ve’eikhakhah ’ukhal vera’iti be’abedan moladti. vayomer hamelekh ’akhashveirosh le’ester hamalkah ulemaredokhai hayehudi hineh bet haman natati le’ester ve’oto talu ‘al ha‘ets ‘al ’asher shalakh yado bayehudiyim bayehudim. ve’atem kitbu ‘al hayehudim katob be‘eineikhem beshem hamelekh vekhitmu betaba‘at hamelekh ki khetab ’asher nikhtab beshem hamelekh venakhtom betaba‘at hamelekh ’en lehashib. vayiqare’u soferei hamelekh ba‘et hahi bakhodesh hashelishi hu khodesh sivan bishloshah ve‘esrim bo vayikateb kekhal ’asher tsivah maredokhai ’el hayehudim ve’el ha’akhashdarpenim vehapakhot vesarei hamedinot ’asher meihodu ve‘ad kush sheba‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve‘am va‘am kilshono ve’el hayehudim kikhtabam vekhilshonam. vayikhtob beshem hamelekh ’akhashveirosh vayakhtom betaba‘at hamelekh vayishlakh sefarim beyad haratsim basusim rokhebei harekhesh ha’akhashteranim benei haramakhim. ’asher natan hamelekh layehudim ’asher bekhal ‘ir va‘ir lehiqahel vela‘amod ‘al nafsham lehashmid velaharog ule’abed ’et kal khel ‘am umedinah hatsarim ’otam taf venashim ushelalam laboz. beyom ’ekhad bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh bishloshah ‘asar lekhodesh shenem ‘asar hu khodesh ’adar. patshegen haketab lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha‘amim velihyot hayehudiyim hayehudim ‘atudim ‘atidim layom hazeh lehinaqem mei’oyebeihem. haratsim rokhebei harekhesh ha’akhashteranim yatse’u mebohalim udekhufim bidbar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah. umaredokhai yatsa milifnei hamelekh bilbush malkhut tekheilet vakhur va‘ateret zahab gedolah vetakhrikh buts ve’argaman veha‘ir shushan tsahalah vesameikhah. layehudim hayetah ’orah vesimkhah vesason viqar. ubekhal medinah umedinah ubekhal ‘ir va‘ir meqom ’asher debar hamelekh vedato magia‘ simkhah vesason layehudim mishteh veyom tob verabim mei‘amei ha’arets mityahadim ki nafal pakhad hayehudim ‘aleihem. ubishnem ‘asar khodesh hu khodesh ’adar bishloshah ‘asar yom bo ’asher higia‘ debar hamelekh vedato lehei‘asot bayom ’asher siberu ’oyebei hayehudim lishlot bahem venahafokh hu ’asher yishletu hayehudim hemah besone’eihem. niqhalu hayehudim be‘areihem bekhal medinot hamelekh ’okhashveirosh lishloakh yad bimbaqshei ra‘atam ve’ish lo ‘amad lifneihem ki nafal pakhdam ‘al kal ha‘amim. vekhal sarei hamedinot veha’akhashdarpenim vehapakhot ve‘osei hamelakhah ’asher lamelekh menase’im ’et hayehudim ki nafal pakhad maredokhai ‘aleihem. ki gadol maredokhai bebet hamelekh veshame‘o holekh bekhal hamedinot ki ha’ish maredokhai holekh vegadol. vayaku hayehudim bekhal ’oyebeihem makat khereb vehereg ve’abdan vaya‘asu besone’eihem kirtsonam. ubeshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve’abed khamesh mei’ot ’ish. ve’et parshandata ve’et dalfon ve’et ’aspata. ve’et porata ve’et ’adalya ve’et ’aridata. ve’et parmashta ve’et ’arisai ve’et ’aridai ve’et vayzata. ‘aseret benei haman ben hamedata tsorer hayehudim haragu ubabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. bayom hahu ba mispar haharugim beshushan habirah lifnei hamelekh. vayomer hamelekh le’ester hamalkah beshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve’abed khamesh mei’ot ’ish ve’et ‘aseret benei haman bish’ar medinot hamelekh meh ‘asu umah she’eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh ‘od vetei‘as. vatomer ’ester ’im ‘al hamelekh tob yinaten gam makhar layehudim ’asher beshushan la‘asot kedat hayom ve’et ‘aseret benei haman yitlu ‘al ha‘ets. vayomer hamelekh lehei‘asot ken vatinaten dat beshushan ve’et ‘aseret benei haman talu. vayiqahalu hayehudiyim hayehudim ’asher beshushan gam beyom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar vayahargu beshushan shelosh mei’ot ’ish ubabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. ushe’ar hayehudim ’asher bimdinot hamelekh niqhalu ve‘amod ‘al nafsham venoakh mei’oyebeihem veharog besone’eihem khamishah veshib‘im ’alef ubabizah lo shalekhu ’et yadam. beyom sheloshah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar venoakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar bo ve‘asoh ’oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. vehayehudiyim vehayehudim ’asher beshushan niqhalu bishloshah ‘asar bo ube’arba‘ah ‘asar bo venoakh bakhamishah ‘asar bo ve‘asoh ’oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. ‘al ken hayehudim haperozim haperazim hayoshebim be‘arei haperazot ‘osim ’et yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar simkhah umishteh veyom tob umishloakh manot ’ish lerei‘eihu. vayikhtob maredokhai ’et hadebarim ha’eleh vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal hayehudim ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’akhashveirosh haqerobim veharekhoqim. leqayem ‘aleihem lihyot ‘osim ’et yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar lekhodesh ’adar ve’et yom khamishah ‘asar bo bekhal shanah veshanah. kayamim ’asher nakhu bahem hayehudim mei’oybeihem vehakhodesh ’asher nehpakh lahem miyagon lesimkhah umei’eibel leyom tob la‘asot ’otam yemei mishteh vesimkhah umishloakh manot ’ish lerei‘eihu umatanot la’ebyonim. veqibel hayehudim ’et ’asher heikhelu la‘asot ve’et ’asher katab maredokhai ’aleihem. ki haman ben hamedata ha’agagi tsorer kal hayehudim khashab ‘al hayehudim le’abedam vehipil pur hu hagoral lehumam ule’abedam. ubebo’ah lifnei hamelekh ’amar ‘im haseifer yashub makhashabto hara‘ah ’asher khashab ‘al hayehudim ‘al rosho vetalu ’oto ve’et banav ‘al ha‘ets. ‘al ken qare’u layamim ha’eleh furim ‘al shem hapur ‘al ken ‘al kal dibrei ha’igeret hazot umah ra’u ‘al kakhah umah higia‘ ’aleihem. qiyemu veqibel veqibelu hayehudim ‘aleihem ve‘al zar‘am ve‘al kal hanilvim ‘aleihem velo ya‘abor lihyot ‘osim ’et shenei hayamim ha’eleh kikhtabam vekhizmanam bekhal shanah veshanah. vehayamim ha’eleh nizkarim vena‘asim bekhal dor vador mishpakhah umishpakhah medinah umedinah ve‘ir va‘ir vimei hapurim ha’eleh lo ya‘abru mitokh hayehudim vezikhram lo yasuf mizar‘am. vatikhtob ’ester hamalkah bat ’abikhayil umaredokhai hayehudi ’et kal toqef leqayem ’et ’igeret hapurim hazot hasheinit. vayishlakh sefarim ’el kal hayehudim ’el sheba‘ ve‘esrim umei’ah medinah malkhut ’akhashveirosh dibrei shalom ve’emet. leqayem ’et yemei hapurim ha’eleh bizmaneihem ka’asher qiyam ‘aleihem maredokhai hayehudi ve’ester hamalkah vekha’asher qiyemu ‘al nafsham ve‘al zar‘am dibrei hatsomot veza‘aqatam. uma’amar ’ester qiyam dibrei hapurim ha’eleh venikhtab baseifer. vayasem hamelekh ’akhasheirosh ’akhashveirosh mas ‘al ha’arets ve’iyei hayam. vekhal ma‘aseh taqepo ugeburato ufarashat gedulat maredokhai ’asher gidelo hamelekh halo hem ketubim ‘al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei madai ufaras. ki maredokhai hayehudi mishneh lamelekh ’akhashveirosh vegadol layehudim veratsui lerob ’ekhav doresh tob le‘amo vedober shalom lekhal zar‘o. bishnat shalosh lemalkhut yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba nebukhadnetsar melekh babel yerushalim vayatsar ‘aleha. vayiten ’adonai beyado ’et yehoyaqim melekh yehudah umiqtsat kelei bet ha’elohim vaybi’em ’erets shin‘ar bet ’elohav ve’et hakeilim heibi bet ’otsar ’elohav. vayomer hamelekh le’ashpenaz rab sarisav lehabi mibenei yisra’el umizera‘ hamelukhah umin hapartemim. yeladim ’asher ’en bahem kal me’um mum vetobei mar’eh umaskilim bekhal khakhmah veyode‘ei da‘at umebinei mada‘ va’asher koakh bahem la‘amod beheikhal hamelekh ulalamedam seifer uleshon kasdim. vayman lahem hamelekh debar yom beyomo mipat bag hamelekh umiyen mishtav ulegadelam shanim shalosh umiqtsatam ya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. vayhi bahem mibenei yehudah daniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah. vayasem lahem sar hasarisim sheimot vayasem ledaniyel beileteshatsar velakhananyah shadrakh ulemisha’el meishakh vela‘azaryah ‘abed nego. vayasem daniyel ‘al libo ’asher lo yitga’al befatbag hamelekh ubeyen mishtav vaybaqesh misar hasarisim ’asher lo yitga’al. vayiten ha’elohim ’et daniyel lekhesed ulerakhamim lifnei sar hasarisim. vayomer sar hasarisim ledaniyel yarei ’ani ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’asher minah ’et ma’akhalkhem ve’et mishteikhem ’asher lamah yir’eh ’et peneikhem zo‘afim min hayladim ’asher kegilekhem vekhiyabtem ’et roshi lamelekh. vayomer daniyel ’el hameltsar ’asher minah sar hasarisim ‘al daniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah. nas na ’et ‘abadekha yamim ‘asarah veyitenu lanu min hazeiro‘im venokhelah umayim venishteh. veyeira’u lefanekha mar’einu umar’eh hayladim ha’okhelim ’et patbag hamelekh vekha’asher tir’eh ‘aseh ‘im ‘abadekha. vayishma‘ lahem ladabar hazeh vaynasem yamim ‘asarah. umiqtsat yamim ‘asarah nir’ah mar’eihem tob uberi’ei basar min kal hayladim ha’okhelim ’et patbag hamelekh. vayhi hameltsar nosei ’et patbagam veyen mishteihem venoten lahem zeire‘onim. vehayladim ha’eleh ’arba‘tam natan lahem ha’elohim mada‘ vehaskel bekhal seifer vekhakhemah vedaniyel heibin bekhal khazon vakhalomot. ulemiqtsat hayamim ’asher ’amar hamelekh lahabi’am vaybi’em sar hasarisim lifnei nebukhadnetsar. vaydaber ’itam hamelekh velo nimtsa mikulam kedaniyel khananyah misha’el va‘azaryah vaya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. vekhol debar khakhemat binah ’asher biqesh meihem hamelekh vayimtsa’em ‘eser yadot ‘al kal hakhartumim ha’ashafim ’asher bekhal malkhuto. vayhi daniyel ‘ad shenat ’akhat lekhoresh hamelekh. ubishnat shetayim lemalkhut nebukhadnetsar khalam nebukhadnetsar khalomot vatitpa‘em rukho ushenato nihyetah ‘alav. vayomer hamelekh liqro lakhartumim vela’ashafim velamkhashefim velakasdim lehagid lamelekh khalomotav vayabo’u vaya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. vayomer lahem hamelekh khalom khalameti vatipa‘em rukhi lada‘at ’et hakhalom. vaydaberu hakasdim lamelekh ’aramit malka le‘alemin kheyi ’emar khelma le‘abdayikh le‘abdakh ufishra nekhavei. ‘aneh malka ve’amar lekhasdayei lekhasda’ei mileta mini ’azda hen la tehod‘unani khelma ufishreh hadamin tit‘abdun ubateikhon nevali yitesamun. vehen khelma ufishreh tehakhavon matenan unebizbah viqar sagi teqabelun min qodamai lahen khelma ufishreh hakhavoni. ‘ano tinyanut ve’amerin malka khelma yeimar le‘abdohi ufishrah nehakhaveh. ‘aneh malka ve’amar min yatsib yada‘ ’anah di ‘idana ’antun zabenin kal qobel di khazeiton di ’azda mini mileta. di hen khelma la tehod‘unani khadah hi datekhon umilah khidbah ushekhitah hazmintun hizdemintun lemeimar qadamai ‘ad di ‘idana yishtanei lahen khelma ’emaru li ve’inda‘ di fishreh tehakhavunani. ‘ano khasdayei khasda’ei qodam malka ve’amerin la ’itai ’anash ‘al yabeshta di milat malka yukhal lehakhavayah kal qobel di kal melekh rab veshalit milah khidnah la she’el lekhal khartom ve’ashaf vekhasdai. umileta di malkah sha’el yaqirah ve’akhoran la ’itai di yekhavinah qodam malka lahen ’elahin di medarehon ‘im bisra la ’itohi. kal qobel denah malka benas uqetsaf sagi va’amar lehobadah lekhol khakimei babel. vedata nefqat vekhakimaya mitqatelin ube‘o daniyel vekhabrohi lehitqetalah. beidayin daniyel hatib ‘eita ute‘em le’aryokh rab tabakhaya di malka di nefaq leqatalah lekhakimei babel. ‘aneh ve’amar le’aryokh shalita di malka ‘al mah data mehakhtsefah min qodam malka ’edayin mileta hoda‘ ’aryokh ledaniyel. vedaniyel ‘al ube‘ah min malka di zeman yinten leh ufishra lehakhavayah lemalka. ’edayin daniyel lebayteh ’azal velakhananyah misha’el va‘azaryah khabrohi mileta hoda‘. verakhamin lemib‘ei min qodam ’elah shemaya ‘al razah denah di la yehobedun daniyel vekhabrohi ‘im she’ar khakimei babel. ’edayin ledaniyel bekhezva di leileya razah gali ’edayin daniyel barikh le’elah shemaya. ‘aneh daniyel ve’amar lehevei shemeh di ’elaha mebarakh min ‘alema ve‘ad ‘alema di khakhemeta ugebureta di leh hi. vehu mehashnei ‘idanaya vezimnaya meha‘deh malkhin umehaqem malkhin yaheb khakhemeta lekhakimin umande‘a leyade‘ei binah. hu galei ‘amiqata umesaterata yada‘ mah bakhashokha unehira unehora ‘imeh sherei. lakh ’elah ’abahati mehodei umeshabakh ’anah di khakhemeta ugebureta yehabt li ukhe‘an hoda‘tani di be‘eina minakh di milat malka hoda‘tena. kal qobel denah daniyel ‘al ‘al ’aryokh di mani malka lehobadah lekhakimei babel ’azal vekhen ’amar leh lekhakimei babel ’al tehobed ha‘eileni qodam malka ufishra lemalka ’akhavei. ’edayin ’aryokh behitbehalah han‘el ledaniyel qodam malka vekhen ’amar leh di hashkakhat gebar min benei galuta di yehud di fishra lemalka yehoda‘. ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar ha’itayikh ha’itakh kahel lehoda‘utani khelma di khazet ufishreh. ‘aneh daniyel qodam malka ve’amar razah di malka sha’el la khakimin ’ashefin khartumin gazerin yakhelin lehakhavayah lemalka. beram ’itai ’elah bishmaya galei razin vehoda‘ lemalka nebukhadnetsar mah di lehevei be’akharit yomaya khelmakh vekhezvei reishakh ‘al mishkebakh denah hu. ’antah malka ra‘yonakh ‘al mishkebakh seliqu mah di lehevei ’akharei denah vegalei razaya hod‘akh mah di lehevei. va’anah la bekhakhemah di ’itai bi min kal khayaya raza denah geli li lahen ‘al dibrat di fishra lemalka yehod‘un vera‘yonei libbakh tinda‘. ’antah malka khazeh havayta va’alu tselem khad sagi tsalma diken rab veziveh yatir qa’em leqabelakh vereiveh dekhil. hu tsalma reisheh di dehab tab khadohi udera‘ohi di khesaf me‘ohi veyarkhateh di nekhash. shaqohi di farzel raglohi minehon minehen di farzel uminehon uminehen di khasaf. khazeh havayta ‘ad di hitgezeret ’eben di la bidayin umekhat letsalma ‘al raglohi di farzela vekhaspa vehadeiqet himon. beidayin daqu khakhadah parzela khaspa nekhasha kaspa vedahaba vahavo ke‘ur min ’iderei qayit unesa himon rukha vekhal ’atar la hishtakhakh lehon ve’abna di mekhat letsalma havat letur rab umelat kal ’ar‘a. denah khelma ufishreh neimar qodam malka. ’antah malka melekh malkhaya di ’elah shemaya malkhuta khisna vetaqepa viqara yehab lakh. ubekhal di da’arin dayerin benei ’anasha kheivat bara ve‘of shemaya yehab bidakh vehashletakh bekhalehon ’antah hu reishah di dahaba. ubaterakh tequm malkhu ’akhori ’ara‘ minakh umalkhu telitaya telita’ah ’akhori di nekhasha di tishlat bekhal ’ar‘a. umalkhu rebi‘ayah rebi‘a’ah tehevei taqifah kefarzela kal qobel di farzela mehadeq vekhashel kola ukhefarzela di mera‘a‘ kal ’ilen tadiq veteiroa‘. vedi khazaytah raglaya ve’etsbe‘ata minehon minehen khasaf di fekhar uminehon uminehen parzel malkhu feligah teheveh umin nitsbeta di farzela lehevei bah kal qobel di khazaytah parzela me‘arab bakhasaf tina. ve’etsbe‘at raglaya minehon minehen parzel uminehon uminehen khasaf min qetsat malkhuta teheveh taqifah uminah teheveh tebirah. di vedi khazayta parzela me‘arab bakhasaf tina mit‘arebin lehevon bizra‘ ’anasha vela lehevon dabeqin denah ‘im denah hei khedi farzela la mit‘arab ‘im khaspa. ubeyomeihon di malkhaya ’inun yeqim ’elah shemaya malkhu di le‘alemin la titkhabal umalkhutah le‘am ’akhoran la tishtebiq tadiq vetasef kal ’ilen malkhevata vehi tequm le‘alemaya. kal qobel di khazayta di mitura ’itgezeret ’eben di la bidayin vehadeqet parzela nekhasha khaspa kaspa vedahaba ’elah rab hoda‘ lemalka mah di lehevei ’akharei denah veyatsib khelma umeheiman pishreh. beidayin malka nebukhadnetsar nefal ‘al ’anpohi uledaniyel segid uminkhah venikhokhin ’amar lenasakhah leh. ‘aneh malka ledaniyel ve’amar min qeshot di ’elahakhon hu ’elah ’elahin umarei malkhin vegaleh razin di yekheileta lemiglei razah denah. ’edayin malka ledaniyel rabi umatenan rabreban sagi’an yehab leh vehashleteh ‘al kal medinat babel verab signin ‘al kal khakimei babel. vedaniyel be‘a min malka umani ‘al ‘abideta di medinat babel leshadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego vedaniyel bitra‘ malka. nebukhadnetsar malka ‘abad tselem di dehab rumeh ’amin shitin petayeh ’amin shit ’aqimeh bebiq‘at dura bimdinat babel. unebukhadnetsar malka shelakh lemikhnash la’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata ’adargazeraya gedaberaya detaberaya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lemeitei lakhanukat tsalma di haqem nebukhadnetsar malka. beidayin mitkaneshin ’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata ’adargazeraya gedaberaya detaberaya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lakhanukat tsalma di haqem nebukhadnetsar malka veqa’amin veqayemin laqobel tsalma di haqem nebukhadnetsar. vekharoza qarei bekhayil lekhon ’amerin ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya. be‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin sumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun letselem dahaba di haqem nebukhadnetsar malka. uman di la yipel veyisgud bah sha‘ata yitremei lego ’atun nura yaqidta. kal qobel denah beh zimna kedi shame‘in kal ‘amaya qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vekhol zenei zemara nafelin kal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya sagedin letselem dahaba di haqem nebukhadnetsar malka. kal qobel denah beh zimna qeribu gubrin kasda’in va’akhalu qartseihon di yehudayei. ‘ano ve’amerin linbukhadnetsar malka malka le‘alemin kheyi. ’antah ’ant malka sameta te‘em di khal ’enash di yishma‘ qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha fesanteirin vesiponeyah vesuponeyah vekhol zenei zemara yipel veyisgud letselem dahaba. uman di la yipel veyisgud yitremei lego ’atun nura yaqidta. ’itai gubrin yehudayin di manita yatehon ‘al ‘abidat medinat babel shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego gubraya ’ilekh la samu ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka te‘em leilahayikh leilahakh la falekhin uletselem dahaba di haqeimeta la sagedin. beidayin nebukhadnetsar birgaz vakhamah ’amar lehaytayah leshadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego beidayin gubraya ’ilekh heitayu qodam malka. ‘aneh nebukhadnetsar ve’amar lehon hatsda shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego leilahai la ’iteikhon palekhin uletselem dahaba di haqeimet la sagedin. ke‘an hen ’iteikhon ‘atidin di be‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vesumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun letsalma di ‘abdet vehen la tisgedun bah sha‘atah titremon lego ’atun nura yaqidta uman hu ’elah dei yesheizebinkhon min yedai. ‘ano shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego ve’amerin lemalka nebukhadnetsar la khashkhin ’anakhnah ‘al denah pitgam lahatabutakh. hen ’itai ’elahana di ’anakhna falekhin yakhil lesheizabutana min ’atun nura yaqidta umin yedakh malka yesheizib. vehen la yedia‘ lehevei lakh malka di leilahayikh la ’itayna ’itana falekhin uletselem dahaba di haqeimeta la nisgud. beidayin nebukhadnetsar hitmeli khema utselem ’anpohi ’eshtanu ’eshtani ‘al shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego ‘aneh ve’amar lemeizei le’atuna khad shib‘ah ‘al di khazeh lemeizeyeh. ulegubrin gibarei khayil di bekhayleh ’amar lekhapatah leshadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego lemirmei le’atun nura yaqidta. beidayin gubraya ’ilekh kefitu besarbaleihon patisheihon patesheihon vekharbelatehon ulebusheihon uremiv lego ’atun nura yaqidta. kal qobel denah min di milat malka makhtsefah ve’atuna ’eizeh yatira gubraya ’ilekh di hasiqu leshadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego qatil himon shebiba di nura. vegubraya ’ilekh telateihon shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego nefalu lego ’atun nura yaqidta mekhapetin. ’edayin nebukhadnetsar malka tevah veqam behitbehalah ‘aneh ve’amar lehadaberohi hala gubrin telata remeina lego nura mekhapetin ‘anayin ve’amerin lemalka yatsiba malka. ‘aneh ve’amar ha ’anah khazeh gubrin ’arbe‘ah sherayin mahlekhin bego nura vakhabal la ’itai behon vereiveh di rebi‘aya rebi‘a’ah dameh lebar ’elahin. beidayin qereb nebukhadnetsar litra‘ ’atun nura yaqidta ‘aneh ve’amar shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego ‘abdohi di ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah puqu ve’eto beidayin nafeqin shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego min go nura. umitkaneshin ’akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata vehadaberei malka khazayin legubraya ’ilekh di la shelet nura begeshmehon use‘ar reishehon la hitkharakh vesarebaleihon la sheno vereiakh nur la ‘adat behon. ‘aneh nebukhadnetsar ve’amar berikh ’elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego di shelakh mal’akheh vesheizib le‘abdohi di hitrekhitsu ‘alohi umilat malka shaniv vihabu geshmeihon geshmehon di la yiflekhun vela yisgedun lekhal ’elah lahen leilahahon. umini sim te‘em di khal ‘am ’umah velishan di yeimar sheilah shalu ‘al ’elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego hadamin yit‘abed ubayteh nevali yishtaveh kal qobel di la ’itai ’elah ’akhoran di yikul lehatsalah kidnah. beidayin malka hatslakh leshadrakh meishakh va‘abed nego bimdinat babel. nebukhadnetsar malka lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. ’ataya vetimhaya di ‘abad ‘imi ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah shefar qadamai lehakhavayah. ’atohi kemah rabrebin vetimhohi kemah taqifin malkhuteh malkhut ‘alam veshaletaneh ‘im dar vedar. ’anah nebukhadnetsar sheleh havet bebeiti vera‘nan beheikheli. kheilem khazet vidakhalinani veharhorin ‘al mishkebi vekhezvei reishi yebahalunani. umini sim te‘em lehan‘alah qadamai lekhol khakimei babel di feshar khelma yehod‘unani. beidayin ‘alalin ‘alin khartumaya ’ashefaya kasdayei kasda’ei vegazeraya vekhelma ’amar ’anah qodameihon ufishreh la mehod‘in li. ve‘ad ’akhoren ‘al qadamai daniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar keshum ’elahi vedi ruakh ’elahin qadishin beh vekhelma qadamohi ’amret. beileteshatsar rab khartumaya di ’anah yid‘et di ruakh ’elahin qadishin bakh vekhal raz la ’anes lakh khezvei khelmi di khazet ufishreh ’emar. vekhezvei reishi ‘al mishkebi khazeh havet va’alu ’ilan bego ’ar‘a verumeh sagi. rebah ’ilana uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lesof kal ’ar‘a. ‘afeyeh shapir ve’inbeh sagi umazon lekhola beh tekhotohi tatlel kheivat bara ube‘anfohi yedurun yeduran tsiparei shemaya umineh yitezin kal bisra. khazeh havet bekhezvei reishi ‘al mishkebi va’alu ‘ir veqadish min shemaya nakhit. qarei bekhayil vekhen ’amar godu ’ilana veqatsitsu ‘anfohi ’ataru ‘afeyeh ubadaru ’inbeh tenud kheiveta min takhtohi vetsiperaya min ‘anfohi. beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shebuqu ube’esur di farzel unekhash bedit’a di bara ubetal shemaya yitstaba‘ ve‘im kheiveta khalaqeh ba‘asab ’ar‘a. libbeh min ’enosha ’anasha yeshanon ulebab kheivah yityehib leh veshib‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alohi. bigzeirat ‘irin pitgama umeimar qadishin she’eileta ‘ad dibrat di yinde‘un khayaya di shalit ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’enosha ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah ushefal ’anashim yeqim ‘alayah ‘alah. denah khelma khazet ’anah malka nebukhadnetsar ve’antah ve’ant beileteshatsar pishrei ’emar kal qobel di kal khakimei malkhuti la yakhelin pishra lehoda‘utani ve’antah ve’ant kahel di ruakh ’elahin qadishin bakh. ’edayin daniyel di shemeh beileteshatsar ’eshtomam kesha‘ah khadah vera‘yonohi yebahaluneh ‘aneh malka ve’amar beileteshatsar khelma ufishrei ’al yebahalakh ‘aneh beileteshatsar ve’amar mare’i mari khelma lesane’ayikh lesane’akh ufishreh le‘arayikh le‘arakh ’ilana di khazayta di rebah uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lekhal ’ar‘a. ve‘afeyeh shapir ve’inbeh sagi umazon lekhola beh tekhotohi tedur kheivat bara ube‘anfohi yishkenan tsiparei shemaya. ’antah ’ant hu malka di rebayt uteqeifet urebutakh rebat umetat lishmaya veshaletanakh lesof ’ar‘a. vedi khazah malka ‘ir veqadish nakhit min shemaya ve’amar godu ’ilana vekhabeluhi beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shebuqu ube’esur di farzel unekhash bedit’a di bara ubetal shemaya yitstaba‘ ve‘im kheivat bara khalaqeh ‘ad di shib‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alohi. denah fishra malka ugezeirat ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah hi di metat ‘al mar’i mari malka. velakh taredin min ’anasha ve‘im kheivat bara leheveh medorakh ve‘isba khetorin lakh yeta‘amun umital shemaya lakh metsabe‘in veshib‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alayikh ‘ad di tinda‘ di shalit ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah. vedi ’amaru lemishbaq ‘iqar shareshohi di ’ilana malkhutakh lakh qayamah min di tinda‘ di shalitin shemaya. lahen malka milki yishpar ‘alayikh ‘alakh vakhatayakh vakhata’akh betsidqah feruq va‘avayatakh bemikhan ‘anayin hen tehevei ’arkhah lishleivetakh. kola meta ‘al nebukhadnetsar malka. liqtsat yarkhin terei ‘asar ‘al heikhal malkhuta di babel mehalekh havah. ‘aneh malka ve’amar hala da hi babel rabeta di ’anah benaytah lebet malkhu bitqaf khisni veliqar hadri. ‘od mileta befum malka qal min shemaya nefal lakh ’amerin nebukhadnetsar malka malkhutah ‘adat minakh. umin ’anasha lakh taredin ve‘im kheivat bara medorakh ‘isba khetorin lakh yeta‘amun veshib‘ah ‘idanin yakhlefun ‘alayikh ‘alakh ‘ad di tinda‘ di shalit ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbei yiteninah. bah sha‘ata mileta safat ‘al nebukhadnetsar umin ’anasha terid ve‘isba khetorin yeikhul umital shemaya gishmeh yitstaba‘ ‘ad di sa‘reh kenishrin rebah vetifrohi khetsiperin. veliqtsat yomayah ’anah nebukhadnetsar ‘aynai lishmaya nitlet umande‘i ‘alai yetub ule‘ilaya ule‘ila’ah barekhet ulekhai ‘alema shabekhet vehaderet di shaletaneh shaletan ‘alam umalkhuteh ‘im dar vedar. vekhal da’arei dayerei ’ar‘a kelah khashibin ukhemitsbeyeh ‘abed bekhel shemaya veda’arei vedayerei ’ar‘a vela ’itai di yemakhei bideh veyeimar leh mah ‘abadt. beh zimna mande‘i yetub ‘alai veliqar malkhuti hadri vezivi yetub ‘alai veli hadaberai verabrebanai yeba‘on ve‘al malkhuti hateqenat urebu yatirah husefat li. ke‘an ’anah nebukhadnetsar meshabakh umeromem umehadar lemelekh shemaya di khal ma‘abadohi qeshot ve’orekhateh din vedi mahlekhin begeivah yakhil lehashpalah. beileshatsar malka ‘abad lekhem rab lerabrebanohi ’alaf velaqobel ’alpa khamra shateh. beileshatsar ’amar bit‘em khamra lehaytayah lemanei dahaba vekhaspa di hanpeq nebukhadnetsar ’abuhi min heikhela di birushelem veyishton behon malka verabrebanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. beidayin haytiv manei dahaba di hanpiqu min heikhela di bet ’elaha di birushelem ve’ishtiv behon malka verabrebanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. ’ishtiv khamra veshabakhu leilahei dahaba vekhaspa nekhasha farzela ’a‘a ve’abna. bah sha‘atah nefaqu nefaqah ’etsbe‘an di yad ’enash vekhateban laqobel nebrashta ‘al gira di khetal heikhela di malka umalka khazeh pas yedah di khatebah. ’edayin malka ziyohi shenohi vera‘yonohi yebahaluneh veqitrei khartseh mishtarayin ve’arkhubateh da leda naqeshan. qarei malka bekhayil lehe‘alah le’ashefaya kasdayei kasda’ei vegazeraya ‘aneh malka ve’amar lekhakimei babel di khal ’enash di yiqreh ketabah denah ufishreh yekhavinani ’argevana yilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba ‘al tsavereh vetalti bemalkhuta yishlat. ’edayin ‘alalin ‘alin kol khakimei malka vela khahalin ketaba lemiqrei ufishra ufishreh lehoda‘ah lemalka. ’edayin malka beileshatsar sagi mitbahal veziyohi shanayin ‘alohi verabrebanohi mishtabeshin. malketa laqobel milei malka verabrebanohi lebet mishteya ‘alalat ‘alat ‘anat malketa va’ameret malka le‘alemin kheyi ’al yebahalukh ra‘yonakh vezivaykh ’al yishtano. ’itai gebar bemalkhutakh di ruakh ’elahin qadishin beh ubeyomei ’abukh nahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah kekhakhemat ’elahin hishtekhakhat beh umalka nebukhadnetsar ’abukh rab khartumin ’ashefin kasda’in gazerin haqimeh ’abukh malka. kal qobel di ruakh yatirah umanda‘ vesakheletanu mefashar khelmin va’akhavayat ’akhidan umesharei qitrin hishtekhakhat beh bedaniyel di malka sam shemeh beileteshatsar ke‘an daniyel yitqerei ufishrah yehakhaveh. beidayin daniyel hu‘al qodam malka ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel ’antah ’ant hu daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud di hayti malka ’abi min yehud. veshim‘et ‘alayikh ‘alakh di ruakh ’elahin bakh venahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah yatirah hishtekhakhat bakh. ukhe‘an hu‘alu qadamai khakimaya ’ashefaya di khetabah denah yiqron ufishreh lehoda‘utani vela khahalin peshar mileta lehakhavayah. va’anah shim‘et ‘alayikh ‘alakh di tukhal tikul pishrin lemifshar veqitrin lemishrei ke‘an hen tukhal tikhul ketaba lemiqrei ufishreh lehoda‘utani ’argevana tilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba ‘al tsaverakh vetalta bemalkhuta tishlat. beidayin ‘aneh daniyel ve’amar qodam malka matenatakh lakh lehevyan unebazebeyatakh le’akhoran hab beram ketaba ’eqrei lemalka ufishra ’ahod‘ineh. ’antah ’ant malka ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah malkhuta urebuta viqara vehadrah yehab linbukhadnetsar ’abukh. umin rebuta di yehab leh kol ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya havo za’a‘in zaye‘in vedakhalin min qodamohi di havah tsabei hava qatel vedi havah tsabei havah makhei vedi havah tsabei havah marim vedi havah tsabei havah mashpil. ukhedi rim libbeh verukheh tiqfat lahazadah hanekhat min karesei malkhuteh viqarah he‘diyu mineh. umin benei ’anasha terid velibbeh ‘im kheiveta shevi shaviyv ve‘im ‘aradaya medoreh ‘isba khetorin yeta‘amuneh umital shemaya gishmeh yitstaba‘ ‘ad di yeda‘ di shalit ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’anasha uleman di yitsbeh yehaqem ‘alayeh ‘alah. ve’antah ve’ant bereh beileshatsar la hashpeilet libbakh kal qobel di khal denah yeda‘ta. ve‘al marei shemaya hitromamta ulemanaya di bayteh haytiv qadamayikh qadamakh ve’antah ve’ant verabrebanayikh verabrebanakh sheigelatakh ulekheinatakh khamra shatayin behon veleilahei khaspa vedahaba nekhasha farzela ’a‘a ve’abna di la khazayin vela shame‘in vela yade‘in shabakhta veleilaha di nishmetakh bideh vekhal ’orekhatakh leh la hadarta. beidayin min qodamohi sheliyaakh pasa di yeda ukhetaba denah reshim. udenah khetaba di reshim menei menei teqel ufarsin. denah peshar mileta menei menah ’elaha malkhutakh vehashlemah. teqel teqiletah bemozanya vehishtekhakhat khasir. peres perisat malkhutakh vihibat lemadai ufaras. beidayin ’amar beileshatsar vehalbishu ledaniyel ’argevana vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba ‘al tsavereh vehakhrizu ‘alohi di lehevei shalit talta bemalkhuta. beh beleileya qetil beileshatsar malka khasdaya khasda’ah. vedareyavesh madaya qabel malkhuta kebar shenin shitin vetarten. shefar qodam dareyavesh vahaqim ‘al malkhuta la’akhashdarpenaya me’ah ve‘esrin di lehevon bekhal malkhuta. ve‘ela minehon sarekhin telata di daniyel khad minehon di lehevon ’akhashdarpenaya ’ilen yahabin lehon ta‘ma umalka la lehevei naziq. ’edayin daniyel denah hava mitnatsakh ‘al sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya kal qobel di ruakh yatira beh umalka ‘ashit lahaqamuteh ‘al kal malkhuta. ’edayin sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya havo ba‘ayin ‘ilah lehashkakhah ledaniyel mitsad malkhuta vekhal ‘ilah ushekhitah la yakhelin lehashkakhah kal qobel di meheiman hu vekhal shalu ushekhitah la hishtekhakhat ‘alohi. ’edayin gubraya ’ilekh ’amerin di la nehashkakh ledaniyel denah kal ‘ila lahen hashkakhnah ‘alohi bedat ’elaheh. ’edayin sarekhaya va’akhashdarpenaya ’ilen hargishu ‘al malka vekhen ’amerin leh dareyavesh malka le‘alemin kheyi. ’itya‘atu kol sarekhei malkhuta signaya va’akhashdarpenaya hadaberaya ufakhavata leqayamah qeyam malka uletaqafah ’esar di khal di yib‘eh ba‘u min kal ’elah ve’enash ‘ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legob ’aryavata. ke‘an malka teqim ’esara vetirshum ketaba di la lehashnayah kedat madai ufaras di la te‘dei. kal qobel denah malka dareyavesh resham ketaba ve’esara. vedaniyel kedi yeda‘ di reshim ketaba ‘al lebayteh vekhavin petikhan leh be‘iliteh neged yerushelem vezimnin telatah beyoma hu barekh ‘al birkhohi umetsalei umodei qodam ’elaheh kal qobel di hava ‘abed min qadmat denah. ’edayin gubraya ’ilekh hargishu vehashkakhu ledaniyel ba‘ei umitkhanan qodam ’elaheh. beidayin qeribu ve’amerin qodam malka ‘al ’esar malka hala ’esar reshamta di khal ’enash di yib‘eh min kal ’elah ve’enash ‘ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legob ’aryavta ‘aneh malka ve’amar yatsiba mileta kedat madai ufaras di la te‘dei. beidayin ‘ano ve’amerin qodam malka di daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud la sam ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka te‘em ve‘al ’esara di reshamta vezimnin telatah beyoma ba‘ei ba‘uteh. ’edayin malka kedi mileta shema‘ sagi be’esh ‘alohi ve‘al daniyel sam bal lesheizabuteh ve‘ad me‘alei shimsha hava mishtadar lehatsaluteh. beidayin gubraya ’ilekh hargishu ‘al malka ve’amerin lemalka da‘ malka di dat lemadai ufaras di khal ’esar uqeyam di malka yehaqem la lehashnayah. beidayin malka ’amar vehaytiv ledaniyel uremo leguba di ’aryavata ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel ’elahakh di ’antah ’ant palakh leh bitdira hu yesheizebinakh. veheitayit ’eben khadah vesumat ‘al pum guba vekhatmah malka be‘izqeteh ube‘izqat rabrebanohi di la tishnei tsebu bedaniyel. ’edayin ’azal malka leheikheleh ubat tevat vedakhavan la han‘el qadamohi veshinteh nadat ‘alohi. beidayin malka bishparpara yequm benageha ubehitbehalah leguba di ’aryavata ’azal. ukhemiqrebeh leguba ledaniyel beqal ‘atsib ze‘iq ‘aneh malka ve’amar ledaniyel daniyel ‘abed ’elaha khaya ’elahakh di ’antah ’ant palakh leh bitdira haykhil lesheizabutakh min ’aryavata. ’edayin daniyel ‘im malka malil malka le‘alemin kheyi. ’elahi shelakh mal’akheh usagar pum ’aryavata vela khabeluni kal qobel di qadamohi zakhu hishtekhakhat li ve’af qadamayikh qadamakh malka khabulah la ‘abdet. beidayin malka sagi te’eb ‘alohi uledaniyel ’amar lehansaqah min guba vehusaq daniyel min guba vekhal khabal la hishtekhakh beh di heimin beilaheh. va’amar malka vehaytiv gubraya ’ilekh di ’akhalu qartsohi di daniyel ulegob ’aryavata remo ’inun beneihon unesheihon vela meto le’ar‘it guba ‘ad di shelitu behon ’aryavata vekhal garmeihon hadiqu. beidayin dareyavesh malka ketab lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. min qodamai sim te‘em di bekhal shaletan malkhuti lehevon za’a‘in zaye‘in vedakhalin min qodam ’elaheh di daniyel di hu ’elaha khaya veqayam le‘alemin umalkhuteh di la titkhabal veshaletaneh ‘ad sofa. mesheizib umatsil ve‘abed ’atin vetimhin bishmaya ube’ar‘a di sheizib ledaniyel min yad ’aryavata. vedaniyel denah hatslakh bemalkhut dareyavesh ubemalkhut koresh paresaya paresa’ah. bishnat khadah lebeileshatsar melekh babel daniyel kheilem khazah vekhezvei reisheh ‘al mishkebeh beidayin khelma khetab resh milin ’amar. ‘aneh daniyel ve’amar khazeh havet bekhezvi ‘im leileya va’aru ’arba‘ rukhei shemaya megikhan leyama raba. ve’arba‘ kheivan rabreban saleqan min yama shaneyan da min da. qadmayeta khe’aryeh vegapin di neshar lah khazeh havet ‘ad di meritu gapayh unetilat min ’ar‘a ve‘al raglayin ke’enash hoqimat ulebab ’enash yehib lah. va’aru kheivah ’akhori tinyanah dameyah ledob velistar khad hoqimat utelat ‘il‘in befumah ben shinayah shinah vekhen ’amerin lah qumi ’akhuli besar sagi. batar denah khazeh havet va’aru ’akhori kinmar velah gapin ’arba‘ di ‘of ‘al gabayah gabah ve’arbe‘ah reishin lekheiveta veshaletan yehib lah. batar denah khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va’aru kheivah rebi‘ayah rebi‘a’ah dekhilah ve’eimetani vetaqifa yatira veshinayin di farzel lah rabreban ’akhelah umadeqah ushe’ara beraglayah beraglah rafesah vehi meshaneyah min kal kheivata di qadamayh veqarnayin ‘asar lah. mistakal havet beqarnaya va’alu qeren ’akhori ze‘eirah silqat beineihon beineihen utelat min qarnaya qadmayata ’et‘aqaru ’et‘aqarah min qodamayah qodamah va’alu ‘aynin ke‘aynei ’anasha beqarna da ufum memalil rabreban. khazeh havet ‘ad di kharesavan remiv ve‘atiq yomin yetib lebusheh kitlag khivar use‘ar reisheh ka‘amar neqei kareseyeh shebibin di nur galgilohi nur daliq. nehar di nur naged venafeq min qodamohi ’elef ’alfayim ’alfin yeshameshuneh veribo rabevan ribban qadamohi yequmun dina yetib vesifrin petikhu. khazeh havet beidayin min qal milaya rabrebata di qarna memalelah khazeh havet ‘ad di qetilat kheiveta vehubad gishmah vihibat liqeidat ’esha. ushe’ar kheivata he‘div shaletanehon ve’arkhah bekhayin yehibat lehon ‘ad zeman ve‘idan. khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va’aru ‘im ‘ananei shemaya kebar ’enash ’ateh havah ve‘ad ‘atiq yomaya metah uqedamohi haqrebuhi. veleh yehib shaletan viqar umalkhu vekhol ‘amaya ’umaya velishanaya leh yiflekhun shaletaneh shaletan ‘alam di la ye‘deh umalkhuteh di la titkhabal. ’etkeriyat rukhi ’anah daniyel bego nidneh vekhezvei reishi yebahalunani. qirbet ‘al khad min qa’amaya veyatsiba ’eb‘ei mineh ‘al kal denah va’amar li ufeshar milaya yehod‘inani. ’ilen kheivata rabrebata di ’inin ’arba‘ ’arbe‘ah malkhin yequmun min ’ar‘a. viqabelun malkhuta qadishei ‘elyonin veyakhsenun malkhuta ‘ad ‘alema ve‘ad ‘alam ‘alemaya. ’edayin tsebit leyatsaba ‘al kheiveta rebi‘ayeta di havat shaneyah min kalehon kalehen dekhilah yatirah shinayah shinah di farzel vetifrayh di nekhash ’akhelah madaqah ushe’ara beraglayh rafesah. ve‘al qarnaya ‘asar di bereishah ve’akhori di silqat unefalu unefalah min qodamayah qodamah telat veqarna diken ve‘aynin lah vefum memalil rabreban vekhezvah rab min khabratah. khazeh havet veqarna diken ‘abedah qerab ‘im qadishin veyakhelah lehon. ‘ad di ’atah ‘atiq yomaya vedina yehib leqadishei ‘elyonin vezimna metah umalkhuta hekhesinu qadishin. ken ’amar kheiveta rebi‘ayeta malkhu rebi‘aya rebi‘a’ah tehevei be’ar‘a di tishnei min kal malkhevata veteikhul kal ’ar‘a utedushinah vetadeqinah. veqarnaya ‘asar minah malkhutah ‘asrah malkhin yequmun ve’akhoran yequm ’akhareihon vehu yishnei min qadmayei utelatah malkhin yehashpil. umilin letsad ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah yemalil uleqadishei ‘elyonin yebalei veyisbar lehashnayah zimnin vedat veyityahabun bideh ‘ad ‘idan ve‘idanin ufelag ‘idan. vedina yitib veshaletaneh yeha‘don lehashmadah ulehobadah ‘ad sofa. umalkhutah veshaletana urebuta di malkhevat tekhot kal shemaya yehibat le‘am qadishei ‘elyonin malkhuteh malkhut ‘alam vekhol shaletanaya leh yiflekhun veyishtame‘un. ‘ad kah sofa di mileta ’anah daniyel sagi ra‘yonai yebahalunani vezivai yishtanon ‘alai umileta belibi nitret. bishnat shalosh lemalkhut beileshatsar hamelekh khazon nir’ah ’eilai ’ani daniyel ’akharei hanir’ah ’eilai batekhilah. va’er’eh bekhazon vayhi bir’oti va’ani beshushan habirah ’asher be‘eilam hamedinah va’er’eh bekhazon va’ani hayiti ‘al ’ubal ’ulai. va’esa ‘einai va’er’eh vehineh ’ayil ’ekhad ‘omed lifnei ha’ubal velo qeranayim vehaqeranayim gebohot veha’akhat gebohah min hasheinit vehagebohah ‘olah ba’akharonah. ra’iti ’et ha’ayil menageiakh yamah vetsafonah vanegbah vekhal khayot lo ya‘amdu lefanav ve’en matsil miyado ve‘asah khirtsono vehigdil. va’ani hayiti meibin vehineh tsefir ha‘izim ba min hama‘arab ‘al penei khal ha’arets ve’en nogeia‘ ba’arets vehatsafir qeren khazut ben ‘einav. vayabo ‘ad ha’ayil ba‘al haqeranayim ’asher ra’iti ‘omed lifnei ha’ubal vayarats ’eilav bakhamat kokho. ure’itiv magia‘ ’eitsel ha’ayil vayitmarmar ’eilav vayakh ’et ha’ayil vayshaber ’et shetei qeranav velo hayah khoakh ba’ayil la‘amod lefanav vayashlikheihu ’artsah vayirmeseihu velo hayah matsil la’ayil miyado. utsefir ha‘izim higdil ‘ad me’od ukhe‘atsemo nishberah haqeren hagedolah vata‘alenah khazut ’arba‘ takhteha le’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim. umin ha’akhat meihem yatsa qeren ’akhat mitse‘irah vatigdal yeter ’el hanegeb ve’el hamizrakh ve’el hatsebi. vatigdal ‘ad tseba hashamayim vatapel ’artsah min hatsaba umin hakokhabim vatirmesem. ve‘ad sar hatsaba higdil umimenu heirim huram hatamid vehushlakh mekhon miqdasho. vetsaba tinaten ‘al hatamid befasha‘ vetashlekh ’emet ’artsah ve‘asetah vehitslikhah. va’eshme‘ah ’ekhad qadosh medaber vayomer ’ekhad qadosh lapalmoni hamdaber ‘ad matai hekhazon hatamid vehapesha‘ shomem tet veqodesh vetsaba mirmas. vayomer ’eilai ‘ad ‘ereb boqer ’alpayim ushelosh mei’ot venitsdaq qodesh. vayhi bir’oti ’ani daniyel ’et hekhazon va’abaqshah binah vehineh ‘omed lenegdi kemar’eh gaber. va’eshma‘ qol ’adam ben ’ulai vayiqra vayomar gabri’el haben lehalaz ’et hamar’eh. vayabo ’eitsel ‘amedi ubebo’o nib‘ati va’epelah ‘al panai vayomer ’eilai haben ben ’adam ki le‘et qets hekhazon. ubedabero ‘imi nirdamti ‘al panai ’aretsah vayiga‘ bi vaya‘amideini ‘al ‘amedi. vayomer hini modi‘akha ’et ’asher yihyeh be’akharit haza‘am ki lemo‘ed qets. ha’ayil ’asher ra’ita ba‘al haqeranayim malkhei madai ufaras. vehatsafir hasa‘ir melekh yavan vehaqeren hagedolah ’asher ben ‘einav hu hamelekh harishon. vehanishberet vata‘amodenah ’arba‘ takhteha ’arba‘ malkhuyot migo ya‘amodenah velo bekhokho. ube’akharit malkhutam kehatem haposhe‘im ya‘amod melekh ‘az panim umeibin khidot. ve‘atsam kokho velo bekhokho venifla’ot yashkhit vehitsliakh ve‘asah vehishkhit ‘atsumim ve‘am qedoshim. ve‘al sikhlo vehitsliakh mirmah beyado ubilbabo yagdil ubeshalvah yashkhit rabim ve‘al sar sarim ya‘amod ube’efes yad yishaber. umar’eh ha‘ereb vehaboqer ’asher ne’emar ’emet hu ve’atah setom hekhazon ki leyamim rabim. va’ani daniyel nihyeiti venekheleiti yamim va’aqum va’e‘eseh ’et melekhet hamelekh va’eshtomem ‘al hamar’eh ve’en meibin. bishnat ’akhat ledareyavesh ben ’akhashveirosh mizera‘ madai ’asher hamelakh ‘al malkhut kasdim. bishnat ’akhat lemalekho ’ani daniyel binoti basefarim mispar hashanim ’asher hayah debar yhvh ’el yirmiyah hanabi lemalot lekharebot yerushalim shib‘im shanah. va’etenah ’et panai ’el ’adonai ha’elohim lebaqesh tefilah vetakhanunim betsom vesaq va’eifer. va’etpalah yhvh ’elohai va’etvadeh va’omerah ’ana ’adonai ha’el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed le’ohabav uleshomerei mitsvotav. khatanu ve‘avinu vehirsha‘nu hirsha‘nu umaradenu vesor mimitsvotekha umimishpatekha. velo shama‘nu ’el ‘abadekha hanebi’im ’asher diberu beshimkha ’el melakheinu sareinu va’aboteinu ve’el kal ‘am ha’arets. lekha ’adonai hatsedaqah velanu boshet hapanim kayom hazeh le’ish yehudah uleyoshebei yerushalim ulekhal yisra’el haqerobim veharekhoqim bekhal ha’aratsot ’asher hidakhtam sham bema‘alam ’asher ma‘alu bakh. yhvh lanu boshet hapanim limlakheinu lesareinu vela’aboteinu ’asher khatanu lakh. ladonai ’eloheinu harakhamim vehaselikhot ki maradnu bo. velo shama‘nu beqol yhvh ’eloheinu lalekhet betorotav ’asher natan lefaneinu beyad ‘abadav hanebi’im. vekhal yisra’el ‘aberu ’et toratekha vesor lebilti shemoa‘ beqolekha vatitakh ‘aleinu ha’alah vehashebu‘ah ’asher ketubah betorat mosheh ‘ebed ha’elohim ki khatanu lo. vayaqem ’et debarav debaro ’asher diber ‘aleinu ve‘al shofeteinu ’asher shefatunu lehabi ‘aleinu ra‘ah gedolah ’asher lo ne‘estah takhat kal hashamayim ka’asher ne‘estah birushalim. ka’asher katub betorat mosheh ’et kal hara‘ah hazot ba’ah ‘aleinu velo khilinu ’et penei yhvh ’eloheinu lashub mei‘avoneinu ulehaskil ba’amitekha. vayishqod yhvh ‘al hara‘ah vaybi’eha ‘aleinu ki tsadiq yhvh ’eloheinu ‘al kal ma‘asav ’asher ‘asah velo shama‘nu beqolo. ve‘atah ’adonai ’eloheinu ’asher hotseita ’et ‘amekha mei’erets mitsrayim beyad khazaqah vata‘as lekha shem kayom hazeh khatanu rasha‘enu. ’adonai kekhal tsidqotekha yashab na ’apekha vakhamatekha mei‘irekha yerushalim har qadshekha ki bakhata’einu uba‘avonot ’aboteinu yerushalim ve‘amekha lekherpah lekhal sebiboteinu. ve‘atah shema‘ ’eloheinu ’el tefilat ‘abdekha ve’el takhanunav veha’er panekha ‘al miqdashekha hashamem lema‘an ’adonai. hateh ’elohai ’azenekha ushama‘ piqkhah peqakh ‘einekha ure’eh shomemoteinu veha‘ir ’asher niqra shimkha ‘aleha ki lo ‘al tsidqoteinu ’anakhnu mapilim takhanuneinu lefanekha ki ‘al rakhamekha harabim. ’adonai shema‘ah ’adonai selakhah ’adonai haqashibah va‘aseh ’al te’akhar lema‘ankha ’elohai ki shimkha niqra ‘al ‘irekha ve‘al ‘amekha. ve‘od ’ani medaber umitpalel umitvadeh khatati vekhatat ‘ami yisra’el umapil tekhinati lifnei yhvh ’elohai ‘al har qodesh ’elohai. ve‘od ’ani medaber batefilah veha’ish gabri’el ’asher ra’iti bekhazon batekhilah mu‘af bi‘af nogeia‘ ’eilai ke‘et minkhat ‘areb. vayaben vaydaber ‘imi vayomar daniyel ‘atah yatsati lehaskilekha binah. bitkhilat takhanunekha yatsa dabar va’ani bati lehagid ki khamudot ’atah ubin badabar vehaben bamar’eh. shabu‘im shib‘im nekhtakh ‘al ‘amekha ve‘al ‘ir qadshekha lekhalei hapesha‘ ulakhtom ulehatem khata’ot khatat ulekhaper ‘avon ulehabi tsedeq ‘olamim velakhtom khazon venabi velimshoakh qodesh qadashim. veteida‘ vetaskel min motsa dabar lehashib velibnot yerushalim ‘ad mashiakh nagid shabu‘im shib‘ah veshabu‘im shishim ushenayim tashub venibnetah rekhob vekharuts ubetsoq ha‘itim. ve’akharei hashabu‘im shishim ushenayim yikaret mashiakh ve’en lo veha‘ir vehaqodesh yashkhit ‘am nagid haba veqitso bashetef ve‘ad qets milkhamah nekheretset shomeimot. vehigbir berit larabim shabua‘ ’ekhad vakhatsi hashabua‘ yashbit zebakh uminkhah ve‘al kenaf shiqutsim meshomem ve‘ad kalah venekheratsah titakh ‘al shomem. bishnat shalosh lekhoresh melekh paras dabar niglah ledaniyel ’asher niqra shemo beileteshatsar ve’emet hadabar vetsaba gadol ubin ’et hadabar ubinah lo bamar’eh. bayamim hahem ’ani daniyel hayiti mit’abel sheloshah shabu‘im yamim. lekhem khamudot lo ’akhalti ubasar vayayin lo ba ’el pi vesokh lo sakheti ‘ad melot sheloshet shabu‘im yamim. ubeyom ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah lakhodesh harishon va’ani hayiti ‘al yad hanahar hagadol hu khidaqel. va’esa ’et ‘einai va’eire vehineh ’ish ’ekhad labush badim umatenav khagurim bekhetem ’ufaz. ugeviyato khetarshish ufanav kemar’eh baraq ve‘einav kelapidei ’esh uzero‘otav umargelotav ke‘en nekhoshet qalal veqol debarav keqol hamon. vera’iti ’ani daniyel lebadi ’et hamar’ah veha’anashim ’asher hayu ‘imi lo ra’u ’et hamar’ah ’abal kharadah gedolah nafelah ‘aleihem vayibrekhu beheikhabei. va’ani nish’arti lebadi va’er’eh ’et hamar’ah hagedolah hazot velo nish’ar bi kokh vehodi nehpakh ‘alai lemashkhit velo ‘atsarti koakh. va’eshma‘ ’et qol debarav ukheshame‘i ’et qol debarav va’ani hayiti nirdam ‘al panai ufanai ’aretsah. vehineh yad nage‘ah bi vateni‘eini ‘al birkai vekhapot yadai. vayomer ’eilai daniyel ’ish khamudot haben badebarim ’asher ’anokhi dober ’eilekha va‘amod ‘al ‘amedekha ki ‘atah shulakhti ’eilekha ubedabero ‘imi ’et hadabar hazeh ‘amadti mar‘id. vayomer ’eilai ’al tira daniyel ki min hayom harishon ’asher natata ’et libekha lehabin ulehit‘anot lifnei ’elohekha nishme‘u debarekha va’ani bati bidbarekha. vesar malkhut paras ‘omed lenegdi ‘esrim ve’ekhad yom vehineh mikha’el ’akhad hasarim harishonim ba le‘azereini va’ani notarti sham ’eitsel malkhei faras. ubati lahabinekha ’et ’asher yiqrah le‘amekha be’akharit hayamim ki ‘od khazon layamim. ubedabero ‘imi kadebarim ha’eleh natati fanai ’artsah vene’elameti. vehineh kidmut benei ’adam nogeia‘ ‘al sefatai va’eftakh pi va’adaberah va’omerah ’el ha‘omed lenegdi ’adoni bamar’ah nehefkhu tsirai ‘alai velo ‘atsarti koakh. vehekh yukhal ‘ebed ’adoni zeh ledaber ‘im ’adoni zeh va’ani mei‘atah lo ya‘amad bi khoakh uneshamah lo nish’arah bi. vayosef vayiga‘ bi kemar’eh ’adam vaykhazeqeini. vayomer ’al tira ’ish khamudot shalom lakh khazaq vakhazaq ukhedabero ‘imi hitkhazaqti va’omerah yedaber ’adoni ki khizaqtani. vayomer hayada‘ta lamah bati ’eilekha ve‘atah ’ashub lehilakhem ‘im sar paras va’ani yotsei vehineh sar yavan ba. ’abal ’agid lekha ’et harashum bikhtab ’emet ve’en ’ekhad mitkhazeq ‘imi ‘al ’eleh ki ’im mikha’el sarkhem. va’ani bishnat ’akhat ledareyavesh hamadi ‘amedi lemakhaziq ulema‘oz lo. ve‘atah ’emet ’agid lakh hineh ‘od sheloshah melakhim ‘omedim lefaras veharebi‘i ya‘ashir ‘osher gadol mikol ukhekhezqato be‘ashero ya‘ir hakol ’et malkhut yavan. ve‘amad melekh gibor umashal mimshal rab ve‘asah kirtsono. ukhe‘amedo tishaber malkhuto veteikhats le’arba‘ rukhot hashamayim velo le’akharito velo khemashelo ’asher mashal ki tinatesh malkhuto vela’akheirim milebad ’eleh. veyekhezaq melekh hanegeb umin sarav veyekhezaq ‘alav umashal mimshal rab memshalto. uleqets shanim yitkhabaru ubat melekh hanegeb tabo ’el melekh hatsafon la‘asot meisharim velo ta‘tsor koakh hazeroa‘ velo ya‘amod uzero‘o vetinaten hi umebi’eha vehayoledah umakhaziqah ba‘itim. ve‘amad mineitser sharasheha kano veyabo ’el hakhayil veyabo bema‘oz melekh hatsafon ve‘asah bahem vehekheziq. vegam ’eloheihem ‘im nesikheihem ‘im kelei khemdatam kesef vezahab bashebi yabi mitsrayim vehu shanim ya‘amod mimelekh hatsafon uba bemalkhut melekh hanegeb veshab ’el ’admato. ubeno ubanav yitgaru ve’asefu hamon khayalim rabim uba bo veshataf ve‘abar veyashob veyitgaru veyitgareh ‘ad ma‘uzah ma‘uzo. veyitmarmar melekh hanegeb veyatsa venilkham ‘imo ‘im melekh hatsafon vehe‘emid hamon rab venitan hehamon beyado. venisa hehamon yarum veram lebabo vehipil ribo’ot velo ya‘oz. veshab melekh hatsafon vehe‘emid hamon rab min harishon uleqets ha‘itim shanim yabo bo bekhayil gadol ubirkhush rab. uba‘itim hahem rabim ya‘amdu ‘al melekh hanegeb ubenei paritsei ‘amekha yinase’u leha‘amid khazon venikhshalu. veyabo melekh hatsafon veyishpokh solalah velakhad ‘ir mibtsarot uzero‘ot hanegeb lo ya‘amodu ve‘am mibkharav ve’en koakh la‘amod. veya‘as haba ’eilav kirtsono ve’en ‘omed lefanav veya‘amod be’erets hatsebi vekhalah beyado. veyasem panav labo betoqef kal malkhuto visharim ‘imo ve‘asah ubat hanashim yiten lo lehashkhitah velo ta‘amod velo lo tihyeh. veyasheb veyasem panav le’iyim velakhad rabim vehishbit qatsin kherpato lo bilti kherpato yashib lo. veyasheb panav lema‘uzei ’artso venikhshal venafal velo yimatsei. ve‘amad ‘al kano ma‘abir noges heder malkhut ubeyamim ’akhadim yishaber velo be’apayim velo bemilkhamah. ve‘amad ‘al kano nibzeh velo natenu ‘alav hod malkhut uba beshalvah vehekheziq malkhut bakhalaqlaqot. uzero‘ot hashetef yishatefu milefanav veyishabeiru vegam negid berit. umin hitkhaberut ’eilav ya‘aseh mirmah ve‘alah ve‘atsam bim‘at go. beshalvah ubemishmanei medinah yabo ve‘asah ’asher lo ‘asu ’abotav va’abot ’abotav bizah veshalal urekhush lahem yibzor ve‘al mibtsarim yekhasheb makhshebotav ve‘ad ‘et. veya‘er kokho ulebabo ‘al melekh hanegeb bekhayil gadol umelekh hanegeb yitgareh lamilkhamah bekhayil gadol ve‘atsum ‘ad me’od velo ya‘amod ki yakhshebu ‘alav makhashabot. ve’okhelei fat bago yishberuhu vekheilo yishtof venafelu khalalim rabim. usheneihem hamelakhim lebabam lemeira‘ ve‘al shulkhan ’ekhad kazab yedabeiru velo titslakh ki ‘od qets lamo‘ed. veyashob ’artso birkhush gadol ulebabo ‘al berit qodesh ve‘asah veshab le’artso. lamo‘ed yashub uba banegeb velo tihyeh kharishonah vekha’akharonah. uba’u bo tsiyim kitim venikh’ah veshab veza‘am ‘al berit qodesh ve‘asah veshab veyaben ‘al ‘ozebei berit qodesh. uzero‘im mimenu ya‘amodu vekhilelu hamiqdash hama‘oz veheisiru hatamid venatenu hashiquts meshomem. umarshi‘ei berit yakhanif bakhalaqot ve‘am yode‘ei ’elohav yakhaziqu ve‘asu. umaskilei ‘am yabinu larabim venikhshelu bekhereb ubelehabah bishbi ubebizah yamim. ubehikashelam yei‘azeru ‘eizer me‘at venilvu ‘aleihem rabim bakhalaqlaqot. umin hamaskilim yikashelu litsrof bahem ulebarer velalben ‘ad ‘et qets ki ‘od lamo‘ed. ve‘asah khirtsono hamelekh veyitromem veyitgadel ‘al kal ’el ve‘al ’el ’eilim yedaber nifla’ot vehitsliakh ‘ad kalah za‘am ki nekheratsah ne‘esatah. ve‘al ’elohei ’abotav lo yabin ve‘al khemdat nashim ve‘al kal ’eloah lo yabin ki ‘al kol yitgadal. vele’eloah ma‘uzim ‘al kano yekhabed vele’eloah ’asher lo yeda‘uhu ’abotav yekhabed bezahab ubekhesef ube’eben yeqarah ubakhamudot. ve‘asah lemibtserei ma‘uzim ‘im ’eloah neikhar ’asher hikir yakir yarbeh khabod vehimshilam barabim va’adamah yekhaleq bimkhir. ube‘et qets yitnagakh ‘imo melekh hanegeb veyista‘er ‘alav melekh hatsafon berekheb ubefarashim uba’oniyot rabot uba ba’aratsot veshataf ve‘abar. uba be’erets hatsebi verabot yikasheilu ve’eleh yimaletu miyado ’edom umo’ab vereishit benei ‘amon. veyishlakh yado ba’aratsot ve’erets mitsrayim lo tihyeh lifleitah. umashal bemikhmanei hazahab vehakesef ubekhol khamudot mitsrayim velubim vekhushim bemits‘adav. ushemu‘ot yebahaluhu mimizrakh umitsafon veyatsa bekheima gedolah lehashmid ulehakharim rabim. veyita‘ ’ahole ’apadno ben yamim lehar tsebi qodesh uba ‘ad qitso ve’en ‘ozer lo. uba‘et hahi ya‘amod mikha’el hasar hagadol ha‘omed ‘al benei ‘amekha vehayetah ‘et tsarah ’asher lo nihyetah mihyot go ‘ad ha‘et hahi uba‘et hahi yimalet ‘amekha kal hanimtsa katub baseifer. verabim miyesheinei ’admat ‘afar yaqitsu ’eleh lekhayei ‘olam ve’eleh lakharafot ledir’on ‘olam. vehamaskilim yazhiru kezohar haraqia‘ umatsdiqei harabim kakokhabim le‘olam va‘ed. ve’atah daniyel setom hadebarim vakhatom haseifer ‘ad ‘et qets yeshotetu rabim vetirbeh hada‘at. vera’iti ’ani daniyel vehineh shenayim ’akheirim ‘omedim ’ekhad henah lisfat hai’or ve’ekhad henah lisfat hai’or. vayomer la’ish lebush habadim ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hai’or ‘ad matai qets hapela’ot. va’eshma‘ ’et ha’ish lebush habadim ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hai’or vayarem yemino usemolo ’el hashamayim vayishaba‘ bekhei ha‘olam ki lemo‘ed mo‘adim vakheitsi ukhekhalot napets yad ‘am qodesh tikhlenah khal ’eleh. va’ani shama‘ti velo ’abin va’omerah ’adoni mah ’akharit ’eleh. vayomer lekh daniyel ki setumim vakhatumim hadebarim ‘ad ‘et qets. yitbararu veyitlabenu veyitsarefu rabim vehirshi‘u resha‘im velo yabinu kal resha‘im vehamaskilim yabinu. umei‘et husar hatamid velatet shiquts shomem yamim ’elef matayim vetish‘im. ’ashrei hamkhakeh veyagia‘ leyamim ’elef shelosh mei’ot sheloshim vakhamishah. ve’atah lekh laqets vetanuakh veta‘amod legoralekha leqets hayamin. ubishnat ’akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot debar yhvh mipi yirmeyah hei‘ir yhvh ’et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya‘aber qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtab leimor. koh ’amar koresh melekh paras kol mamlekhot ha’arets natan li yhvh ’elohei hashamayim vehu faqad ‘alai libnot lo bayit birushalim ’asher bihudah. mi bakhem mikal ‘amo yehi ’elohav ‘imo veya‘al lirushalim ’asher bihudah veyiben ’et bet yhvh ’elohei yisra’el hu ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. vekhal hanish’ar mikal hameqomot ’asher hu gar sham yenase’uhu ’anshei meqomo bekhesef ubezahab ubirkhush ubibheimah ‘im hanedabah lebet ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. vayaqumu rashei ha’abot lihudah ubinyamin vehakohanim vehalviyim lekhol hei‘ir ha’elohim ’et rukho la‘alot libnot ’et bet yhvh ’asher birushalim. vekhal sebiboteihem khizequ bideihem bikhlei khesef bazahab barekhush ubabeheimah ubamigdanot lebad ‘al kal hitnadeb. vehamelekh koresh hotsi ’et kelei bet yhvh ’asher hotsi nebukhadnetsar mirushalim vayitenem bebet ’elohav. vayotsi’em koresh melekh paras ‘al yad mitredat hagizbar vayisperem lesheishebatsar hanasi lihudah. ve’eleh misparam ’agartelei zahab sheloshim ’agartelei khesef ’alef makhalafim tish‘ah ve‘esrim. keforei zahab sheloshim keforei khesef mishnim ’arba‘ mei’ot va‘asarah keilim ’akheirim ’alef. kal keilim lazahab velakesef khameishet ’alafim ve’arba‘ mei’ot hakol he‘elah sheishebatsar ‘im hei‘alot hagolah mibabel lirushalim. ve’eleh benei hamedinah ha‘olim mishebi hagolah ’asher heglah nebukhadnetsor nebukhadnetsar melekh babel lebabel vayashubu lirushalim vihudah ’ish le‘iro. ’asher ba’u ‘im zerubabel yeishua‘ nekhemyah serayah re‘eilayah maredokhai bilshan mispar bigvai rekhum ba‘anah mispar ’anshei ‘am yisra’el. benei far‘osh ’alpayim mei’ah shib‘im ushenayim. benei shefatyah shelosh mei’ot shib‘im ushenayim. benei ’arakh sheba‘ mei’ot khamishah veshib‘im. benei fakhat mo’ab libnei yeishua‘ yo’ab ’alpayim shemoneh mei’ot ushenem ‘asar. benei ‘eilam ’elef matayim khamishim ve’arba‘ah. benei zatu tesha‘ mei’ot ve’arba‘im vakhamishah. benei zakai sheba‘ mei’ot veshishim. benei bani shesh mei’ot ’arba‘im ushenayim. benei beibai shesh mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah. benei ‘azgad ’elef matayim ‘esrim ushenayim. benei ’adoniqam shesh mei’ot shishim veshishah. benei bigvai ’alpayim khamishim veshishah. benei ‘adin ’arba‘ mei’ot khamishim ve’arba‘ah. benei ’ater likhizqiyah tish‘im ushemonah. benei beitsai shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah. benei yorah mei’ah ushenem ‘asar. benei khashum matayim ‘esrim usheloshah. benei gibar tish‘im vakhamishah. benei bet lakhem mei’ah ‘esrim usheloshah. ’anshei netofah khamishim veshishah. ’anshei ‘anatot mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah. benei ‘azmavet ’arba‘im ushenayim. benei qiryat ‘arim kefirah ube’eirot sheba‘ mei’ot ve’arba‘im
