shema‘yah. ’eleh haba’im besheimot nesi’im bemishpekhotam ubet ’aboteihem paretsu larob. vayeilekhu limbo gedor ‘ad lemizrakh hagai lebaqesh mir‘eh letsonam. vayimtse’u mir‘eh shamen vatob veha’arets rakhabat yadayim veshoqetet usheleivah ki min kham hayoshebim sham lefanim. vayabo’u ’eleh haketubim besheimot bimei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayaku ’et ’aholeihem ve’et hame‘inim hame‘unim ’asher nimtse’u shamah vayakharimum ‘ad hayom hazeh vayeishebu takhteihem ki mir‘eh letsonam sham. umeihem min benei shim‘on halekhu lehar sei‘ir ’anashim khamesh mei’ot ufelatyah une‘aryah urefayah ve‘uzi’el benei yish‘i berosham. vayaku ’et she’eirit hapeleitah la‘amaleq vayeishebu sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. ubenei re’uben bekhor yisra’el ki hu habekhor ubekhalelo yetsu‘ei ’abiv nitenah bekhorato libnei yosef ben yisra’el velo lehityakhes labekhorah. ki yehudah gabar be’ekhav ulenagid mimenu vehabekhorah leyosef. benei re’uben bekhor yisra’el khanokh ufalu khetsron vekharmi. benei yo’el shema‘yah beno gog beno shim‘i beno. mikhah beno re’ayah beno ba‘al beno. be’eirah beno ’asher heglah tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur hu nasi lar’ubeini. ve’ekhav lemishpekhotav behityakhes letoledotam harosh ye‘i’el uzekharyahu. ubela‘ ben ‘azaz ben shema‘ ben yo’el hu yosheb ba‘aro‘er ve‘ad nebo uba‘al me‘on. velamizrakh yashab ‘ad lebo midbarah lemin hanahar perat ki miqneihem rabu be’erets gil‘ad. ubimei sha’ul ‘asu milkhamah ‘im hahagri’im vayipelu beyadam vayeishebu be’aholeihem ‘al kal penei mizrakh lagil‘ad. ubenei gad lenegdam yashebu be’erets habashan ‘ad salkhah. yo’el harosh veshafam hamishneh veya‘nai veshafat babashan. va’akheihem lebet ’aboteihem mikha’el umeshulam vesheba‘ veyorai veya‘kan vezia‘ va‘eiber shib‘ah. ’eleh benei ’abikhayil ben khuri ben yaroakh ben gil‘ad ben mikha’el ben yeshishai ben yakhdo ben buz. ’akhi ben ‘abdi’el ben guni rosh lebet ’abotam. vayeishebu bagil‘ad babashan ubibnoteha ubekhal migreshei sharon ‘al tots’otam. kulam hityakhsu bimei yotam melekh yehudah ubimei yarabe‘am melekh yisra’el. benei re’uben vegadi vakhatsi sheibet menasheh min benei khayil ’anashim nose’ei magen vekhereb vedorekhei qeshet ulemudei milkhamah ’arba‘im ve’arba‘ah ’elef usheba‘ mei’ot veshishim yotse’ei tsaba. vaya‘asu milkhamah ‘im hahagri’im vitur venafish venodab. vayei‘azeru ‘aleihem vayinatenu beyadam hahagri’im vekhol she‘imahem ki leilohim za‘aqu bamilkhamah vena‘tor lahem ki batekhu bo. vayishbu miqneihem gemaleihem khamishim ’elef vetson matayim vakhamishim ’elef vakhamorim ’alpayim venefesh ’adam mei’ah ’alef. ki khalalim rabim nafalu ki meiha’elohim hamilkhamah vayeishebu takhteihem ‘ad hagolah. ubenei khatsi sheibet menasheh yashebu ba’arets mibashan ‘ad ba‘al khermon usenir vehar khermon hemah rabu. ve’eleh rashei bet ’abotam ve‘eifer veyish‘i ve’eli’el ve‘azri’el veyirmeyah vehodavyah veyakhdi’el ’anashim giborei khayil ’anshei sheimot rashim lebet ’abotam. vayim‘alu beilohei ’aboteihem vayiznu ’akharei ’elohei ‘amei ha’arets ’asher hishmid ’elohim mipeneihem. vaya‘ar ’elohei yisra’el ’et ruakh pul melekh ’ashur ve’et ruakh tilegat pilneser melekh ’ashur vayaglem lar’ubeini velagadi velakhatsi sheibet menasheh vaybi’em lakhlakh vekhabor vehara unehar gozan ‘ad hayom hazeh. benei leivi geireshon qehat umerari. ubenei qehat ‘amram yitshar vekhebron ve‘uzi’el. ubenei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh umiryam ubenei ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. ’el‘azar holid ’et pinekhas pinekhas holid ’et ’abishua‘. va’abishua‘ holid ’et buqi ubuqi holid ’et ‘uzi. ve‘uzi holid ’et zerakhyah uzerakhyah holid ’et merayot. merayot holid ’et ’amaryah va’amaryah holid ’et ’akhitub. va’akhitub holid ’et tsadoq vetsadoq holid ’et ’akhima‘ats. va’akhima‘ats holid ’et ‘azaryah va‘azaryah holid ’et yokhanan. veyokhanan holid ’et ‘azaryah hu ’asher kihen babayit ’asher banah shelomoh birushalim. vayoled ‘azaryah ’et ’amaryah va’amaryah holid ’et ’akhitub. va’akhitub holid ’et tsadoq vetsadoq holid ’et shalum. veshalum holid ’et khilqiyah vekhilqiyah holid ’et ‘azaryah. va‘azaryah holid ’et serayah userayah holid ’et yehotsadaq. vihotsadaq halakh behaglot yhvh ’et yehudah virushalim beyad nebukhadnetsar. benei leivi geireshom qehat umerari. ve’eleh shemot benei geireshom libni veshim‘i. ubenei qehat ‘amram veyitshar vekhebron ve‘uzi’el. benei merari makhli umushi ve’eleh mishpekhot haleivi la’aboteihem. legeireshom libni beno yakhat beno zimah beno. yo’akh beno ‘ido beno zerakh beno ye’aterai beno. benei qehat ‘aminadab beno qorakh beno ’asir beno. ’elqanah beno ve’ebyasaf beno ve’asir beno. takhat beno ’uri’el beno ‘uziyah beno vesha’ul beno. ubenei ’elqanah ‘amasai va’akhimot. ’elqanah beno benei ’elqanah tsofai beno venakhat beno. ’eli’ab beno yerokham beno ’elqanah beno. ubenei shemu’el habekhor vashni va’abiyah. benei merari makhli libni beno shim‘i beno ‘uzah beno. shim‘a beno khagiyah beno ‘asayah beno. ve’eleh ’asher he‘emid david ‘al yedei shir bet yhvh mimenoakh ha’aron. vayihyu mesharetim lifnei mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed bashir ‘ad benot shelomoh ’et bet yhvh birushalim vaya‘amdu khemishpatam ‘al ‘abodatam. ve’eleh ha‘omedim ubeneihem mibenei haqehati heiman hamshorer ben yo’el ben shemu’el. ben ’elqanah ben yerokham ben ’eli’el ben toakh. ben tsif tsuf ben ’elqanah ben makhat ben ‘amasai. ben ’elqanah ben yo’el ben ‘azaryah ben tsefanyah. ben takhat ben ’asir ben ’ebyasaf ben qorakh. ben yitshar ben qehat ben leivi ben yisra’el. ve’akhiv ’asaf ha‘omed ‘al yemino ’asaf ben berekhyahu ben shim‘a. ben mikha’el ben ba‘aseiyah ben malkiyah. ben ’etni ben zerakh ben ‘adayah. ben ’eitan ben zimah ben shim‘i. ben yakhat ben geireshom ben leivi. ubenei merari ’akheihem ‘al hasemol ’eitan ben qishi ben ‘abdi ben malukh. ben khashabyah ben ’amatsyah ben khilqiyah. ben ’amtsi ben bani ben shamer. ben makhli ben mushi ben merari ben leivi. va’akheihem halviyim netunim lekhal ‘abodat mishkan bet ha’elohim. ve’aharon ubanav maqtirim ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah ve‘al mizbakh haqetoret lekhol melekhet qodesh haqodashim ulekhaper ‘al yisra’el kekhol ’asher tsivah mosheh ‘ebed ha’elohim. ve’eleh benei ’aharon ’el‘azar beno pinekhas beno ’abishua‘ beno. buqi beno ‘uzi beno zerakhyah beno. merayot beno ’amaryah beno ’akhitub beno. tsadoq beno ’akhima‘ats beno. ve’eleh moshebotam letirotam bigbulam libnei ’aharon lemishpakhat haqehati ki lahem hayah hagoral. vayitenu lahem ’et khebron be’erets yehudah ve’et migrasheha sebiboteha. ve’et sedeh ha‘ir ve’et khatseireha natenu lekhaleb ben yefuneh. velibnei ’aharon natenu ’et ‘arei hamiqlat ’et khebron ve’et libnah ve’et migrasheha ve’et yatir ve’et ’eshtemoa‘ ve’et migrasheha. ve’et khilez ve’et migrasheha ’et debir ve’et migrasheha. ve’et ‘ashan ve’et migrasheha ve’et bet shemesh ve’et migrasheha. umimateh binyamin ’et geba‘ ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘alemet ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘anatot ve’et migrasheha kal ‘areihem shelosh ‘esreh ‘ir bemishpekhoteihem. velibnei qehat hanotarim mimishpakhat hamateh mimakhatsit mateh khatsi menasheh bagoral ‘arim ‘aser. velibnei geireshom lemishpekhotam mimateh yisashkhar umimateh ’asher umimateh naftali umimateh menasheh babashan ‘arim shelosh ‘esreh. libnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re’uben umimateh gad umimateh zebulun bagoral ‘arim shetem ‘esreh. vayitenu benei yisra’el lalviyim ’et he‘arim ve’et migresheihem. vayitenu bagoral mimateh benei yehudah umimateh benei shim‘on umimateh benei binyamin ’et he‘arim ha’eleh ’asher yiqre’u ’ethem besheimot. umimishpekhot benei qehat vayhi ‘arei gebulam mimateh ’efrayim. vayitenu lahem ’et ‘arei hamiqlat ’et shekhem ve’et migrasheha behar ’efrayim ve’et gezer ve’et migrasheha. ve’et yaqeme‘am ve’et migrasheha ve’et bet khoron ve’et migrasheha. ve’et ’ayalon ve’et migrasheha ve’et gat rimon ve’et migrasheha. umimakhatsit mateh menasheh ’et ‘aner ve’et migrasheha ve’et bil‘am ve’et migrasheha lemishpakhat libnei qehat hanotarim. libnei geireshom mimishpakhat khatsi mateh menasheh ’et golan babashan ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘ashtarot ve’et migrasheha. umimateh yisashkhar ’et qedesh ve’et migrasheha ’et daberat ve’et migrasheha. ve’et ramot ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘anem ve’et migrasheha. umimateh ’asher ’et mashal ve’et migrasheha ve’et ‘abdon ve’et migrasheha. ve’et khuqoq ve’et migrasheha ve’et rekhob ve’et migrasheha. umimateh naftali ’et qedesh bagalil ve’et migrasheha ve’et khamon ve’et migrasheha ve’et qiryatayim ve’et migrasheha. libnei merari hanotarim mimateh zebulun ’et rimono ve’et migrasheha ’et tabor ve’et migrasheha. umei‘eiber leyarden yereikho lemizrakh hayarden mimateh re’uben ’et betser bamidbar ve’et migrasheha ve’et yahtsah ve’et migrasheha. ve’et qedeimot ve’et migrasheha ve’et meifa‘at ve’et migrasheha. umimateh gad ’et ramot bagil‘ad ve’et migrasheha ve’et makhanayim ve’et migrasheha. ve’et kheshbon ve’et migrasheha ve’et ya‘zer ve’et migrasheha. velibnei yisashkhar tola‘ ufu’ah yashib yashub veshimron ’arba‘ah. ubenei tola‘ ‘uzi urefayah viri’el veyakhmai veyibsam ushemu’el rashim lebet ’abotam letola‘ giborei khayil letoledotam misparam bimei david ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef veshesh mei’ot. ubenei ‘uzi yizrakhyah ubenei yizrakhyah mikha’el ve‘obadyah veyo’el yishiyah khamishah rashim kulam. va‘aleihem letoledotam lebet ’abotam gedudei tseba milkhamah sheloshim veshishah ’alef ki hirbu nashim ubanim. va’akheihem lekhol mishpekhot yisashkhar giborei khayalim shemonim veshib‘ah ’elef hityakhsam lakol. binyamin bela‘ vabekher vidi‘a’el sheloshah. ubenei bela‘ ’etsbon ve‘uzi ve‘uzi’el virimot ve‘iri khamishah rashei bet ’abot giborei khayalim vehityakhsam ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef usheloshim ve’arba‘ah. ubenei bekher zemirah veyo‘ash ve’eli‘ezer ve’elyo‘einai ve‘ameri vireimot va’abiyah va‘anatot ve‘alamet kal ’eleh benei bakher. vehityakhsam letoledotam rashei bet ’abotam giborei khayil ‘esrim ’elef umatayim. ubenei yedi‘a’el bilhan ubenei bilhan ye‘ish ye‘ush ubinyamin ve’eihud ukhena‘anah vezeitan vetarshish va’akhishakhar. kal ’eleh benei yedi‘a’el lerashei ha’abot giborei khayalim shib‘ah ‘asar ’elef umatayim yotse’ei tsaba lamilkhamah. veshupim vekhupim benei ‘ir khushim benei ’akher. benei naftali yakhatsi’el veguni veyeitser veshalum benei bilhah. benei menasheh ’asri’el ’asher yaladah pilagsho ha’aramiyah yaledah ’et makhir ’abi gil‘ad. umakhir laqakh ’ishah lekhupim uleshupim veshem ’akhoto ma‘akhah veshem hasheini tselafekhad vatihyenah litslafekhad banot. vateiled ma‘akhah ’eishet makhir ben vatiqra shemo peresh veshem ’akhiv sharesh ubanav ’ulam varaqem. ubenei ’ulam bedan ’eleh benei gil‘ad ben makhir ben menasheh. va’akhoto hamolekhet yaledah ’et ’ishehod ve’et ’abi‘ezer ve’et makhlah. vayihyu benei shemida‘ ’akhyan vashekhem veliqkhi va’ani‘am. ubenei ’efrayim shutalakh ubered beno vetakhat beno ve’el‘adah beno vetakhat beno. vezabad beno veshutelakh beno ve‘eizer ve’el‘ad vaharagum ’anshei gat hanoladim ba’arets ki yaredu laqakhat ’et miqneihem. vayit’abel ’efrayim ’abihem yamim rabim vayabo’u ’ekhav lenakhamo. vayabo ’el ’ishto vatahar vateiled ben vayiqra ’et shemo beri‘ah ki bera‘ah hayetah bebeito. ubito she’erah vatiben ’et bet khoron hatakhton ve’et ha‘elyon ve’et ’uzen she’erah. verefakh beno vereshef vetelakh beno vetakhan beno. la‘dan beno ‘amihud beno ’elishama‘ beno. non beno yehoshua‘ beno. va’akhuzatam umoshebotam bet ’el ubenoteha velamizrakh na‘aran velama‘arab gezer ubenoteha ushekhem ubenoteha ‘ad ‘ayah ubenoteha. ve‘al yedei benei menasheh bet she’an ubenoteha ta‘nakh ubenoteha megido ubenoteha dor ubenoteha be’eleh yashebu benei yosef ben yisra’el. benei ’asher yimnah veyishvah veyishvi uberi‘ah veserakh ’akhotam. ubenei beri‘ah kheber umalki’el hu ’abi birzot birzayit. vekheber holid ’et yaflet ve’et shomer ve’et khotam ve’et shu‘a ’akhotam. ubenei yaflet pasakh ubimhal ve‘ashvat ’eleh benei yaflet. ubenei shamer ’akhi verohagah verahegah yakhbah vekhubah va’aram. uben heilem ’akhiv tsofakh veyimna‘ vesheilesh ve‘amal. benei tsofakh suakh vekharnefer veshu‘al ubeiri veyimrah. betser vahod veshama veshilshah veyitran ube’eira. ubenei yeter yefuneh ufispah va’ra. ubenei ‘ula ’arakh vekhani’el veritsya. kal ’eleh benei ’asher rashei bet ha’abot berurim giborei khayalim rashei hanesi’im vehityakhsam batsaba bamilkhamah misparam ’anashim ‘esrim veshishah ’alef. ubinyamin holid ’et bela‘ bekhoro ’ashbel hasheini ve’akhrakh hashelishi. nokhah harebi‘i verafa hakhamishi. vayihyu banim lebala‘ ’adar vegeira va’abihud. va’abishua‘ vena‘aman va’akhoakh. vegeira ushefufan vekhuram. ve’eleh benei ’eikhud ’eleh hem rashei ’abot leyoshebei geba‘ vayaglum ’el manakhat. vena‘aman va’akhiyah vegeira hu heglam veholid ’et ‘uza ve’et ’akhikhud. veshakharayim holid bisdeh mo’ab min shilkho ’otam khushim ve’et ba‘ara nashav. vayoled min khodesh ’ishto ’et yobab ve’et tsibya ve’et meisha ve’et malkam. ve’et ye‘uts ve’et sakheyah ve’et mirmah ’eleh banav rashei ’abot. umeikhushim holid ’et ’abitub ve’et ’elpa‘al. ubenei ’elpa‘al ‘eiber umish‘am vashamed hu banah ’et ’ono ve’et lod ubenoteha. uberi‘ah vashema‘ hemah rashei ha’abot leyoshebei ’ayalon hemah hibrikhu ’et yoshebei gat. ve’akhyo shashaq vireimot. uzebadyah va‘arad va‘ader. umikha’el veyishpah veyokha benei beri‘ah. uzebadyah umeshulam vekhizqi vakhaber. veyishmerai veyizli’ah veyobab benei ’elpa‘al. veyaqim vezikhri vezabdi. ve’eli‘einai vetsiletai ve’eli’el. va‘adayah uberayah veshimrat benei shim‘i. veyishpan va‘eiber ve’eli’el. ve‘abdon vezikhri vekhanan. vakhananyah ve‘eilam ve‘antotiyah. veyifdeyah ufeni’el ufenu’el benei shashaq. veshamsherai ushekharyah va‘atalyah. veya‘areshyah ve’eiliyah vezikhri benei yerokham. ’eleh rashei ’abot letoledotam rashim ’eleh yashebu birushalim. ubegib‘on yashebu ’abi gib‘on veshem ’ishto ma‘akhah. ubeno habekhor ‘abdon vetsur veqish uba‘al venadab. ugedor ve’akhyo vazakher. umiqlot holid ’et shim’ah ve’af hemah neged ’akheihem yashebu birushalim ‘im ’akheihem. vener holid ’et qish veqish holid ’et sha’ul vesha’ul holid ’et yehonatan ve’et malki shua‘ ve’et ’abinadab ve’et ’eshba‘al. uben yehonatan merib ba‘al umerib ba‘al holid ’et mikhah. ubenei mikhah piton vamelekh veta’reia‘ ve’akhaz. ve’akhaz holid ’et yeho‘adah viho‘adah holid ’et ‘alemet ve’et ‘azmavet ve’et zimri vezimri holid ’et motsa. umotsa holid ’et bin‘a rafah beno ’el‘asah beno ’atsel beno. ule’atsel shishah banim ve’eleh shemotam ‘azriqam bokheru veyishma‘el ushe‘aryah ve‘obadyah vekhanan kal ’eleh benei ’atsal. ubenei ‘eisheq ’akhiv ’ulam bekhoro ye‘ush hasheini ve’elifelet hashelishi. vayihyu benei ’ulam ’anashim giborei khayil dorekhei qeshet umarbim banim ubenei banim mei’ah vakhamishim kal ’eleh mibenei binyamin. vekhal yisra’el hityakhsu vehinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah hagelu lebabel bema‘alam. vehayoshebim harishonim ’asher ba’akhuzatam be‘areihem yisra’el hakohanim halviyim vehanetinim. ubirushalim yashebu min benei yehudah umin benei binyamin umin benei ’efrayim umenasheh. ‘utai ben ‘amihud ben ‘ameri ben ’imri ben banimin bani min benei ferets ben yehudah. umin hashiloni ‘asayah habekhor ubanav. umin benei zerakh ye‘u’el va’akheihem shesh mei’ot vetish‘im. umin benei binyamin salu ben meshulam ben hodavyah ben hasenu’ah. veyibneyah ben yerokham ve’eilah ben ‘uzi ben mikhri umeshulam ben shefatyah ben re‘u’el ben yibniyah. va’akheihem letoledotam tesha‘ mei’ot vakhamishim veshishah kal ’eleh ’anashim rashei ’abot lebet ’aboteihem. umin hakohanim yeda‘yah vihoyarib veyakhin. va‘azaryah ben khilqiyah ben meshulam ben tsadoq ben merayot ben ’akhitub negid bet ha’elohim. va‘adayah ben yerokham ben pashkhur ben malkiyah uma‘sai ben ‘adi’el ben yakhzeirah ben meshulam ben meshileimit ben ’imer. va’akheihem rashim lebet ’abotam ’elef usheba‘ mei’ot veshishim giborei khel melekhet ‘abodat bet ha’elohim. umin halviyim shema‘yah ben khashub ben ‘azriqam ben khashabyah min benei merari. ubaqbaqar kheresh vegalal umatanyah ben mikha ben zikhri ben ’asaf. ve‘obadyah ben shema‘yah ben galal ben yedutun uberekhyah ben ’asa ben ’elqanah hayosheb bekhatsrei netofati. vehasho‘arim shalum ve‘aqub vetalmon va’akhiman va’akhihem shalum harosh. ve‘ad henah besha‘ar hamelekh mizrakhah hemah hasho‘arim lemakhanot benei leivi. veshalum ben qorei ben ’ebyasaf ben qorakh ve’ekhav lebet ’abiv haqarekhim ‘al melekhet ha‘abodah shomerei hasipim la’ohel va’aboteihem ‘al makhaneh yhvh shomerei hamabo. ufinekhas ben ’el‘azar nagid hayah ‘aleihem lefanim yhvh ‘imo. zekharyah ben meshelemyah sho‘er petakh le’ohel mo‘ed. kulam haberurim lesho‘arim basipim matayim ushenem ‘asar hemah bekhatsreihem hityakhsam hemah yisad david ushemu’el haro’eh be’emunatam. vehem ubeneihem ‘al hashe‘arim lebet yhvh lebet ha’ohel lemishmarot. le’arba‘ rukhot yihyu hasho‘arim mizrakh yamah tsafonah vanegbah. va’akheihem bekhatsreihem labo leshib‘at hayamim mei‘et ’el ‘et ‘im ’eleh. ki be’emunah hemah ’arba‘at giborei hasho‘arim hem halviyim vehayu ‘al haleshakhot ve‘al ha’otserot bet ha’elohim. usebibot bet ha’elohim yalinu ki ‘aleihem mishmeret vehem ‘al hamafteiakh velaboqer laboqer. umeihem ‘al kelei ha‘abodah ki bemispar yebi’um ubemispar yotsi’um. umeihem memunim ‘al hakeilim ve‘al kal kelei haqodesh ve‘al hasolet vehayayin vehashemen vehalebonah vehabesamim. umin benei hakohanim roqekhei hamirqakhat labesamim. umatityah min halviyim hu habekhor leshalum haqarekhi be’emunah ‘al ma‘aseh hakhabitim. umin benei haqehati min ’akheihem ‘al lekhem hama‘arakhet lehakhin shabat shabat. ve’eleh hamshorerim rashei ’abot lalviyim baleshakhot petirim peturim ki yomam valaylah ‘aleihem bamelakhah. ’eleh rashei ha’abot lalviyim letoledotam rashim ’eleh yashebu birushalim. ubegib‘on yashebu ’abi gib‘on ye‘u’el ye‘i’el veshem ’ishto ma‘akhah. ubeno habekhor ‘abdon vetsur veqish uba‘al vener venadab. ugedor ve’akhyo uzekharyah umiqlot. umiqlot holid ’et shim’am ve’af hem neged ’akheihem yashebu birushalim ‘im ’akheihem. vener holid ’et qish veqish holid ’et sha’ul vesha’ul holid ’et yehonatan ve’et malki shua‘ ve’et ’abinadab ve’et ’eshba‘al. uben yehonatan merib ba‘al umeri ba‘al holid ’et mikhah. ubenei mikhah piton vamelekh vetakhreia‘. ve’akhaz holid ’et ya‘rah veya‘rah holid ’et ‘alemet ve’et ‘azmavet ve’et zimri vezimri holid ’et motsa. umotsa holid ’et bin‘a urefayah beno ’el‘asah beno ’atsel beno. ule’atsel shishah banim ve’eleh shemotam ‘azriqam bokheru veyishma‘el ushe‘aryah ve‘obadyah vekhanan ’eleh benei ’atsal. ufelishtim nilkhamu beyisra’el vayanas ’ish yisra’el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar gilboa‘. vayadbequ felishtim ’akharei sha’ul ve’akharei banav vayaku felishtim ’et yonatan ve’et ’abinadab ve’et malki shua‘ benei sha’ul. vatikhbad hamilkhamah ‘al sha’ul vayimtsa’uhu hamorim baqashet vayakhel min hayorim. vayomer sha’ul ’el nosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini bah pen yabo’u ha‘areilim ha’eleh vehit‘alelu bi velo ’abah nosei kheilav ki yarei me’od vayiqakh sha’ul ’et hakhereb vayipol ‘aleha. vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha’ul vayipol gam hu ‘al hakhereb vayamot. vayamat sha’ul usheloshet banav vekhal beito yakhdav meitu. vayir’u kal ’ish yisra’el ’asher ba‘eimeq ki nasu vekhi meitu sha’ul ubanav vaya‘azbu ‘areihem vayanusu vayabo’u felishtim vayeishebu bahem. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo’u felishtim lefashet ’et hakhalalim vayimtse’u ’et sha’ul ve’et banav nofelim behar gilboa‘. vayafshituhu vayis’u ’et rosho ve’et keilav vayshalekhu be’erets felishtim sabib lebaser ’et ‘atsabeihem ve’et ha‘am. vayasimu ’et keilav bet ’eloheihem ve’et gulgaleto taqe‘u bet dagon. vayishme‘u kol yabesh gil‘ad ’et kal ’asher ‘asu felishtim lesha’ul. vayaqumu kal ’ish khayil vayis’u ’et gufat sha’ul ve’et gufot banav vaybi’um yabeishah vayiqberu ’et ‘atsmoteihem takhat ha’eilah beyabesh vayatsumu shib‘at yamim. vayamat sha’ul bema‘alo ’asher ma‘al yhvh ‘al debar yhvh ’asher lo shamar vegam lish’ol ba’ob lidrosh. velo darash yhvh vaymiteihu vayaseb ’et hamelukhah ledavid ben yishai. vayiqabetsu khal yisra’el ’el david khebronah leimor hineh ‘atsmekha ubesarekha ’anakhenu. gam temol gam shilshom gam bihyot sha’ul melekh ’atah hamotsi vehameibi ’et yisra’el vayomer yhvh ’elohekha lekha ’atah tir‘eh ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’el ve’atah tihyeh nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. vayabo’u kal ziqnei yisra’el ’el hamelekh khebronah vayikhrot lahem david berit bekhebron lifnei yhvh vayimshekhu ’et david lemelekh ‘al yisra’el kidbar yhvh beyad shemu’el. vayeilekh david vekhal yisra’el yerushalim hi yebus vesham haybusi yoshebei ha’arets. vayomeru yoshebei yebus ledavid lo tabo henah vayilkod david ’et metsudat tsiyon hi ‘ir david. vayomer david kal makeh yebusi barishonah yihyeh lerosh ulesar vaya‘al barishonah yo’ab ben tseruyah vayhi lerosh. vayeisheb david bamtsad ‘al ken qare’u lo ‘ir david. vayiben ha‘ir misabib min hamilo ve‘ad hasabib veyo’ab yekhayeh ’et she’ar ha‘ir. vayeilekh david halokh vegadol yhvh tseba’ot ‘imo. ve’eleh rashei hagiborim ’asher ledavid hamitkhazeqim ‘imo bemalkhuto ‘im kal yisra’el lehamlikho kidbar yhvh ‘al yisra’el. ve’eleh mispar hagiborim ’asher ledavid yashabe‘am ben khakhmoni rosh hasheloshim hashalishim hu ‘orer ’et khanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot khalal befa‘am ’ekhat. ve’akharav ’el‘azar ben dodo ha’akhokhi hu bishloshah hagiborim. hu hayah ‘im david bapas damim vehapelishtim ne’esfu sham lamilkhamah vatehi khelqat hasadeh melei’ah se‘orim veha‘am nasu mipenei felishtim. vayityatsebu betokh hakhelqah vayatsiluha vayaku ’et pelishtim vayosha‘ yhvh teshu‘ah gedolah. vayeiredu sheloshah min hasheloshim rosh ‘al hatsur ’el david ’el me‘arat ‘adulam umakhaneh felishtim khonah be‘eimeq refa’im. vedavid ’az bametsudah unetsib pelishtim ’az bebet lakhem. vayit’av vayit’av david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar. vayibqe‘u hasheloshah bemakhaneh felishtim vayish’abu mayim mibor bet lekhem ’asher basha‘ar vayis’u vayabi’u ’el david velo ’abah david lishtotam vaynasekh ’otam yhvh. vayomer khalilah li mei’elohai mei‘asot zot hadam ha’anashim ha’eleh ’eshteh benafshotam ki benafshotam hebi’um velo ’abah lishtotam ’eleh ‘asu sheloshet hagiborim. ve’abshai ’akhi yo’ab hu hayah rosh hasheloshah vehu ‘orer ’et khanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot khalal velo velo shem basheloshah. min hasheloshah bashenayim nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve‘ad hasheloshah lo ba. benayah ben yehoyada‘ ben ’ish khayil rab pe‘alim min qabtse’el hu hikah ’et shenei ’ari’el mo’ab vehu yarad vehikah ’et ha’ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. vehu hikah ’et ha’ish hamitsri ’ish midah khamesh ba’amah ubeyad hamitsri khanit kimnor ’oregim vayeired ’eilav bashabet vayigzol ’et hakhanit miyad hamitsri vayahargeihu bakhanito. ’eleh ‘asah benayahu ben yehoyada‘ velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. min hasheloshim hino nikhbad hu ve’el hasheloshah lo ba vaysimeihu david ‘al mishma‘to. vegiborei hakhayalim ‘asah ’el ’akhi yo’ab ’elkhanan ben dodo mibet lakhem. shamot haharori khelets hapeloni. ‘ira ben ‘iqesh hateqo‘i ’abi‘ezer ha‘anetoti. sibekhai hakhushati ‘ilai ha’akhokhi. mahrai hanetofati kheiled ben ba‘anah hanetofati. ’itai ben ribai migib‘at benei binyamin benayah hapir‘atoni. khurai minakhalei ga‘ash ’abi’el ha‘arbati. ‘azmavet habakharumi ’elyakhba hasha‘alboni. benei hashem hagizoni yonatan ben shageh haharari. ’akhi’am ben sakhar haharari ’elifal ben ’ur. kheifer hamekheirati ’akhiyah hapeloni. khetsro hakarmeli na‘arai ben ’ezbai. yo’el ’akhi natan mibkhar ben hagri. tseleq ha‘amoni nakhrai habeiroti nosei kelei yo’ab ben tseruyah. ‘ira hayitri gareb hayitri. ’uriyah hakhiti zabad ben ’akhlai. ‘adina ben shiza har’ubeini rosh lar’ubeini ve‘alav sheloshim. khanan ben ma‘akhah veyoshafat hamitni. ‘uziya ha‘ashterati shama‘ vi‘u’el vi‘i’el benei khotam ha‘aro‘eiri. yedi‘a’el ben shimri veyokha ’akhiv hatitsi. ’eli’el hamakhavim viribai veyoshavyah benei ’elna‘am veyitmah hamo’abi. ’eli’el ve‘obed veya‘asi’el hametsobayah. ve’eleh haba’im ’el david letsiqelag ‘od ‘atsur mipenei sha’ul ben qish vehemah bagiborim ‘ozerei hamilkhamah. nosheqei qeshet mayminim umasmilim ba’abanim ubakhitsim baqashet mei’akhei sha’ul mibinyamin. harosh ’akhi‘ezer veyo’ash benei hashema‘ah hagib‘ati vizu’el vizi’el vafelet benei ‘azmavet uberakhah veyeihu ha‘anetoti. veyishma‘yah hagib‘oni gibor basheloshim ve‘al hasheloshim. veyirmeyah veyakhazi’el veyokhanan veyozabad hagedeirati. ’el‘uzai virimot ube‘alyah ushemaryahu ushefatyahu hakharifi hakharufi. ’elqanah veyishiyahu va‘azar’el veyo‘ezer veyashabe‘am haqarekhim. veyo‘eilah uzebadyah benei yerokham min hagedor. umin hagadi nibdelu ’el david lamtsad midbarah giborei hakhayil ’anshei tsaba lamilkhamah ‘orekhei tsinah varomakh ufenei ’aryeh peneihem vekhitsbayim ‘al heharim lemaher. ‘eizer harosh ‘obadyah hasheini ’eli’ab hashelishi. mishmanah harebi‘i yirmeyah hakhamishi. ‘atai hashishi ’eli’el hashebi‘i. yokhanan hashemini ’elzabad hateshi‘i. yirmeyahu ha‘asiri makhbanai ‘ashtei ‘asar. ’eleh mibenei gad rashei hatsaba ’ekhad lemei’ah haqatan vehagadol le’alef. ’eleh hem ’asher ‘aberu ’et hayarden bakhodesh harishon vehu memalei ‘al kal gidyotav gedotav vayabrikhu ’et kal ha‘amaqim lamizrakh velama‘arab. vayabo’u min benei binyamin vihudah ‘ad lamtsad ledavid. vayeitsei david lifneihem vaya‘an vayomer lahem ’im leshalom batem ’eilai le‘azereini yihyeh li ‘aleikhem leibab leyakhad ve’im leramotani letsarai belo khamas bekhapai yeire ’elohei ’aboteinu veyokhakh. veruakh labeshah ’et ‘amasai rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha david ve‘imekha ben yishai shalom shalom lekha veshalom le‘ozerekha ki ‘azarekha ’elohekha vayqabelem david vayitenem berashei hagedud. umimenasheh nafelu ‘al david bebo’o ‘im pelishtim ‘al sha’ul lamilkhamah velo ‘azarum ki be‘eitsah shilekhuhu sarnei felishtim leimor berasheinu yipol ’el ’adonav sha’ul. belekhto ’el tsiqelag nafelu ‘alav mimenasheh ‘adnakh veyozabad vidi‘a’el umikha’el veyozabad ve’elihu vetsiletai rashei ha’alafim ’asher limnasheh. vehemah ‘azeru ‘im david ‘al hagedud ki giborei khayil kulam vayihyu sarim batsaba. ki le‘et yom beyom yabo’u ‘al david le‘azero ‘ad lemakhaneh gadol kemakhaneh ’elohim. ve’eleh misperei rashei hekhaluts latsaba ba’u ‘al david khebronah lehaseb malkhut sha’ul ’eilav kefi yhvh. benei yehudah nose’ei tsinah varomakh sheishet ’alafim ushemoneh mei’ot khalutsei tsaba. min benei shim‘on giborei khayil latsaba shib‘at ’alafim umei’ah. min benei haleivi ’arba‘at ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. vihoyada‘ hanagid le’aharon ve‘imo sheloshet ’alafim usheba‘ mei’ot. vetsadoq na‘ar gibor khayil ubet ’abiv sarim ‘esrim ushenayim. umin benei binyamin ’akhei sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim ve‘ad henah marbitam shomerim mishmeret bet sha’ul. umin benei ’efrayim ‘esrim ’elef ushemoneh mei’ot giborei khayil ’anshei sheimot lebet ’abotam. umeikhatsi mateh menasheh shemonah ‘asar ’alef ’asher niqebu besheimot labo lehamlikh ’et david. umibenei yisashkhar yod‘ei binah la‘itim lada‘at mah ya‘aseh yisra’el rasheihem matayim vekhal ’akheihem ‘al pihem. mizebulun yots’ei tsaba ‘orekhei milkhamah bekhal kelei milkhamah khamishim ’alef vela‘ador belo leb valeb. uminaftali sarim ’alef ve‘imahem betsinah vakhanit sheloshim veshib‘ah ’alef. umin hadani ‘orekhei milkhamah ‘esrim ushemonah ’elef veshesh mei’ot. umei’asher yots’ei tsaba la‘arokh milkhamah ’arba‘im ’alef. umei‘eiber layarden min har’ubeini vehagadi vakhatsi sheibet menasheh bekhol kelei tseba milkhamah mei’ah ve‘esrim ’alef. kal ’eleh ’anshei milkhamah ‘oderei ma‘arakhah beleibab shalem ba’u khebronah lehamlikh ’et david ‘al kal yisra’el vegam kal sheirit yisra’el leb ’ekhad lehamlikh ’et david. vayihyu sham ‘im david yamim sheloshah ’okhelim veshotim ki heikhinu lahem ’akheihem. vegam haqerobim ’aleihem ‘ad yisashkhar uzebulun venaftali mebi’im lekhem bakhamorim ubagemalim ubaperadim ubabaqar ma’akhal qemakh debeilim vetsimuqim veyayin veshemen ubaqar vetson larob ki simkhah beyisra’el. vayiva‘ats david ‘im sarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot lekhal nagid. vayomer david lekhol qehal yisra’el ’im ‘aleikhem tob umin yhvh ’eloheinu nifretsah nishlekhah ‘al ’akheinu hanish’arim bekhol ’artsot yisra’el ve‘imahem hakohanim vehalviyim be‘arei migresheihem veyiqabetsu ’eileinu. venasebah ’et ’aron ’eloheinu ’eileinu ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha’ul. vayomeru khal haqahal la‘asot ken ki yashar hadabar be‘einei khal ha‘am. vayaqhel david ’et kal yisra’el min shikhor mitsrayim ve‘ad lebo khamat lehabi ’et ’aron ha’elohim miqiryat ye‘arim. vaya‘al david vekhal yisra’el ba‘alatah ’el qiryat ye‘arim ’asher lihudah leha‘alot misham ’et ’aron ha’elohim yhvh yosheb hakerubim ’asher niqra shem. vayarkibu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘al ‘agalah khadashah mibet ’abinadab ve‘uza ve’akhyo nohagim ba‘agalah. vedavid vekhal yisra’el mesakhaqim lifnei ha’elohim bekhal ‘oz ubeshirim ubekhinorot ubinbalim ubetupim ubimtsiltayim ubakhatsotserot. vayabo’u ‘ad goren kidon vayishlakh ‘uza ’et yado le’ekhoz ’et ha’aron ki shametu habaqar. vayikhar ’af yhvh be‘uza vayakeihu ‘al ’asher shalakh yado ‘al ha’aron vayamat sham lifnei ’elohim. vayikhar ledavid ki farats yhvh perets be‘uza vayiqra lamaqom hahu perets ‘uza ‘ad hayom hazeh. vayira david ’et ha’elohim bayom hahu leimor hekh ’abi ’eilai ’et ’aron ha’elohim. velo heisir david ’et ha’aron ’eilav ’el ‘ir david vayateihu ’el bet ‘obed ’edom hagiti. vayeisheb ’aron ha’elohim ‘im bet ‘obed ’edom bebeito sheloshah khodashim vaybarekh yhvh ’et bet ‘obed ’edom ve’et kal ’asher lo. vayishlakh khiram khuram melekh tsor mal’akhim ’el david va‘atsei ’arazim vekharashei qir vekharashei ‘eitsim libnot lo bayit. vayeida‘ david ki hekhino yhvh lemelekh ‘al yisra’el ki niset lema‘lah malkhuto ba‘abur ‘amo yisra’el. vayiqakh david ‘od nashim birushalim vayoled david ‘od banim ubanot. ve’eleh shemot hayludim ’asher hayu lo birushalim shamua‘ veshobab natan ushelomoh. veyibkhar ve’elishua‘ ve’elpalet. venogah venefeg veyafia‘. ve’elishama‘ ube‘elyada‘ ve’elifalet. vayishme‘u felishtim ki nimshakh david lemelekh ‘al kal yisra’el vaya‘alu khal pelishtim lebaqesh ’et david vayishma‘ david vayeitsei lifneihem. ufelishtim ba’u vayifshetu be‘eimeq refa’im. vayish’al david beilohim leimor ha’e‘eleh ‘al pelishtiyim pelishtim unetatam beyadi vayomer lo yhvh ‘aleh unetatim beyadekha. vaya‘alu beba‘al peratsim vayakem sham david vayomer david parats ha’elohim ’et ’oybai beyadi keferets mayim ‘al ken qare’u shem hamaqom hahu ba‘al peratsim. vaya‘azbu sham ’et ’eloheihem vayomer david vayisarefu ba’esh. vayosifu ‘od pelishtim vayifshetu ba‘eimeq. vayish’al ‘od david beilohim vayomer lo ha’elohim lo ta‘aleh ’akhareihem haseb mei‘aleihem ubata lahem mimul habekha’im. vihi keshame‘akha ’et qol hatse‘adah berashei habekha’im ’az teitsei bamilkhamah ki yatsa ha’elohim lefanekha lehakot ’et makhaneh felishtim. vaya‘as david ka’asher tsivahu ha’elohim vayaku ’et makhaneh felishtim migib‘on ve‘ad gazerah. vayeitsei shem david bekhal ha’aratsot yhvh natan ’et pakhdo ‘al kal hagoyim. vaya‘as lo batim be‘ir david vayakhen maqom la’aron ha’elohim vayet lo ’ohel. ’az ’amar david lo laset ’et ’aron ha’elohim ki ’im halviyim ki bam bakhar yhvh laset ’et ’aron yhvh uleshareto ‘ad ‘olam. vayaqhel david ’et kal yisra’el ’el yerushalim leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhvh ’el meqomo ’asher heikhin lo. vaye’esof david ’et benei ’aharon ve’et halviyim. libnei qehat ’uri’el hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah ve‘esrim. libnei merari ‘asayah hasar ve’ekhav matayim ve‘esrim. libnei geireshom yo’el hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah usheloshim. libnei ’elitsafan shema‘yah hasar ve’ekhav matayim. libnei khebron ’eli’el hasar ve’ekhav shemonim. libnei ‘uzi’el ‘aminadab hasar ve’ekhav mei’ah ushenem ‘asar. vayiqra david letsadoq ule’ebyatar hakohanim velalviyim le’uri’el ‘asayah veyo’el shema‘yah ve’eli’el ve‘aminadab. vayomer lahem ’atem rashei ha’abot lalviyim hitqadeshu ’atem va’akheikhem veha‘alitem ’et ’aron yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’el hakhinoti lo. ki lemabarishonah lo ’atem parats yhvh ’eloheinu banu ki lo derashnuhu kamishpat. vayitqadeshu hakohanim vehalviyim leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. vayis’u benei halviyim ’et ’aron ha’elohim ka’asher tsivah mosheh kidbar yhvh bikhteifam bamotot ‘aleihem. vayomer david lesarei halviyim leha‘amid ’et ’akheihem hamshorerim bikhlei shir nebalim vekhinorot umetsiltayim mashmi‘im leharim beqol lesimkhah. vaya‘amidu halviyim ’et heiman ben yo’el umin ’ekhav ’asaf ben berekhyahu umin benei merari ’akheihem ’eitan ben qushayahu. ve‘imahem ’akheihem hamishnim zekharyahu ben veya‘azi’el ushemiramot vikhi’el ve‘uni ’eli’ab ubenayahu uma‘aseiyahu umatityahu ve’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve‘obed ’edom vi‘i’el hasho‘arim. vehamshorerim heiman ’asaf ve’eitan bimtsiltayim nekhoshet lehashmia‘. uzekharyah va‘azi’el ushemiramot vikhi’el ve‘uni ve’eli’ab uma‘aseiyahu ubenayahu binbalim ‘al ‘alamot. umatityahu ve’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve‘obed ’edom vi‘i’el va‘azazyahu bekhinorot ‘al hasheminit lenatseiakh. ukhenanyahu sar halviyim bemasa yasor bamasa ki meibin hu. uberekhyah ve’elqanah sho‘arim la’aron. ushebanyahu veyoshafat unetan’el va‘amasai uzekharyahu ubenayahu ve’eli‘ezer hakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim bakhatsotserot lifnei ’aron ha’elohim ve‘obed ’edom vikhiyah sho‘arim la’aron. vayhi david veziqnei yisra’el vesarei ha’alafim haholekhim leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhvh min bet ‘obed ’edom besimkhah. vayhi be‘zor ha’elohim ’et halviyim nose’ei ’aron berit yhvh vayizbekhu shib‘ah farim veshib‘ah ’eilim. vedavid mekhurbal bim‘il buts vekhal halviyim hanose’im ’et ha’aron vehamshorerim ukhenanyah hasar hamasa hamshorerim ve‘al david ’eifod bad. vekhal yisra’el ma‘alim ’et ’aron berit yhvh bitru‘ah ubeqol shofar ubakhatsotserot ubimtsiltayim mashmi‘im binbalim vekhinorot. vayhi ’aron berit yhvh ba ‘ad ‘ir david umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad hakhalon vateire ’et hamelekh david meraqed umesakheq vatibez lo belibah. vayabi’u ’et ’aron ha’elohim vayatsigu ’oto betokh ha’ohel ’asher natah lo david vayaqribu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei ha’elohim. vaykhal david meiha‘alot ha‘olah vehashelamim vaybarekh ’et ha‘am beshem yhvh. vaykhaleq lekhal ’ish yisra’el mei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah le’ish kikar lekhem ve’eshpar va’ashishah. vayiten lifnei ’aron yhvh min halviyim mesharetim ulehazkir ulehodot ulehalel yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. ’asaf harosh umishneihu zekharyah ye‘i’el ushemiramot vikhi’el umatityah ve’eli’ab ubenayahu ve‘obed ’edom vi‘i’el bikhlei nebalim ubekhinorot ve’asaf bamtsiltayim mashmia‘. ubenayahu veyakhazi’el hakohanim bakhatsotserot tamid lifnei ’aron berit ha’elohim. bayom hahu ’az natan david barosh lehodot yhvh beyad ’asaf ve’ekhav. hodu yhvh qir’u bishmo hodi‘u ba‘amim ‘alilotav. shiru lo zameru lo sikhu bekhal nifle’otav. hithalu beshem qadesho yismakh leb mebaqshei yhvh. dirshu yhvh ve‘uzo baqeshu fanav tamid. zikhru nifle’otav ’asher ‘asah mofetav umishpetei fihu. zera‘ yisra’el ‘abdo benei ya‘aqob bekhirav. hu yhvh ’eloheinu bekhal ha’arets mishpatav. zikhru le‘olam berito dabar tsivah le’elef dor. ’asher karat ’et ’abraham ushebu‘ato leyitskhaq. vaya‘amideha leya‘aqob lekhoq leyisra’el berit ‘olam. leimor lekha ’eten ’erets kena‘an khebel nakhalatkhem. bihyotkhem metei mispar kim‘at vegarim bah. vayithalekhu migo ’el go umimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’akher. lo hiniakh le’ish le‘asheqam vayokhakh ‘aleihem melakhim. ’al tige‘u bimshikhai ubinbi’ai ’al tarei‘u. shiru yhvh kal ha’arets baseru miyom ’el yom yeshu‘ato. saperu bagoyim ’et kebodo bekhal ha‘amim nifle’otav. ki gadol yhvh umehulal me’od venora hu ‘al kal ’elohim. ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim yhvh shamayim ‘asah. hod vehadar lefanav ‘oz vekhedvah bimqomo. habu yhvh mishpekhot ‘amim habu yhvh kabod va‘oz. habu yhvh kebod shemo se’u minkhah ubo’u lefanav hishtakhavu yhvh behadrat qodesh. khilu milefanav kal ha’arets ’af tikon teibel bal timot. yismekhu hashamayim vetagel ha’arets veyomeru bagoyim yhvh malakh. yir‘am hayam umelo’o ya‘alots hasadeh vekhal ’asher bo. ’az yeranenu ‘atsei haya‘ar milifnei yhvh ki ba lishpot ’et ha’arets. hodu yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. ve’imru hoshi‘einu ’elohei yish‘einu veqabetseinu vehatsileinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. barukh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el min ha‘olam ve‘ad ha‘olam vayomeru khal ha‘am ’amen vehalel yhvh. vaya‘azab sham lifnei ’aron berit yhvh le’asaf ule’ekhav lesharet lifnei ha’aron tamid lidbar yom beyomo. ve‘obed ’edom va’akheihem shishim ushemonah ve‘obed ’edom ben yeditun vekhosah lesho‘arim. ve’et tsadoq hakohen ve’ekhav hakohanim lifnei mishkan yhvh babamah ’asher begib‘on. leha‘alot ‘olot yhvh ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah tamid laboqer vela‘areb ulekhal hakatub betorat yhvh ’asher tsivah ‘al yisra’el. ve‘imahem heiman vidutun ushe’ar haberurim ’asher niqebu besheimot lehodot yhvh ki le‘olam khasdo. ve‘imahem heiman vidutun khatsotserot umetsiltayim lemashmi‘im ukhelei shir ha’elohim ubenei yedutun lasha‘ar. vayeilekhu khal ha‘am ’ish lebeito vayisob david lebarekh ’et beito. vayhi ka’asher yashab david bebeito vayomer david ’el natan hanabi hineh ’anokhi yosheb bebet ha’arazim va’aron berit yhvh takhat yeri‘ot. vayomer natan ’el david kol ’asher bilbabekha ‘aseh ki ha’elohim ‘imakh. vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi debar ’elohim ’el natan leimor. lekh ve’amarta ’el david ‘abdi koh ’amar yhvh lo ’atah tibneh li habayit lashabet. ki lo yashabti bebayit min hayom ’asher he‘eleiti ’et yisra’el ‘ad hayom hazeh va’ehyeh mei’ohel ’el ’ohel umimishkan. bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra’el hadabar dibarti ’et ’akhad shofetei yisra’el ’asher tsiviti lir‘ot ’et ‘ami leimor lamah lo benitem li bet ’arazim. ve‘atah koh tomar le‘abdi ledavid koh ’amar yhvh tseba’ot ’ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh min ’akharei hatson lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. va’ehyeh ‘imekha bekhol ’asher halakhta va’akhrit ’et kal ’oybekha mipanekha ve‘asiti lekha shem keshem hagedolim ’asher ba’arets. vesamti maqom le‘ami yisra’el uneta‘tihu veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz ‘od velo yosifu benei ‘avlah lebaloto ka’asher barishonah. ulemiyamim ’asher tsiviti shofetim ‘al ‘ami yisra’el vehikhna‘ti ’et kal ’oybekha va’agid lakh ubayit yibneh lekha yhvh. vehayah ki male’u yamekha lalekhet ‘im ’abotekha vahaqimoti ’et zar‘akha ’akharekha ’asher yihyeh mibanekha vahakhinoti ’et malkhuto. hu yibneh li bayit vekhonanti ’et kis’o ‘ad ‘olam. ’ani ’ehyeh lo le’ab vehu yihyeh li leben vekhasdi lo ’asir mei‘imo ka’asher hasiroti mei’asher hayah lefanekha. veha‘amadtihu bebeiti ubemalkhuti ‘ad ha‘olam vekhis’o yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. kekhol hadebarim ha’eleh ukhekhol hekhazon hazeh ken diber natan ’el david. vayabo hamelekh david vayeisheb lifnei yhvh vayomer mi ’ani yhvh ’elohim umi beiti ki habi’otani ‘ad halom. vatiqtan zot be‘einekha ’elohim vatedaber ‘al bet ‘abdekha lemeirakhoq ure’itani ketor ha’adam hama‘alah yhvh ’elohim. mah yosif ‘od david ’eilekha lekhabod ’et ‘abdekha ve’atah ’et ‘abdekha yada‘eta. yhvh ba‘abur ‘abdekha ukhelibekha ‘asita ’et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia‘ ’et kal hagedulot. yhvh ’en kamokha ve’en ’elohim zulatekha bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’azeneinu. umi ke‘amekha yisra’el go ’ekhad ba’arets ’asher halakh ha’elohim lifdot lo ‘am lasum lekha m gedulot venora’ot legaresh mipenei ‘amekha ’asher padita mimitsrayim goyim. vatiten ’et ‘amekha yisra’el lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam ve’atah yhvh hayita lahem leilohim. ve‘atah yhvh hadabar ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘abdekha ve‘al beito yei’amen ‘ad ‘olam va‘aseh ka’asher dibarta. veyei’amen veyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor yhvh tseba’ot ’elohei yisra’el ’elohim leyisra’el ubet david ‘abdekha nakhon lefanekha. ki ’atah ’elohai galita ’et ’ozen ‘abdekha libnot lo bayit ‘al ken matsa ‘abdekha lehitpalel lefanekha. ve‘atah yhvh ’atah hu ha’elohim vatedaber ‘al ‘abdekha hatobah hazot. ve‘atah ho’alta lebarekh ’et bet ‘abdekha lihyot le‘olam lefanekha ki ’atah yhvh beirakhta umeborakh le‘olam. vayhi ’akharei khen vayakh david ’et pelishtim vayakhni‘em vayiqakh ’et gat ubenoteha miyad pelishtim. vayakh ’et mo’ab vayihyu mo’ab ‘abadim ledavid nose’ei minkhah. vayakh david ’et hadad‘ezer melekh tsobah khamatah belekhto lehatsib yado binhar perat. vayilkod david mimenu ’elef rekheb veshib‘at ’alafim parashim ve‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli vai‘aqer david ’et kal harekheb vayoter mimenu mei’ah rakheb. vayabo ’aram darmeseq la‘zor lahadad‘ezer melekh tsobah vayakh david ba’aram ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. vayasem david ba’aram darmeseq vayhi ’aram ledavid ‘abadim nose’ei minkhah vayosha‘ yhvh ledavid bekhol ’asher halakh. vayiqakh david ’et shiltei hazahab ’asher hayu ‘al ‘abdei hadad‘azer vaybi’em yerushalim. umitibkhat umikun ‘arei hadad‘ezer laqakh david nekhoshet rabah me’od bah ‘asah shelomoh ’et yam hanekhoshet ve’et ha‘amudim ve’et kelei hanekhoshet. vayishma‘ to‘u melekh khamat ki hikah david ’et kal khel hadad‘ezer melekh tsobah. vayishlakh ’et hadoram beno ’el hamelekh david lish’ol lish’al lo leshalom ulebarakho ‘al ’asher nilkham bahadad‘ezer vayakeihu ki ’ish milkhamot to‘u hayah hadad‘azer vekhol kelei zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. gam ’otam hiqdish hamelekh david yhvh ‘im hakesef vehazahab ’asher nasa mikal hagoyim mei’edom umimo’ab umibenei ‘amon umipelishtim umei‘amaleq. ve’abshai ben tseruyah hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelakh shemonah ‘asar ’alef. vayasem be’edom netsibim vayihyu khal ’edom ‘abadim ledavid vayosha‘ yhvh ’et david bekhol ’asher halakh. vayimlokh david ‘al kal yisra’el vayhi ‘oseh mishpat utsedaqah lekhal ‘amo. veyo’ab ben tseruyah ‘al hatsaba vihoshafat ben ’akhilud mazkir. vetsadoq ben ’akhitub va’abimelekh ben ’ebyatar kohanim veshavsha sofer. ubenayahu ben yehoyada‘ ‘al hakereiti vehapeleiti ubenei david harishonim leyad hamelekh. vayhi ’akharei khen vayamat nakhash melekh benei ‘amon vayimlokh beno takhtav. vayomer david ’e‘eseh khesed ‘im khanun ben nakhash ki ‘asah ’abiv ‘imi khesed vayishlakh david mal’akhim lenakhamo ‘al ’abiv vayabo’u ‘abdei david ’el ’erets benei ‘amon ’el khanun lenakhamo. vayomeru sarei benei ‘amon lekhanun hamkhabed david ’et ’abikha be‘einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba‘abur lakhqor velahafokh uleragel ha’arets ba’u ‘abadav ’eilekha. vayiqakh khanun ’et ‘abdei david vaygalekhem vayikhrot ’et madveihem bakheitsi ‘ad hamifsa‘ah vayshalekhem. vayeilekhu vayagidu ledavid ‘al ha’anashim vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od vayomer hamelekh shebu bireikho ‘ad ’asher yetsamakh zeqankhem veshabtem. vayir’u benei ‘amon ki hitba’ashu ‘im david vayishlakh khanun ubenei ‘amon ’elef kikar kesef liskor lahem min ’aram naharayim umin ’aram ma‘akhah umitsobah rekheb ufarashim. vayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim ’elef rekheb ve’et melekh ma‘akhah ve’et ‘amo vayabo’u vayakhanu lifnei meideba ubenei ‘amon ne’esfu mei‘areihem vayabo’u lamilkhamah vayishma‘ david vayishlakh ’et yo’ab ve’et kal tsaba hagiborim. vayeitse’u benei ‘amon vaya‘arkhu milkhamah petakh ha‘ir vehamelakhim ’asher ba’u lebadam basadeh. vayar yo’ab ki hayetah fenei hamilkhamah ’eilav panim ve’akhor vayibkhar mikal bakhur beyisra’el vaya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. ve’et yeter ha‘am natan beyad ’abshai ’akhiv vaya‘arkhu liqrat benei ‘amon. vayomer ’im tekhezaq mimeni ’aram vehayita li litshu‘ah ve’im benei ‘amon yekhezqu mimekha vehosha‘tikha. khazaq venitkhazeqah be‘ad ‘ameinu ube‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu yhvh hatob be‘einav ya‘aseh. vayigash yo’ab veha‘am ’asher ‘imo lifnei ’aram lamilkhamah vayanusu mipanav. ubenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram vayanusu gam hem mipenei ’abshai ’akhiv vayabo’u ha‘irah vayabo yo’ab yerushalim. vayar ’aram ki nigefu lifnei yisra’el vayishlekhu mal’akhim vayotsi’u ’et ’aram ’asher mei‘eiber hanahar veshofakh sar tseba hadad‘ezer lifneihem. vayugad ledavid vaye’esof ’et kal yisra’el vaya‘abor hayarden vayabo ’aleihem vaya‘arokh ’aleihem vaya‘arokh david liqrat ’aram milkhamah vayilakhamu ‘imo. vayanas ’aram milifnei yisra’el vayaharog david mei’aram shib‘at ’alafim rekheb ve’arba‘im ’elef ’ish ragli ve’et shofakh sar hatsaba heimit. vayir’u ‘abdei hadad‘ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra’el vayashlimu ‘im david vaya‘abduhu velo ’abah ’aram lehoshia‘ ’et benei ‘amon ‘od. vayhi le‘et teshubat hashanah le‘et tset hamelakhim vayinhag yo’ab ’et khel hatsaba vayashkhet ’et ’erets benei ‘amon vayabo vayatsar ’et rabah vedavid yosheb birushalim vayakh yo’ab ’et rabah vayeherseha. vayiqakh david ’et ‘ateret malkam mei‘al rosho vayimtsa’ah mishqal kikar zahab ubah ’eben yeqarah vatehi ‘al rosh david ushelal ha‘ir hotsi harbeh me’od. ve’et ha‘am ’asher bah hotsi vayasar bamegeirah ubakharitsei habarzel ubamegeirot vekhen ya‘aseh david lekhol ‘arei benei ‘amon vayashab david vekhal ha‘am yerushalim. vayhi ’akhareikhen vata‘amod milkhamah begezer ‘im pelishtim ’az hikah sibekhai hakhushati ’et sipai milidei harefa’im vayikanei‘u. vatehi ‘od milkhamah ’et pelishtim vayakh ’elkhanan ben ya‘ur ya‘ir ’et lakhmi ’akhi galeyat hagiti ve‘ets khanito kimnor ’oregim. vatehi ‘od milkhamah begat vayhi ’ish midah ve’etsbe‘otav shesh vashesh ‘esrim ve’arba‘ vegam hu nolad leharafa. vaykharef ’et yisra’el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim‘a ’akhi david. ’el nuledu leharafa begat vayipelu beyad david ubeyad ‘abadav. vaya‘amod satan ‘al yisra’el vayaset ’et david limnot ’et yisra’el. vayomer david ’el yo’ab ve’el sarei ha‘am lekhu sifru ’et yisra’el mibe’er sheba‘ ve‘ad dan vehabi’u ’eilai ve’eide‘ah ’et misparam. vayomer yo’ab yosef yhvh ‘al ‘amo kahem mei’ah fe‘amim halo ’adoni hamelekh kulam ladoni la‘abadim lamah yebaqesh zot ’adoni lamah yihyeh le’ashmah leyisra’el. udebar hamelekh khazaq ‘al yo’ab vayeitsei yo’ab vayithalekh bekhal yisra’el vayabo yerushalim. vayiten yo’ab ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el david vayhi khal yisra’el ’elef ’alafim umei’ah ’elef ’ish sholef khereb vihudah ’arba‘ mei’ot veshib‘im ’elef ’ish sholef khareb. veleivi ubinyamin lo faqad betokham ki nit‘ab debar hamelekh ’et yo’ab. vayeira‘ be‘einei ha’elohim ‘al hadabar hazeh vayakh ’et yisra’el. vayomer david ’el ha’elohim khatati me’od ’asher ‘asiti ’et hadabar hazeh ve‘atah ha‘aber na ’et ‘avon ‘abdekha ki niskalti me’od. vaydaber yhvh ’el gad khozeh david leimor. lekh vedibarta ’el david leimor koh ’amar yhvh shalosh ’ani noteh ‘alekha bekhar lekha ’akhat meihenah ve’e‘eseh lakh. vayabo gad ’el david vayomer lo koh ’amar yhvh qabel lakh. ’im shalosh shanim ra‘ab ve’im sheloshah khodashim nispeh mipenei tsarekha vekhereb ’oybekha lemaseget ve’im sheloshet yamim khereb yhvh vedeber ba’arets umal’akh yhvh mashkhit bekhal gebul yisra’el ve‘atah re’eh mah ’ashib ’et sholekhi dabar. vayomer david ’el gad tsar li me’od ’epelah na beyad yhvh ki rabim rakhamav me’od ubeyad ’adam ’al ’epol. vayiten yhvh deber beyisra’el vayipol miyisra’el shib‘im ’elef ’ish. vayishlakh ha’elohim mal’akh lirushalim lehashkhitah ukhehashkhit ra’ah yhvh vayinakhem ‘al hara‘ah vayomer lamal’akh hamashkhit rab ‘atah heref yadekha umal’akh yhvh ‘omed ‘im goren ’arenan haybusi. vayisa david ’et ‘einav vayar ’et mal’akh yhvh ‘omed ben ha’arets uben hashamayim vekharbo shelufah beyado netuyah ‘al yerushalim vayipol david vehazeqeinim mekhusim basaqim ‘al peneihem. vayomer david ’el ha’elohim halo ’ani ’amarti limnot ba‘am va’ani hu ’asher khatati vehareia‘ harei‘oti ve’eleh hatson meh ‘asu yhvh ’elohai tehi na yadekha bi ubebet ’abi ube‘amekha lo lemageifah. umal’akh yhvh ’amar ’el gad leimor ledavid ki ya‘aleh david lehaqim mizbeiakh yhvh begoren ’arenan haybusi. vaya‘al david bidbar gad ’asher diber beshem yhvh. vayashab ’arenan vayar ’et hamal’akh ve’arba‘at banav ‘imo mitkhabe’im ve’arenan dash khitim. vayabo david ‘ad ’arenan vayabet ’arenan vayar ’et david vayeitsei min hagoren vayishtakhu ledavid ’apayim ’aretsah. vayomer david ’el ’arenan tenah li meqom hagoren ve’ebneh bo mizbeiakh yhvh bekhesef malei teneihu li vetei‘atsar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. vayomer ’arenan ’el david qakh lakh veya‘as ’adoni hamelekh hatob be‘einav re’eh natati habaqar la‘olot vehamorigim la‘eitsim vehakhitim laminkhah hakol natati. vayomer hamelekh david le’arenan lo ki qanoh ’eqneh bekhesef malei ki lo ’esa ’asher lekha yhvh veha‘alot ‘olah khinam. vayiten david le’arenan bamaqom shiqlei zahab mishqal shesh mei’ot. vayiben sham david mizbeiakh yhvh vaya‘al ‘olot ushelamim vayiqra ’el yhvh vaya‘aneihu ba’esh min hashamayim ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah. vayomer yhvh lamal’akh vayasheb kharbo ’el nedanah. ba‘et hahi bir’ot david ki ‘anahu yhvh begoren ’arenan haybusi vayizbakh sham. umishkan yhvh ’asher ‘asah mosheh bamidbar umizbakh ha‘olah ba‘et hahi babamah begib‘on. velo yakhol david lalekhet lefanav lidrosh ’elohim ki nib‘at mipenei khereb mal’akh yhvh. vayomer david zeh hu bet yhvh ha’elohim vezeh mizbeiakh le‘olah leyisra’el. vayomer david likhnos ’et hageirim ’asher be’erets yisra’el vaya‘amed khotsebim lakhtsob ’abnei gazit libnot bet ha’elohim. ubarzel larob lamismerim ledaltot hashe‘arim velamkhaberot heikhin david unekhoshet larob ’en mishqal. va‘atsei ’arazim le’en mispar ki heibi’u hatsidonim vehatsorim ‘atsei ’arazim larob ledavid. vayomer david shelomoh beni na‘ar varakh vehabayit libnot yhvh lehagdil lema‘lah leshem uletif’eret lekhal ha’aratsot ’akhinah na lo vayakhen david larob lifnei moto. vayiqra lishlomoh beno vaytsaveihu libnot bayit yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. vayomer david lishlomoh beno beni ’ani hayah ‘im lebabi libnot bayit leshem yhvh ’elohai. vayhi ‘alai debar yhvh leimor dam larob shafakhta umilkhamot gedolot ‘asita lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki damim rabim shafakhta ’artsah lefanai. hineh ben nolad lakh hu yihyeh ’ish menukhah vahanikhoti lo mikal ’oybav misabib ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo veshalom vasheqet ’eten ‘al yisra’el beyamav. hu yibneh bayit lishmi vehu yihyeh li leben va’ani lo le’ab vahakhinoti kisei malkhuto ‘al yisra’el ‘ad ‘olam. ‘atah beni yehi yhvh ‘imakh vehitslakhta ubanita bet yhvh ’elohekha ka’asher diber ‘alekha. ’akh yiten lekha yhvh seikhel ubinah vitsavekha ‘al yisra’el velishmor ’et torat yhvh ’elohekha. ’az tatsliakh ’im tishmor la‘asot ’et hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim ’asher tsivah yhvh ’et mosheh ‘al yisra’el khazaq ve’emats ’al tira ve’al teikhat. vehineh be‘aneyi hakhinoti lebet yhvh zahab kikarim mei’ah ’elef vekhesef ’elef ’alafim kikarim velanekhoshet velabarzel ’en mishqal ki larob hayah ve‘eitsim va’abanim hakhinoti va‘aleihem tosif. ve‘imekha larob ‘osei melakhah khotsebim vekharashei ’eben va‘ets vekhal khakham bekhal melakhah. lazahab lakesef velanekhoshet velabarzel ’en mispar qum va‘aseh vihi yhvh ‘imakh. vaytsav david lekhal sarei yisra’el la‘zor lishlomoh beno. halo yhvh ’eloheikhem ‘imakhem veheiniakh lakhem misabib ki natan beyadi ’et yoshebei ha’arets venikhbeshah ha’arets lifnei yhvh velifnei ‘amo. ‘atah tenu lebabkhem venafshekhem lidrosh yhvh ’eloheikhem vequmu ubenu ’et miqdash yhvh ha’elohim lehabi ’et ’aron berit yhvh ukhelei qodesh ha’elohim labayit hanibneh leshem yhvh. vedavid zaqen vesaba‘ yamim vayamlekh ’et shelomoh beno ‘al yisra’el. vaye’esof ’et kal sarei yisra’el vehakohanim vehalviyim. vayisaferu halviyim miben sheloshim shanah vama‘elah vayhi misparam legulgelotam ligbarim sheloshim ushemonah ’alef. mei’eleh lenatseiakh ‘al melekhet bet yhvh ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef veshoterim veshofetim sheishet ’alafim. ve’arba‘at ’alafim sho‘arim ve’arba‘at ’alafim mehalim yhvh bakeilim ’asher ‘asiti lehalel. vayekhaleqem david makhleqot libnei leivi legeireshon qehat umerari. lageireshuni la‘dan veshim‘i. benei la‘dan harosh yekhi’el vezeitam veyo’el sheloshah. benei shim‘i shelomot shelomit vakhazi’el veharan sheloshah ’eleh rashei ha’abot lela‘dan. ubenei shim‘i yakhat zina vi‘ush uberi‘ah ’eleh benei shim‘i ’arba‘ah. vayhi yakhat harosh vezizah hasheini vi‘ush uberi‘ah lo hirbu banim vayihyu lebet ’ab lifqudah ’ekhat. benei qehat ‘amram yitshar khebron ve‘uzi’el ’arba‘ah. benei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh vayibadel ’aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu ubanav ‘ad ‘olam lehaqtir lifnei yhvh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo ‘ad ‘olam. umosheh ’ish ha’elohim banav yiqare’u ‘al sheibet haleivi. benei mosheh geireshom ve’eli‘ezer. benei geireshom shebu’el harosh. vayihyu benei ’eli‘ezer rekhabyah harosh velo hayah le’eli‘ezer banim ’akheirim ubenei rekhabyah rabu lema‘elah. benei yitshar shelomit harosh. benei khebron yeriyahu harosh ’amaryah hasheini yakhazi’el hashelishi viqam‘am harebi‘i. benei ‘uzi’el mikhah harosh veyishiyah hasheini. benei merari makhli umushi benei makhli ’el‘azar veqish. vayamat ’el‘azar velo hayu lo banim ki ’im banot vayisa’um benei qish ’akheihem. benei mushi makhli ve‘eider vireimot sheloshah. ’eleh benei leivi lebet ’aboteihem rashei ha’abot lifqudeihem bemispar sheimot legulgelotam ‘oseh hamelakhah la‘abodat bet yhvh miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah. ki ’amar david heiniakh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el le‘amo vayishkon birushalim ‘ad le‘olam. vegam lalviyim ’en laset ’et hamishkan ve’et kal keilav la‘abodato. ki bedibrei david ha’akharonim hemah mispar benei leivi miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah. ki ma‘amadam leyad benei ’aharon la‘abodat bet yhvh ‘al hakhatseirot ve‘al haleshakhot ve‘al tahorat lekhal qodesh uma‘aseh ‘abodat bet ha’elohim. ulelekhem hama‘arekhet ulesolet leminkhah velirqiqei hamatsot velamakhabat velamurbakhet ulekhal mesurah umidah. vela‘amod baboqer baboqer lehodot ulehalel yhvh vekhen la‘areb. ulekhol ha‘alot ‘olot yhvh lashabatot lekhodashim velamo‘adim bemispar kemishpat ‘aleihem tamid lifnei yhvh. veshameru ’et mishmeret ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et mishmeret haqodesh umishmeret benei ’aharon ’akheihem la‘abodat bet yhvh. velibnei ’aharon makhleqotam benei ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. vayamat nadab va’abihu lifnei ’abihem ubanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahanu ’el‘azar ve’itamar. vayekhaleqem david vetsadoq min benei ’el‘azar va’akhimelekh min benei ’itamar lifqudatam ba‘abodatam. vayimatse’u benei ’el‘azar rabim lerashei hagebarim min benei ’itamar vayakhlequm libnei ’el‘azar rashim lebet ’abot shishah ‘asar velibnei ’itamar lebet ’abotam shemonah. vayakhlequm begoralot ’eleh ‘im ’eleh ki hayu sarei qodesh vesarei ha’elohim mibenei ’el‘azar ubibnei ’itamar. vayikhtebem shema‘yah ben netan’el hasofer min haleivi lifnei hamelekh vehasarim vetsadoq hakohen va’akhimelekh ben ’ebyatar verashei ha’abot lakohanim velalviyim bet ’ab ’ekhad ’akhuz le’el‘azar ve’akhuz ’akhuz le’itamar. vayeitsei hagoral harishon lihoyarib lida‘yah hasheini. lekharim hashelishi lis‘orim harebi‘i. lemalkiyah hakhamishi lemiyamin hashishi. lehaqots hashebi‘i la’abiyah hashemini. leyeishua‘ hateshi‘i lishkhanyahu ha‘asiri. le’elyashib ‘ashtei ‘asar leyaqim shenem ‘asar. lekhupah sheloshah ‘asar leyesheb’ab ’arba‘ah ‘asar. lebilgah khamishah ‘asar le’imer shishah ‘asar. lekheizir shib‘ah ‘asar lehapitsets shemonah ‘asar. liftakhyah tish‘ah ‘asar likhezqel ha‘esrim. leyakhin ’ekhad ve‘esrim legamul shenayim ve‘esrim. lidlayahu sheloshah ve‘esrim lema‘azyahu ’arba‘ah ve‘esrim. ’eleh fequdatam la‘abodatam labo lebet yhvh kemishpatam beyad ’aharon ’abihem ka’asher tsivahu yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. velibnei leivi hanotarim libnei ‘amram shuba’el libnei shuba’el yekhdeyahu. lirkhabyahu libnei rekhabyahu harosh yishiyah. layitshari shelomot libnei shelomot yakhat. ubenai yeriyahu ’amaryahu hasheini yakhazi’el hashelishi yeqam‘am harebi‘i. benei ‘uzi’el mikhah libnei mikhah shamur shamir. ’akhi mikhah yishiyah libnei yishiyah zekharyahu. benei merari makhli umushi benei ya‘aziyahu beno. benei merari leya‘aziyahu beno veshoham vezakur ve‘ibri. lemakhli ’el‘azar velo hayah lo banim. leqish benei qish yerakhme’el. ubenei mushi makhli ve‘eider virimot ’eleh benei halviyim lebet ’aboteihem. vayapilu gam hem goralot le‘umat ’akheihem benei ’aharon lifnei david hamelekh vetsadoq va’akhimelekh verashei ha’abot lakohanim velalviyim ’abot harosh le‘umat ’akhiv haqatan. vayabdel david vesarei hatsaba la‘abodah libnei ’asaf veheiman vidutun hanebi’im hanibe’im bekhinorot binbalim ubimtsiltayim vayhi misparam ’anshei melakhah la‘abodatam. libnei ’asaf zakur veyosef unetanyah va’asar’eilah benei ’asaf ‘al yad ’asaf haniba ‘al yedei hamelekh. lidutun benei yedutun gedalyahu utseri visha‘yahu khashabyahu umatityahu shishah ‘al yedei ’abihem yedutun bakinor haniba ‘al hodot vehalel yhvh. leheiman benei heiman buqiyahu matanyahu ‘uzi’el shebu’el virimot khananyah khanani ’eli’atah gidalti veromamti ‘ezer yashebeqashah maloti hotir makhazi’ot. kal ’eleh banim leheiman khozeh hamelekh bedibrei ha’elohim leharim qaren vayiten ha’elohim leheiman banim ’arba‘ah ‘asar ubanot shalosh. kal ’eleh ‘al yedei ’abihem bashir bet yhvh bimtsiltayim nebalim vekhinorot la‘abodat bet ha’elohim ‘al yedei hamelekh ’asaf vidutun veheiman. vayhi misparam ‘im ’akheihem melumedei shir yhvh kal hameibin matayim shemonim ushemonah. vayapilu goralot mishmeret le‘umat kaqaton kagadol meibin ‘im talmid. vayeitsei hagoral harishon le’asaf leyosef gedalyahu hasheini hu ve’ekhav ubanav shenem ‘asar. hashelishi zakur banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. harebi‘i layitsri banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hakhamishi netanyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hashishi buqiyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hashebi‘i yesar’eilah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hashemini yesha‘yahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hateshi‘i matanyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. ha‘asiri shim‘i banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. ‘ashtei ‘asar ‘azar’el banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. hashenem ‘asar lakhashabyah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lishloshah ‘asar shuba’el banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. le’arba‘ah ‘asar matityahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lakhamishah ‘asar lireimot banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. leshishah ‘asar lakhananyahu banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. leshib‘ah ‘asar leyashebeqashah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lishmonah ‘asar lakhanani banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. letish‘ah ‘asar lemaloti banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. le‘esrim le’eliyatah banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. le’ekhad ve‘esrim lehotir banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lishnayim ve‘esrim legidalti banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lishloshah ve‘esrim lemakhazi’ot banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. le’arba‘ah ve‘esrim leromamti ‘azer banav ve’ekhav shenem ‘asar. lemakhleqot lesho‘arim laqarekhim meshelemyahu ben qorei min benei ’asaf. velimshelemyahu banim zekharyahu habekhor yedi‘a’el hasheini zebadyahu hashelishi yatni’el harebi‘i. ‘eilam hakhamishi yehokhanan hashishi ’elyeho‘einai hashebi‘i. ule‘obed ’edom banim shema‘yah habekhor yehozabad hasheini yo’akh hashelishi vesakhar harebi‘i unetan’el hakhamishi. ‘ami’el hashishi yisashkhar hashebi‘i pe‘uletai hashemini ki beirakho ’elohim. velishma‘yah beno nolad banim hamimshalim lebet ’abihem ki giborei khayil hemah. benei shema‘yah ‘ateni urefa’el ve‘obed ’elzabad ’ekhav benei khayil ’elihu usemakhyahu. kal ’eleh mibenei ‘obed ’edom hemah ubeneihem va’akheihem ’ish khayil bakoakh la‘abodah shishim ushenayim le‘obed ’edom. velimshelemyahu banim ve’akhim benei khayil shemonah ‘asar. ulekhosah min benei merari banim shimri harosh ki lo hayah bekhor vaysimeihu ’abihu lerosh. khilqiyahu hasheini tebalyahu hashelishi zekharyahu harebi‘i kal banim ve’akhim lekhosah sheloshah ‘asar. le’eleh makhleqot hasho‘arim lerashei hagebarim mishmarot le‘umat ’akheihem lesharet bebet yhvh. vayapilu goralot kaqaton kagadol lebet ’abotam lesha‘ar vasha‘ar. vayipol hagoral mizrakhah leshelemyahu uzekharyahu beno yo‘ets besekhel hipilu goralot vayeitsei goralo tsafonah. le‘obed ’edom negbah ulebanav bet ha’asupim. leshupim ulekhosah lama‘arab ‘im sha‘ar shalekhet bamsilah ha‘olah mishmar le‘umat mishmar. lamizrakh halviyim shishah latsafonah layom ’arba‘ah lanegbah layom ’arba‘ah vela’asupim shenayim shenayim. laparbar lama‘arab ’arba‘ah lamsilah shenayim laparbar. ’eleh makhleqot hasho‘arim libnei haqarekhi velibnei merari. vehalviyim ’akhiyah ‘al ’otsrot bet ha’elohim ule’otserot haqodashim. benei la‘dan benei hageireshuni lela‘dan rashei ha’abot lela‘dan hageireshuni yekhi’eili. benei yekhi’eili zeitam veyo’el ’akhiv ‘al ’otserot bet yhvh. la‘amrami layitshari lakhebroni la‘azi’eili. ushebu’el ben geireshom ben mosheh nagid ‘al ha’otsarot. ve’ekhav le’eli‘ezer rekhabyahu beno visha‘yahu beno veyoram beno vezikhri beno ushelomot ushelomit beno. hu shelomot ve’ekhav ‘al kal ’otserot haqodashim ’asher hiqdish david hamelekh verashei ha’abot lesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot vesarei hatsaba. min hamilkhamot umin hashalal hiqdishu lekhazeq lebet yhvh. vekhol hahiqdish shemu’el haro’eh vesha’ul ben qish ve’abner ben ner veyo’ab ben tseruyah kol hamaqdish ‘al yad shelomit ve’ekhav. layitshari kenanyahu ubanav lamelakhah hakhitsonah ‘al yisra’el leshoterim uleshofetim. lakhebroni khashabyahu ve’ekhav benei khayil ’elef usheba‘ mei’ot ‘al pequdat yisra’el mei‘eiber layarden ma‘rabah lekhol melekhet yhvh vela‘abodat hamelekh. lakhebroni yeriyah harosh lakhebroni letoledotav le’abot bishnat ha’arba‘im lemalkhut david nidrashu vayimatsei bahem giborei khayil beya‘zer gil‘ad. ve’ekhav benei khayil ’alpayim usheba‘ mei’ot rashei ha’abot vayafqidem david hamelekh ‘al har’ubeini vehagadi vakhatsi sheibet hamnashi lekhal debar ha’elohim udebar hamelekh. ubenei yisra’el lemisparam rashei ha’abot vesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot veshotereihem hamsharetim ’et hamelekh lekhol debar hamakhleqot haba’ah vehayotset khodesh bekhodesh lekhol khadeshei hashanah hamakhaloqet ha’akhat ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. ‘al hamakhaloqet harishonah lakhodesh harishon yashabe‘am ben zabdi’el ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. min benei ferets harosh lekhal sarei hatseba’ot lakhodesh harishon. ve‘al makhaloqet hakhodesh hasheini dodai ha’akhokhi umakhaluqto umiqlot hanagid ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. sar hatsaba hashelishi lakhodesh hashelishi benayahu ben yehoyada‘ hakohen rosh ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hu benayahu gibor hasheloshim ve‘al hasheloshim umakhaluqto ‘amizabad beno. harebi‘i lakhodesh harebi‘i ‘asah ’el ’akhi yo’ab uzebadyah beno ’akharav ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hakhamishi lakhodesh hakhamishi hasar shamhut hayizrakh ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hashishi lakhodesh hashishi ‘ira ben ‘iqesh hateqo‘i ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hashebi‘i lakhodesh hashebi‘i khelets hapeloni min benei ’efrayim ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hashemini lakhodesh hashemini sibekhai hakhushati lazarkhi ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hateshi‘i lakhodesh hateshi‘i ’abi‘ezer ha‘anetoti labenyemini laben yemini ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. ha‘asiri lakhodesh ha‘asiri mahrai hanetofati lazarkhi ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. ‘ashtei ‘asar le‘ashtei ‘asar hakhodesh benayah hapir‘atoni min benei ’efrayim ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. hashenem ‘asar lishnem ‘asar hakhodesh kheldai hanetofati le‘ateni’el ve‘al makhaluqto ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah ’alef. ve‘al shibtei yisra’el lar’ubeini nagid ’eli‘ezer ben zikhri lashim‘oni shefatyahu ben ma‘akhah. leleivi khashabyah ben qemu’el le’aharon tsadoq. lihudah ’elihu mei’akhei david leyisashkhar ‘ameri ben mikha’el. lizbulun yishma‘yahu ben ‘obadyahu lenaftali yerimot ben ‘azri’el. libnei ’efrayim hosheia‘ ben ‘azazyahu lakhatsi sheibet menasheh yo’el ben pedayahu. lakhatsi hamnasheh gil‘adah yido ben zekharyahu lebinyamin ya‘asi’el ben ’abner. ledan ‘azar’el ben yerokham ’eleh sarei shibtei yisra’el. velo nasa david misparam lemiben ‘esrim shanah ulematah ki ’amar yhvh leharbot ’et yisra’el kekhokhbei hashamayim. yo’ab ben tseruyah heikhel limnot velo khilah vayhi bazot qetsef ‘al yisra’el velo ‘alah hamispar bemispar dibrei hayamim lamelekh david. ve‘al ’otserot hamelekh ‘azmavet ben ‘adi’el ve‘al ha’otsarot basadeh be‘arim ubakefarim ubamigdalot yehonatan ben ‘uziyahu. ve‘al ‘osei melekhet hasadeh la‘abodat ha’adamah ‘ezri ben kelub. ve‘al hakeramim shim‘i haramati ve‘al shebakeramim le’otserot hayayin zabdi hashifmi. ve‘al hazeitim vehashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah ba‘al khanan hagedeiri ve‘al ’otserot hashemen yo‘ash. ve‘al habaqar haro‘im basharon shitrai shirtai hasharoni ve‘al habaqar ba‘amaqim shafat ben ‘adlai. ve‘al hagemalim ’obil hayishme‘eili ve‘al ha’atonot yekhdeyahu hameironoti. ve‘al hatson yaziz hahagri kal ’eleh sarei harekhush ’asher lamelekh david. vihonatan dod david yo‘ets ’ish meibin vesofer hu vikhi’el ben khakhmoni ‘im benei hamelekh. va’akhitofel yo‘ets lamelekh vekhushai ha’arki reia‘ hamelekh. ve’akharei ’akhitofel yehoyada‘ ben benayahu ve’ebyatar vesar tsaba lamelekh yo’ab. vayaqhel david ’et kal sarei yisra’el sarei hashebatim vesarei hamakhleqot hamsharetim ’et hamelekh vesarei ha’alafim vesarei hamei’ot vesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulebanav ‘im hasarisim vehagiborim ulekhal gibor khayil ’el yerushalim. vayaqam david hamelekh ‘al raglav vayomer shema‘uni ’akhai ve‘ami ’ani ‘im lebabi libnot bet menukhah la’aron berit yhvh velahadom raglei ’eloheinu vahakhinoti libnot. veha’elohim ’amar li lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki ’ish milkhamot ’atah vedamim shafakheta. vayibkhar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el bi mikol bet ’abi lihyot lemelekh ‘al yisra’el le‘olam ki bihudah bakhar lenagid ubebet yehudah bet ’abi ubibnei ’abi bi ratsah lehamlikh ‘al kal yisra’el. umikal banai ki rabim banim natan li yhvh vayibkhar bishlomoh beni lashebet ‘al kisei malkhut yhvh ‘al yisra’el. vayomer li shelomoh binkha hu yibneh beiti vakhatseirotai ki bakharti bo li leben va’ani ’ehyeh lo le’ab. vahakhinoti ’et malkhuto ‘ad le‘olam ’im yekhezaq la‘asot mitsvotai umishpatai kayom hazeh. ve‘atah le‘einei khal yisra’el qehal yhvh ube’azenei ’eloheinu shimru vedirshu kal mitsvot yhvh ’eloheikhem lema‘an tireshu ’et ha’arets hatobah vehinkhaltem libneikhem ’akhareikhem ‘ad ‘olam. ve’atah shelomoh beni da‘ ’et ’elohei ’abikha ve‘abedeihu beleb shalem ubenefesh khafeitsah ki khal lebabot doresh yhvh vekhal yeitser makhashabot meibin ’im tidreshenu yimatsei lakh ve’im ta‘azbenu yaznikhakha la‘ad. re’eh ‘atah ki yhvh bakhar bekha libnot bayit lamiqdash khazaq va‘aseh. vayiten david lishlomoh beno ’et tabnit ha’ulam ve’et batav veganzakav va‘aliyotav vakhadarav hapenimim ubet hakaporet. vetabnit kol ’asher hayah baruakh ‘imo lekhatsrot bet yhvh ulekhal haleshakhot sabib le’otserot bet ha’elohim ule’otserot haqodashim. ulemakhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ulekhal melekhet ‘abodat bet yhvh ulekhal kelei ‘abodat bet yhvh. lazahab bamishqal lazahab lekhal kelei ‘abodah va‘abodah lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal lekhal kelei ‘abodah va‘abodah. umishqal limnorot hazahab veneiroteihem zahab bemishqal menorah umenorah veneiroteha velimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah veneiroteha ka‘abodat menorah umenorah. ve’et hazahab mishqal leshulkhanot hama‘arekhet leshulkhan veshulkhan vekhesef leshulkhanot hakasef. vehamizlagot vehamizraqot vehaqesavot zahab tahor velikhforei hazahab bemishqal likhfor ukhefor velikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. ulemizbakh haqetoret zahab mezuqaq bamishqal uletabnit hamerkabah hakerubim zahab leforesim vesokhekhim ‘al ’aron berit yhvh. hakol bikhtab miyad yhvh ‘alai hiskil kol mal’akhot hatabnit. vayomer david lishlomoh beno khazaq ve’emats va‘aseh ’al tira ve’al teikhat ki yhvh ’elohim ’elohai ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azbeka ‘ad likhlot kal melekhet ‘abodat bet yhvh. vehineh makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal ‘abodat bet ha’elohim ve‘imekha bekhal melakhah lekhal nadib bakhakhemah lekhal ‘abodah vehasarim vekhal ha‘am lekhal debarekha. vayomer david hamelekh lekhal haqahal shelomoh beni ’ekhad bakhar bo ’elohim na‘ar varakh vehamelakhah gedolah ki lo le’adam habirah ki yhvh ’elohim. ukhekhal kokhi hakhinoti lebet ’elohai hazahab lazahab vehakesef lakesef vehanekhoshet lanekhoshet habarzel labarzel veha‘eitsim la‘eitsim ’abnei shoham umilu’im ’abnei fukh veriqmah vekhol ’eben yeqarah ve’abnei shayish larob. ve‘od birtsoti bebet ’elohai yesh li segulah zahab vakhasef natati lebet ’elohai lema‘lah mikal hakhinoti lebet haqodesh. sheloshet ’alafim kikerei zahab mizehab ’ofir veshib‘at ’alafim kikar kesef mezuqaq latuakh qirot habatim. lazahab lazahab velakesef lakesef ulekhal melakhah beyad kharashim umi mitnadeb lemalot yado hayom yhvh. vayitnadebu sarei ha’abot vesarei shibtei yisra’el vesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. vayitenu la‘abodat bet ha’elohim zahab kikarim khameishet ’alafim va’adarkhonim ribo vekhesef kikarim ‘aseret ’alafim unekhoshet ribo ushemonat ’alafim kikarim ubarzel mei’ah ’elef kikarim. vehanimtsa ’ito ’abanim natenu le’otsar bet yhvh ‘al yad yekhi’el hageireshuni. vayismekhu ha‘am ‘al hitnadebam ki beleb shalem hitnadebu yhvh vegam david hamelekh samakh simkhah gedolah. vaybarekh david ’et yhvh le‘einei kal haqahal vayomer david barukh ’atah yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’abinu mei‘olam ve‘ad ‘olam. lekha yhvh hagedulah vehageburah vehatif’eret vehaneitsakh vehahod ki khol bashamayim uba’arets lekha yhvh hamamlakhah vehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. veha‘osher vehakabod milefanekha ve’atah moshel bakol ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ubeyadekha legadel ulekhazeq lakol. ve‘atah ’eloheinu modim ’anakhnu lakh umehalim leshem tif’artekha. vekhi mi ’ani umi ‘ami ki na‘tsor koakh lehitnadeb kazot ki mimekha hakol umiyadekha natanu lakh. ki geirim ’anakhnu lefanekha vetoshabim kekhal ’aboteinu katsel yameinu ‘al ha’arets ve’en miqveh. yhvh ’eloheinu khol hehamon hazeh ’asher hakhinonu libnot lekha bayit leshem qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. veyada‘ti ’elohai ki ’atah bokhen leibab umeisharim tirtseh ’ani beyosher lebabi hitnadabti khal ’eleh ve‘atah ‘amekha hanimtse’u foh ra’iti besimkhah lehitnadeb lakh. yhvh ’elohei ’abraham yitskhaq veyisra’el ’aboteinu shomrah zot le‘olam leyeitser makhshebot lebab ‘amekha vehakhen lebabam ’eilekha. velishlomoh beni ten leibab shalem lishmor mitsvotekha ‘eidevotekha vekhuqekha vela‘asot hakol velibnot habirah ’asher hakhinoti. vayomer david lekhal haqahal barekhu na ’et yhvh ’eloheikhem vaybarakhu khal haqahal yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu yhvh velamelekh. vayizbekhu yhvh zebakhim vaya‘alu ‘olot yhvh lemakhorat hayom hahu parim ’elef ’eilim ’elef kebasim ’elef veniskeihem uzebakhim larob lekhal yisra’el. vayokhelu vayishtu lifnei yhvh bayom hahu besimkhah gedolah vayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh ben david vayimshekhu yhvh lenagid uletsadoq lekhohen. vayeisheb lomoh ‘al kisei yhvh lemelekh takhat david ’abiv vayatslakh vayishme‘u ’eilav kal yisra’el. vekhal hasarim vehagiborim vegam kal benei hamelekh david natenu yad takhat shelomoh hamelekh. vaygadel yhvh ’et shelomoh lema‘lah le‘einei kal yisra’el vayiten ‘alav hod malkhut ’asher lo hayah ‘al kal melekh lefanav ‘al yisra’el. vedavid ben yishai malakh ‘al kal yisra’el. vehayamim ’asher malakh ‘al yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah bekhebron malakh sheba‘ shanim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh. vayamat beseibah tobah seba‘ yamim ‘osher vekhabod vayimlokh shelomoh beno takhtav. vedibrei david hamelekh harishonim veha’akhronim hinam ketubim ‘al dibrei shemu’el haro’eh ve‘al dibrei natan hanabi ve‘al dibrei gad hakhozeh. ‘im kal malkhuto ugeburato veha‘itim ’asher ‘aberu ‘alav ve‘al yisra’el ve‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot. vayitkhazeq shelomoh ben david ‘al malkhuto yhvh ’elohav ‘imo vaygadeleihu lema‘elah. vayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra’el lesarei ha’alafim vehamei’ot velashofetim ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra’el rashei ha’abot. vayeilekhu shelomoh vekhal haqahal ‘imo labamah ’asher begib‘on ki sham hayah ’ohel mo‘ed ha’elohim ’asher ‘asah mosheh ‘ebed yhvh bamidbar. ’abal ’aron ha’elohim he‘elah david miqiryat ye‘arim baheikhin lo david ki natah lo ’ohel birushalim. umizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher ‘asah betsal’el ben ’uri ben khur sam lifnei mishkan yhvh vayidresheihu shelomoh vehaqahal. vaya‘al shelomoh sham ‘al mizbakh hanekhoshet lifnei yhvh ’asher le’ohel mo‘ed vaya‘al ‘alav ‘olot ’alef. balaylah hahu nir’ah ’elohim lishlomoh vayomer lo she’al mah ’eten lakh. vayomer shelomoh leilohim ’atah ‘asita ‘im david ’abi khesed gadol vehimlakhtani takhtav. ‘atah yhvh ’elohim yei’amen debarekha ‘im david ’abi ki ’atah himlakhtani ‘al ‘am rab ka‘afar ha’arets. ‘atah khakhmah umada‘ ten li ve’eitse’ah lifnei ha‘am hazeh ve’abo’ah ki mi yishpot ’et ‘amekha hazeh hagadol. vayomer ’elohim lishlomoh ya‘an ’asher hayetah zot ‘im lebabekha velosha ’alta ‘osher nekhasim vekhabod ve’et nefesh sone’ekha vegam yamim rabim lo sha’aleta vatish’al lekha khakhmah umada‘ ’asher tishpot ’et ‘ami ’asher himlakhtikha ‘alav. hakhakhemah vehamada‘ natun lakh ve‘osher unekhasim vekhabod ’eten lakh ’asher lo hayah khen lamelakhim ’asher lefanekha ve’akharekha lo yihyeh ken. vayabo shelomoh labamah ’asher begib‘on yerushalim milifnei ’ohel mo‘ed vayimlokh ‘al yisra’el. vaye’esof shelomoh rekheb ufarashim vayhi lo ’elef ve’arba‘ mei’ot rekheb ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim vayanikhem be‘arei harekheb ve‘im hamelekh birushalim. vayiten hamelekh ’et hakesef ve’et hazahab birushalim ka’abanim ve’et ha’arazim natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larob. umotsa hasusim ’asher lishlomoh mimitsrayim umiqvei sokharei hamelekh miqvei yiqkhu bimkhir. vaya‘alu vayotsi’u mimitsrayim merkabah beshesh mei’ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei’ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim umalkhei ’aram beyadam yotsi’u. vayomer shelomoh libnot bayit leshem yhvh ubayit lemalkhuto. vayispor shelomoh shib‘im ’elef ’ish sabal ushemonim ’elef ’ish khotseb bahar umenatsekhim ‘aleihem sheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. vayishlakh shelomoh ’el khuram melekh tsor leimor ka’asher ‘asita ‘im david ’abi vatishlakh lo ’arazim libnot lo bayit lashebet bo. hineh ’ani boneh bayit leshem yhvh ’elohai lehaqdish lo lehaqtir lefanav qetoret samim uma‘arekhet tamid ve‘olot laboqer vela‘ereb lashabatot velekhodashim ulemo‘adei yhvh ’eloheinu le‘olam zot ‘al yisra’el. vehabayit ’asher ’ani boneh gadol ki gadol ’eloheinu mikal ha’elohim. umi ya‘atsar koakh libnot lo bayit ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu umi ’ani ’asher ’ebneh lo bayit ki ’im lehaqtir lefanav. ve‘atah shelakh li ’ish khakham la‘asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet ubabarzel uba’argevan vekharmil utekheilet veyodeia‘ lefateiakh pitukhim ‘im hakhakhamim ’asher ‘imi bihudah ubirushalim ’asher heikhin david ’abi. ushelakh li ‘atsei ’arazim beroshim ve’algumim meihalebanon ki ’ani yada‘ti ’asher ‘abadekha yod‘im likhrot ‘atsei lebanon vehineh ‘abadai ‘im ‘abadekha. ulehakhin li ‘eitsim larob ki habayit ’asher ’ani boneh gadol vehaflei. vehineh lakhotebim lekhoretei ha‘eitsim natati khitim makot la‘abadekha korim ‘esrim ’elef use‘orim korim ‘esrim ’alef veyayin batim ‘esrim ’elef veshemen batim ‘esrim ’alef. vayomer khuram melekh tsor bikhtab vayishlakh ’el shelomoh be’ahabat yhvh ’et ‘amo netanekha ‘aleihem melekh. vayomer khuram barukh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher ‘asah ’et hashamayim ve’et ha’arets ’asher natan ledavid hamelekh ben khakham yodeia‘ seikhel ubinah ’asher yibneh bayit yhvh ubayit lemalkhuto. ve‘atah shalakhti ’ish khakham yodeia‘ binah lekhuram ’abi. ben ’ishah min benot dan ve’abiv ’ish tsori yodeia‘ la‘asot bazahab ubakesef banekhoshet babarzel ba’abanim uba‘eitsim ba’argaman batekheilet ubabuts ubakarmil ulefateiakh kal pituakh velakhshob kal makhashabet ’asher yinaten lo ‘im khakhamekha vekhakhmei ’adoni david ’abikha. ve‘atah hakhitim vehase‘orim hashemen vehayayin ’asher ’amar ’adoni yishlakh la‘abadav. va’anakhnu nikhrot ‘eitsim min halebanon kekhal tsarekekha unebi’em lekha rafsodot ‘al yam yafo ve’atah ta‘aleh ’otam yerushalim. vayispor shelomoh kal ha’anashim hageirim ’asher be’erets yisra’el ’akharei hasefar ’asher sefaram david ’abiv vayimatse’u mei’ah vakhamishim ’elef usheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot. vaya‘as meihem shib‘im ’elef sabal ushemonim ’elef khotseb bahar usheloshet ’alafim veshesh mei’ot menatsekhim leha‘abid ’et ha‘am. vayakhel shelomoh libnot ’et bet yhvh birushalim behar hamoriyah ’asher nir’ah ledavid ’abihu ’asher heikhin bimqom david begoren ’arenan haybusi. vayakhel libnot bakhodesh hasheini basheini bishnat ’arba‘ lemalkhuto. ve’eleh husad shelomoh libnot ’et bet ha’elohim ha’orekh ’amot bamidah harishonah ’amot shishim verokhab ’amot ‘esrim. veha’ulam ’asher ‘al penei ha’orekh ‘al penei rokhab habayit ’amot ‘esrim vehagobah mei’ah ve‘esrim vaytsapeihu mipenimah zahab tahor. ve’et habayit hagadol khipah ‘ets beroshim vaykhapeihu zahab tob vaya‘al ‘alav timorim vesharsherot. vaytsaf ’et habayit ’eben yeqarah letif’aret vehazahab zehab parvayim. vaykhaf ’et habayit haqorot hasipim veqirotav vedaltotav zahab ufitakh kerubim ‘al haqirot. vaya‘as ’et bet qodesh haqodashim ’areko ‘al penei rokhab habayit ’amot ‘esrim verakhebo ’amot ‘esrim vaykhapeihu zahab tob lekhikarim shesh mei’ot. umishqal lemismerot lishqalim khamishim zahab veha‘aliyot khipah zahab. vaya‘as bebet qodesh haqodashim kerubim shenayim ma‘aseh tsa‘atsu‘im vaytsapu ’otam zahab. vekhanfei hakerubim ’arekam ’amot ‘esrim kenaf ha’ekhad le’amot khamesh maga‘at leqir habayit vehakanaf ha’akheret ’amot khamesh magia‘ likhnaf hakerub ha’akher. ukhenaf hakerub ha’ekhad ’amot khamesh magia‘ leqir habayit vehakanaf ha’akheret ’amot khamesh debeiqah likhnaf hakerub ha’akher. kanfei hakerubim ha’eleh poresim ’amot ‘esrim vehem ‘omedim ‘al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit. vaya‘as ’et haparokhet tekheilet ve’argaman vekharmil ubuts vaya‘al ‘alav kerubim. vaya‘as lifnei habayit ‘amudim shenayim ’amot sheloshim vekhamesh ’orekh vehatsefet ’asher ‘al rosho ’amot khamesh. vaya‘as sharsherot badebir vayiten ‘al rosh ha‘amudim vaya‘as rimonim mei’ah vayiten basharsherot. vayaqem ’et ha‘amudim ‘al penei haheikhal ’ekhad miyamin ve’ekhad meihasemol vayiqra shem haymini haymani yakhin veshem hasemali bo‘az. vaya‘as mizbakh nekhoshet ‘esrim ’amah ’areko ve‘esrim ’amah rakhebo ve‘eser ’amot qomato. vaya‘as ’et hayam mutsaq ‘eser ba’amah misefato ’el sefato ‘agol sabib vekhamesh ba’amah qomato veqav sheloshim ba’amah yasob ’oto sabib. udemut beqarim takhat lo sabib sabib sobbim ’oto ‘eser ba’amah maqifim ’et hayam sabib shenayim turim habaqar yetsuqim bemutsaqto. ‘omed ‘al shenem ‘asar baqar sheloshah fonim tsafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah vekhal ’akhoreihem bayetah. ve‘abeyo tefakh usefato kema‘aseh sefat kos perakh shoshanah makhaziq batim sheloshet ’alafim yakhil. vaya‘as kiyorim ‘asarah vayiten khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol lerakhetsah bahem ’et ma‘aseh ha‘olah yadikhu bam vehayam lerakhetsah lakohanim bo. vaya‘as ’et menorot hazahab ‘eser kemishpatam vayiten baheikhal khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol. vaya‘as shulkhanot ‘asarah vayanakh baheikhal khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol vaya‘as mizreqei zahab mei’ah. vaya‘as khatsar hakohanim veha‘azarah hagedolah udelatot la‘azarah vedaltoteihem tsipah nekhoshet. ve’et hayam natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. vaya‘as khuram ’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot vaykhal khyram khuram la‘asot ’et hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh bebet ha’elohim. ‘amudim shenayim vehagulot vehakotarot ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim vehasebakhot shetayim lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. ve’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasebakhot shenayim turim rimonim lasebakhah ha’ekhat lekhasot ’et shetei gulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. ve’et hamekhonot ‘asah ve’et hakiyorot ‘asah ‘al hamekhonot. ’et hayam ’ekhad ve’et habaqar shenem ‘asar takhtav. ve’et hasirot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizlagot ve’et kal keleihem ‘asah khuram ’abiv lamelekh shelomoh lebet yhvh nekhoshet maruq. bekhikar hayarden yetsaqam hamelekh ba‘abi ha’adamah ben sukot uben tsereidatah. vaya‘as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha’eleh larob me’od ki lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. vaya‘as shelomoh ’et kal hakeilim ’asher bet ha’elohim ve’et mizbakh hazahab ve’et hashulkhanot va‘aleihem lekhem hapanim. ve’et hamenorot veneiroteihem leba‘aram kamishpat lifnei hadebir zahab sagur. vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahab hu mikhlot zahab. vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahab sagur ufetakh habayit daltotav hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim vedaltei habayit laheikhal zahab. vatishlam kal hamelakhah ’asher ‘asah shelomoh lebet yhvh vayabei shelomoh ’et qadeshei david ’abiv ve’et hakesef ve’et hazahab ve’et kal hakeilim natan be’otserot bet ha’elohim. ’az yaqhel shelomoh ’et ziqnei yisra’el ve’et kal rashei hamatot nesi’ei ha’abot libnei yisra’el ’el yerushalim leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhvh mei‘ir david hi tsiyon. vayiqahalu ’el hamelekh kal ’ish yisra’el bekhag hu hakhodesh hashebi‘i. vayabo’u kol ziqnei yisra’el vayis’u halviyim ’et ha’aron. vaya‘alu ’et ha’aron ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et kal kelei
