haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel he‘elu ’otam hakohanim halviyim. vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal ‘adat yisra’el hano‘adim ‘alav lifnei ha’aron mezabekhim tson ubaqar ’asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirob. vayabi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhvh ’el meqomo ’el debir habayit ’el qodesh haqedashim ’el takhat kanfei hakerubim. vayihyu hakerubim poresim kenafayim ‘al meqom ha’aron vaykhasu hakerubim ‘al ha’aron ve‘al badav milma‘elah. vaya’arikhu habadim vayeira’u rashei habadim min ha’aron ‘al penei hadebir velo yeira’u hakhutsah vayhi sham ‘ad hayom hazeh. ’en ba’aron raq shenei halukhot ’asher natan mosheh bekhoreb ’asher karat yhvh ‘im benei yisra’el betseitam mimitsrayim. vayhi betset hakohanim min haqodesh ki kal hakohanim hanimtse’im hitqadashu ’en lishmor lemakhleqot. vehalviyim hamshorarim lekhulam le’asaf leheiman lidutun velibneihem vela’akheihem melubashim buts bimtsiltayim ubinbalim vekhinorot ‘omedim mizrakh lamizbeiakh ve‘imahem kohanim lemei’ah ve‘esrim makhtseririm makhtserim bakhatsotserot. vayhi khe’ekhad lamakhatsotserim lamkhatserim velamshorarim lehashmia‘ qol ’ekhad lehalel ulehodot yhvh ukheharim qol bakhatsotserot ubimtsiltayim ubikhlei hashir ubehalel yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo vehabayit malei ‘anan bet yhvh. velo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod lesharet mipenei he‘anan ki malei khebod yhvh ’et bet ha’elohim. ’az ’amar shelomoh yhvh ’amar lishkon ba‘arafel. va’ani baniti bet zebul lakh umakhon leshibtekha ‘olamim. vayaseb hamelekh ’et panav vaybarekh ’et kal qehal yisra’el vekhal qehal yisra’el ‘omed. vayomer barukh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’asher diber befiv ’et david ’abi ubeyadav milei leimor. min hayom ’asher hotseiti ’et ‘ami mei’erets mitsrayim lo bakharti be‘ir mikol shibtei yisra’el libnot bayit lihyot shemi sham velo bakharti be’ish lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. va’ebkhar birushalim lihyot shemi sham va’ebkhar bedavid lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’el. vayhi ‘im lebab david ’abi libnot bayit leshem yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. vayomer yhvh ’el david ’abi ya‘an ’asher hayah ‘im lebabekha libnot bayit lishmi hetibota ki hayah ‘im lebabekha. raq ’atah lo tibneh habayit ki binkha hayotsei meikhalatsekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. vayaqem yhvh ’et debaro ’asher diber va’aqum takhat david ’abi va’eisheb ‘al kisei yisra’el ka’asher diber yhvh va’ebneh habayit leshem yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. va’asim sham ’et ha’aron ’asher sham berit yhvh ’asher karat ‘im benei yisra’el. vaya‘amod lifnei mizbakh yhvh neged kal qehal yisra’el vayifros kapav. ki ‘asah shelomoh kiyor nekhoshet vayiteneihu betokh ha‘azarah khamesh ’amot ’areko vekhamesh ’amot rakhebo ve’amot shalosh qomato vaya‘amod ‘alav vayibrakh ‘al birkav neged kal qehal yisra’el vayifros kapav hashamayemah. vayomar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’en kamokha ’elohim bashamayim uba’arets shomer haberit vehakhesed la‘abadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. ’asher shamarta le‘abdekha david ’abi ’et ’asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha ubeyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. ve‘atah yhvh ’elohei yisra’el mor le‘abdekha david ’abi ’et ’asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish milefanai yosheb ‘al kisei yisra’el raq ’im yishmeru banekha ’et darkam lalekhet betorati ka’asher halakhta lefanai. ve‘atah yhvh ’elohei yisra’el yei’amen debarekha ’asher dibarta le‘abdekha ledavid. ki ha’umnam yeisheb ’elohim ’et ha’adam ‘al ha’arets hineh shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha ’af ki habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. ufanita ’el tefilat ‘abdekha ve’el tekhinato yhvh ’elohai lishmoa‘ ’el harinah ve’el hatefilah ’asher ‘abdekha mitpalel lefanekha. lihyot ‘einekha fetukhot ’el habayit hazeh yomam valaylah ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amarta lasum shimkha sham lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah ’asher yitpalel ‘abdekha ’el hamaqom hazeh. veshama‘ta ’el takhanunei ‘abdekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh ve’atah tishma‘ mimeqom shibtekha min hashamayim veshama‘ta vesalakheta. ’im yekheta ’ish lerei‘eihu venasha bo ’alah leha’aloto uba ’alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim ve‘asita veshafata ’et ‘abadekha lehashib lerasha‘ latet darko berosho ulehatsdiq tsadiq latet lo ketsidqato. ve’im yinagef ‘amekha yisra’el lifnei ’oyeb ki yekhet’u lakh veshabu vehodu ’et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu lefanekha babayit hazeh. ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘amekha yisra’el vahasheibotam ’el ha’adamah ’asher natatah lahem vela’aboteihem. behei‘atser hashamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet’u lakh vehitpalu ’el hamaqom hazeh vehodu ’et shemekha meikhatatam yeshubun ki ta‘anem. ve’atah tishma‘ hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat ‘abadekha ve‘amekha yisra’el ki torem ’el haderekh hatobah ’asher yeilekhu bah venatatah matar ‘al ’artsekha ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenakhalah. ra‘ab ki yihyeh ba’arets deber ki yihyeh shidafon veyeiraqon ’arbeh vekhasil ki yihyeh ki yatsar lo ’oybav be’erets she‘arav kal nega‘ vekhal makhalah. kal tefilah khal tekhinah ’asher yihyeh lekhal ha’adam ulekhol ‘amekha yisra’el ’asher yeide‘u ’ish nig‘o umakh’obo ufaras kapav ’el habayit hazeh. ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mekhon shibtekha vesalakhta venatatah la’ish kekhal derakhav ’asher teida‘ ’et lebabo ki ’atah lebadekha yada‘ta ’et lebab benei ha’adam. lema‘an yira’ukha lalekhet bidrakhekha kal hayamim ’asher hem khayim ‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher natatah la’aboteinu. vegam ’el hanakheri ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’el hu uba mei’erets rekhoqah lema‘an shimkha hagadol veyadekha hakhazaqah uzero‘akha hanetuyah uba’u vehitpalu ’el habayit hazeh. ve’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha ve‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri lema‘an yeide‘u khal ‘amei ha’arets ’et shemekha uleyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’el velada‘at ki shimkha niqra ‘al habayit hazeh ’asher baniti. ki yeitsei ‘amekha lamilkhamah ‘al ’oybav baderekh ’asher tishlakhem vehitpalu ’eilekha derekh ha‘ir hazot ’asher bakharta bah vehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. veshama‘ta min hashamayim ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinatam ve‘asita mishpatam. ki yekhet’u lakh ki ’en ’adam ’asher lo yekheta ve’anafta bam unetatam lifnei ’oyeb veshabum shobeihem ’el ’erets rekhoqah ’o qerobah. veheishibu ’el lebabam ba’arets ’asher nishbu sham veshabu vehitkhanenu ’eilekha be’erets shibyam leimor khatanu he‘evinu verasha‘enu. veshabu ’eilekha bekhal libam ubekhal nafsham be’erets shibyam ’asher shabu ’otam vehitpalu derekh ’artsam ’asher natatah la’abotam veha‘ir ’asher bakharta velabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. veshama‘ta min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha ’et tefilatam ve’et tekhinoteihem ve‘asita mishpatam vesalakhta le‘amekha ’asher khate’u lakh. ‘atah ’elohai yihyu na ‘einekha petukhot ve’azenekha qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. ve‘atah qumah yhvh ’elohim lenukhekha ’atah va’aron ‘uzekha kohanekha yhvh ’elohim yilbeshu teshu‘ah vakhasidekha yismekhu batob. yhvh ’elohim ’al tasheb penei meshikhekha zakherah lekhasdei david ‘abdekha. ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel veha’esh yaredah meihashamayim vatokhal ha‘olah vehazebakhim ukhebod yhvh malei ’et habayit. velo yakhelu hakohanim labo ’el bet yhvh ki malei khebod yhvh ’et bet yhvh. vekhol benei yisra’el ro’im beredet ha’esh ukhebod yhvh ‘al habayit vayikhre‘u ’apayim ’artsah ‘al haritsfah vayishtakhavu vehodot yhvh ki tob ki le‘olam khasdo. vehamelekh vekhal ha‘am zobekhim zebakh lifnei yhvh. vayizbakh hamelekh shelomoh ’et zebakh habaqar ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef vetson mei’ah ve‘esrim ’alef vayakhnekhu ’et bet ha’elohim hamelekh vekhal ha‘am. vehakohanim ‘al mishmerotam ‘omedim vehalviyim bikhlei shir yhvh ’asher ‘asah david hamelekh lehodot yhvh ki le‘olam khasdo behalel david beyadam vehakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim negdam vekhal yisra’el ‘omedim. vayqadesh shelomoh ’et tokh hekhatser ’asher lifnei bet yhvh ki ‘asah sham ha‘olot ve’et khelbei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet ’asher ‘asah shelomoh lo yakhol lehakhil ’et ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah ve’et hakhalabim. vaya‘as shelomoh ’et hekhag ba‘et hahi shib‘at yamim vekhal yisra’el ‘imo qahal gadol me’od milebo khamat ‘ad nakhal mitsrayim. vaya‘asu bayom hashemini ‘atsaret ki khanukat hamizbeiakh ‘asu shib‘at yamim vehekhag shib‘at yamim. ubeyom ‘esrim usheloshah lakhodesh hashebi‘i shilakh ’et ha‘am le’aholeihem semeikhim vetobei leb ‘al hatobah ’asher ‘asah yhvh ledavid velishlomoh uleyisra’el ‘amo. vaykhal shelomoh ’et bet yhvh ve’et bet hamelekh ve’et kal haba ‘al leb shelomoh la‘asot bebet yhvh ubebeito hitsliakh. vayeira yhvh ’el shelomoh balayelah vayomer lo shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha ubakharti bamaqom hazeh li lebet zabakh. hen ’e‘etsor hashamayim velo yihyeh matar vehen ’atsaveh ‘al khagab le’ekhol ha’arets ve’im ’ashalakh deber be‘ami. veyikane‘u ‘ami ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleihem veyitpalu vibaqshu fanai veyashubu midarkheihem hara‘im va’ani ’eshma‘ min hashamayim ve’eslakh lekhatatam ve’erpa ’et ’artsam. ‘atah ‘einai yihyu fetukhot ve’azenai qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. ve‘atah bakharti vehiqdashti ’et habayit hazeh lihyot shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam vehayu ‘einai velibi sham kal hayamim. ve’atah ’im teilekh lefanai ka’asher halakh david ’abikha vela‘asot kekhol ’asher tsivitikha vekhuqai umishpatai tishmor. vahaqimoti ’et kisei malkhutekha ka’asher karati ledavid ’abikha leimor lo yikaret lekha ’ish moshel beyisra’el. ve’im teshubun ’atem va‘azabtem khuqotai umitsvotai ’asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va‘abadtem ’elohim ’akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. unetashtim mei‘al ’admati ’asher natati lahem ve’et habayit hazeh ’asher hiqdashti lishmi ’ashlikh mei‘al panai ve’etenenu lemashal velishninah bekhal ha‘amim. vehabayit hazeh ’asher hayah ‘elyon lekhal ‘ober ‘alav yishom ve’amar bameh ‘asah yhvh kakhah la’arets hazot velabayit hazeh. ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azebu ’et yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem ’asher hotsi’am mei’erets mitsrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim ’akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem vaya‘abdum ‘al ken heibi ‘aleihem ’et kal hara‘ah hazot. vayhi miqets ‘esrim shanah ’asher banah shelomoh ’et bet yhvh ve’et beito. vehe‘arim ’asher natan khuram lishlomoh banah shelomoh ’otam vayosheb sham ’et benei yisra’el. vayeilekh shelomoh khamat tsobah vayekhezaq ‘aleha. vayiben ’et tadmor bamidbar ve’et kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher banah bakhamat. vayiben ’et bet khoron ha‘elyon ve’et bet khoron hatakhton ‘arei matsor khomot delatayim uberiakh. ve’et ba‘alat ve’et kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh ve’et kal ‘arei harekheb ve’et ‘arei haparashim ve’et kal kheisheq shelomoh ’asher khashaq libnot birushalim ubalebanon ubekhol ’erets memshalto. kal ha‘am hanotar min hakhiti veha’emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi ’asher lo miyisra’el hemah. min beneihem ’asher notru ’akhareihem ba’arets ’asher lo khilum benei yisra’el vaya‘alem shelomoh lemas ‘ad hayom hazeh. umin benei yisra’el ’asher lo natan shelomoh la‘abadim limlakhto ki hemah ’anshei milkhamah vesarei shalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. ve’eleh sarei hanetsibim hanitsabim ’asher lamelekh shelomoh khamishim umatayim harodim ba‘am. ve’et bat par‘oh he‘elah shelomoh mei‘ir david labayit ’asher banah lah ki ’amar lo teisheb ’ishah li bebet david melekh yisra’el ki qodesh hemah ’asher ba’ah ’aleihem ’aron yhvh. ’az he‘elah shelomoh ‘olot yhvh ‘al mizbakh yhvh ’asher banah lifnei ha’ulam. ubidbar yom beyom leha‘alot kemitsvat mosheh lashabatot velekhodashim velamo‘adot shalosh pe‘amim bashanah bekhag hamatsot ubekhag hashabu‘ot ubekhag hasukot. vaya‘amed kemishpat david ’abiv ’et makhleqot hakohanim ‘al ‘abodatam vehalviyim ‘al mishmerotam lehalel ulesharet neged hakohanim lidbar yom beyomo vehasho‘arim bemakhleqotam lesha‘ar vasha‘ar ki khen mitsvat david ’ish ha’elohim. velo saru mitsvat hamelekh ‘al hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal dabar vela’otsarot. vatikon kal melekhet shelomoh ‘ad hayom musad bet yhvh ve‘ad keloto shalem bet yhvh. ’az halakh shelomoh le‘etsyon geber ve’el ’eilot ‘al sefat hayam be’erets ’edom. vayishlakh lo khuram beyad ‘abadav ’oniyot ’oniyot va‘abadim yod‘ei yam vayabo’u ‘im ‘abdei shelomoh ’ofirah vayiqkhu misham ’arba‘ mei’ot vakhamishim kikar zahab vayabi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh. umalkat sheba shame‘ah ’et sheima‘ shelomoh vatabo lenasot ’et shelomoh bekhidot birushalim bekhayil kabed me’od ugemalim nose’im besamim vezahab larob ve’eben yeqarah vatabo ’el shelomoh vatedaber ‘imo ’et kal ’asher hayah ‘im lebabah. vayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal debareha velo ne‘lam dabar mishelomoh ’asher lo higid lah. vateire malkat sheba ’et khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit ’asher banah. uma’akhal shulkhano umoshab ‘abadav uma‘amad mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav umalbusheihem va‘aliyato ’asher ya‘aleh bet yhvh velo hayah ‘od bah ruakh. vatomer ’el hamelekh ’emet hadabar ’asher shama‘ti be’artsi ‘al debarekha ve‘al khakhematekha. velo he’emanti ledibreihem ‘ad ’asher bati vatir’enah ‘einai vehineh lo hugad li khatsi marbit khakhematekha yasafta ‘al hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. ’ashrei ’anashekha ve’ashrei ‘abadekha ’eleh ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid veshome‘im ’et khakhematekha. yehi yhvh ’elohekha barukh ’asher khafets bekha letitekha ‘al kis’o lemelekh yhvh ’elohekha be’ahabat ’elohekha ’et yisra’el leha‘amido le‘olam vayitenkha ‘aleihem lemelekh la‘asot mishpat utsedaqah. vatiten lamelekh mei’ah ve‘esrim kikar zahab ubesamim larob me’od ve’eben yeqarah velo hayah kabosem hahu ’asher natenah malkat sheba lamelekh shelomoh. vegam ‘abdei khiram khuram ve‘abdei shelomoh ’asher heibi’u zahab mei’ofir heibi’u ‘atsei ’algumim ve’eben yeqarah. vaya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘atsei ha’algumim mesilot lebet yhvh ulebet hamelekh vekhinorot unebalim lasharim velo nir’u khahem lefanim be’erets yehudah. vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat sheba ’et kal kheftsah ’asher sha’alah milebad ’asher heibi’ah ’el hamelekh vatahafokh vateilekh le’artsah hi va‘abadeha. vayhi mishqal hazahab ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’ekhat shesh mei’ot veshishim vashesh kikerei zahab. lebad mei’anshei hatarim vehasokharim mebi’im vekhal malkhei ‘arab ufakhot ha’arets mebi’im zahab vakhesef lishlomoh. vaya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim tsinah zahab shakhut shesh mei’ot zahab shakhut ya‘aleh ‘al hatsinah ha’ekhat. ushelosh mei’ot maginim zahab shakhut shelosh mei’ot zahab ya‘aleh ‘al hamagen ha’ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bebet ya‘ar halebanon. vaya‘as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vaytsapeihu zahab tahor. veshesh ma‘alot lakisei vekhebesh bazahab lakisei ma’okhazim veyadot mizeh umizeh ‘al meqom hashabet ushenayim ’arayot ‘omedim ’eitsel hayadot. ushenem ‘asar ’arayot ‘omedim sham ‘al shesh hama‘alot mizeh umizeh lo na‘asah khen lekhal mamlakhah. vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahab vekhol kelei bet ya‘ar halebanon zahab sagur ’en kesef nekhshab bimei shelomoh lim’umah. ki ’oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish ‘im ‘abdei khuram ’akhat leshalosh shanim tabonah ’oniyot tarshish nose’ot zahab vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha’arets le‘osher vekhakhemah. vekhol malkhei ha’arets mebaqshim ’et penei shelomoh lishmoa‘ ’et khakhemato ’asher natan ha’elohim belibo. vehem mebi’im ’ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahab uselamot neisheq ubesamim susim uferadim debar shanah beshanah. vayhi lishlomoh ’arba‘at ’alafim ’uryot susim umarkabot ushenem ‘asar ’elef parashim vayanikhem be‘arei harekheb ve‘im hamelekh birushalim. vayhi moshel bekhal hamelakhim min hanahar ve‘ad ’erets pelishtim ve‘ad gebul mitsrayim. vayiten hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’abanim ve’et ha’arazim natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larob. umotsi’im susim mimitsrayim lishlomoh umikal ha’aratsot. ushe’ar dibrei shelomoh harishonim veha’akharonim halo hem ketubim ‘al dibrei natan hanabi ve‘al nebu’at ’akhiyah hashiloni ubakhazot ye‘di ye‘do hakhozeh ‘al yarabe‘am ben nebat. vayimlokh shelomoh birushalim ‘al kal yisra’el ’arba‘im shanah. vayishkab shelomoh ‘im ’abotav vayiqberuhu be‘ir david ’abiv vayimlokh rekhab‘am beno takhtav. vayeilekh rekhab‘am shekhemah ki shekhem ba’u khal yisra’el lehamlikh ’oto. vayhi kishmoa‘ yarabe‘am ben nebat vehu bemitsrayim ’asher barakh mipenei shelomoh hamelekh vayashab yarabe‘am mimitsrayim. vayishlekhu vayiqre’u lo vayabo yarabe‘am vekhal yisra’el vaydaberu ’el rekhab‘am leimor. ’abikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu ve‘atah haqel mei‘abodat ’abikha haqashah umei‘ulo hakabed ’asher natan ‘aleinu vena‘abdeka. vayomer ’aleihem ‘od sheloshet yamim veshubu ’eilai vayeilekh ha‘am. vayiva‘ats hamelekh rekhab‘am ’et hazeqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim lifnei shelomoh ’abiv bihyoto khai leimor ’ekh ’atem no‘atsim lehashib la‘am hazeh dabar. vaydaberu ’eilav leimor ’im tihyeh letob leha‘am hazeh uretsitam vedibarta ’aleihem debarim tobim vehayu lekha ‘abadim kal hayamim. vaya‘azob ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim ’asher ye‘atsuhu vayiva‘ats ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito ha‘omedim lefanav. vayomer ’aleihem mah ’atem no‘atsim venashib dabar ’et ha‘am hazeh ’asher diberu ’eilai leimor haqel min ha‘ol ’asher natan ’abikha ‘aleinu. vaydaberu ’ito hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor ’abikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu ve’atah haqel mei‘aleinu koh tomar ’aleihem qatani ‘abah mimatenei ’abi. ve‘atah ’abi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kabed va’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem ’abi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ba‘aqrabim. vayabo yarabe‘am vekhal ha‘am ’el rekhab‘am bayom hashelishi ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor shubu ’eilai bayom hashelishi. vaya‘anem hamelekh qashah vaya‘azob hamelekh rekhab‘am ’et ‘atsat hazeqeinim. vaydaber ’aleihem ka‘atsat hayladim leimor ’akhbid ’et ‘ulekhem va’ani ’osif ‘alav ’abi yisar ’etkhem bashotim va’ani ba‘aqrabim. velo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am ki hayetah nesibah mei‘im ha’elohim lema‘an haqim yhvh ’et debaro ’asher diber beyad ’akhiyahu hashiloni ’el yarabe‘am ben nebat. vekhal yisra’el ki lo shama‘ hamelekh lahem vayashibu ha‘am ’et hamelekh leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah beben yishai ’ish le’ohalekha yisra’el ‘atah re’eh beitekha david vayeilekh kal yisra’el le’ohalav. ubenei yisra’el hayoshebim be‘arei yehudah vayimlokh ‘aleihem rekhab‘am. vayishlakh hamelekh rekhab‘am ’et hadoram ’asher ‘al hamas vayirgemu bo benei yisra’el ’eben vayamot vehamelekh rekhab‘am hit’amets la‘alot bamerkabah lanus yerushalim. vayifshe‘u yisra’el bebet david ‘ad hayom hazeh. vayabo rekhab‘am yerushalim vayaqhel ’et bet yehudah ubinyamin mei’ah ushemonim ’elef bakhur ‘oseh milkhamah lehilakhem ‘im yisra’el lehashib ’et hamamlakhah lirkhab‘am. vayhi debar yhvh ’el shema‘yahu ’ish ha’elohim leimor. ’emor ’el rekhab‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve’el kal yisra’el bihudah ubinyamin leimor. koh ’amar yhvh lo ta‘alu velo tilakhamu ‘im ’akheikhem ubu ’ish lebeito ki mei’iti nihyah hadabar hazeh vayishme‘u ’et dibrei yhvh vayashubu milekhet ’el yarabe‘am. vayeisheb rekhab‘am birushalim vayiben ‘arim lematsor bihudah. vayiben ’et bet lekhem ve’et ‘eitam ve’et teqoa‘. ve’et bet tsur ve’et sokho ve’et ‘adulam. ve’et gat ve’et mareishah ve’et zif. ve’et ’adorayim ve’et lakhish ve’et ‘azeiqah. ve’et tsare‘ah ve’et ’ayalon ve’et khebron ’asher bihudah ubebinyamin ‘arei metsurot. vaykhazeq ’et hametsurot vayiten bahem negidim ve’otserot ma’akhal veshemen vayayin. ubekhal ‘ir va‘ir tsinot uremakhim vaykhazeqem leharbeh me’od vayhi lo yehudah ubinyamin. vehakohanim vehalviyim ’asher bekhal yisra’el hityatsebu ‘alav mikal gebulam. ki ‘azebu halviyim ’et migresheihem va’akhuzatam vayeilekhu lihudah velirushalim ki hiznikham yarabe‘am ubanav mikahen yhvh. vaya‘amed lo kohanim labamot velase‘irim vela‘agalim ’asher ‘asah. ve’akhareihem mikol shibtei yisra’el hanotenim ’et lebabam lebaqesh ’et yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ba’u yerushalim lizboakh yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem. vaykhazequ ’et malkhut yehudah vai’ametsu ’et rekhab‘am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh ki halekhu bederekh david ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. vayiqakh lo rekhab‘am ’ishah ’et makhalat ben bat yerimot ben david ’abihayil bat ’eli’ab ben yishai. vateiled lo banim ’et ye‘ush ve’et shemaryah ve’et zaham. ve’akhareha laqakh ’et ma‘akhah bat ’abshalom vateiled lo ’et ’abiyah ve’et ‘atai ve’et ziza ve’et shelomit. vaye’ehab rekhab‘am ’et ma‘akhah bat ’abshalom mikal nashav ufilagshav ki nashim shemoneh ‘esreh nasa ufilagshim shishim vayoled ‘esrim ushemonah banim veshishim banot. vaya‘amed larosh rekhab‘am ’et ’abiyah ben ma‘akhah lenagid be’ekhav ki lehamlikho. vayaben vayifrots mikal banav lekhal ’artsot yehudah ubinyamin lekhol ‘arei hametsurot vayiten lahem hamazon larob vayish’al hamon nashim. vayhi kehakhin malkhut rekhab‘am ukhekhezqato ‘azab ’et torat yhvh vekhal yisra’el ‘imo. vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhab‘am ‘alah shishaq melekh mitsrayim ‘al yerushalim ki ma‘alu yhvh. be’elef umatayim rekheb ubeshishim ’elef parashim ve’en mispar la‘am ’asher ba’u ‘imo mimitsrayim lubim sukiyim vekhushim. vayilkod ’et ‘arei hametsurot ’asher lihudah vayabo ‘ad yerushalim. ushema‘yah hanabi ba ’el rekhab‘am vesarei yehudah ’asher ne’esfu ’el yerushalim mipenei shishaq vayomer lahem koh ’amar yhvh ’atem ‘azabtem ’oti ve’af ’ani ‘azabti ’etkhem beyad shishaq. vayikane‘u sarei yisra’el vehamelekh vayomeru tsadiq yhvh. ubir’ot yhvh ki nikhna‘u hayah debar yhvh ’el shema‘yah leimor nikhne‘u lo ’ashkhitem venatati lahem kim‘at lifleitah velo titakh khamati birushalim beyad shishaq. ki yihyu lo la‘abadim veyeide‘u ‘abodati va‘abodat mamlekhot ha’aratsot. vaya‘al shishaq melekh mitsrayim ‘al yerushalim vayiqakh ’et ’otserot bet yhvh ve’et ’otserot bet hamelekh ’et hakol laqakh vayiqakh ’et maginei hazahab ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. vaya‘as hamelekh rekhab‘am takhteihem maginei nekhoshet vehifqid ‘al yad sarei haratsim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. vayhi midei bo hamelekh bet yhvh ba’u haratsim unesa’um veheshibum ’el ta haratsim. ubehikane‘o shab mimenu ’af yhvh velo lehashkhit lekhalah vegam bihudah hayah debarim tobim. vayitkhazeq hamelekh rekhab‘am birushalim vayimlokh ki ben ’arba‘im ve’akhat shanah rekhab‘am bemalekho ushaba‘ ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha‘ir ’asher bakhar yhvh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shibtei yisra’el veshem ’imo na‘amah ha‘amonit. vaya‘as hara‘ ki lo heikhin libo lidrosh ’et yhvh. vedibrei rekhab‘am harishonim veha’akharonim halo hem ketubim bedibrei shema‘yah hanabi ve‘ido hakhozeh lehityakhes umilkhamot rekhab‘am veyarabe‘am kal hayamim. vayishkab rekhab‘am ‘im ’abotav vayiqaber be‘ir david vayimlokh ’abiyah beno takhtav. bishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lamelekh yarabe‘am vayimlokh ’abiyah ‘al yehudah. shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem ’imo mikhayahu bat ’uri’el min gib‘ah umilkhamah hayetah ben ’abiyah uben yarabe‘am. vaye’sor ’abiyah ’et hamilkhamah bekhayil giborei milkhamah ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur veyarabe‘am ‘arakh ‘imo milkhamah bishmoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur gibor khayil. vayaqam ’abiyah mei‘al lehar tsemarayim ’asher behar ’efrayim vayomer shema‘uni yarabe‘am vekhal yisra’el. halo lakhem lada‘at ki yhvh ’elohei yisra’el natan mamlakhah ledavid ‘al yisra’el le‘olam lo ulebanav berit melakh. vayaqam yarabe‘am ben nebat ‘ebed shelomoh ben david vayimrod ‘al ’adonav. vayiqabetsu ‘alav ’anashim reiqim benei beliya‘al vayit’ametsu ‘al rekhab‘am ben shelomoh urekhab‘am hayah na‘ar verakh leibab velo hitkhazaq lifneihem. ve‘atah ’atem ’omerim lehitkhazeq lifnei mamlekhet yhvh beyad benei david ve’atem hamon rab ve‘imakhem ‘eglei zahab ’asher ‘asah lakhem yarabe‘am leilohim. halo hidakhtem ’et kohanei yhvh ’et benei ’aharon vehalviyim vata‘asu lakhem kohanim ke‘amei ha’aratsot kal haba lemalei yado befar ben baqar ve’eilim shib‘ah vehayah khohen lelo ’elohim. va’anakhnu yhvh ’eloheinu velo ‘azabnuhu vekhohanim mesharetim yhvh benei ’aharon vehalviyim bamlakhet. umaqtirim yhvh ‘olot baboqer baboqer uba‘ereb ba‘ereb uqetoret samim uma‘arekhet lekhem ‘al hashulkhan hatahor umenorat hazahab veneiroteha leba‘er ba‘ereb ba‘ereb ki shomerim ’anakhnu ’et mishmeret yhvh ’eloheinu ve’atem ‘azabtem ’oto. vehineh ‘imanu barosh ha’elohim vekhohanav vakhatsotserot hateru‘ah leharia‘ ‘aleikhem benei yisra’el ’al tilakhamu ‘im yhvh ’elohei ’aboteikhem ki lo tatslikhu. veyarabe‘am heiseb ’et hama’rab labo mei’akhareihem vayihyu lifnei yehudah vehama’rab mei’akhareihem. vayifnu yehudah vehineh lahem hamilkhamah panim ve’akhor vayits‘aqu yhvh vehakohanim makhatsotserim makhtserim bakhatsotserot. vayari‘u ’ish yehudah vayhi beharia‘ ’ish yehudah veha’elohim nagaf ’et yarabe‘am vekhal yisra’el lifnei ’abiyah vihudah. vayanusu benei yisra’el mipenei yehudah vayitenem ’elohim beyadam. vayaku bahem ’abiyah ve‘amo makah rabah vayipelu khalalim miyisra’el khamesh mei’ot ’elef ’ish bakhur. vayikane‘u benei yisra’el ba‘et hahi vaye’emtsu benei yehudah ki nish‘anu ‘al yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem. vayirdof ’abiyah ’akharei yarabe‘am vayilkod mimenu ‘arim ’et bet ’el ve’et benoteha ve’et yeshanah ve’et benoteha ve’et ‘efron ‘efrayin ubenoteha. velo ‘atsar koakh yarabe‘am ‘od bimei ’abiyahu vayigefeihu yhvh vayamot. vayitkhazeq ’abiyahu vayisa lo nashim ’arba‘ ‘esreh vayoled ‘esrim ushenayim banim veshesh ‘esreh banot. veyeter dibrei ’abiyah uderakhav udebarav ketubim bemidrash hanabi ‘ido. vayishkab ’abiyah ‘im ’abotav vayiqberu ’oto be‘ir david vayimlokh ’asa beno takhtav beyamav shaqetah ha’arets ‘eser shanim. vaya‘as ’asa hatob vehayashar be‘einei yhvh ’elohav. vayasar ’et mizbekhot haneikhar vehabamot vayshaber ’et hamatseibot vaygada‘ ’et ha’asheirim. vayomer lihudah lidrosh ’et yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem vela‘asot hatorah vehamitsvah. vayasar mikal ‘arei yehudah ’et habamot ve’et hakhamanim vatishqot hamamlakhah lefanav. vayiben ‘arei metsurah bihudah ki shaqetah ha’arets ve’en ‘imo milkhamah bashanim ha’eleh ki heiniakh yhvh lo. vayomer lihudah nibneh ’et he‘arim ha’eleh venaseb khomah umigdalim delatayim uberikhim ‘odenu ha’arets lefaneinu ki darashnu ’et yhvh ’eloheinu darashnu vayanakh lanu misabib vayibnu vayatslikhu. vayhi le’asa khayil nosei tsinah varomakh mihudah shelosh mei’ot ’elef umibinyamin nose’ei magen vedorekhei qeshet matayim ushemonim ’alef kal ’eleh giborei khayil. vayeitsei ’aleihem zerakh hakushi bekhayil ’elef ’alafim umarkabot shelosh mei’ot vayabo ‘ad mareishah. vayeitsei ’asa lefanav vaya‘arkhu milkhamah begei tsefatah lemareishah. vayiqra ’asa ’el yhvh ’elohav vayomar yhvh ’en ‘imekha la‘zor ben rab le’en koakh ‘azereinu yhvh ’eloheinu ki ‘alekha nish‘anu ubeshimkha banu ‘al hehamon hazeh yhvh ’eloheinu ’atah ’al ya‘tsor ‘imekha ’enosh. vayigof yhvh ’et hakushim lifnei ’asa velifnei yehudah vayanusu hakushim. vayirdefem ’asa veha‘am ’asher ‘imo ‘ad ligrar vayipol mikushim le’en lahem mikhyah ki nishberu lifnei yhvh velifnei makhaneihu vayis’u shalal harbeh me’od. vayaku ’et kal he‘arim sebibot gerar ki hayah fakhad yhvh ‘aleihem vayabozu ’et kal he‘arim ki bizah rabah hayetah bahem. vegam ’aholei miqneh hiku vayishbu tson larob ugemalim vayashubu yerushalim. va‘azaryahu ben ‘oded hayetah ‘alav ruakh ’elohim. vayeitsei lifnei ’asa vayomer lo shema‘uni ’asa vekhal yehudah ubinyamin yhvh ‘imakhem bihyotkhem ‘imo ve’im tidreshuhu yimatsei lakhem ve’im ta‘azbuhu ya‘azob ’etkhem. veyamim rabim leyisra’el lelo ’elohei ’emet ulelo kohen moreh ulelo torah. vayashab batsar lo ‘al yhvh ’elohei yisra’el vaybaqshuhu vayimatsei lahem. uba‘itim hahem ’en shalom layotsei velaba ki mehumot rabot ‘al kal yoshebei ha’aratsot. vekhutetu go bego ve‘ir be‘ir ki ’elohim hamamam bekhal tsarah. ve’atem khizqu ve’al yirpu yedeikhem ki yesh sakhar lif‘ulatkhem. vekhishmoa‘ ’asa hadebarim ha’eleh vehanebu’ah ‘oded hanabi hitkhazaq vaya‘aber hashiqutsim mikal ’erets yehudah ubinyamin umin he‘arim ’asher lakhad meihar ’efrayim vaykhadesh ’et mizbakh yhvh ’asher lifnei ’ulam yhvh. vayiqbots ’et kal yehudah ubinyamin vehagarim ‘imahem mei’efrayim umenasheh umishim‘on ki nafelu ‘alav miyisra’el larob bir’otam ki yhvh ’elohav ‘imo. vayiqabetsu yerushalim bakhodesh hashelishi lishnat khamesh ‘esreh lemalkhut ’asa. vayizbekhu yhvh bayom hahu min hashalal heibi’u baqar sheba‘ mei’ot vetson shib‘at ’alafim. vayabo’u baberit lidrosh ’et yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham. vekhol ’asher lo yidrosh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el yumat lemin qaton ve‘ad gadol lemei’ish ve‘ad ’ishah. vayishabe‘u yhvh beqol gadol ubitru‘ah ubakhatsotserot ubeshofarot. vayismekhu khal yehudah ‘al hashebu‘ah ki bekhal lebabam nishba‘u ubekhal retsonam biqshuhu vayimatsei lahem vayanakh yhvh lahem misabib. vegam ma‘akhah ’em ’asa hamelekh hesirah migebirah ’asher ‘asetah la’asheirah miflatset vayikhrot ’asa ’et miflatstah vayadeq vayisrof benakhal qidron. vehabamot lo saru miyisra’el raq lebab ’asa hayah shalem kal yamav. vayabei ’et qadeshei ’abiv veqadashav bet ha’elohim kesef vezahab vekheilim. umilkhamah lo hayatah ‘ad shenat sheloshim vekhamesh lemalkhut ’asa. bishnat sheloshim vashesh lemalkhut ’asa ‘alah ba‘sha melekh yisra’el ‘al yehudah vayiben ’et haramah lebilti tet yotsei vaba le’asa melekh yehudah. vayotsei ’asa kesef vezahab mei’otserot bet yhvh ubet hamelekh vayishlakh ’el ben hadad melekh ’aram hayosheb bedarmeseq leimor. berit beini ubeinekha uben ’abi uben ’abikha hineh shalakhti lekha kesef vezahab lekh hafer beritekha ’et ba‘sha melekh yisra’el veya‘aleh mei‘alai. vayishma‘ ben hadad ’el hamelekh ’asa vayishlakh ’et sarei hakhayalim ’asher lo ’el ‘arei yisra’el vayaku ’et ‘iyon ve’et dan ve’et ’abel mayim ve’et kal miskenot ‘arei naftali. vayhi kishmoa‘ ba‘sha vayekhdal mibenot ’et haramah vayashbet ’et melakhto. ve’asa hamelekh laqakh ’et kal yehudah vayis’u ’et ’abnei haramah ve’et ‘eitseha ’asher banah ba‘sha vayiben bahem ’et geba‘ ve’et hamitspah. uba‘et hahi ba khanani haro’eh ’el ’asa melekh yehudah vayomer ’eilav behisha‘enkha ‘al melekh ’aram velo nish‘anta ‘al yhvh ’elohekha ‘al ken nimlat khel melekh ’aram miyadekha. halo hakushim vehalubim hayu lekhayil larob lerekheb ulefarashim leharbeh me’od ubehisha‘enkha ‘al yhvh netanam beyadekha. ki yhvh ‘einav meshotetot bekhal ha’arets lehitkhazeq ‘im lebabam shalem ’eilav niskalta ‘al zot ki mei‘atah yesh ‘imekha milkhamot. vayikh‘as ’asa ’el haro’eh vayiteneihu bet hamahpekhet ki beza‘af ‘imo ‘al zot vayratsets ’asa min ha‘am ba‘et hahi. vehineh dibrei ’asa harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketubim ‘al seifer hamelakhim lihudah veyisra’el. vayekhele ’asa bishnat sheloshim vateisha‘ lemalkhuto beraglav ‘ad lema‘lah khaleyo vegam bekhaleyo lo darash ’et yhvh ki barofe’im. vayishkab ’asa ‘im ’abotav vayamat bishnat ’arba‘im ve’akhat lemalekho. vayiqberuhu beqibrotav ’asher karah lo be‘ir david vayashkibuhu bamishkab ’asher milei besamim uzenim meruqakhim bemirqakhat ma‘aseh vayisrefu lo sereifah gedolah ‘ad lim’od. vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav vayitkhazeq ‘al yisra’el. vayiten khayil bekhal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot vayiten netsibim be’erets yehudah ube‘arei ’efrayim ’asher lakhad ’asa ’abiv. vayhi yhvh ‘im yehoshafat ki halakh bedarkhei david ’abiv harishonim velo darash labe‘alim. ki leilohei ’abiv darash ubemitsvotav halakh velo kema‘aseh yisra’el. vayakhen yhvh ’et hamamlakhah beyado vayitenu khal yehudah minkhah lihoshafat vayhi lo ‘osher vekhabod larob. vayigbah libo bedarkhei yhvh ve‘od heisir ’et habamot ve’et ha’asheirim mihudah. ubishnat shalosh lemalekho shalakh lesarav leben khayil ule‘obadyah velizkharyah velintan’el ulemikhayahu lelamed be‘arei yehudah. ve‘imahem halviyim shema‘yahu unetanyahu uzebadyahu va‘asah’el ushemirimot ushemiramot vihonatan va’adoniyahu vetobiyahu vetob ’adoniyah halviyim ve‘imahem ’elishama‘ vihoram hakohanim. vaylamedu bihudah ve‘imahem seifer torat yhvh vayasobu bekhal ‘arei yehudah vaylamedu ba‘am. vayhi pakhad yhvh ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot ’asher sebibot yehudah velo nilkhamu ‘im yehoshafat. umin pelishtim mebi’im lihoshafat minkhah vekhesef masa gam ha‘arbi’im mebi’im lo tson ’eilim shib‘at ’alafim usheba‘ mei’ot uteyashim shib‘at ’alafim usheba‘ mei’ot. vayhi yehoshafat holekh vegadel ‘ad lema‘elah vayiben bihudah biraniyot ve‘arei miskenot. umelakhah rabah hayah lo be‘arei yehudah ve’anshei milkhamah giborei khayil birushalim. ve’eleh fequdatam lebet ’aboteihem lihudah sarei ’alafim ‘adnah hasar ve‘imo giborei khayil shelosh mei’ot ’alef. ve‘al yado yehokhanan hasar ve‘imo matayim ushemonim ’alef. ve‘al yado ‘amasyah ben zikhri hamitnadeb yhvh ve‘imo matayim ’elef gibor khayil. umin binyamin gibor khayil ’elyada‘ ve‘imo nosheqei qeshet umagen matayim ’alef. ve‘al yado yehozabad ve‘imo mei’ah ushemonim ’elef khalutsei tsaba. ’eleh hamsharetim ’et hamelekh milebad ’asher natan hamelekh be‘arei hamibtsar bekhal yehudah. vayhi lihoshafat ‘osher vekhabod larob vayitkhaten le’akh’ab. vayeired leqets shanim ’el ’akh’ab leshomeron vayizbakh lo ’akh’ab tson ubaqar larob vela‘am ’asher ‘imo vaysiteihu la‘alot ’el ramot gil‘ad. vayomer ’akh’ab melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat melekh yehudah hateilekh ‘imi ramot gil‘ad vayomer lo kamoni khamokha ukhe‘amekha ‘ami ve‘imekha bamilkhamah. vayomer yehoshafat ’el melekh yisra’el derash na khayom ’et debar yhvh. vayiqbots melekh yisra’el ’et hanebi’im ’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish vayomer ’aleihem haneilekh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im ’ekhdal vayomeru ‘aleh veyiten ha’elohim beyad hamelekh. vayomer yehoshafat ha’en poh nabi yhvh ‘od venidreshah mei’oto. vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat ‘od ’ish ’ekhad lidrosh ’et yhvh mei’oto va’ani seneitihu ki ’einenu mitnabei ‘alai letobah ki khal yamav lera‘ah hu mikhayehu ben yimla vayomer yehoshafat ’al yomar hamelekh ken. vayiqra melekh yisra’el ’el saris ’ekhad vayomer maher mikhahu mikhayehu ben yimla. umelekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshebim ’ish ‘al kis’o melubashim begadim veyoshebim begoren petakh sha‘ar shomeron vekhal hanebi’im mitnabe’im lifneihem. vaya‘as lo tsidqiyahu ben kena‘anah qarnei barzel vayomer koh ’amar yhvh be’eleh tenagakh ’et ’aram ‘ad kalotam. vekhal hanebi’im nibe’im ken leimor ‘aleh ramot gil‘ad vehatslakh venatan yhvh beyad hamelekh. vehamal’akh ’asher halakh liqro lemikhayehu diber ’eilav leimor hineh dibrei hanebi’im peh ’ekhad tob ’el hamelekh vihi na debarekha ke’akhad meihem vedibarta tob. vayomer mikhayehu khai yhvh ki ’et ’asher yomar ’elohai ’oto ’adaber. vayabo ’el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh ’eilav mikhah haneilekh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilkhamah ’im ’ekhdal vayomer ‘alu vehatslikhu veyinatenu beyedkhem. vayomer ’eilav hamelekh ‘ad kameh fe‘amim ’ani mashbi‘ekha ’asher lo tedaber ’eilai raq ’emet beshem yhvh. vayomer ra’iti ’et kal yisra’el nefotsim ‘al heharim katson ’asher ’en lahen ro‘eh vayomer yhvh lo ’adonim la’eleh yashubu ’ish lebeito beshalom. vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat halo ’amarti ’eilekha lo yitnabei ‘alai tob ki ’im lera‘. vayomer lakhen shim‘u debar yhvh ra’iti ’et yhvh yosheb ‘al kis’o vekhal tseba hashamayim ‘omedim ‘al yemino usemolo. vayomer yhvh mi yefateh ’et ’akh’ab melekh yisra’el veya‘al veyipol beramot gil‘ad vayomer zeh ’omer kakhah vezeh ’omer kakhah. vayeitsei haruakh vaya‘amod lifnei yhvh vayomer ’ani ’afatenu vayomer yhvh ’eilav bamah. vayomer ’eitsei vehayiti leruakh sheqer befi kal nebi’av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal tsei va‘aseh khen. ve‘atah hineh natan yhvh ruakh sheqer befi nebi’ekha ’eleh yhvh diber ‘alekha ra‘ah. vayigash tsidqiyahu ben kena‘anah vayakh ’et mikhayehu ‘al halekhi vayomer ’ei zeh haderekh ‘abar ruakh yhvh mei’iti ledaber ’otakh. vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro’eh bayom hahu ’asher tabo kheder bekheder leheikhabei. vayomer melekh yisra’el qekhu ’et mikhayehu vahashibuhu ’el ’amon sar ha‘ir ve’el yo’ash ben hamelekh. va’amartem koh ’amar hamelekh simu zeh bet hakele veha’akhiluhu lekhem lakhats umayim lakhats ‘ad shubi beshalom. vayomer mikhayehu ’im shob tashub beshalom lo diber yhvh bi vayomer shim‘u ‘amim kulam. vaya‘al melekh yisra’el vihoshafat melekh yehudah ’el ramot gil‘ad. vayomer melekh yisra’el ’el yehoshafat hitkhapes vabo bamilkhamah ve’atah lebash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra’el vayabo’u bamilkhamah. umelekh ’aram tsivah ’et sarei harekheb ’asher lo leimor lo tilakhamu ’et haqaton ’et hagadol ki ’im ’et melekh yisra’el lebado. vayhi kir’ot sarei harekheb ’et yehoshafat vehemah ’ameru melekh yisra’el hu vayasobu ‘alav lehilakhem vayiz‘aq yehoshafat yhvh ‘azaro vaysitem ’elohim mimenu. vayhi kir’ot sarei harekheb ki lo hayah melekh yisra’el vayashubu mei’akharav. ve’ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakh ’et melekh yisra’el ben hadebaqim uben hashiryan vayomer larakab hafokh yadekha yadekha vehotseitani min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. vata‘al hamilkhamah bayom hahu umelekh yisra’el hayah ma‘amid bamerkabah nokhakh ’aram ‘ad ha‘areb vayamat le‘et bo hashamesh. vayashab yehoshafat melekh yehudah ’el beito beshalom lirushalim. vayeitsei ’el panav yeihu ben khanani hakhozeh vayomer ’el hamelekh yehoshafat halarasha‘ la‘zor ulesone’ei yhvh te’ehab ubazot ‘alekha qetsef milifnei yhvh. ’abal debarim tobim nimtse’u ‘imakh ki bi‘arta ha’asheirot min ha’arets vahakhinota lebabekha lidrosh ha’elohim. vayeisheb yehoshafat birushalim vayashab vayeitsei ba‘am mibe’er sheba‘ ‘ad har ’efrayim vayshibem ’el yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem. vaya‘amed shofetim ba’arets bekhal ‘arei yehudah habetsurot le‘ir va‘ir. vayomer ’el hashofetim re’u mah ’atem ‘osim ki lo le’adam tishpetu ki yhvh ve‘imakhem bidbar mishpat. ve‘atah yehi fakhad yhvh ‘aleikhem shimru va‘asu ki ’en ‘im yhvh ’eloheinu ‘avlah umaso fanim umiqakh shokhad. vegam birushalim he‘emid yehoshafat min halviyim vehakohanim umeirashei ha’abot leyisra’el lemishpat yhvh velarib vayashubu yerushalim. vaytsav ‘aleihem leimor koh ta‘asun beyir’at yhvh be’emunah ubeleibab shalem. vekhal rib ’asher yabo ‘aleikhem mei’akheikhem hayoshebim be‘areihem ben dam ledam ben torah lemitsvah lekhuqim ulemishpatim vehizhartem ’otam velo ye’shemu yhvh vehayah qetsef ‘aleikhem ve‘al ’akheikhem koh ta‘asun velo te’shamu. vehineh ’amaryahu khohen harosh ‘aleikhem lekhol debar yhvh uzebadyahu ben yishma‘el hanagid lebet yehudah lekhol debar hamelekh veshoterim halviyim lifneikhem khizqu va‘asu vihi yhvh ‘im hatob. vayhi ’akhareikhen ba’u benei mo’ab ubenei ‘amon ve‘imahem meiha‘amonim ‘al yehoshafat lamilkhamah. vayabo’u vayagidu lihoshafat leimor ba ‘alekha hamon rab mei‘eiber layam mei’aram vehinam bekhatson tamar hi ‘en gedi. vayira vayiten yehoshafat ’et panav lidrosh yhvh vayiqra tsom ‘al kal yehudah. vayiqabetsu yehudah lebaqesh yhvh gam mikal ‘arei yehudah ba’u lebaqesh ’et yhvh. vaya‘amod yehoshafat biqhal yehudah virushalim bebet yhvh lifnei hekhatser hakhadashah. vayomar yhvh ’elohei ’aboteinu halo ’atah hu ’elohim bashamayim ve’atah moshel bekhol mamlekhot hagoyim ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ve’en ‘imekha lehityatseb. halo ’atah ’eloheinu horashta ’et yoshebei ha’arets hazot milifnei ‘amekha yisra’el vatitenah lezera‘ ’abraham ’ohabkha le‘olam. vayeishebu bah vayibnu lekha bah miqdash leshimkha leimor. ’im tabo ‘aleinu ra‘ah khereb shefot vedeber vera‘ab na‘amdah lifnei habayit hazeh ulefanekha ki shimkha babayit hazeh veniz‘aq ’eilekha mitsarateinu vetishma‘ vetoshia‘. ve‘atah hineh benei ‘amon umo’ab vehar sei‘ir ’asher lo natatah leyisra’el labo bahem bebo’am mei’erets mitsrayim ki saru mei‘aleihem velo hishmidum. vehineh hem gomelim ‘aleinu labo legaresheinu miyerushatekha ’asher horashtanu. ’eloheinu halo tishpat bam ki ’en banu koakh lifnei hehamon harab hazeh haba ‘aleinu va’anakhnu lo neida‘ mah na‘aseh ki ‘alekha ‘eineinu. vekhol yehudah ‘omedim lifnei yhvh gam tapam nesheihem ubeneihem. veyakhazi’el ben zekharyahu ben benayah ben ye‘i’el ben matanyah haleivi min benei ’asaf hayetah ‘alav ruakh yhvh betokh haqahal. vayomer haqshibu khal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehamelekh yehoshafat koh ’amar yhvh lakhem ’atem ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu mipenei hehamon harab hazeh ki lo lakhem hamilkhamah ki leilohim. makhar redu ‘aleihem hinam ‘olim bema‘aleh hatsits umetsatem ’otam besof hanakhal penei midbar yeru’el. lo lakhem lehilakhem bazot hityatsebu ‘imdu ure’u ’et yeshu‘at yhvh ‘imakhem yehudah virushalim ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu makhar tse’u lifneihem yhvh ‘imakhem. vayiqod yehoshafat ’apayim ’aretsah vekhal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim nafelu lifnei yhvh lehishtakhavot yhvh. vayaqumu halviyim min benei haqehatim umin benei haqarekhim lehalel yhvh ’elohei yisra’el beqol gadol lema‘elah. vayashkimu baboqer vayeitse’u lemidbar teqoa‘ ubetseitam ‘amad yehoshafat vayomer shema‘uni yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim ha’aminu yhvh ’eloheikhem vetei’ameinu ha’aminu binbi’av vehatslikhu. vayiva‘ats ’el ha‘am vaya‘amed meshorarim yhvh umehalim lehadrat qodesh betset lifnei hekhaluts ve’omerim hodu yhvh ki le‘olam khasdo. ube‘et heikhelu berinah utehilah natan yhvh me’arebim ‘al benei ‘amon mo’ab vehar sei‘ir haba’im lihudah vayinageifu. vaya‘amdu benei ‘amon umo’ab ‘al yoshebei har sei‘ir lehakharim ulehashmid ukhekhalotam beyoshebei sei‘ir ‘azeru ’ish berei‘eihu lemashkhit. vihudah ba ‘al hamitspeh lamidbar vayifnu ’el hehamon vehinam pegarim nofelim ’artsah ve’en peleitah. vayabo yehoshafat ve‘amo laboz ’et shelalam vayimtse’u bahem larob urekhush ufegarim ukhelei khamudot vaynatselu lahem le’en masa vayihyu yamim sheloshah bozezim ’et hashalal ki rab hu. ubayom harebi‘i niqhalu le‘eimeq berakhah ki sham beirakhu ’et yhvh ‘al ken qare’u ’et shem hamaqom hahu ‘eimeq berakhah ‘ad hayom. vayashubu kal ’ish yehudah virushalim vihoshafat berosham lashub ’el yerushalim besimkhah ki simekham yhvh mei’oybeihem. vayabo’u yerushalim binbalim ubekhinorot ubakhatsotserot ’el bet yhvh. vayhi pakhad ’elohim ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’aratsot beshame‘am ki nilkham yhvh ‘im ’oybei yisra’el. vatishqot malkhut yehoshafat vayanakh lo ’elohav misabib. vayimlokh yehoshafat ‘al yehudah ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve‘esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘azubah bat shilkhi. vayeilekh bederekh ’abiv ’asa velo sar mimenah la‘asot hayashar be‘einei yhvh. ’akh habamot lo saru ve‘od ha‘am lo heikhinu lebabam leilohei ’aboteihem. veyeter dibrei yehoshafat harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketubim bedibrei yeihu ben khanani ’asher ho‘alah ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el. ve’akhareikhen ’etkhabar yehoshafat melekh yehudah ‘im ’akhazyah melekh yisra’el hu hirshia‘ la‘asot. vaykhabereihu ‘imo la‘asot ’oniyot lalekhet tarshish vaya‘asu ’oniyot be‘etsyon gaber. vayitnabei ’eli‘ezer ben dodavahu mimareishah ‘al yehoshafat leimor kehitkhaberkha ‘im ’akhazyahu parats yhvh ’et ma‘asekha vayishaberu ’oniyot velo ‘atseru lalekhet ’el tarshish. vayishkab yehoshafat ‘im ’abotav vayiqaber ‘im ’abotav be‘ir david vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. velo ’akhim benei yehoshafat ‘azaryah vikhi’el uzekharyahu va‘azaryahu umikha’el ushefatyahu kal ’eleh benei yehoshafat melekh yisra’el. vayiten lahem ’abihem matanot rabot lekhesef ulezahab ulemigdanot ‘im ‘arei metsurot bihudah ve’et hamamlakhah natan lihoram ki hu habekhor. vayaqam yehoram ‘al mamlekhat ’abiv vayitkhazaq vayaharog ’et kal ’ekhav bekhareb vegam misarei yisra’el. ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah yehoram bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim. vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el ka’asher ‘asu bet ’akh’ab ki bat ’akh’ab hayetah lo ’ishah vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh. velo ’abah yhvh lehashkhit ’et bet david lema‘an haberit ’asher karat ledavid vekha’asher ’amar latet lo nir ulebanav kal hayamim. beyamav pasha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu ‘aleihem melekh. vaya‘abor yehoram ‘im sarav vekhal harekheb ‘imo vayhi qam laylah vayakh ’et ’edom hasobeb ’eilav ve’et sarei harakheb. vayifsha‘ ’edom mitakhat yad yehudah ‘ad hayom hazeh ’az tifsha‘ libnah ba‘et hahi mitakhat yado ki ‘azab ’et yhvh ’elohei ’abotav. gam hu ‘asah bamot beharei yehudah vayezen ’et yoshebei yerushalim vayadakh ’et yehudah. vayabo ’eilav mikhtab mei’eiliyahu hanabi leimor koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei david ’abikha takhat ’asher lo halakhta bedarkhei yehoshafat ’abikha ubedarkhei ’asa melekh yehudah. vateilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’el vatazneh ’et yehudah ve’et yoshebei yerushalim kehaznot bet ’akh’ab vegam ’et ’akhekha bet ’abikha hatobim mimekha harageta. hineh yhvh nogef mageifah gedolah be‘amekha ubebanekha ubenashekha ubekhal rekhushekha. ve’atah bakholayim rabim bemakhaleh mei‘ekha ‘ad yeitse’u mei‘ekha min hakholi yamim ‘al yamim. vaya‘ar yhvh ‘al yehoram ’et ruakh hapelishtim veha‘arbim ’asher ‘al yad kushim. vaya‘alu bihudah vayibqa‘uha vayishbu ’et kal harekhush hanimtsa lebet hamelekh vegam banav venashav velo nish’ar lo ben ki ’im yeho’akhaz qeton banav. ve’akharei kal zot negafo yhvh bemei‘av lakholi le’en marpei. vayhi leyamim miyamim ukhe‘et tset haqets leyamim shenayim yatse’u mei‘av ‘im khaleyo vayamat betakhalu’im ra‘im velo ‘asu lo ‘amo sereifah kisreifat ’abotav. ben sheloshim ushetayim hayah bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim vayeilekh belo khemdah vayiqberuhu be‘ir david velo beqibrot hamelakhim. vayamlikhu yoshebei yerushalim ’et ’akhazyahu beno haqaton takhtav ki khal harishonim harag hagedud haba ba‘arbim lamakhaneh vayimlokh ’akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah. ben ’arba‘im ushetayim shanah ’akhazyahu bemalekho veshanah ’akhat malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ‘atalyahu bat ‘ameri. gam hu halakh bedarkhei bet ’akh’ab ki ’imo hayetah yo‘atsto leharshia‘. vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh kebet ’akh’ab ki hemah hayu lo yo‘atsim ’akharei mot ’abiv lemashkhit lo. gam ba‘atsatam halakh vayeilekh ’et yehoram ben ’akh’ab melekh yisra’el lamilkhamah ‘al khaza’el melekh ’aram beramot gil‘ad vayaku haramim ’et yoram. vayashab lehitrapei beyizre‘el ki hamakim ’asher hikuhu baramah behilakhamo ’et khazah’el melekh ’aram va‘azaryahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir’ot ’et yehoram ben ’akh’ab beyizre‘el ki kholeh hu. umei’elohim hayetah tebusat ’akhazyahu labo ’el yoram ubebo’o yatsa ‘im yehoram ’el yeihu ben nimshi ’asher meshakho yhvh lehakhrit ’et bet ’akh’ab. vayhi kehishafet yeihu ‘im bet ’akh’ab vayimtsa ’et sarei yehudah ubenei ’akhei ’akhazyahu mesharetim la’akhazyahu vayahargem. vaybaqesh ’et ’akhazyahu vayilkeduhu vehu mitkhabei beshomeron vaybi’uhu ’el yeihu vaymituhu vayiqberuhu ki ’ameru ben yehoshafat hu ’asher darash ’et yhvh bekhal lebabo ve’en lebet ’akhazyahu la‘tsor koakh lemamlakhah. va‘atalyahu ’em ’akhazyahu ra’atah ki met benah vataqam vatedaber ’et kal zera‘ hamamlakhah lebet yehudah. vatiqakh yehoshab‘at bat hamelekh ’et yo’ash ben ’akhazyahu vatignob ’oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamumatim vatiten ’oto ve’et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vatastireihu yehoshab‘at bat hamelekh yehoram ’eishet yehoyada‘ hakohen ki hi hayetah ’akhot ’akhazyahu mipenei ‘atalyahu velo hemitatehu. vayhi ’itam bebet ha’elohim mitkhabei shesh shanim va‘atalyah molekhet ‘al ha’arets. ubashanah hashebi‘it hitkhazaq yehoyada‘ vayiqakh ’et sarei hamei’ot la‘azaryahu ben yerokham uleyishma‘el ben yehokhanan vela‘azaryahu ben ‘obed ve’et ma‘aseiyahu ben ‘adayahu ve’et ’elishafat ben zikhri ‘imo baberit. vayasobu bihudah vayiqbetsu ’et halviyim mikal ‘arei yehudah verashei ha’abot leyisra’el vayabo’u ’el yerushalim. vayikhrot kal haqahal berit bebet ha’elohim ‘im hamelekh vayomer lahem hineh ben hamelekh yimlokh ka’asher diber yhvh ‘al benei david. zeh hadabar ’asher ta‘asu hashelishit mikem ba’ei hashabat lakohanim velalviyim lesho‘arei hasipim. vehashelishit bebet hamelekh vehashelishit besha‘ar haysod vekhal ha‘am bekhatsrot bet yhvh. ve’al yabo bet yhvh ki ’im hakohanim vehamsharetim lalviyim hemah yabo’u ki qodesh hemah vekhal ha‘am yishmeru mishmeret yhvh. vehiqifu halviyim ’et hamelekh sabib ’ish vekheilav beyado vehaba ’el habayit yumat vihyu ’et hamelekh bebo’o ubetseito. vaya‘asu halviyim vekhal yehudah kekhol ’asher tsivah yehoyada‘ hakohen vayiqkhu ’ish ’et ’anashav ba’ei hashabat ‘im yots’ei hashabat ki lo fatar yehoyada‘ hakohen ’et hamakhleqot. vayiten yehoyada‘ hakohen lesarei hamei’ot ’et hakhanitim ve’et hamaginot ve’et hashelatim ’asher lamelekh david ’asher bet ha’elohim. vaya‘amed ’et kal ha‘am ve’ish shilkho beyado miketef habayit haymanit ‘ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit ‘al hamelekh sabib. vayotsi’u ’et ben hamelekh vayitenu ‘alav ’et haneizer ve’et ha‘eidut vayamlikhu ’oto vayimshakhuhu yehoyada‘ ubanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. vatishma‘ ‘atalyahu ’et qol ha‘am haratsim vehamhalim ’et hamelekh vatabo ’el ha‘am bet yhvh. vateire vehineh hamelekh ‘omed ‘al ‘amudo bamabo vehasarim vehakhatsotserot ‘al hamelekh vekhal ‘am ha’arets sameiakh vetoqeia‘ bakhatsotserot vehamshorarim bikhlei hashir umodi‘im lehalel vatiqra‘ ‘atalyahu ’et begadeha vatomer qesher qasher. vayotsei yehoyada‘ hakohen ’et sarei hamei’ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer ’aleihem hotsi’uha ’el mibet hasedeirot vehaba ’akhareha yumat bekhareb ki ’amar hakohen lo temituha bet yhvh. vayasimu lah yadayim vatabo ’el mebo sha‘ar hasusim bet hamelekh vaymituha sham. vayikhrot yehoyada‘ berit beino uben kal ha‘am uben hamelekh lihyot le‘am yhvh. vayabo’u khal ha‘am bet haba‘al vayitetsuhu ve’et mizbekhotav ve’et tselamav shibeiru ve’et matan kohen haba‘al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot. vayasem yehoyada‘ pequdot bet yhvh beyad hakohanim halviyim ’asher khalaq david ‘al bet yhvh leha‘alot ‘olot yhvh kakatub betorat mosheh besimkhah ubeshir ‘al yedei david. vaya‘amed hasho‘arim ‘al sha‘arei bet yhvh velo yabo tamei lekhal dabar. vayiqakh ’et sarei hamei’ot ve’et ha’adirim ve’et hamoshelim ba‘am ve’et kal ‘am ha’arets vayored ’et hamelekh mibet yhvh vayabo’u betokh sha‘ar ha‘elyon bet hamelekh vayoshibu ’et hamelekh ‘al kisei hamamlakhah. vayismekhu khal ‘am ha’arets veha‘ir shaqatah ve’et ‘atalyahu heimitu bekhareb. ben sheba‘ shanim yo’ash bemalekho ve’arba‘im shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo tsibyah mibe’er shaba‘. vaya‘as yo’ash hayashar be‘einei yhvh kal yemei yehoyada‘ hakohen. vayisa lo yehoyada‘ nashim shetayim vayoled banim ubanot. vayhi ’akhareikhen hayah ‘im leb yo’ash lekhadesh ’et bet yhvh. vayiqbots ’et hakohanim vehalviyim vayomer lahem tse’u le‘arei yehudah veqibtsu mikal yisra’el kesef lekhazeq ’et bet ’eloheikhem midei shanah beshanah ve’atem temaharu ladabar velo miharu halviyim. vayiqra hamelekh lihoyada‘ harosh vayomer lo madua‘ lo darashta ‘al halviyim lehabi mihudah umirushalim ’et mas’at mosheh ‘ebed yhvh vehaqahal leyisra’el le’ohel ha‘eidut. ki ‘atalyahu hamirsha‘at baneha faretsu ’et bet ha’elohim vegam kal qadeshei bet yhvh ‘asu labe‘alim. vayomer hamelekh vaya‘asu ’aron ’ekhad vayitenuhu besha‘ar bet yhvh khutsah. vayitenu qol bihudah ubirushalim lehabi yhvh mas’at mosheh ‘ebed ha’elohim ‘al yisra’el bamidbar. vayismekhu khal hasarim vekhal ha‘am vayabi’u vayashlikhu la’aron ‘ad lekhaleh. vayhi be‘et yabi ’et ha’aron ’el pequdat hamelekh beyad halviyim vekhir’otam ki rab hakesef uba sofer hamelekh ufeqid kohen harosh vi‘aru ’et ha’aron veyisa’uhu vishibuhu ’el meqomo koh ‘asu leyom beyom vaya’asfu khesef larob. vayiteneihu hamelekh vihoyada‘ ’el ‘oseh melekhet ‘abodat bet yhvh vayihyu sokherim khotsebim vekharashim lekhadesh bet yhvh vegam lekharashei barzel unekhoshet lekhazeq ’et bet yhvh. vaya‘asu ‘osei hamelakhah vata‘al ’arukhah lamelakhah beyadam vaya‘amidu ’et bet ha’elohim ‘al matkunto vai’ametsuhu. ukhekhalotam heibi’u lifnei hamelekh vihoyada‘ ’et she’ar hakesef vaya‘aseihu kheilim lebet yhvh kelei sharet veha‘alot vekhapot ukhelei zahab vakhasef vayihyu ma‘alim ‘olot bebet yhvh tamid kol yemei yehoyada‘. vayizqan yehoyada‘ vayisba‘ yamim vayamot ben mei’ah usheloshim shanah bemoto. vayiqberuhu be‘ir david ‘im hamelakhim ki ‘asah tobah beyisra’el ve‘im ha’elohim ubeito. ve’akharei mot yehoyada‘ ba’u sarei yehudah vayishtakhavu lamelekh ’az shama‘ hamelekh ’aleihem. vaya‘azbu ’et bet yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem vaya‘abdu ’et ha’asheirim ve’et ha‘atsabim vayhi qetsef ‘al yehudah virushalim be’ashmatam zot. vayishlakh bahem nebi’im lahashibam ’el yhvh vaya‘idu bam velo he’ezinu. veruakh ’elohim labeshah ’et zekharyah ben yehoyada‘ hakohen vaya‘amod mei‘al la‘am vayomer lahem koh ’amar ha’elohim lamah ’atem ‘oberim ’et mitsvot yhvh velo tatslikhu ki ‘azabtem ’et yhvh vaya‘azob ’etkhem. vayiqsheru ‘alav vayirgemuhu ’eben bemitsvat hamelekh bakhatsar bet yhvh. velo zakhar yo’ash hamelekh hakhesed ’asher ‘asah yehoyada‘ ’abiv ‘imo vayaharog ’et beno ukhemoto ’amar yeire yhvh veyidrosh. vayhi litqufat hashanah ‘alah ‘alav khel ’aram vayabo’u ’el yehudah virushalim vayashkhitu ’et kal sarei ha‘am mei‘am vekhal shelalam shilekhu lemelekh darmaseq. ki bemits‘ar ’anashim ba’u khel ’aram yhvh natan beyadam khayil larob me’od ki ‘azebu ’et yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem ve’et yo’ash ‘asu shefatim. ubelekhtam mimenu ki ‘azebu ’oto bemakhaliyim bemakhaluyim rabim hitqasheru ‘alav ‘abadav bidmei benei yehoyada‘ hakohen vayaharguhu ‘al mitato vayamot vayiqberuhu be‘ir david velo qebaruhu beqibrot hamelakhim. ve’eleh hamitqasherim ‘alav zabad ben shim‘at ha‘amonit vihozabad ben shimrit hamo’abit. ubanav verob yireb hamasa ‘alav visod bet ha’elohim hinam ketubim ‘al midrash seifer hamelakhim vayimlokh ’amatsyahu beno takhtav. ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh ’amatsyahu ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yeho‘adan mirushalayim. vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhvh raq lo beleibab shalem. vayhi ka’asher khazeqah hamamlakhah ‘alav vayaharog ’et ‘abadav hamakim ’et hamelekh ’abiv. ve’et beneihem lo heimit ki khakatub batorah beseifer mosheh ’asher tsivah yhvh leimor lo yamutu ’abot ‘al banim ubanim lo yamutu ‘al ’abot ki ’ish bekhet’o yamutu. vayiqbots ’amatsyahu ’et yehudah vaya‘amidem lebet ’abot lesarei ha’alafim ulesarei hamei’ot lekhal yehudah ubinyamin vayifqedem lemiben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah vayimtsa’em shelosh mei’ot ’elef bakhur yotsei tsaba ’okhez romakh vetsinah. vayiskor miyisra’el mei’ah ’elef gibor khayil bemei’ah khikar kasef. ve’ish ha’elohim ba ’eilav leimor hamelekh ’al yabo ‘imekha tseba yisra’el ki ’en yhvh ‘im yisra’el kol benei ’efrayim. ki ’im bo ’atah ‘aseh khazaq lamilkhamah yakhshilekha ha’elohim lifnei ’oyeb ki yesh koakh beilohim la‘zor ulehakhshil. vayomer ’amatsyahu le’ish ha’elohim umah la‘asot lim’at hakikar ’asher natati ligdud yisra’el vayomer ’ish ha’elohim yesh yhvh latet lekha harbeh mizeh. vayabdilem ’amatsyahu lehagedud ’asher ba ’eilav mei’efrayim lalekhet limqomam vayikhar ’apam me’od bihudah vayashubu limqomam bakhori ’af. va’amatsyahu hitkhazaq vayinhag ’et ‘amo vayeilekh gei hamelakh vayakh ’et benei sei‘ir ‘aseret ’alafim. va‘aseret ’alafim khayim shabu benei yehudah vaybi’um lerosh hasala‘ vayashlikhum meirosh hasela‘ vekhulam nibqa‘u. ubenei hagedud ’asher heishib ’amatsyahu milekhet ‘imo lamilkhamah vayifshetu be‘arei yehudah mishomeron ve‘ad bet khoron vayaku meihem sheloshet ’alafim vayabozu bizah rabah. vayhi ’akharei bo ’amatsyahu meihakot ’et ’adomim vayabei ’et ’elohei benei sei‘ir vaya‘amidem lo leilohim velifneihem yishtakhaveh velahem yeqater. vayikhar ’af yhvh ba’amatsyahu vayishlakh ’eilav nabi vayomer lo lamah darashta ’et ’elohei ha‘am ’asher lo hitsilu ’et ‘amam miyadekha. vayhi bedabero ’eilav vayomer lo halyo‘ets lamelekh netanukha khadal lekha lamah yakukha vayekhdal hanabi vayomer yada‘ti ki ya‘ats ’elohim lehashkhitekha ki ‘asita zot velo shama‘ta la‘atsati. vayiva‘ats ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah vayishlakh ’el yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra’el leimor lekha lekhah nitra’eh fanim. vayishlakh yo’ash melekh yisra’el ’el ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh ’asher balebanon lakh ’el ha’erez ’asher balebanon leimor tenah ’et bitekha libni le’ishah vata‘abor khayat hasadeh ’asher balebanon vatirmos ’et hakhoakh. ’amarta hineh hikita ’et ’edom unesa’akha libekha lehakhbid ‘atah shebah bebeitekha lamah titgareh bera‘ah venafalta ’atah vihudah ‘imakh. velo shama‘ ’amatsyahu ki meiha’elohim hi lema‘an titam beyad ki dareshu ’et ’elohei ’edom. vaya‘al yo’ash melekh yisra’el vayitra’u fanim hu va’amatsyahu melekh yehudah bebet shemesh ’asher lihudah. vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra’el vayanusu ’ish le’ohalav. ve’et ’amatsyahu melekh yehudah ben yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz tafas yo’ash melekh yisra’el bebet shamesh vaybi’eihu yerushalim vayifrots bekhomat yerushalim misha‘ar ’efrayim ‘ad sha‘ar haponeh ’arba‘ mei’ot ’amah. vekhal hazahab vehakesef ve’et kal hakeilim hanimtse’im bebet ha’elohim ‘im ‘obed ’edom ve’et ’otserot bet hamelekh ve’et benei hata‘arubot vayashab shomeron. vaykhi ’amatsyahu ben yo’ash melekh yehudah ’akharei mot yo’ash ben yeho’akhaz melekh yisra’el khamesh ‘esreh shanah. veyeter dibrei ’amatsyahu harishonim veha’akharonim halo hinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. umei‘et ’asher sar ’amatsyahu mei’akharei yhvh vayiqsheru ‘alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu ’akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. vayisa’uhu ‘al hasusim vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’abotav be‘ir yehudah. vayiqkhu kal ‘am yehudah ’et ‘uziyahu vehu ben shesh ‘esreh shanah vayamlikhu ’oto takhat ’abiv ’amatsyahu. hu banah ’et ’eilot vayshibeha lihudah ’akharei shekhab hamelekh ‘im ’abotav. ben shesh ‘esreh shanah ‘uziyahu bemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yekhileyah yekhaleyah min yerushalim. vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhvh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’amatsyahu ’abiv. vayhi lidrosh ’elohim bimei zekharyahu hameibin bir’ot ha’elohim ubimei daresho ’et yhvh hitslikho ha’elohim. vayeitsei vayilakhem bapelishtim vayifrots ’et khomat gat ve’et khomat yabneh ve’et khomat ’ashdod vayibneh ‘arim be’ashdod ubapelishtim. vaya‘zereihu ha’elohim ‘al pelishtim ve‘al ha‘arbiyim ha‘arbim hayoshebim begur ba‘al vehame‘unim. vayitenu ha‘amonim minkhah le‘uziyahu vayeilekh shemo ‘ad lebo mitsrayim ki hekheziq ‘ad lema‘elah. vayiben ‘uziyahu migdalim birushalim ‘al sha‘ar hapinah ve‘al sha‘ar hagai ve‘al hamiqtsoa‘ vaykhazeqem. vayiben migdalim bamidbar vayakhtsob borot rabim ki miqneh rab hayah lo ubashefeilah ubamishor ’ikarim vekhoremim beharim ubakarmel ki ’oheb ’adamah hayah. vayhi le‘uziyahu khayil ‘oseh milkhamah yots’ei tsaba ligdud bemispar pequdatam beyad ye‘u’el ye‘i’el hasofer uma‘aseiyahu hashoter ‘al yad khananyahu misarei hamelekh. kol mispar rashei ha’abot legiborei khayil ’alpayim veshesh mei’ot. ve‘al yadam khel tsaba shelosh mei’ot ’elef veshib‘at ’alafim vakhamesh mei’ot ‘osei milkhamah bekhoakh khayil la‘zor lamelekh ‘al ha’oyeb. vayakhen lahem ‘uziyahu lekhal hatsaba maginim uremakhim vekhoba‘im veshiryonot uqeshatot ule’abnei qela‘im. vaya‘as birushalim khishebonot makhashebet khosheb lihyot ‘al hamigdalim ve‘al hapinot liro bakhitsim uba’abanim gedolot vayeitsei shemo ‘ad lemeirakhoq ki hifli lehei‘azer ‘ad ki khazaq. ukhekhezqato gabah libo ‘ad lehashkhit vayim‘al yhvh ’elohav vayabo ’el heikhal yhvh lehaqtir ‘al mizbakh haqetoret. vayabo ’akharav ‘azaryahu hakohen ve‘imo kohanim yhvh shemonim benei khayil. vaya‘amdu ‘al ‘uziyahu hamelekh vayomeru lo lo lekha ‘uziyahu lehaqtir yhvh ki lakohanim benei ’aharon hamqudashim lehaqtir tsei min hamiqdash ki ma‘alta velo lekha lekhabod yhvh ’elohim. vayiz‘af ‘uziyahu ubeyado miqteret lehaqtir ubeza‘po ‘im hakohanim vehatsara‘at zarekhah bemitskho lifnei hakohanim bebet yhvh mei‘al lemizbakh haqetoret. vayifen ’eilav ‘azaryahu khohen harosh vekhal hakohanim vehineh hu metsora‘ bemitskho vayabhiluhu misham vegam hu nidkhaf latset ki nige‘o yhvh. vayhi ‘uziyahu hamelekh metsora‘ ‘ad yom moto vayeisheb bet hakhafeshut hakhafeshit metsora‘ ki nigzar mibet yhvh veyotam beno ‘al bet hamelekh shofet ’et ‘am ha’arets. veyeter dibrei ‘uziyahu harishonim veha’akharonim katab yesha‘yahu ben ’amots hanabi. vayishkab ‘uziyahu ‘im ’abotav vayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’abotav bisdeh haqeburah ’asher lamelakhim ki ’ameru metsora‘ hu vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah yotam bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo yerushah bat tsadoq. vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhvh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ‘uziyahu ’abiv raq lo ba ’el heikhal yhvh ve‘od ha‘am mashkhitim. hu banah ’et sha‘ar bet yhvh ha‘elyon ubekhomat ha‘ofel banah larob. ve‘arim banah behar yehudah ubekhorashim banah biraniyot umigdalim. vehu nilkham ‘im melekh benei ‘amon vayekhezaq ‘aleihem vayitenu lo benei ‘amon bashanah hahi mei’ah kikar kesef va‘aseret ’alafim korim khitim use‘orim ‘aseret ’alafim zot heishibu lo benei ‘amon ubashanah hasheinit vehashelishit. vayitkhazeq yotam ki heikhin derakhav lifnei yhvh ’elohav. veyeter dibrei yotam vekhal milkhamotav uderakhav hinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah. ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim. vayishkab yotam ‘im ’abotav vayiqberu ’oto be‘ir david vayimlokh ’akhaz beno takhtav. ben ‘esrim shanah ’akhaz bemalekho veshesh ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo ‘asah hayashar be‘einei yhvh kedavid ’abiv. vayeilekh bedarkhei malkhei yisra’el vegam maseikhot ‘asah labe‘alim. vehu hiqtir begei ben hinom vayab‘er ’et banav ba’esh keto‘abot hagoyim ’asher horish hashem mipenei benei yisra’el. vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve‘al hageba‘ot vetakhat kal ‘ets ra‘anan. vayiteneihu yhvh ’elohav beyad melekh ’aram vayaku bo vayishbu mimenu shibyah gedolah vayabi’u darmaseq vegam beyad melekh yisra’el nitan vayakh bo makah gedolah. vayaharog peqakh ben remalyahu bihudah mei’ah ve‘esrim ’elef beyom ’ekhad hakol benei khayil be‘azebam ’et yhvh ’elohei ’abotam. vayaharog zikhri gibor ’efrayim ’et ma‘aseiyahu ben hamelekh ve’et ‘azriqam negid habayit ve’et ’elqanah mishneh hamelekh. vayishbu benei yisra’el mei’akheihem matayim ’elef nashim banim ubanot vegam shalal rab bazezu meihem vayabi’u ’et hashalal leshomeron. vesham hayah nabi yhvh ‘oded shemo vayeitsei lifnei hatsaba haba leshomeron vayomer lahem hineh bakhamat yhvh ’elohei ’aboteikhem ‘al yehudah netanam beyedkhem vatahargu bam beza‘af ‘ad lashamayim higia‘. ve‘atah benei yehudah virushalim ’atem ’omerim likhbosh la‘abadim velishfakhot lakhem halo raq ’atem ‘imakhem ’ashamot yhvh ’eloheikhem. ve‘atah shema‘uni vehashibu hashibyah ’asher shebitem mei’akheikhem ki kharon ’af yhvh ‘aleikhem. vayaqumu ’anashim meirashei benei ’efrayim ‘azaryahu ben yehokhanan berekhyahu ben meshileimot vikhizqiyahu ben shalum va‘amasa ben khadlai ‘al haba’im min hatsaba. vayomeru lahem lo tabi’u ’et hashibyah henah ki le’ashmat yhvh ‘aleinu ’atem ’omerim lehosif ‘al khatoteinu ve‘al ’ashmateinu ki rabah ’ashmah lanu vakharon ’af ‘al yisra’el. vaya‘azob hekhaluts ’et hashibyah ve’et habizah lifnei hasarim vekhal haqahal. vayaqumu ha’anashim ’asher niqebu besheimot vayakhaziqu bashibyah vekhal ma‘arumeihem hilbishu min hashalal vayalbishum vayan‘ilum vaya’akhilum vayashqum vaysukhum vaynahalum bakhamorim lekhal koshel vaybi’um yereikho ‘ir hatemarim ’eitsel ’akheihem vayashubu shomeron. ba‘et hahi shalakh hamelekh ’akhaz ‘al malkhei ’ashur la‘zor lo. ve‘od ’adomim ba’u vayaku bihudah vayishbu shebi. ufelishtim pashetu be‘arei hashefeilah vehanegeb lihudah vayilkedu ’et bet shemesh ve’et ’ayalon ve’et hagedeirot ve’et sokho ubenoteha ve’et timnah ubenoteha ve’et gimzo ve’et benoteha vayeishebu sham. ki hikhnia‘ yhvh ’et yehudah ba‘abur ’akhaz melekh yisra’el ki hifria‘ bihudah uma‘ol ma‘al yhvh. vayabo ‘alav tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur vayatsar lo velo khazaqo. ki khalaq ’akhaz ’et bet yhvh ve’et bet hamelekh vehasarim vayiten lemelekh ’ashur velo le‘ezrah lo. ube‘et hatser lo vayosef lim‘ol yhvh hu hamelekh ’akhaz. vayizbakh leilohei darmeseq hamakim bo vayomer ki ’elohei malkhei ’aram hem ma‘zerim ’otam lahem ’azabeiakh veya‘zeruni vehem hayu lo lehakhshilo ulekhal yisra’el. vaye’esof ’akhaz ’et kelei bet ha’elohim vayqatsets ’et kelei bet ha’elohim vayisgor ’et daltot bet yhvh vaya‘as lo mizbekhot bekhal pinah birushalim. ubekhal ‘ir va‘ir lihudah ‘asah bamot leqater leilohim ’akheirim vayakh‘es ’et yhvh ’elohei ’abotav. veyeter debarav vekhal derakhav harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. vayishkab ’akhaz ‘im ’abotav vayiqberuhu ba‘ir birushalim ki lo hebi’uhu leqibrei malkhei yisra’el vayimlokh yekhizqiyahu beno takhtav. yekhizqiyahu malakh ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah ve‘esrim vateisha‘ shanah malakh birushalim veshem ’imo ’abiyah bat zekharyahu. vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhvh kekhol ’asher ‘asah david ’abiv. hu bashanah harishonah lemalekho bakhodesh harishon patakh ’et daltot bet yhvh vaykhazeqem. vayabei ’et hakohanim ve’et halviyim vaya’asfem lirkhob hamizrakh. vayomer lahem shema‘uni halviyim ‘atah hitqadeshu veqadeshu ’et bet yhvh ’elohei ’aboteikhem vehotsi’u ’et hanidah min haqodesh. ki ma‘alu ’aboteinu ve‘asu hara‘ be‘einei yhvh ’eloheinu vaya‘azbuhu vayasebu feneihem mimishkan yhvh vayitenu ‘oref. gam sageru daltot ha’ulam vaykhabu ’et haneirot uqetoret lo hiqtiru ve‘olah lo he‘elu baqodesh leilohei yisra’el. vayhi qetsef yhvh ‘al yehudah virushalim vayitenem lizva‘ah leza‘avah leshamah velishreiqah ka’asher ’atem ro’im be‘eineikhem. vehineh nafelu ’aboteinu bekhareb ubaneinu ubenoteinu venasheinu bashebi ‘al zot. ‘atah ‘im lebabi likhrot berit yhvh ’elohei yisra’el veyashob mimenu kharon ’apo. banai ‘atah ’al tishalu ki bakhem bakhar yhvh la‘amod lefanav leshareto velihyot lo mesharetim umaqtirim. vayaqumu halviyim makhat ben ‘amasai veyo’el ben ‘azaryahu min benei haqehati umin benei merari qish ben ‘abdi va‘azaryahu ben yehalel’el umin hageireshuni yo’akh ben zimah ve‘eiden ben yo’akh. umin benei ’elitsafan shimri vi‘u’el vi‘i’el umin benei ’asaf zekharyahu umatanyahu. umin benei heiman yekhu’el yekhi’el veshim‘i umin benei yedutun shema‘yah ve‘uzi’el. vaya’asfu ’et ’akheihem vayitqadeshu vayabo’u khemitsvat hamelekh bedibrei yhvh letaher bet yhvh. vayabo’u hakohanim lifnimah bet yhvh letaher vayotsi’u ’et kal hatum’ah ’asher matse’u beheikhal yhvh lakhatsar bet yhvh vayqabelu halviyim lehotsi lenakhal qidron khutsah. vayakhelu be’ekhad lakhodesh harishon leqadesh ubeyom shemonah lakhodesh ba’u le’ulam yhvh vayqadeshu ’et bet yhvh leyamim shemonah ubeyom shishah ‘asar lakhodesh harishon kilu. vayabo’u fenimah ’el khizqiyahu hamelekh vayomeru tiharnu ’et kal bet yhvh ’et mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal keilav ve’et shulkhan hama‘arekhet ve’et kal keilav. ve’et kal hakeilim ’asher hizniakh hamelekh ’akhaz bemalkhuto bema‘alo heikhanu vehiqdashenu vehinam lifnei mizbakh yhvh. vayashkem yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vaye’esof ’et sarei ha‘ir vaya‘al bet yhvh. vayabi’u farim shib‘ah ve’eilim shib‘ah ukhebasim shib‘ah utsefirei ‘izim shib‘ah lekhatat ‘al hamamlakhah ve‘al hamiqdash ve‘al yehudah vayomer libnei ’aharon hakohanim leha‘alot ‘al mizbakh yhvh. vayishkhatu habaqar vayqabelu hakohanim ’et hadam vayizrequ hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu ha’eilim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu hakebasim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah. vayagishu ’et se‘irei hakhatat lifnei hamelekh vehaqahal vayismekhu yedeihem ‘aleihem. vayishkhatum hakohanim vaykhate’u ’et damam hamizbeikhah lekhaper ‘al kal yisra’el ki lekhal yisra’el ’amar hamelekh ha‘olah vehakhatat. vaya‘amed ’et halviyim bet yhvh bimtsiltayim binbalim ubekhinorot bemitsvat david vegad khozeh hamelekh venatan hanabi ki beyad yhvh hamitsvah beyad nebi’av. vaya‘amdu halviyim bikhlei david vehakohanim bakhatsotserot. vayomer khizqiyahu leha‘alot ha‘olah lehamizbeiakh ube‘et heikhel ha‘olah heikhel shir yhvh vehakhatsotserot ve‘al yedei kelei david melekh yisra’el. vekhal haqahal mishtakhavim vehashir meshorer vehakhatsotserot makhatsotserim makhtserim hakol ‘ad likhlot ha‘olah. ukhekhalot leha‘alot kare‘u hamelekh vekhal hanimtse’im ’ito vayishtakhavu. vayomer yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vehasarim lalviyim lehalel yhvh bedibrei david ve’asaf hakhozeh vayhalu ‘ad lesimkhah vayiqedu vayishtakhavu. vaya‘an yekhizqiyahu vayomer ‘atah mileitem yedkhem yhvh goshu vehabi’u zebakhim vetodot lebet yhvh vayabi’u haqahal zebakhim vetodot vekhal nedib leb ‘olot. vayhi mispar ha‘olah ’asher heibi’u haqahal baqar shib‘im ’eilim mei’ah kebasim matayim le‘olah yhvh kal ’eleh. vehaqodashim baqar shesh mei’ot vetson sheloshet ’alafim. raq hakohanim hayu lim‘at velo yakhelu lehafshit ’et kal ha‘olot vayekhazequm ’akheihem halviyim ‘ad kelot hamelakhah ve‘ad yitqadeshu hakohanim ki halviyim yishrei leibab lehitqadesh meihakohanim. vegam ‘olah larob bekhelbei hashelamim ubanesakhim la‘olah vatikon ‘abodat bet yhvh. vayismakh yekhizqiyahu vekhal ha‘am ‘al haheikhin ha’elohim la‘am ki befit’om hayah hadabar. vayishlakh yekhizqiyahu ‘al kal yisra’el vihudah vegam ’igerot katab ‘al ’efrayim umenasheh labo lebet yhvh birushalim la‘asot pesakh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. vayiva‘ats hamelekh vesarav vekhal haqahal birushalim la‘asot hapesakh bakhodesh hasheini. ki lo yakhelu la‘asoto ba‘et hahi ki hakohanim lo hitqadeshu lemadai veha‘am lo ne’esfu lirushalim. vayishar hadabar be‘einei hamelekh ube‘einei kal haqahal. vaya‘amidu dabar leha‘abir qol bekhal yisra’el mibe’er sheba‘ ve‘ad dan labo la‘asot pesakh yhvh ’elohei yisra’el birushalim ki lo larob ‘asu kakatub. vayeilekhu haratsim ba’igerot miyad hamelekh vesarav bekhal yisra’el vihudah ukhemitsvat hamelekh leimor benei yisra’el shubu ’el yhvh ’elohei ’abraham yitskhaq veyisra’el veyashob ’el hapeleitah hanish’eret lakhem mikaf malkhei ’ashur. ve’al tihyu ka’aboteikhem vekha’akheikhem ’asher ma‘alu yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem vayitenem leshamah ka’asher ’atem ro’im. ‘atah ’al taqshu ‘arepekhem ka’aboteikhem tenu yad yhvh ubo’u lemiqdasho ’asher hiqdish le‘olam ve‘ibdu ’et yhvh ’eloheikhem veyashob mikem kharon ’apo. ki beshubekhem ‘al yhvh ’akheikhem ubeneikhem lerakhamim lifnei shobeihem velashub la’arets hazot ki khanun verakhum yhvh ’eloheikhem velo yasir panim mikem ’im tashubu ’eilav. vayihyu haratsim ‘oberim mei‘ir la‘ir be’erets ’efrayim umenasheh ve‘ad zebulun vayihyu maskhiqim ‘aleihem umal‘igim bam. ’akh ’anashim mei’asher umenasheh umizebulun nikhne‘u vayabo’u lirushalim. gam bihudah hayetah yad ha’elohim latet lahem leb ’ekhad la‘asot mitsvat hamelekh vehasarim bidbar yhvh. vayei’asefu yerushalim ‘am rab la‘asot ’et khag hamatsot bakhodesh hasheini qahal larob me’od. vayaqumu vayasiru ’et hamizbekhot ’asher birushalim ve’et kal hamqaterot heisiru vayashlikhu lenakhal qidron. vayishkhatu hapesakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh hasheini vehakohanim vehalviyim nikhlemu vayitqadeshu vayabi’u ‘olot bet yhvh. vaya‘amdu ‘al ‘amedam kemishpatam ketorat mosheh ’ish ha’elohim hakohanim zoreqim ’et hadam miyad halviyim. ki rabat baqahal ’asher lo hitqadashu vehalviyim ‘al shekhitat hapesakhim lekhol lo tahor lehaqdish yhvh. ki marbit ha‘am rabat mei’efrayim umenasheh yisashkhar uzebulun lo hiteharu ki ’akhelu ’et hapesakh belo khakatub ki hitpalel yekhizqiyahu ‘aleihem leimor yhvh hatob yekhaper be‘ad. kal lebabo heikhin lidrosh ha’elohim yhvh ’elohei ’abotav velo ketahorat haqodesh. vayishma‘ yhvh ’el yekhizqiyahu vayirpa ’et ha‘am. vaya‘asu benei yisra’el hanimtse’im birushalim ’et khag hamatsot shib‘at yamim besimkhah gedolah umehalim yhvh yom beyom halviyim vehakohanim bikhlei ‘oz yhvh. vaydaber yekhizqiyahu ‘al leb kal halviyim hamaskilim seikhel tob yhvh vayokhelu ’et hamo‘ed shib‘at hayamim mezabekhim zibkhei shelamim umitvadim yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem. vayiva‘atsu kal haqahal la‘asot shib‘at yamim ’akheirim vaya‘asu shib‘at yamim simkhah. ki khizqiyahu melekh yehudah heirim laqahal ’elef parim veshib‘at ’alafim tson vehasarim heirimu laqahal parim ’elef vetson ‘aseret ’alafim vayitqadeshu khohanim larob. vayismekhu kal qehal yehudah vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haqahal haba’im miyisra’el vehageirim haba’im mei’erets yisra’el vehayoshebim bihudah. vatehi simkhah gedolah birushalim ki mimei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra’el lo khazot birushalim. vayaqumu hakohanim halviyim vaybarakhu ’et ha‘am vayishama‘ beqolam vatabo tefilatam lim‘on qadesho lashamayim. ukhekhalot kal zot yatse’u kal yisra’el hanimtse’im le‘arei yehudah vayshaberu hamatseibot vaygade‘u ha’asheirim vaynatetsu ’et habamot ve’et hamizbekhot mikal yehudah ubinyamin ube’efrayim umenasheh ‘ad lekhaleh vayashubu kal benei yisra’el ’ish la’akhuzato le‘areihem. vaya‘amed yekhizqiyahu ’et makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ‘al makhleqotam ’ish kefi ‘abodato lakohanim velalviyim le‘olah velishlamim lesharet ulehodot ulehalel besha‘arei makhanot yhvh. umenat hamelekh min rekhusho la‘olot le‘olot haboqer veha‘ereb veha‘olot lashabatot velekhodashim velamo‘adim kakatub betorat yhvh. vayomer la‘am leyoshebei yerushalim latet menat hakohanim vehalviyim lema‘an yekhezqu betorat yhvh. vekhifrots hadabar hirbu benei yisra’el reishit dagan tirosh veyitshar udebash vekhol tebu’at sadeh uma‘sar hakol larob heibi’u. ubenei yisra’el vihudah hayoshebim be‘arei yehudah gam hem ma‘sar baqar vatson uma‘sar qadashim hamqudashim yhvh ’eloheihem heibi’u vayitenu ‘areimot ‘areimot. bakhodesh hashelishi heikhelu ha‘areimot leyisod ubakhodesh hashebi‘i kilu. vayabo’u yekhizqiyahu vehasarim vayir’u ’et ha‘areimot vaybarakhu ’et yhvh ve’et ‘amo yisra’el. vayidrosh yekhizqiyahu ‘al hakohanim vehalviyim ‘al ha‘areimot. vayomer ’eilav ‘azaryahu hakohen harosh lebet tsadoq vayomer meihakhel haterumah labi bet yhvh ’akhol vesaboa‘ vehoter ‘ad larob ki yhvh beirakh ’et ‘amo vehanotar ’et hehamon hazeh. vayomer yekhizqiyahu lehakhin leshakhot bebet yhvh vayakhinu. vayabi’u ’et haterumah vehama‘aser vehaqodashim be’emunah va‘aleihem nagid konanyahu kananyahu haleivi veshim‘i ’akhihu mishneh. vikhi’el va‘azazyahu venakhat va‘asah’el virimot veyozabad ve’eli’el veyismakhyahu umakhat ubenayahu peqidim miyad kavnanyahu kananyahu veshim‘i ’akhiv bemifqad yekhizqiyahu hamelekh va‘azaryahu negid bet ha’elohim. veqorei ben yimnah haleivi hasho‘er lamizrakhah ‘al nidbot ha’elohim latet terumat yhvh veqadeshei haqodashim. ve‘al yado ‘eiden uminyamin veyeishua‘ ushema‘yahu ’amaryahu ushekhanyahu be‘arei hakohanim be’emunah latet la’akheihem bemakhleqot kagadol kaqatan. milebad hityakhsam lizkharim miben shalosh shanim ulema‘lah lekhal haba lebet yhvh lidbar yom beyomo la‘abodatam bemishmerotam kemakhleqoteihem. ve’et hityakhes hakohanim lebet ’aboteihem vehalviyim miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah bemishmeroteihem bemakhleqoteihem. ulehityakhes bekhal tapam nesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem lekhal qahal ki be’emunatam yitqadeshu qodesh. velibnei ’aharon hakohanim bisdei migrash ‘areihem bekhal ‘ir va‘ir ’anashim ’asher niqebu besheimot latet manot lekhal zakhar bakohanim ulekhal hityakhes balviyim. vaya‘as kazot yekhizqiyahu bekhal yehudah vaya‘as hatob vehayashar veha’emet lifnei yhvh ’elohav. ubekhal ma‘aseh ’asher heikhel ba‘abodat bet ha’elohim ubatorah ubamitsvah lidrosh leilohav bekhal lebabo ‘asah vehitsliakh. ’akharei hadebarim veha’emet ha’eleh ba sankheirib melekh ’ashur vayabo bihudah vayikhan ‘al he‘arim habetsurot vayomer lebiq‘am ’eilav. vayar yekhizqiyahu ki ba sankheirib ufanav lamilkhamah ‘al yerushalim. vayiva‘ats ‘im sarav vegiborav listom ’et meimei ha‘ayanot ’asher mikhuts la‘ir vaya‘zeruhu. vayiqabetsu ‘am rab vayistemu ’et kal hama‘yanot ve’et hanakhal hashotef betokh ha’arets leimor lamah yabo’u malkhei ’ashur umatse’u mayim rabim. vayitkhazaq vayiben ’et kal hakhomah haperutsah vaya‘al ‘al hamigdalot velakhutsah hakhomah ’akheret vaykhazeq ’et hamilo ‘ir david vaya‘as shelakh larob umaginim. vayiten sarei milkhamot ‘al ha‘am vayiqbetsem ’eilav ’el rekhob sha‘ar ha‘ir vaydaber ‘al lebabam leimor. khizqu ve’imtsu ’al tire’u ve’al teikhatu mipenei melekh ’ashur umilifnei kal hehamon ’asher ‘imo ki ‘imanu rab mei‘imo. ‘imo zeroa‘ basar ve‘imanu yhvh ’eloheinu le‘azereinu ulehilakhem milkhamoteinu vayisamekhu ha‘am ‘al dibrei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah. ’akhar zeh lakh sankheirib melekh ’ashur ‘abadav yerushalaymah vehu ‘al lakhish vekhal memshalto ‘imo ‘al yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah ve‘al kal yehudah ’asher birushalim leimor. koh ’amar sankheirib melekh ’ashur ‘al mah ’atem botekhim veyoshebim bematsor birushalim. halo yekhizqiyahu masit ’etkhem latet ’etkhem lamut bera‘ab ubetsama leimor yhvh ’eloheinu yatsileinu mikaf melekh ’ashur. halo hu yekhizqiyahu heisir ’et bamotav ve’et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim leimor lifnei mizbeiakh ’ekhad tishtakhavu ve‘alav taqtiru. halo teide‘u meh ‘asiti ’ani va’abotai lekhol ‘amei ha’aratsot hayakhol yakhelu ’elohei goyei ha’aratsot lehatsil ’et ’artsam miyadi. mi bekhal ’elohei hagoyim ha’eleh ’asher hekherimu ’abotai ’asher yakhol lehatsil ’et ‘amo miyadi ki yukhal ’eloheikhem lehatsil ’etkhem miyadi. ve‘atah ’al yashi ’etkhem khizqiyahu ve’al yasit ’etkhem kazot ve’al ta’aminu lo ki lo yukhal kal ’eloha kal go umamlakhah lehatsil ‘amo miyadi umiyad ’abotai ’af ki ’eloheikhem lo yatsilu ’etkhem miyadi. ve‘od diberu ‘abadav ‘al yhvh ha’elohim ve‘al yekhizqiyahu ‘abdo. usefarim katab lekharef yhvh ’elohei yisra’el veleimor ‘alav leimor keilohei goyei ha’aratsot ’asher lo hitsilu ‘amam miyadi ken lo yatsil ’elohei yekhizqiyahu ‘amo miyadi. vayiqre’u beqol gadol yehudit ‘al ‘am yerushalim ’asher ‘al hakhomah leyare’am ulebahalam lema‘an yilkedu ’et ha‘ir. vaydaberu ’el ’elohei yerushalim ke‘al ’elohei ‘amei ha’arets ma‘aseh yedei ha’adam. vayitpalel yekhizqiyahu hamelekh visha‘yahu ben ’amots hanabi ‘al zot vayiz‘aqu hashamayim. vayishlakh yhvh mal’akh vayakhkhed kal gibor khayil venagid vesar bemakhaneh melekh ’ashur vayashab beboshet panim le’artso vayabo bet ’elohav umitsi’o umitsi’ei mei‘av sham hipiluhu bekhareb. vayosha‘ yhvh ’et yekhizqiyahu ve’et yoshebei yerushalim miyad sankheirib melekh ’ashur umiyad kol vaynahalem misabib. verabim mebi’im minkhah yhvh lirushalim umigdanot likhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayinasei le‘einei khal hagoyim mei’akharei khen. bayamim hahem khalah yekhizqiyahu ‘ad lamut vayitpalel ’el yhvh vayomer lo umofet natan lo. velo khigmul ‘alav heishib yekhizqiyahu ki gabah libo vayhi ‘alav qetsef ve‘al yehudah virushalim. vayikana‘ yekhizqiyahu begobah libo hu veyoshebei yerushalim velo ba ‘aleihem qetsef yhvh bimei yekhizqiyahu. vayhi likhizqiyahu ‘osher vekhabod harbeh me’od ve’otsarot ‘asah lo lekhesef ulezahab ule’eben yeqarah velibsamim ulemaginim ulekhol kelei khemdah. umiskenot litbu’at dagan vetirosh veyitshar ve’uravot lekhal beheimah ubeheimah va‘adarim la’aveirot. ve‘arim ‘asah lo umiqneh tson ubaqar larob ki natan lo ’elohim rekhush rab me’od. vehu yekhizqiyahu satam ’et motsa meimei gikhon ha‘elyon vayaysherem lematah ma‘rabah le‘ir david vayatslakh yekhizqiyahu bekhal ma‘aseihu. vekhen bimlitsei sarei babel hamshalekhim ‘alav lidrosh hamofet ’asher hayah ba’arets ‘azabo ha’elohim lenasoto lada‘at kal bilbabo. veyeter dibrei yekhizqiyahu vakhasadav hinam ketubim bakhazon yesha‘yahu ben ’amots hanabi ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra’el. vayishkab yekhizqiyahu ‘im ’abotav vayiqberuhu bema‘aleh qibrei benei david vekhabod ‘asu lo bemoto kal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vayimlokh menasheh beno takhtav. ben shetem ‘esreh shanah menasheh bemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim. vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh keto‘abot hagoyim ’asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra’el. vayashab vayiben ’et habamot ’asher nitats yekhizqiyahu ’abiv vayaqem mizbekhot labe‘alim vaya‘as ’asheirot vayishtakhu lekhal tseba hashamayim vaya‘abod ’otam. ubanah mizbekhot bebet yhvh ’asher ’amar yhvh birushalim yihyeh shemi le‘olam. vayiben mizbekhot lekhal tseba hashamayim bishtei khatsrot bet yhvh. vehu he‘ebir ’et banav ba’esh begei ben hinom ve‘onen venikhesh vekhishef ve‘asah ’ob veyide‘oni hirbah la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhvh lehakh‘iso. vayasem ’et pesel hasemel ’asher ‘asah bebet ha’elohim ’asher ’amar ’elohim ’el david ve’el shelomoh beno babayit hazeh ubirushalim ’asher bakharti mikol shibtei yisra’el ’asim ’et shemi le‘eilom. velo ’osif lehasir ’et regel yisra’el mei‘al ha’adamah ’asher he‘emadti la’aboteikhem raq ’im yishmeru la‘asot ’et kal ’asher tsivitim lekhal hatorah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim beyad mosheh. vayeta‘ menasheh ’et yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim la‘asot ra‘ min hagoyim ’asher hishmid yhvh mipenei benei yisra’el. vaydaber yhvh ’el menasheh ve’el ‘amo velo hiqshibu. vayabei yhvh ‘aleihem ’et sarei hatsaba ’asher lemelekh ’ashur vayilkedu ’et menasheh bakhokhim vaya’asruhu bankhushtayim vayolikhuhu babelah. ukhehatser lo khilah ’et penei yhvh ’elohav vayikana‘ me’od milifnei ’elohei ’abotav. vayitpalel ’eilav vayei‘ater lo vayishma‘ tekhinato vayshibeihu yerushalim lemalkhuto vayeida‘ menasheh ki yhvh hu ha’elohim. ve’akharei khen banah khomah khitsonah le‘ir david ma‘rabah legikhon banakhal velabo besha‘ar hadagim vesabab la‘ofel vayagbiheha me’od vayasem sarei khayil bekhal he‘arim habetsurot bihudah. vayasar ’et ’elohei haneikhar ve’et hasemel mibet yhvh vekhal hamizbekhot ’asher banah behar bet yhvh ubirushalim vayashlekh khutsah la‘ir. vayakhen vayiben ’et mizbakh yhvh vayizbakh ‘alav zibkhei shelamim vetodah vayomer lihudah la‘abod ’et yhvh ’elohei
