yisra’el. ’abal ‘od ha‘am zobekhim babamot raq yhvh ’eloheihem. veyeter dibrei menasheh utefilato ’el ’elohav vedibrei hakhozim hamdaberim ’eilav beshem yhvh ’elohei yisra’el hinam ‘al dibrei malkhei yisra’el. utefilato vehei‘ater lo vekhal khatato uma‘lo vehameqomot ’asher banah bahem bamot vehe‘emid ha’asheirim vehapesilim lifnei hikane‘o hinam ketubim ‘al dibrei khozai. vayishkab menasheh ‘im ’abotav vayiqberuhu beito vayimlokh ’amon beno takhtav. ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim. vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh ka’asher ‘asah menasheh ’abiv ulekhal hapesilim ’asher ‘asah menasheh ’abiv zibakh ’amon vaya‘abdem. velo nikhna‘ milifnei yhvh kehikana‘ menasheh ’abiv ki hu ’amon hirbah ’ashmah. vayiqsheru ‘alav ‘abadav vaymituhu bebeito. vayaku ‘am ha’arets ’et kal haqosherim ‘al hamelekh ’amon vayamlikhu ‘am ha’arets ’et yoshiyahu beno takhtav. ben shemoneh shanim yoshiyahu bemalekho usheloshim ve’akhat shanah malakh birushalim. vaya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhvh vayeilekh bedarkhei david ’abiv velo sar yamin usemol. ubishmoneh shanim lemalekho vehu ‘odenu na‘ar heikhel lidrosh leilohei david ’abiv ubishtem ‘esreh shanah heikhel letaher ’et yehudah virushalim min habamot veha’asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot. vaynatetsu lefanav ’et mizbekhot habe‘alim vehakhamanim ’asher lema‘lah mei‘aleihem gideia‘ veha’asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot shibar veheidaq vayizroq ‘al penei haqebarim hazobekhim lahem. ve‘atsmot kohanim saraf ‘al mizbekhotaym mizbekhotam vaytaher ’et yehudah ve’et yerushalim. ube‘arei menasheh ve’efrayim veshim‘on ve‘ad naftali bahar bateihem bekharboteihem sabib. vaynatets ’et hamizbekhot ve’et ha’asheirim vehapesilim kitat leheidaq vekhal hakhamanim gida‘ bekhal ’erets yisra’el vayashab lirushalim. ubishnat shemoneh ‘esreh lemalekho letaher ha’arets vehabayit lakh ’et shafan ben ’atsalyahu ve’et ma‘aseiyahu sar ha‘ir ve’et yo’akh ben yo’akhaz hamazkir lekhazeq ’et bet yhvh ’elohav. vayabo’u ’el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol vayitenu ’et hakesef hamuba bet ’elohim ’asher ’asefu halviyim shomerei hasaf miyad menasheh ve’efrayim umikol she’eirit yisra’el umikal yehudah ubinyamin veyoshebei vayashubu yerushalim. vayitenu ‘al yad ‘oseh hamelakhah hamufqadim bebet yhvh vayitenu ’oto ‘osei hamelakhah ’asher ‘osim bebet yhvh libdoq ulekhazeq habayit. vayitenu lekharashim velabonim liqnot ’abnei makhtseb ve‘eitsim lamkhaberot uleqarot ’et habatim ’asher hishkhitu malkhei yehudah. veha’anashim ‘osim be’emunah bamelakhah va‘aleihem mufqadim yakhat ve‘obadyahu halviyim min benei merari uzekharyah umeshulam min benei haqehatim lenatseiakh vehalviyim kal meibin bikhlei shir. ve‘al hasabalim umenatsekhim lekhol ‘oseh melakhah la‘abodah va‘abodah umeihalviyim sofrim veshoterim vesho‘arim. ubehotsi’am ’et hakesef hamuba bet yhvh matsa khilqiyahu hakohen ’et seifer torat yhvh beyad mosheh. vaya‘an khilqiyahu vayomer ’el shafan hasofer seifer hatorah matsati bebet yhvh vayiten khilqiyahu ’et haseifer ’el shafan. vayabei shafan ’et haseifer ’el hamelekh vayasheb ‘od ’et hamelekh dabar leimor kol ’asher nitan beyad ‘abadekha hem ‘osim. vayatikhu ’et hakesef hanimtsa bebet yhvh vayitenuhu ‘al yad hamufqadim ve‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah. vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyahu hakohen vayiqra bo shafan lifnei hamelekh. vayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et dibrei hatorah vayiqra‘ ’et begadav. vaytsav hamelekh ’et khilqiyahu ve’et ’akhiqam benosha fan ve’et ‘abdon ben mikhah ve’et shafan hasofer ve’et ‘asayah ‘ebed hamelekh leimor. lekhu dirshu ’et yhvh ba‘adi ube‘ad hanish’ar beyisra’el ubihudah ‘al dibrei haseifer ’asher nimtsa ki gedolah khamat yhvh ’asher nitekhah banu ‘al ’asher lo shameru ’aboteinu ’et debar yhvh la‘asot kekhal hakatub ‘al haseifer hazeh. vayeilekh khilqiyahu va’asher hamelekh ’el khuldah hanebi’ah ’eishet shalum ben toqhat taqehat ben khasrah shomer habegadim vehi yoshebet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu ’eileha kazot. vatomer lahem koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el ’imru la’ish ’asher shalakh ’etkhem ’eilai. koh ’amar yhvh hini meibi ra‘ah ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshebav ’et kal ha’alot haketubot ‘al haseifer ’asher qare’u lifnei melekh yehudah. takhat ’asher ‘azabuni vayaqtiru vayqateru leilohim ’akheirim lema‘an hakh‘iseini bekhol ma‘asei yedeihem vetitakh khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. ve’el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh ’etkhem lidrosh yhvh koh tomeru ’eilav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el hadebarim ’asher shama‘eta. ya‘an rakh lebabekha vatikana‘ milifnei ’elohim beshame‘akha ’et debarav ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshebav vatikana‘ lefanai vatiqra‘ ’et begadekha vateibek lefanai vegam ’ani shama‘ti ne’um yhvh. hini ’osifkha ’el ’abotekha vene’esafta ’el qibrotekha beshalom velo tir’enah ‘einekha bekhol hara‘ah ’asher ’ani meibi ‘al hamaqom hazeh ve‘al yoshebav vayashibu ’et hamelekh dabar. vayishlakh hamelekh vaye’esof ’et kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. vaya‘al hamelekh bet yhvh vekhal ’ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal ha‘am migadol ve‘ad qatan vayiqra be’azeneihem ’et kal dibrei seifer haberit hanimtsa bet yhvh. vaya‘amod hamelekh ‘al ‘amedo vayikhrot ’et haberit lifnei yhvh lalekhet ’akharei yhvh velishmor ’et mitsvotav ve‘eidevotav vekhuqav bekhal lebabo ubekhal nafsho la‘asot ’et dibrei haberit haketubim ‘al haseifer hazeh. vaya‘amed ’et kal hanimtsa birushalim ubinyamin vaya‘asu yoshebei yerushalim kibrit ’elohim ’elohei ’aboteihem. vayasar yoshiyahu ’et kal hato‘eibot mikal ha’aratsot ’asher libnei yisra’el vaya‘abed ’et kal hanimtsa beyisra’el la‘abod ’et yhvh ’eloheihem kal yamav lo saru mei’akharei yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem. vaya‘as yoshiyahu birushalim pesakh yhvh vayishkhatu hapesakh be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh harishon. vaya‘amed hakohanim ‘al mishmerotam vaykhazeqem la‘abodat bet yhvh. vayomer lalviyim hamebunim hamebinim lekhal yisra’el haqedoshim yhvh tenu ’et ’aron haqodesh babayit ’asher banah shelomoh ben david melekh yisra’el ’en lakhem masa bakatef ‘atah ‘ibdu ’et yhvh ’eloheikhem ve’et ‘amo yisra’el. vehikonu lebet ’aboteikhem kemakhleqoteikhem bikhtab david melekh yisra’el ubemikhtab shelomoh beno. ve‘imdu baqodesh liflugot bet ha’abot la’akheikhem benei ha‘am vakhaluqat bet ’ab lalviyim. veshakhatu hapasakh vehitqadeshu vehakhinu la’akheikhem la‘asot kidbar yhvh beyad mosheh. vayarem yoshiyahu libnei ha‘am tson kebasim ubenei ‘izim hakol lapesakhim lekhal hanimtsa lemispar sheloshim ’elef ubaqar sheloshet ’alafim ’eleh meirekhush hamelekh. vesarav lindabah la‘am lakohanim velalviyim heirimu khilqiyah uzekharyahu vikhi’el negidei bet ha’elohim lakohanim natenu lapesakhim ’alpayim veshesh mei’ot ubaqar shelosh mei’ot. vekhavnanyahu vekhananyahu ushema‘yahu unetan’el ’ekhav vakhashabyahu vi‘i’el veyozabad sarei halviyim heirimu lalviyim lapesakhim khameishet ’alafim ubaqar khamesh mei’ot. vatikon ha‘abodah vaya‘amdu hakohanim ‘al ‘amedam vehalviyim ‘al makhleqotam kemitsvat hamelekh. vayishkhatu hapasakh vayizrequ hakohanim miyadam vehalviyim mafshitim. vayasiru ha‘olah letitam lemiflagot lebet ’abot libnei ha‘am lehaqrib yhvh kakatub beseifer mosheh vekhen labaqar. vaybashelu hapesakh ba’esh kamishpat vehaqodashim bishelu basirot ubadevadim ubatseilakhot vayaritsu lekhal benei ha‘am. ve’akhar heikhinu lahem velakohanim ki hakohanim benei ’aharon beha‘alot ha‘olah vehakhalabim ‘ad layelah vehalviyim heikhinu lahem velakohanim benei ’aharon. vehamshorarim benei ’asaf ‘al ma‘amadam kemitsvat david ve’asaf veheiman vidutun khozeh hamelekh vehasho‘arim lesha‘ar vasha‘ar ’en lahem lasur mei‘al ‘abodatam ki ’akheihem halviyim heikhinu lahem. vatikon kal ‘abodat yhvh bayom hahu la‘asot hapesakh veha‘alot ‘olot ‘al mizbakh yhvh kemitsvat hamelekh yoshiyahu. vaya‘asu benei yisra’el hanimtse’im ’et hapesakh ba‘et hahi ve’et khag hamatsot shib‘at yamim. velo na‘asah fesakh kamohu beyisra’el mimei shemu’el hanabi vekhal malkhei yisra’el lo ‘asu kapesakh ’asher ‘asah yoshiyahu vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal yehudah veyisra’el hanimtsa veyoshebei yerushalim. bishmoneh ‘esreh shanah lemalkhut yoshiyahu na‘asah hapesakh hazeh. ’akharei khal zot ’asher heikhin yoshiyahu ’et habayit ‘alah nekho melekh mitsrayim lehilakhem bekharkemish ‘al perat vayeitsei liqrato yoshiyahu. vayishlakh ’eilav mal’akhim leimor mah li valakh melekh yehudah lo ‘alekha ’atah hayom ki ’el bet milkhamti veilohim ’amar lebahaleini khadal lekha mei’elohim ’asher ‘imi ve’al yashkhitekha. velo heiseb yoshiyahu fanav mimenu ki lehilakhem bo hitkhapes velo shama‘ ’el dibrei nekho mipi ’elohim vayabo lehilakhem bebiq‘at megido. vayoru hayorim lamelekh yoshiyahu vayomer hamelekh la‘abadav ha‘abiruni ki hakholeiti me’od. vaya‘abiruhu ‘abadav min hamerkabah vayarkibuhu ‘al rekheb hamishneh ’asher lo vayolikhuhu yerushalim vayamat vayiqaber beqibrot ’abotav vekhal yehudah virushalim mit’abelim ‘al yoshiyahu. vayqonen yirmeyahu ‘al yoshiyahu vayomeru khal hasharim vehasharot beqinoteihem ‘al yoshiyahu ‘ad hayom vayitenum lekhoq ‘al yisra’el vehinam ketubim ‘al haqinot. veyeter dibrei yoshiyahu vakhasadav kakatub betorat yhvh. udebarav harishonim veha’akharonim hinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah. vayiqkhu ‘am ha’arets ’et yeho’akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayamlikhuhu takhat ’abiv birushalim. ben shalosh ve‘esrim shanah yo’akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim. vaysireihu melekh mitsrayim birushalim vaya‘anosh ’et ha’arets mei’ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahab. vayamlekh melekh mitsrayim ’et ’elyaqim ’akhiv ‘al yehudah virushalim vayaseb ’et shemo yehoyaqim ve’et yo’akhaz ’akhiv laqakh nekho vaybi’eihu mitsrayemah. ben ‘esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh ’elohav. ‘alav ‘alah nebukhadnetsar melekh babel vaya’asreihu bankhushtayim leholikho babelah. umikelei bet yhvh heibi nebukhadnetsar lebabel vayitenem beheikhalo bebabel. veyeter dibrei yehoyaqim veto‘abotav ’asher ‘asah vehanimtsa ‘alav hinam ketubim ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’el vihudah vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. ben shemoneh shanim yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim va‘aseret yamim malakh birushalim vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh. velitshubat hashanah shalakh hamelekh nebukhadnetsar vaybi’eihu babelah ‘im kelei khemdat bet yhvh vayamlekh ’et tsidqiyahu ’akhiv ‘al yehudah virushalim. ben ‘esrim ve’akhat shanah tsidqiyahu bemalekho ve’akhat ‘esreh shanah malakh birushalim. vaya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhvh ’elohav lo nikhna‘ milifnei yirmeyahu hanabi mipi yhvh. vegam bamelekh nebukhadnetsar marad ’asher hishbi‘o beilohim vayeqesh ’et ‘arepo vai’amets ’et lebabo mishub ’el yhvh ’elohei yisra’el. gam kal sarei hakohanim veha‘am hirbu lim‘al ma‘al kekhol to‘abot hagoyim vaytame’u ’et bet yhvh ’asher hiqdish birushalim. vayishlakh yhvh ’elohei ’aboteihem ‘aleihem beyad mal’akhav hashkem veshaloakh ki khamal ‘al ‘amo ve‘al me‘ono. vayihyu mal‘ibim bemal’akhei ha’elohim ubozim debarav umita‘te‘im binbi’av ‘ad ‘alot khamat yhvh be‘amo ‘ad le’en marpei. vaya‘al ‘aleihem ’et melekh kasdiyim kasdim vayaharog bakhureihem bakhereb bebet miqdasham velo khamal ‘al bakhur ubetulah zaqen veyashesh hakol natan beyado. vekhol kelei bet ha’elohim hagedolim vehaqetanim ve’otserot bet yhvh ve’otserot hamelekh vesarav hakol heibi babel. vayisrefu ’et bet ha’elohim vaynatetsu ’et khomat yerushalim vekhal ’armenoteha sarefu ba’esh vekhal kelei makhamadeha lehashkhit. vayegel hashe’eirit min hakhereb ’el babel vayihyu lo ulebanav la‘abadim ‘ad melokh malkhut paras. lemalot debar yhvh befi yirmeyahu ‘ad ratsetah ha’arets ’et shabetoteha kal yemei hashamah shabatah lemalot shib‘im shanah. ubishnat ’akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot debar yhvh befi yirmeyahu hei‘ir yhvh ’et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya‘aber qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtab leimor. koh ’amar koresh melekh paras kal mamlekhot ha’arets natan li yhvh ’elohei hashamayim vehu faqad ‘alai libnot lo bayit birushalim ’asher bihudah mi bakhem mikal ‘amo yhvh ’elohav ‘imo veya‘al.
